column5: >The revolutionary interactive music device that reduces night-time crying and helps develop your baby's brain in one simple product.

column1:
The miracle of sleep

Being a parent is never easy, we always want to give our child the best start in life, but the demands of parenting sometimes become overwhelming, especially on those sleepless nights of endless crying.
Quiet Night combines an interactive handle that a baby can pull, combined with an intelligent application that learns your child's musical tastes and then develops with your child.
The app and basestation come packed with over a hundred handpicked(by a child psychologist) songs. We will also add more to download as our research continues.
The solution is here and over twenty years of research and development have produced Quiet Night's unique and patented technology.

The Science

Over twenty years of Professor Tom's life revolved around research for Quiet Night, luckily we still have a video of Tom doing what he loved best, talking passionately about how and why Quiet Night works.

column5: > Child pulls on the Quiet Night handle.
> When pulled the Quiet Night plays a song from its library of hundreds of child friendly melodies.
> The longer the child pulls the handle the more they like that piece of music.
> Quiet Night intelligently learns which music the child likes and automatically changes the music as the baby's brain grows.
> Because the child is engaged and learning, they cry less, allowing you more sleep!

column1: One of the most important realizations of Tom's research was that rather than the on and off mentality of adult humans, babies work differently. It takes a while for a baby to learn to pull on the handle and for them to learn that as long as they pull on the handle the music continues playing. But once they learn this and gain control over their environment they really do interact with the device extensively.

It is best not to give Quiet Night to your baby until his coordination is sufficiently developed - usually at about 4 months. If your young baby does not quickly learn to enjoy pulling the handle, take it away for a week or two and then try again.
Professor Tom tried the prototypes on many many children over twenty years and found that crying could be reduced by up to fifty percent.

He additionally found that very young children like 'elevator music' and as children grow up they prefer more sophisticated music such as classical. Quiet Night will always automatically find the best music for your child's development.

It contains everything you need to make Quiet night work including 125+ hand picked songs and the learning algorithms. Contains everything you need to use Quiet Night out of the box including the handle and wireless base station.
The basestation comes with pre loaded songs so you don't even need a wifi connection to use it, just plug it in and the rest is easy.
The basestation is mains powered and can be up to 10m (30feet) from the Quiet Night handle.

The App

This completely free app works with the Quiet Night and contains over 125+ hand picked songs with the option to download more.
Quiet Night does not just learn about your baby's musical preferences it allows you to see your child's development in real time.
The app will be available for iOS and Android (see Q&
column2: A) for specific requirements. If you do not have a compatible phone or do not want to use your own you can always add the optional base station.

column1: The app uses wireless bluetooth to detect if the handle is being pulled and should work within 10m (30feet).
After 20 years of research and development, multiple prototypes and hundreds of baby tests we need your help to get us past the final goal post and turn Tom's idea into reality.
We have partnered with two amazing and experienced development companies to make sure that with your help we can get the product into your hands as soon as possible.
DesignWorks is our product development partner and they will use their 25 years of experience designing and manufacturing children’s products for global brands such as Hasbro and Clarks shoes.

Rainmakers is our incubator and have helped hundreds of companies launch over their twenty years in business development. They have worked with some of the leading companies and brands in the world, including BT, Smarta and both the UK and US government.
<div>We are lucky to have<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: > some of the best industrial designers working on this product, and every part of the project from concept to manufacturing has been extensively researched and evaluated. DesignWorks has extensive manufacturing experience and have their own manufacturing capabilities. This ensures that there are no surprises along the way and your Quiet Night reaches you on time and at the best quality.

column1: We have an amazing team of experienced professionals at the helm of this campaign, combined they have almost a hundred years of experience delivering products and technology into market.
Our stretch perks allow you to get added benefits the bigger the campaign gets! Want to help us get there? Helps us with our referral program below!
The safety of your little one is our highest priority, below we outline why this product is safe for your little one.
Each type of material has been chosen for safety, the handle material is the same type of material they use in pacifiers.
The handle is ergonomically designed to be safe for whatever your little one throws at it, the non closed loop makes sure that your baby does not get their hand stuck while pulling the handle.
With ultra low power bluetooth allowing the placement of the basestation or phone well away from your little one we make sure that there are no strong electrical fields near your child's body.
Before you get a Quiet Night our product will go through extensive testing with the leading certification agencies in the world.

Handle Material : TPE(same material as used in pacifiers)
Unit Material : PC+ABS

Material : PC+ABS
Sound : Stereo Audio
Power Source : Mains adapter, micro USB
OS : Android
Wireless : Wifi, Bluetooth

Supported operating systems : IOS, Android
Learning Algorithm : Frequency, (ANNs) Artificial Neural Networks 
Royalty Free Music Libary : 125+ Tracks
Data Storage : Cloud
Developer API : RESTful
*Technical Specifications Subject to Minor Reasonable Changes

Q: What age children can use it?
A: A child as young as 4 months to 3 years old can use the device, however every child develops at a different rate some children can't pull the handle until month 6, so don't give up easily!

Q: How does it stop crying?
A:  By keeping the little one engaged and giving them control over their environment professor Tom discovered  that your baby will cry less because it is engaged and is not looking for attention.

Q: You say it stops crying by up to 50% is that guaranteed?
A:  Obviously every baby is different and your baby will still cry(especially when hungry!) the late and great professor Tom found that on average a night with Quiet Night will reduce typical crying by 30% in most babies and up to 50% in some, he calculated that on average that was an extra hour of sleep for the parents.

Q: How does it develop my children's brain?
A: Professor Tom discovered that children that used the device had a quicker preference for complex music which he believed is an indicator in brain development. Many studies have shown that music can improve a child's development some are listed here:
Though question of the Mozart effect still needs further research and we hope that we will be able to input into these results once we start building long term data.

Q: Can you detect child development problems?
A: At this point we don't know, it makes sense that we should be able to detect behavior anomalies across large data sets, we hope to work with the leading doctors in the field to find out....if you are a leading professional in child development and you are interested in working with us get in touch. We will never disclose any results unless you specifically ask and of course all data is confidential  and anonymized.

Q: How much music does it come with?
A: At least 125 tracks covering most clasical and soothing music music genres, including some white noise and other noise patters. Sorry rappers and hard rock we left you out....though you can add your own tracks so your little one can become a rock god!

Q: Can I add my own music?
A: Yes, MP3 in the app....we may add support for a music store at a later date.

Q: Where do you ship internationally to?
A: All developed countries. You will be responsible for any tax or custom issues or costs.

Q: What type of phone do I need?
A: If you don't purchase the base station you need an Apple iPhone or Android Phone or Tablet that is less than a year old. It may work on older phones and we may release for other OS systems but we can't promise it.

Q: Do I need a separate phone or tablet?
A: If you don't purchase an optional base station then yes you will need to use a bluetooth compatible phone or tablet.

Q: What color is it?
A: Unless you buy the limited edition version, its white with a transparent green handle.

Q: Does Tom's family still benefit from his legacy?
A: Yes we have made sure that Tom's family has been part of the process and benefits from his legacy.

Q: How many babies has it been tested on?
A: We believe Professor Tom tested it on up to 100 babies over twenty years, including, we believe Princess Beatrice!

Q: What??!??! How did Princess Beatrice have it as a kid?
A: So the story goes that there was some connection between professor Tom and  Fergie, and when Beatrice was born Tom lent her one of the first devices. Apparently it worked very well and somewhere there is a letter from the palace thanking Tom for his wonderful device...trust us, we are trying to find the letter!

Q: Can you download extra music on the app?
A: We plan to have both free and premium music options available on top of the 125+ handpicked songs available by default.

Q: Who else helped Tom with the research?
A: Tom's wife Sue Blackmore helped Tom with the concept and research and writes for several magazines and newspapers, blogs for the Guardian newspaper and Psychology Today, and is a frequent contributor and presenter on radio and television. She is author of over sixty academic articles, about eighty book contributions, and many book reviews.
Other people helped in his research as well, but many of these contacts were lost over the years, if you helped in the research and want a mention please do reach out.

Q: Who should I get in contact with about Press Enquiries?
A: Julia Mitchell from Toast PR will be able to deal with any press issues please contact JuliaMitchell@toastpr.co.uk

Q: How do I get in contact with the team?
A: Email : info@thequietnight.com
Q: I want to know more about the late and great Professor Tom?
","The revolutionary interactive music device that reduces night-time crying and helps develop your baby's brain in one simple product.

The miracle of sleep Being a parent is never easy, we always want to give our child the best start in life, but the demands of parenting sometimes become overwhelming, especially on those sleepless nights of endless crying.
Quiet Night combines an interactive handle that a baby can pull, combined with an intelligent application that learns your child's musical tastes and then develops with your child.
The app and basestation come packed with over a hundred handpicked(by a child psychologist) songs. We will also add more to download as our research continues.
The solution is here and over twenty years of research and development have produced Quiet Night's unique and patented technology.

The Science Over twenty years of Professor Tom's life revolved around research for Quiet Night, luckily we still have a video of Tom doing what he loved best, talking passionately about how and why Quiet Night works.
Child pulls on the Quiet Night handle.
When pulled the Quiet Night plays a song from its library of hundreds of child friendly melodies.
The longer the child pulls the handle the more they like that piece of music.
Quiet Night intelligently learns which music the child likes and automatically changes the music as the baby's brain grows.
Because the child is engaged and learning, they cry less, allowing you more sleep!

One of the most important realizations of Tom's research was that rather than the on and off mentality of adult humans, babies work differently. It takes a while for a baby to learn to pull on the handle and for them to learn that as long as they pull on the handle the music continues playing. But once they learn this and gain control over their environment they really do interact with the device extensively.

It is best not to give Quiet Night to your baby until his coordination is sufficiently developed - usually at about 4 months. If your young baby does not quickly learn to enjoy pulling the handle, take it away for a week or two and then try again.
Professor Tom tried the prototypes on many many children over twenty years and found that crying could be reduced by up to fifty percent.

He additionally found that very young children like 'elevator music' and as children grow up they prefer more sophisticated music such as classical. Quiet Night will always automatically find the best music for your child's development.

It contains everything you need to make Quiet night work including 125+ hand picked songs and the learning algorithms. Contains everything you need to use Quiet Night out of the box including the handle and wireless base station.
The basestation comes with pre loaded songs so you don't even need a wifi connection to use it, just plug it in and the rest is easy.
The basestation is mains powered and can be up to 10m (30feet) from the Quiet Night handle.
The App This completely free app works with the Quiet Night and contains over 125+ hand picked songs with the option to download more.
Quiet Night does not just learn about your baby's musical preferences it allows you to see your child's development in real time.
The app will be available for iOS and Android (see Q&A) for specific requirements. If you do not have a compatible phone or do not want to use your own you can always add the optional base station.
The app uses wireless bluetooth to detect if the handle is being pulled and should work within 10m (30feet).

Rainmakers is our incubator and have helped hundreds of companies launch over their twenty years in business development. They have worked with some of the leading companies and brands in the world, including BT, Smarta and both the UK and US government.

This ensures that there are no surprises along the way and your Quiet Night reaches you on time and at the best quality.

About me &
column2:
why GLANCE? 

Hi! My name is Anya.
I live and work in the Bay Area and have been a self-employed freelance designer/developer for over a decade. I am absolutely obsessed with perfecting ways to manage my tasks and time during the day. 

I use everything: dry erase boards, notepads, sticky notes, mnemonic techniques, etc. These tools are simple, easy to use, and serve my productivity in exactly the way I expect them to. However, I also love technology and throughout years I have tried MULTIPLE, if not all, TO-DO  apps available on the market. 

They all fail to serve my productivity in the way I expect them to. 

Have you tried many TO-DO apps and still searching?..

If you are like me (seeking maximum time efficiency and productivity in your day), then you have probably tried multiple TO-DO apps that exist out there. S

column3:
>Fight Procrastination effectively!

- Have you ever had an experience of avoiding a task again and again only to discover that it was not as hard as you though it would be once you finally got to working on it?

- Do you have any tasks that you have been avoiding for a long time OR indefinitely?..

- Do you indulge in so-called ""productive procrastination"" by doing a lot of non-essential tasks while avoiding truly important ones? 

If you are honest with yourself, then for you (as well as for me) the answers to these questions are YES, YES, and YES.

column1: As you probably know, raising funds for an app is very challenging as there is not much to be offered for any donation amount above just few dollars. To solve this challenge, I got in touch with two authors: Seth Braun (""Indestructible Success""), whom I know personally and whose public speaking and entrepreneurial skills I admire greatly, and Steve Chandler, who's book, ""Time Warrior"", has been my favorite companion for years and is an inspiration on my path for mastering my entrepreneurial and time skills. In fact, it is the ""Time Warrior"" spirit that inspires the creation of this app! Both Steve and Seth have agreed to support my project and have allowed me to offer their books as perks in this campaign.
With your support (depending on your support level), you can receive Time Warrior as a PDF and audio book and Seth Braun's Indestructible Success in hard-copy format! :)
I am thrilled for this opportunity to share these two absolutely wonderful books with you! Thank you for your support and I look forward to releasing and sharing GLANCE with you very soon!

","GLANCE Website:www.glance.rocks (note: I will be adding more information, descriptions, screenshots, etc. as campaign progresses and app is being developed)About me & why GLANCE? Hi! My name is Anya.I live and work in the Bay Area and have been a self-employed freelance designer/developer for over a decade. I am absolutely obsessed with perfecting ways to manage my tasks and time during the day. I use everything: dry erase boards, notepads, sticky notes, mnemonic techniques, etc. These tools are simple, easy to use, and serve my productivity in exactly the way I expect them to. However, I also love technology and throughout years I have tried MULTIPLE, if not all, TO-DO  apps available on the market. They all fail to serve my productivity in the way I expect them to. Have you tried many TO-DO apps and still searching?..If you are like me (seeking maximum time efficiency and productivity in your day), then you have probably tried multiple TO-DO apps that exist out there. Some are overly complex, others are too simple, yet others seem to pay more attention to how they look rather than how they work. The most critical flaw of all TO-DO apps I've tried is that they fail to account for the most essential feature - TIME MANAGEMENT.Effective Time Management 101: Knowing how long each task should take.Yes. Exactly.However, virtually all TO-DO apps currently on the market are really nothing more then sophisticated notepad lists with tasks that are chaotically grouped, tagged, assigned to various calendar slots with due dates and priority flags. They provide absolutely no way of telling how much time a given list of tasks is going to take to accomplish. Why do they lack this feature? Honestly, I don't know, but I intend to create an app that will focus directly on time estimates for tasks  &  daily time management, as well as provide other features to help you calibrate time estimations, daily commitment levels, and effectively fight procrastination.
>> You HAVE to see the TOTAL TIME ESTIMATE of your list for TODAY <<

THIS is the only way to avoid over-commitment with its consequent frustration AND under-accomplishment which leads to working into the night, destroying your sleep pattern and reducing productivity of the following day
column2: only to pick up even more commitments in an attempt to make up for the previous day's failure!And this is the function that I always miss in all other TO-DO apps I have tried.Fight Procrastination effectively!- Have you ever had an experience of avoiding a task again and again only to discover that it was not as hard as you though it would be once you finally got to working on it?- Do you have any tasks that you have been avoiding for a long time OR indefinitely?..- Do you indulge in so-called ""productive procrastination"" by doing a lot of non-essential tasks while avoiding truly important ones? If you are honest with yourself, then for you (as well as for me) the answers to these questions are YES, YES, and YES.GLANCE will have features that will aim at fighting this common corrosion of time, willpower, and perception that stands in the way of achieving our true potential. It will help you to become a true warrior of your day. Day after day. Task by task. Hour by hour.  >> Don't overcommit, fight procrastination, ""eat frogs"" and focus on your ONE THING while avoiding distractions and COMPLETING lists!   <<

column1: Here are some main features that GLANCE will have:
Create a list just for TODAY (the ""DO"" list) made out of various task selections from your ""LISTS"" collection (you can create as many of these LISTS as you wish).
Move and sort tasks to and from the DO list with a simple swipe.
Set time estimates, priorities items, and see the Total Time Estimate of the DO list.
Decide to commit to a list  once you believe it is realistic (time-wise).
See how accurate your time estimations are for various tasks at the end of the day.
KICK"" tasks to the future and see if there are patterns there
Create a ""SUPERLIST"" of only those tasks that you keep avoiding! Eat those frogs!
Block out your time for your most important goals. Avoid distractions.
Be reminded with inspirational quotes of how to stay on top of your goals and achieve your dreams!
Let's create this app together!  I will need your support and I would LOVE you to see GLANCE in action. Try it and use it in your everyday life!
Moreover, I will commit to listening to your advice, suggestions, and requests for modifications.

In the future, I would love to expand GLANCE's features with some lessons from Behavioral Economics. GLANCE will let you choose if you want to be ""punished"" for under-performance/procrastination by allowing it to charge you if you fail to check off items from your ""committed"" lists by the end of the day (a few cents or a few dollars: go as easy or as harsh on yourself as you wish
A lot of research shows that such features greatly boost productivity and help people achieve goals they've been struggling with for a long time.

As you probably know, raising funds for an app is very challenging as there is not much to be offered for any donation amount above just few dollars. To solve this challenge, I got in touch with two authors: Seth Braun (""Indestructible Success""), whom I know personally and whose public speaking and entrepreneurial skills I admire greatly, and Steve Chandler, who's book, ""Time Warrior"", has been my favorite companion for years and is an inspiration on my path for mastering my entrepreneurial and time skills. In fact, it is the ""Time Warrior"" spirit that inspires the creation of this app! Both Steve and Seth have agreed to support my project and have allowed me to offer their books as perks in this campaign.
With your support (depending on your support level), you can receive Time Warrior as a PDF and audio book and Seth Braun's Indestructible Success in hard-copy format! :)
I am thrilled for this opportunity to share these two absolutely wonderful books with you! Thank you for your support and I look forward to releasing and sharing GLANCE with you very soon!
Yours, in the Time Warrior Spirit,

column2:
>What is the BeFree?

The BeFree is the world’s smallest, wireless, and most powerful router. With 802.11n, 1Gbps Ethernet, USB port, and OpenWRT based operating system, BeFree brings you the mobility, flexibility, and power of business-class routers. Because of the USB port, you do not need to take a power adapter with you anymore, you can just draw power from any USB equipped device like your notebook or powerbank. And that is not all! The BeFree is preconfigured to work with TOR and/or VPN services, so you take anonymity with you. You do not have to worry about censure in your area or spying government at all, your network traffic will get encrypted and anonymized with no inconvenience. With its easy to use graphical user interface, it is simple to setup and manage it, even for beginners, and for professionals, there is an advanced interface that provides you all the power of OpenWRT and similiar router firmwares.
column3:
>Main advantages of the BeFree:

The main advantage of the BeFree router is its power in the body the size of a credit card. Literally no other router can give to you such abilities in measurement and price range of the BeFree, bringing you business-class routers possibilities for the price of an average home router. And as a bonus, all of the software running in the BeFree will be Open Source. Also, with support of OpenWRT package management, you can write your own extensions and applications, so you can use all of the performance the BeFree offers. With its quad-core CPU and 1GB RAM, you can operationalize almost any ARM software you could like. From the start, there will be BitTorrent client transmission available.
column4:
>What does the BeFree offer you?

Access to every great feature is made in two ways. First, a simple and effortless elegant graphical user interface and second, more advanced with all the configuring left to the user. The BeFree router offers to you every feature you could possibly want from your router and even more. With an available USB port, the BeFree can be used as ethernet-to-USB or wifi adapter for your ultrabook such as ZenBook, MacBook Air, or others to provide stable and reliable online access anywhere on your travels. Simply connect a network cable to your ultrabook via USB and enjoy the Internet connection. With all of this, securing your Internet connection is easy as connecting a cable. It doesn’t matter if you are using the BeFree as a Access point, hotspot, adapter, or in any other mode, every connection flowing through the device can be torrified and/or VPNed.
column5:
>Three simple steps..

Using the BeFree is meant to be simple and fail-proof with its default plug &
column6: surf design. After connecting ethernet cable to the device and USB cable to the PC, adapter mode will be automatically detected and all traffic will be by default torrified, providing to you security by physical isolation and no undesirable leaks that could lead to revealing your identity online. If only the USB cable is plugged in, the web interface will automatically bring up for next configuring.<h3 style=""text-align: center
column7:
>How it Works?

By default, every connection made through the BeFree is encrypted via TOR network, but it is not limited only to it. With integrated OpenVPN solutions, you can use almost any VPN provider. It does not matter how many connected devices your VPN provider allows, with this, you can create your own home anonymous wifi and connect all of them. With our advanced software solution, there are practically no limitations. Just assign a static IP address for every device and choose which will get encrypted through TOR, VPN, or use a “chain“ mode and encrypt via both of them. With physical isolation, there is no need for worries about unwanted leaks any long. Even if your machine becomes compromised with malware capable of root/admin actions, there is almost no way they will be able to successfully attack our device via network, thanks to SELinux and our double firewall.
column8: >Full technical specifications
column9:
>Timeline and prototyping

After leaks of classified informations from the NSA about spying on people in 2013, we became really worried about our privacy. So we wanted to do something about it, because all of the technology needed to protect everyone’s privacy was already here, but just was not good enough. A mini computer Raspberry Pi with wifi adapter as an onion router was a very good start, but available software was far from satisfying us. So we took source code of OpenWRT and started modifying it to fullfill our vision. In 2014, Alpha version of our OS running on the RPi was completed and running without any bigger problems. But because of hardware limitations of such devices, while we were designing PCB of BeFree, we had several main priorities, including pocket size, fast built-in wifi, 1Gbps ethernet, and a USB port. The latest version offers all of it in a credit card sized body. You can now stay connected wherever you go, but at the same time, stay anonymous and hackproof. After sucessful Indiegogo campaigning, production of devices will start at middle of October and first units will be shipped in November. Final source codes will be released at the end of September via Github.
column10:
>The Size of a Credit Card

Because our whole idea and original prototypes were based on the miniature computer, Raspberry Pi, we wanted to preserve the idea of credit card sized computers. Because of that, the BeFree measures exactly 8.5 x 5.4 cm and 1.35cm in its highest part, which makes it  your ideal partner on the road when you want to stay connected, and anonymous at the same time.
column11:
>Power it from anywhere

The BeFree can be powered from any USB port. You do not have to worry about carrying a special, big, and uncomfortable power source anymore. All you need is your notebook or powerbank. Just plug it in and enjoy the world of uncensured Internet! But remember that minimal power demand is 5V ~ 0.5A and recommended is 5V ~ 2A. Performace limitations and unstable systems can occur on under dimensioned power source.
column12: >Contributor perks only for Indiegogo
column15:
>Special product box

It does not matter which perk you buy. First 10 contributors will get their BeFree in this amazing wooden box!
column16:
>FAQ

What is the BeFree?

   The BeFree is an open source embedded Linux networking device designed for strong security and anonymity.

Will you ship to my country?

   All perks come with worldwide shipping.

Where can I buy the BeFree?

   For now, it is available only via Indiegogo campaign. After  the end of manufacturing and shipping all of Indiegogo orders, it will be available on eShops like Amazon or eBay.

How much it will cost after the end of Indiegogo campaiging?

   The final price has not yet been determined.

What if I want to be a partner with you?

   For now, $500 and $1,000 perks are made for you.

Where are the buttons?

   The BeFree has no buttons. After plugging into power, it will automatically switch on.

Why is there USB Type-A plug?

   Because we like it that way. But adapter for Micro USB is includded, so you can use your own cables.

How big is the BeFree?

   It is the size of a credit card, which makes it ideal for travel.

Can I overclock it?

   Sure you can, but we believe that it has lot of power already!

What operating system does it use?

   Our own highly customized OS for providing both of security and stability based on OpenWRT.

Is there built in Wifi?

   Yes, the BeFree supports 802.11b/g/n standarts.

Will be the software always up to date?

   Yes, we will provide updates constantly.

Can I use it to play games anonymously?

   Yes, but remmember that TOR network can be very slow with very high latency. Anyway, you can use some quality VPN service, like the one you will get with $75 and $100 perks.

How I know TOR or VPN is up and running?

   Web interface is always showing to you your current IP address and which services are running (TOR, VPN, both, ...). Or you can use official Tor check site.

Will it slow down my network?

   TOR can be slow, but in recent months, it had a very good and stable speed. If you are concerned about network performace, you can use VPN only mode.

Will this make my online activity completely anonymous and untraceable?

   Well, that is very serious question. The BeFree router will do everything in its power, from encrypting traffic to preventing risk of being hacked. But you have to be careful about what are you doing online, browsers like Chrome or Firefox can save cookies or reveal browser unique ID, which will track your online activity and identify you. We recommend using TBB (Tor Browser Bundle) or better, whole Whonix Linux distribution in Virtual Machine.

Why should I trust your software?

   All of the software will be released as Open Source in end of September, and before we ship first devices, any potential backdoors or flaws would be discovered.

How can I configure the device?

   By default, a simple web user interface is activated, but you can enable more advanced options and SSH access into device.

Who is behind all of this?

   Our founder, Indiegogo campaing starter, core developer and team leader is Lubomir Zgrlik. His co-workers are Branislav Vyhlidal - main designer, Peter Andrasy - development support and Tatiana Bujdakova.

column13: > is a new app based on a proximity technology which brings to us USEFUL people and informations better and faster .

column1: George is a virtual butler which learns from our common activities such as reading informations and/or finding people available on Internet.
column2:
/>

Imagine a new Facebook or a smart Google which we can use as a butler every time we need.

column1: George Butler is an Internet platform consisting of:
• App for different platforms (iOS, Android, Nokia Symbian, BlackBerry)
• In-app or in-web services to customize each user experience
In the anglo-saxons countries ""George"" is a common name to indicate british ""butlers"" or majordomos which help people somehow.
Following the same idea of help users in the mess of today Internet, we imagined George as a virtual butler which improves the way we will:
• CONTACT people working on topics we're interested in the exact moment we need them (on-demand jobs, real-time appointments, location-based and topic-based chats or messages).
• ALERT whether we’re close to a useful information or a person
• SEE updated event infos we love most
• BECOME popular workers on a specific field and offer our time and services to others.
• IMPROVE our overall internet surfing activity by reducing time spent finding useful people and informations
• IMPROVE the way we surf informations (text, image, video) by using better tools such as magazines or specific-to-field layouts

• ALLOW companies or individuals from contacting us for promoting a service or a product: no more advertising, no more generic Linkedin/Facebook offerings, only smart PUSH for specific keywords we’re really interested in.

The real issue to become aware nowadays is that 100% of us are surrounded mostly by a lot of people and informations NOT USEFUL for our purposes.

So we make Google searches, read digital too-much-generic magazines, contact people on social networks or chat-based services but, basically… often WE WASTE A LOT OF TIME on Internet finding really USEFUL things or people.

Our social network walls are full of posts or images we will never read because even if it’s true they come from close friends it's also true we’re not often interested to friend topics.

Our mailboxes are full of spam or promo messages we will never read.

Maybe important messages are hidden in this chaos or they don’t have the right priority in our reading list.

In fact, timing is a very important concept while talking about USEFUL informations/people.
HOW WE WANT TO REALIZE OUR IDEA
Basically, George Butler is an app which analyzes our behaviour in real time to show us just useful things.

Login is not just a login, it's an import process.

No more spam, no more ads, dramatically reducing the total amount of time surfing the Internet.
Let’s start from social networks and blogs you use everyday but we give you also the opportunity to manually add your hobbies.
Bringing into our platform your posts, images, videos, links, texts you’re passionate to we have a start environment of your passions.

WE’RE NOT IMPORTING ANYTHING FROM THESE SOURCES!!!

We just read infos from these sources, fill your Sonar map and your Profile Tags and that’s it.

Next time you’ll use George, these informations will be retrieved from scratch.

Let's talk about a real application of George Butler.

column5:
>For instance, I would need a Florence-to-Milan trains timetable or Milan weather forecasts JUST tomorrow ‘cause tomorrow i’ve got a business trip to Milan.

I mean… JUST tomorrow.

Such informations could be destroyed after my trip because when i then come back home i no longer need them.

How can i know i've a scheduled business trip to Milan? From my Facebook wall maybe, more frequently from my iPhone/iPad calendar or from my business mailbox.

This example also applies to people: because i’ll be at Milan tomorrow, it’ll be great to know if my favorite fashion blogger will be available for a shopping-assisted tour somehow during the day.

Also, it would be great to know if there are open photography exhibitions tomorrow in Milan….

Fashion or photography are some of my favorite hobbies.

…BUT JUST TOMORROW!!!

I really do not need a daily mail newsletter talking about photography events in Milan or fashion blogger tours if i know i can’t be physically there.

column1: HOW IMPORTANT ARE KEYWORDS FOR OUR PROJECT

Inside George Butler one important role is being played by KEYWORDS.

""Fashion blogger"" or ""Photography events"" of the above example can be also called ""Keywords"".
Every information or person analyzed by our system is basically a sum of keywords.
For instance, if i like Apple smartphones, i can sum it with “apple” and “i-something” or “apple” and “mac”.
column5: >This is equivalent to do a Google search of these keywords.

column1: If 3 of my Facebook friends are fashion bloggers who love Prada or Armani, it’s 100% sure that “shoes” or “bag” are keywords that can be found inside their posts.

Following this approach, we can design your OWN MAGAZINE.

A magazine is a collection of Keywords placed in a fantastic layout you can easily read or interact with.

George Butler will start with just one magazine which will contain only keywords you love more.

Keywords have the function to retrieve entire articles, images, videos or web pages.

In the future, it would be possible to create and share more than one magazine: that is useful when magazines become a collection of specific interests like “apple”+”mac” and “rim”+”blackberry” together in a “Smartphones” magazine or “prada”+”shoes” and “ferragamo”+”bags” in another ""Fashion and Luxury"" magazine.

Create more than one magazine is also useful when you want to publish more than one Job inside George Butler.

What about become an expert of Keywords we get updated every day?

That would be now possible with George Butler!

Some websites are becoming more and more popular offering micro-jobs like ""create a logo for 5$"" or ""promote your website for 5$"".
Nowadays workflow for this kind of jobs is, again, ""off-line"":
• the other party works on it (maybe his home or company computer)
• at the end, the final result is sent over the web to the requester
George Butler works in a different way.
Once checked out which expert is available NOW specifically for our favorite keywords and which are his/her skills, you have the possibility to:
• see his/her rating/feedback for his/her specific topics/fields (i.e. “fashion blogger” or “guitar player”)
• check his/her previous works (Magazines or other layouts)
• see his/her geo-location and availability to perform a specific job
• buy a service from him/her (specific for job type)
• leave a feedback/rating on how this expert made his/her job
Today scenario works quite well for ""off-line"" jobs, it doesn't work for ""on-line"" requests.
Small jobs are becoming popular everywhere expect in the the place people would really need them (such as in developing countries).

Small jobs could be something like offer our time to someone else because we're considered ""expert"" in such field or help someone with a professional service offered in real-time such as a painter or electrician on Christmas or during public holidays.
This is very hard to achieve today within the combination of Google / Social Network / Mobile Apps.
It's hard to achieve because basically we don't know if THAT people which we strongly need in THAT particular circumnstance is available or not.
If we have a specific need in real time, we have to Google search or make a post on Facebook/Twitter or Linkedin.
That means a big effort to us: IT IS not in real time.

The same can apply for companies: feedbacks and ratings are very important in a new world which is more connected than in the past and where each company product or service will benefit from comments and reviews from buyers or experts.
A great issue with nowadays technologies is that they are economic centric.
Informations or people come to us mostly ADVERTISED, not for a real interest from our side.
Google brings us informations or people by using an alghorythm which no one of us can control (ADWords for instance).

Social networks allows companies or individuals to create market campaigns based on our profiles, preferences so that informations we find on our surfing are not the ones we're interested in but most probably the ones advertised.

Social Networks like Facebook or Twitter normal user experience consists of viewing a maximum of 5 seconds per post and usually postst created by the same 5 people..

That said, we would like to improve the way you get benefits from the whole world around you... Please , support our project since the beginning! Thanks again :)

GEORGE BUTLER IS A NEW WAY TO BE SOCIAL

Internet has changed our lives forever, more and more we can take notice of the following evidences:
• growing number of informations that are available on it
• growing number of small jobs complementary or not to our main activity

A very interesting point of view is that while industrialized countries are more than 90% internet-contributors and/or internet-readers, 75% of developing countries people do not have access even to a pc for personal use.

That means countries like Africa have NO influence on the net: few people available, few informations provided.

Those people have few chances to get real useful informations or to be in contact with ""useful"" people since USEFUL informations/people ARE FAR from them. Not only geographically.

While speaking about the George Butler project, we refer to “FAR” like a content or a person WE’RE NOT PASSIONATE with.

Living in a country like Africa for i.e. means we cannot easily contact a painter, an electrician or a medic in real time for help, support or ""on-line"" jobs/requests.

""Technology is great only if it can help others to better living"".

Having this in mind, George Butler goal is to use technology for what it has been invented: help the humans beings.

George Butler will allow childrens, teenagers in developing countries to get in contact with professionals they need in real time or just will improve their lives having localized and useful informations.

George Butler will allow a farmer to localized weather forecasts, splitted for tomatoes or eggplant fields.

George will suggest african teachers which topics are useful for their classes regardless of the official programs.

On the other side, George Butler will allow everyone in developed countries to offer a job to the community or just reduce surfing time by having only access to on-demand and localized informations.


STAFF

Who we are and who we are looking for

Lorenzo Codacci, CEO

Working since 1995 for IT most dynamic and innovative european companies (DADA.net/Buongiorno/TIM), our founder Lorenzo Codacci has a great experience with the web and mobile market.

His main skills are enterprise mobile security and mobile device management: he was the first italian who installed a BES (BlackBerry Enterprise Server) in Italy in 2001.
Recently, he worked on two other startups concerning mobile smartphones in either enterprise or consumer markets: WeM and Emerture .
NGO experiences in Mali, Africa with an italian NGO called
column14:
bvm=bv.72938740,d.bGE"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">UnAltroMondo Onlus can be considered very important steps for representing the base of this new project, George Butler.

George is a perfect fusion of his technology and social dreams.

column1:
---

These are some of the skills we are looking to develop our platform:
This campaign will fund app and web site portal developing and marketing tools to let George be known as much as possible around the globe.
Crowd funding is social based: George is social based.

George Butler base technology and purpose has been imagined the first time on 2012 but the main idea has been improved a lot since 2 years.

We started with the idea that each user around the globe would be happier if having a real time useful place to share informations and jobs with others in a great-looking manner.

Better than Facebook, smarter than Google, more useful than e-mail.

This is why we thought to Magazines, always having in mind an awesome app like ""Flipboard"" from which we grabbed the innovative idea of digital pages.

Our first crowdfunding target will be to let people create their own Magazines.

You can import keywords from Social Networks or add them manually by using the top right ""+ button.

Texts, images, videos will me temporarily imported for your personal usage, then destroyed, then again updated next time you'll use George Butler app.

Magazines -->
column3:
AI (Artificial Intelligence) for Informations/People seeking

The above is schematically which platform we want to create with George Butler.

Each Magazines should be a background for a hobby that could potentially lead to a new or existing Job.

So, in our roadmap after magazines creation, we intend to create the Professional panel with the possibility to share your skills, experiences, magazines and so on.

In the next developments, we would like to use A.I.D.A. (Attention|Interest|Desire|Attention) alghorytm to know which contents or people you manifest some interests.

So, George Butler will NOT ask you keywords anymore. It will understand by itself.

column1: Developing a new platform is a risk by definition.
Apps or websites can be easily forgotten or not 100% represent customer needs as in the initial idea.
Also, once launched there is a lot of time needed to maintenance an entire new platform as George.
It is not just an app for us: it is OUR LIFE, meaning George represents the perfect mix of our technology and social desires.
That reason is the one which answers to these hurdles.
George is not something to ""maintain"" for us.
It is something to let grow up because it will help everyone to better living.
It is NOT a way to make profit.
Then, it will be FREE for everyone, no advertising on it.
Finally, if you don't have fund to contribute or just you can't, please word out about this initiative.
The final result depends on you also this way.
Q: Are you working either on a web version?
A: George Butler has been thought to work in live mode.
Smartphones and tablets, mobile devices are becoming more and more popular in the world.

User interfaces are so easy that each every children could use without problems.

Developing countries are adopting mobile faster than web, while on the other side mobile developed countries market is growing faster than expected and pc market is experiencing a brutal brake.

We believe mobile is the right target for George Butler, not the web.

Finding informations when we're ""out there"", ""somewhere"" far from our homes.

That's the potential our app would like to cover.
Finding the right person for the right service IN REAL TIME is also a problem George Butler wants to reduce.

You need a smartphone for that, you basically don’t have time / opportunity to find a computer while travelling in a city or out for holidays.

Maybe you can , but how difficult could be in a metro or walking down the street?
Google searches or social networks browsing will continue to have a great rule on our usage of the Internet.
George borns as an alternative in situations while being far from a personal computer, or btw where we prefer to use a tiny device.
That said, we’re planning to release a web version also for improve Magazines complex layouts or future layouts we're planning to realize shortly.
It’s not easy to browse a multi-column or multi-rows digital magazine on a smartphone, that's the reason why George Butler will be available also in a convenient web format.
A: On most apps we can find Geo-location based maps.
These kind of maps measure the distance between you and a person or give you a satellite/real territory perception of what is around you geographically.
George Butler considers geo-position to be only one aspect of your proximity to a content or to a person.
Following are some key factors we’re developing in our affinity algorithm, which is called “GX”, George-Index.
The higher a GX is , the closest you’ll see this content/person to you.
• Number of clicks on a specific content/person
• Whether a content/person has only been viewed or opened in full details (i.e. a Person profile)

GX is a mathematical expression of the above parameters.

Therefore, as Sonar maps typically represent the proximity of an object to you we want to immediately give you the perception of how close are informations and people from you regardless of the geographical distance.

Q: Is George Butler an improvement of browser cookies?

A: George GX alghorytm is somehow similar to browser cookies.

Have you ever noticed some web pages prompt you ADs or pop-up of products similar to your last bought items?

George works in a similar manner , but NO PERSONAL DATA will be shared with commercial web sites such as it happens in other systems.

George Butler app uses your preferences to retrieve contents or similar keywords you can find useful.

This process is dynamic, not static.

As soon as you bought some product , George knows it's uncommon to buy another one similar next week.

You can, of course, decide whatever topics and products you want to check now, maybe similar or not.

Profile page inside our app allows you to decide exactly your preferences, timing for your keywords and so on.

George is smart, not stupid!
column2:
)

Q: Which are the main differences between Flipboard and George

A: Flipboard is static, George is dynamic.

Static here is not something related to contents, it refers to the way people and contents are managed.

Inside Flipboard you can decide which ""static"" newspapers or magazines you want to read.

Inside George you'll find one day you want to read a local magazine, another day you want to read an African newspaper.

Today you'd like to follow Chris from Nevada, tomorrow Elise from SouthAfrica.

All is based on your behaviours which could change everyday or every month.

Also, we're adding a second layer to George
column3:
contents you love more can be used as the basement for a new job.

If you like your job, we can spread your hobby in a new dimension.

You can gain money from your passions!

Flipboard is just a read-only app while George allows you to interact with Professionals too.

Contents lead you to people which loves the same things you love.

Isn't great?
column4:
)

Q: Security: “Are my preferences and keywords securely stored?”

column1: That means every usage user PERSONAL informations will be completely deleted within the app.
Only PUBLIC informations will remains available on our platform, a web server we're developing which will be available since the second stage planned in our roadmap.
With PUBLIC informations we mean shared Magazines or public Jobs you’re offering to other users.
- user data: name and surname, age, sex, city, address, country

- personal magazines: each magazine will be completely re-created next time you’ll use the app

KEYWORDS and their occurences, instead, are the core of our app and they'll be stored inside each smartphone.

iOS devices are more secure than Android or Windows phones or tablets.

That said, we have a strong experience securing local mobile data using nowadays technologies.
This process of using local data is very fast and doesn’t involve any interactions from the users at all when it's in auto-mode.
Also, it’s secure ‘cause we don’t need to store PERSONAL data against federal laws and country legal rules.

Each source like Facebook, Twitter, Wordpress or, in the future, public and private databases will continue to have their data stored in companies cloud systems while George Butler only optimise IN REAL TIME these informations.

","George Butler is a new app based on a proximity technology which brings to us USEFUL people and informations better and faster .

George is a virtual butler which learns from our common activities such as reading informations and/or finding people available on Internet.Imagine a new Facebook or a smart Google which we can use as a butler every time we need.
George Butler is an Internet platform consisting of:
App for different platforms (iOS, Android, Nokia Symbian, BlackBerry)
In-app or in-web services to customize each user experience
In the anglo-saxons countries ""George"" is a common name to indicate british ""butlers"" or majordomos which help people somehow.
Following the same idea of help users in the mess of today Internet, we imagined George as a virtual butler which improves the way we will:
CONTACT people working on topics we're interested in the exact moment we need them (on-demand jobs, real-time appointments, location-based and topic-based chats or messages).
ALERT whether we’re close to a useful information or a person
SEE updated event infos we love most
BECOME popular workers on a specific field and offer our time and services to others.
IMPROVE our overall internet surfing activity by reducing time spent finding useful people and informations
IMPROVE the way we surf informations (text, image, video) by using better tools such as magazines or specific-to-field layouts

ALLOW companies or individuals from contacting us for promoting a service or a product: no more advertising, no more generic Linkedin/Facebook offerings, only smart PUSH for specific keywords we’re really interested in.

The real issue to become aware nowadays is that 100% of us are surrounded mostly by a lot of people and informations NOT USEFUL for our purposes.So we make Google searches, read digital too-much-generic magazines, contact people on social networks or chat-based services but, basically… often WE WASTE A LOT OF TIME on Internet finding really USEFUL things or people.Our social network walls are full of posts or images we will never read because even if it’s true they come from close friends it's also true we’re not often interested to friend topics.Our mailboxes are full of spam or promo messages we will never read.Maybe important messages are hidden in this chaos or they don’t have the right priority in our reading list.In fact, timing is a very important concept while talking about USEFUL informations/people.
HOW WE WANT TO REALIZE OUR IDEA
Basically, George Butler is an app which analyzes our behaviour in real time to show us just useful things.
Login is not just a login, it's an import process.No more spam, no more ads, dramatically reducing the total amount of time surfing the Internet.
Let’s start from social networks and blogs you use everyday but we give you also the opportunity to manually add your hobbies.
Bringing into our platform your posts, images, videos, links, texts you’re passionate to we have a start environment of your passions.
WE’RE NOT IMPORTING ANYTHING FROM THESE SOURCES!!!We just read infos from these sources, fill your Sonar map and your Profile Tags and that’s it.
Next time you’ll use George, these informations will be retrieved from scratch.Let's talk about a real application of George Butler.

For instance, I would need a Florence-to-Milan trains timetable or Milan weather forecasts JUST tomorrow ‘cause tomorrow i’ve got a business trip to Milan.I mean… JUST tomorrow.Such informations could be destroyed after my trip because when i then come back home i no longer need them.How can i know i've a scheduled business trip to Milan? From my Facebook wall maybe, more frequently from my iPhone/iPad calendar or from my business mailbox.This example also applies to people: because i’ll be at Milan tomorrow, it’ll be great to know if my favorite fashion blogger will be available for a shopping-assisted tour somehow during the day.Also, it would be great to know if there are open photography exhibitions tomorrow in Milan….Fashion or photography are some of my favorite hobbies.…BUT JUST TOMORROW!!!I really do not need a daily mail newsletter talking about photography events in Milan or fashion blogger tours if i know i can’t be physically there.
HOW IMPORTANT ARE KEYWORDS FOR OUR PROJECT
Inside George Butler one important role is being played by KEYWORDS.""Fashion blogger"" or ""Photography events"" of the above example can be also called ""Keywords"".
Every information or person analyzed by our system is basically a sum of keywords.
For instance, if i like Apple smartphones, i can sum it with “apple” and “i-something” or “apple” and “mac”.This is equivalent to do a Google search of these keywords.
If 3 of my Facebook friends are fashion bloggers who love Prada or Armani, it’s 100% sure that “shoes” or “bag” are keywords that can be found inside their posts.
Following this approach, we can design your OWN MAGAZINE.A magazine is a collection of Keywords placed in a fantastic layout you can easily read or interact with.
George Butler will start with just one magazine which will contain only keywords you love more.Keywords have the function to retrieve entire articles, images, videos or web pages.

In the future, it would be possible to create and share more than one magazine: that is useful when magazines become a collection of specific interests like “apple”+”mac” and “rim”+”blackberry” together in a “Smartphones” magazine or “prada”+”shoes” and “ferragamo”+”bags” in another ""Fashion and Luxury"" magazine.Create more than one magazine is also useful when you want to publish more than one Job inside George Butler.
BECOME A MICRO-JOBS WORKER WITH FEEDBACK

What about become an expert of Keywords we get updated every day?That would be now possible with George Butler!Some websites are becoming more and more popular offering micro-jobs like ""create a logo for 5$"" or ""promote your website for 5$"".
Nowadays workflow for this kind of jobs is, again, ""off-line"":
the other party works on it (maybe his home or company computer)
at the end, the final result is sent over the web to the requester
George Butler works in a different way.
Once checked out which expert is available NOW specifically for our favorite keywords and which are his/her skills, you have the possibility to:
see his/her rating/feedback for his/her specific topics/fields (i.e. “fashion blogger” or “guitar player”)
check his/her previous works (Magazines or other layouts)
send him/her a REALTIME chat request
see his/her geo-location and availability to perform a specific job
buy a service from him/her (specific for job type)
leave a feedback/rating on how this expert made his/her job
Today scenario works quite well for ""off-line"" jobs, it doesn't work for ""on-line"" requests.
Small jobs are becoming popular everywhere expect in the the place people would really need them (such as in developing countries).

Small jobs could be something like offer our time to someone else because we're considered ""expert"" in such field or help someone with a professional service offered in real-time such as a painter or electrician on Christmas or during public holidays.
This is very hard to achieve today within the combination of Google / Social Network / Mobile Apps.
It's hard to achieve because basically we don't know if THAT people which we strongly need in THAT particular circumnstance is available or not.
If we have a specific need in real time, we have to Google search or make a post on Facebook/Twitter or Linkedin.
That means a big effort to us: IT IS not in real time.

The same can apply for companies: feedbacks and ratings are very important in a new world which is more connected than in the past and where each company product or service will benefit from comments and reviews from buyers or experts.
A great issue with nowadays technologies is that they are economic centric.
Informations or people come to us mostly ADVERTISED, not for a real interest from our side.
Google brings us informations or people by using an alghorythm which no one of us can control (ADWords for instance).

Social networks allows companies or individuals to create market campaigns based on our profiles, preferences so that informations we find on our surfing are not the ones we're interested in but most probably the ones advertised.

Social Networks like Facebook or Twitter normal user experience consists of viewing a maximum of 5 seconds per post and usually postst created by the same 5 people..That said, we would like to improve the way you get benefits from the whole world around you... Please , support our project since the beginning! Thanks again :)
GEORGE BUTLER IS A NEW WAY TO BE SOCIALInternet has changed our lives forever, more and more we can take notice of the following evidences:
growing number of people which are using it
growing number of informations that are available on it
growing number of small jobs complementary or not to our main activity

A very interesting point of view is that while industrialized countries are more than 90% internet-contributors and/or internet-readers, 75% of developing countries people do not have access even to a pc for personal use.That means countries like Africa have NO influence on the net: few people available, few informations provided.Those people have few chances to get real useful informations or to be in contact with ""useful"" people since USEFUL informations/people ARE FAR from them. Not only geographically.While speaking about the George Butler project, we refer to “FAR” like a content or a person WE’RE NOT PASSIONATE with.Living in a country like Africa for i.e. means we cannot easily contact a painter, an electrician or a medic in real time for help, support or ""on-line"" jobs/requests.""Technology is great only if it can help others to better living"".Having this in mind, George Butler goal is to use technology for what it has been invented: help the humans beings.George Butler will allow childrens, teenagers in developing countries to get in contact with professionals they need in real time or just will improve their lives having localized and useful informations.George Butler will allow a farmer to localized weather forecasts, splitted for tomatoes or eggplant fields.George will suggest african teachers which topics are useful for their classes regardless of the official programs.On the other side, George Butler will allow everyone in developed countries to offer a job to the community or just reduce surfing time by having only access to on-demand and localized informations.STAFFWho we are and who we are looking for

Lorenzo Codacci, CEOWorking since 1995 for IT most dynamic and innovative european companies (DADA.net/Buongiorno/TIM), our founder Lorenzo Codacci has a great experience with the web and mobile market.His main skills are enterprise mobile security and mobile device management: he was the first italian who installed a BES (BlackBerry Enterprise Server) in Italy in 2001.
Recently, he worked on two other startups concerning mobile smartphones in either enterprise or consumer markets: WeM and Emerture .

NGO experiences in Mali, Africa with an italian NGO called UnAltroMondo Onlus can be considered very important steps for representing the base of this new project, George Butler.George is a perfect fusion of his technology and social dreams.
---These are some of the skills we are looking to develop our platform:
This campaign will fund app and web site portal developing and marketing tools to let George be known as much as possible around the globe.
Crowd funding is social based: George is social based.

George Butler base technology and purpose has been imagined the first time on 2012 but the main idea has been improved a lot since 2 years.We started with the idea that each user around the globe would be happier if having a real time useful place to share informations and jobs with others in a great-looking manner.Better than Facebook, smarter than Google, more useful than e-mail.This is why we thought to Magazines, always having in mind an awesome app like ""Flipboard"" from which we grabbed the innovative idea of digital pages.

Our first crowdfunding target will be to let people create their own Magazines.You can import keywords from Social Networks or add them manually by using the top right ""+ button.Texts, images, videos will me temporarily imported for your personal usage, then destroyed, then again updated next time you'll use George Butler app.Magazines --> Personal Job --> AI (Artificial Intelligence) for Informations/People seekingThe above is schematically which platform we want to create with George Butler.Each Magazines should be a background for a hobby that could potentially lead to a new or existing Job.So, in our roadmap after magazines creation, we intend to create the Professional panel with the possibility to share your skills, experiences, magazines and so on.In the next developments, we would like to use A.I.D.A. (Attention|Interest|Desire|Attention) alghorytm to know which contents or people you manifest some interests.So, George Butler will NOT ask you keywords anymore. It will understand by itself.
Developing a new platform is a risk by definition.
Apps or websites can be easily forgotten or not 100% represent customer needs as in the initial idea.
Also, once launched there is a lot of time needed to maintenance an entire new platform as George.
It is not just an app for us: it is OUR LIFE, meaning George represents the perfect mix of our technology and social desires.
That reason is the one which answers to these hurdles.
George is not something to ""maintain"" for us.
It is something to let grow up because it will help everyone to better living.
It is NOT a way to make profit.
Then, it will be FREE for everyone, no advertising on it.
Finally, if you don't have fund to contribute or just you can't, please word out about this initiative.
The final result depends on you also this way.
Q: Are you working either on a web version?
A: George Butler has been thought to work in live mode.
Smartphones and tablets, mobile devices are becoming more and more popular in the world.

User interfaces are so easy that each every children could use without problems.Developing countries are adopting mobile faster than web, while on the other side mobile developed countries market is growing faster than expected and pc market is experiencing a brutal brake.
We believe mobile is the right target for George Butler, not the web.Finding informations when we're ""out there"", ""somewhere"" far from our homes.That's the potential our app would like to cover.
Finding the right person for the right service IN REAL TIME is also a problem George Butler wants to reduce.

You need a smartphone for that, you basically don’t have time / opportunity to find a computer while travelling in a city or out for holidays.Maybe you can , but how difficult could be in a metro or walking down the street?
Google searches or social networks browsing will continue to have a great rule on our usage of the Internet.
George borns as an alternative in situations while being far from a personal computer, or btw where we prefer to use a tiny device.
That said, we’re planning to release a web version also for improve Magazines complex layouts or future layouts we're planning to realize shortly.
It’s not easy to browse a multi-column or multi-rows digital magazine on a smartphone, that's the reason why George Butler will be available also in a convenient web format.

0,"

No More Boring

Thousands of gameplays are waiting for you to create. It can effectively relax the brain and let you temporarily get out of busy work and study life. This will help you improve your work efficiency, exercise your fingers and promote blood circulation.

Other Ways of Playing

Develop the brain and create new possibilities. In addition to relaxing through the sound, there are many ways to play. The magnet design allows it to have different shapes. If you have more beans, you will have more possibilities to play.

Relaxing Sound

Studies have shown that some special sounds can affect the body system of the autonomic nervous system that controls flight or fright and self-digestion, and has a related impact on the resting activity of the brain.
column2:
>

Wooden pods have grooves of different sizes. When the beans jump between the grooves, they produce a crisp, sweet sound that relaxes the brain.

Fridge Magnet

In addition to being able to relax, it can also be attached to any iron surface, such as a refrigerator or a blackboard.

Fine Wood

Made from wood from Africa and Zambia, it feels smooth and delicate. African Blackwood is one of the most popular and expensive woods in the world. Zambia Bloodwood also has precious qualities, such as waxy and pretty color, make it an ideal choice for musical instruments and fine furniture.​

Portable

Its small size makes it ideal for carrying in your bag. Whether it's waiting in traffic jams or relaxing after studying, it can help you kill time and relax.

 The Set Contains:

column1:
Risks and Challenges

We can guarantee that the first shipment will go out no later than August 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery. We rate the risk of unexpected delays as being very low.

Hello! We are here to change the business world! We are 2 small business owners with a huge passion and vision and we are the founders of ENGAGED. I am Natalia, the visionary and my partner Tim is the logical one, but together, we make dreams a reality.

We created ENGAGED because we understand the passion, the struggle, the determination and the reward that comes with owning a business. We have laughed, cried, won and lost and that's why we want to help put the control back in all business owners and managers hands. ENGAGED will help employers prevent and limit the #1 cause for
lost time at work, unwanted cellphone use. It also helps keep your friends and family stay safe on the road by limiting distracted driving!
This campaign will help us launch! After putting all of our money into the project we still need a little more to finish the development and start to change 1,000's
of  small and large business owners.
Have you ever walked into a store or restaurant where the employee was texting and didn't even greet you? If so, let's change the world together!

I know what you may think, my boss would love ENGAGED but would I? That's the awesome part, we made it a WIN-WIN situation!
Your boss cuts out time wasted on non-work activities and you earn rewards for following the rules!

We are seeking $200,000 in funding. This money will be used to finish development, beta test, secure the first 2,000 customers, protect the patent by making it stronger, make all legal documents between clients, this will cover some equipment and travel fees, commission payment to our contact to the big companies and a little left over for a rainy day. The $200,000 will be the beginning of a new business culture filled with respect and passion for the jobs, and we love that! If we don't reach the goal, all of the funds will go to the development of the app.
If your friends or family own a business, share this with them, they will get the feels.

After many years of owning and operating our own cookie business Tim and I knew we couldn't be the only ones who felt trapped so we did the research! Polls, surveys, forbes.com, famous people, news channels, even our fellow small business owners all had the same feelings we did, it was there where we knew we could  not only make a difference in our business but in everyone else's as well. Not only will ENGAGED make life better for the employer but it will facilitate other managers and supervisors jobs. For a small business owner things like saving payroll and making customer service awesome could be the difference between feeding your family that night or not. Together we can engage in life and the task in front of us making the world better and safer.
 
We will probably face several risks and challenges and we have certainly already faced MANY challenges to get here! That's why I said I'm the dreamer and Tim keeps
us balanced, the perfect dynamic! We have the skills to bring ourselves and the company up when we are feeling down. We always start with the basics! We are positive, realistic and hardworking. We have met so many amazing people along the way from the first friend who believed in us to the investor who took time out of his day to write an email that said ""Your idea is stupid and will never work"", we learn and grow from everyone, we take notes and share our knowledge and we give back to the community. So far we have over 2,000 customers interested in ENGAGED but they will not sign until the product is completed. This has been our biggest hurdle thus far. Luckily, we know that Rome was not built in a day! Tim spent 20+ years working hard before he opened his first business and as a former professional athlete I am a firm believer in getting up after you've been knocked down in order to win! This combined with our insider business knowledge gives us an advantage in our industry.
Plus we give our awesome rewards to the users of ENGAGED so whether you are an awesome employee, a creative business owner, or a tech fan ENGAGED can sound like an appealing business.

We understand that money is not everything so if you can't contribute to the campaign please share our story with a local business or let us know where you have seen
any unwanted cellphone use and help us spread the word with all the Indiegogo Share Tools!

","Hello! We are here to change the business world! We are 2 small business owners with a huge passion and vision and we are the founders of ENGAGED. I am Natalia, the visionary and my partner Tim is the logical one, but together, we make dreams a reality.

We created ENGAGED because we understand the passion, the struggle, the determination and the reward that comes with owning a business. We have laughed, cried, won and lost and that's why we want to help put the control back in all business owners and managers hands. ENGAGED will help employers prevent and limit the #1 cause forlost time at work, unwanted cellphone use. It also helps keep your friends and family stay safe on the road by limiting distracted driving!This campaign will help us launch! After putting all of our money into the project we still need a little more to finish the development and start to change 1,000'sof  small and large business owners.
Have you ever walked into a store or restaurant where the employee was texting and didn't even greet you? If so, let's change the world together!

FansRepublic is the idea of 2 brothers from Palestine, who started the project with very limited resources and a small team, but despite all difficulties we worked hard and were able to deliver a fine product that was carefully crafted from our hearts for football fans and enthusiasts.

FansRepublic is a social network dedicated for football fans, that provides the environment and tools to interact with football fans from all over the world, and to engage in live football events. The main goal of our network is to empower football fans voice, in order to be heard and recognized in the media.

• Supporting our campaign will help us to hire more developers in order to improve the social network, add new features, and make free mobile app so football fans can easily get live updates and engage in football wherever they are.

FansRepublic provides a mix between Football and Social media, where users can easily keep up with football updates and enjoy a football-fanatic environment. It has been engineered to maintain a competitive environment between football fans, like how it is in real life, by introducing Reputation Points, Cheer Power, Team Loyalty Concept, Teams Ranking and Players Ranking.

On the football side, the platform provides live results for more than 120 competitions from all over the world. In addition to fixtures, tables, scorers, match details, team information, team stats, team transfers and players’ details.

We need to expand our team and hire creative people, which will help us in expanding the network and implementing many new creative features that we have in mind. Not only that, we also have plans to develop a free mobile app that will be simple and effective, so that football fans can easily get football updates, in the best quality and experience.

FansRepublic in its heart is to bring football to the people and empower the voice of football fans worldwide. Football fans are marginalized and their voices and opinions are rarely heard in the arena of corporate media, it feels like football is isolated from us. We hope that this network will break the walls and be the loud voice of football fans, and a main source of consideration for football teams, federations and leagues in their decision making and evaluations.

Spreading the word and telling your friends about the network and our campaign, is one of many ways you can support us that will make us very grateful. You can join FansRepublic and invite your friends too, where you can participate with your valuable opinions, thoughts and support your favorite team. Also, you can follow us in social media below:
