Our Aims and the Rewards
Your pledges will help us to go from concepts &
column2: sketches to building the prototypes uniquely designed for a new line of Quigley Brand Products for dogs, cats and children.

column1: Once the products reach the retail market we plan to donate 25% of revenue to help save the lives of mistreated, abused and left behind animals along with our other charity partners.

We are currently developing Quigley 2. Many of the products we create will be based on characters and objects seen in the movie. Aside from Quigley, we will introduce Knuckles the mutt, and Samson the muscular cat.

Once the Quigley products are manufactured and distributed to retailers, the animal rescue and pet shelter organizations have agreed to assist Quigley 2 Production and Destiny Worldwide Entertainment with promotion, marketing and sales.

After the planned production of Quigley 2 is completed and the film in distribution, the same assistance to promote, market and sell the film will come from the pet organizations. Our pledge to help pet, epileptic and autistic organizations will continue with a donation of 25% of the producer’s revenue.
QUIGLEY was born when we introduced the white Pomeranian to the world via infomercial and a mass advertising package that included the first Quigley products.

NOW we are expanding and look to produce some fun toys for dogs, cats and children.  Some of our items will be fun, some practical while others quite unique. Each product will be carefully crafted with durable materials that are lightweight washable and non-toxic. The beds, plush animals, toys and other items will be unlike any other pet product on the market. And, they will all be made in the U.S.A.

More items are being designed and added to our lineup. (See gallery with concept art for future products) With your help and generosity, Bill, Ric and the Destiny Worldwide Entertainment staff will build the Quigley Product Brand prototypes, which will lead to manufacturing our lineup. Our creations will soon be available in a store near you.
Your PLEDGE will bring the first of all our ORIGINAL PRODUCTS right into your home.

Every product sold and every dollar generated from the distribution of the motion picture presently being planned will in part be a donation to various charities that save the lives of animals, promotes no-kill shelters, pet adoption centers and will help Autism and Epilepsy organizations.
About the movie - Quigley 2  - Motion Picture Synopsis

OUR ADVENTURE BEGAN when William Byron Hillman wrote produced and directed the motion picture QUIGLEY. The film starred Gary Busey, Curtis Armstrong, Christopher Atkins and Oz Perkins. View the Trailer: http://leomarkstudios.com/quigley.html

column2: >

column1: It didn’t take long for the film to become a worldwide sensation.  Quigley 2 continues a new exciting chapter with Quigley and friends...

Bob and his wife Artie run a non-profit toy and animal product company staffed with an epileptic and autistic workforce. Ro, a wealthy woman terrified of getting old, wants to rid the town of the toy company for financial gain and claims her goal is for progress. When Ro hires thugs Mitch, his cat Samson, Vinnie and Moe to destroy the toy factory, a prayer rings the emergency bell in heaven. Thurmond, a wingless angel, has been waiting a thousand years for another chance to earn his wings. Next in line on the heavenly roll call and fresh from teaching heaven’s canine angels dance team, Thurmond is chosen for the mission and given an option to pick an angel to accompany him and save the town. Since his only close friends are canine angels, he chooses two – Quigley and Knuckles. In a heavenly decision, the only human able to see Thurmond is Bob. Everyone else will see the dogs.  Quigley and Knuckles need to encourage the wingless angel and yet allow him to formulate his own plan that will reach beyond his self-imposed limits. Thurmond’s heavenly future will depend on what challenges and decisions he makes. Can the angels outsmart the thugs? Do Quigley and Knuckles posses hidden gifts and capabilities? Can the annual Christmas parade and toy give-away be saved? What can two dogs and an elderly wingless angel like Thurmond do to stop the mayhem? Oh so much to do and so little time to accomplish a miracle.

Breaking news! As we roll out the IndieGoGo campaign we have the pleasure of announcing that TV's ""Murder She Wrote"" sheriff, Ron Masak will be appearing as the grandpa in Quigley 2. Ron will also be our honored spokesperson for our IndieGoGo pitch. Follow our campaign blog for more news.
The production team has been enhanced by having Jay and Alessandro join our effort to prep  and put the final pieces together to move Quigley 2 into a pre-production mode.

For you the risks are minimum. All funds received will go to manufacture prototype models. The Risks will be eliminated by the release of the film and the distribution of both product, books and the movie and the charities will receive their percentage from all channels involved. We have set realistic goals for the length of the campaign and allowing manufacture and completion of the perks associated. If anything we will endeavor to deliver the rewards earlier where possible. We will also use the blogging tools to share progress updates for the products and any news about the movie.

If you can't donate directly to the campaign please share using the tools available. We would especially appreciate blog entries and shares on social media including facebook and twitter to spread the word about our campaign, the movie and our supported charities.
Your pledges will help us to go from concepts & sketches to building the prototypes uniquely designed for a new line of Quigley Brand Products for dogs, cats and children.
Once the products reach the retail market we plan to donate 25% of revenue to help save the lives of mistreated, abused and left behind animals along with our other charity partners.

We are currently developing Quigley 2. Many of the products we create will be based on characters and objects seen in the movie. Aside from Quigley, we will introduce Knuckles the mutt, and Samson the muscular cat.

Once the Quigley products are manufactured and distributed to retailers, the animal rescue and pet shelter organizations have agreed to assist Quigley 2 Production and Destiny Worldwide Entertainment with promotion, marketing and sales.

After the planned production of Quigley 2 is completed and the film in distribution, the same assistance to promote, market and sell the film will come from the pet organizations. Our pledge to help pet, epileptic and autistic organizations will continue with a donation of 25% of the producer’s revenue.
QUIGLEY was born when we introduced the white Pomeranian to the world via infomercial and a mass advertising package that included the first Quigley products.

NOW we are expanding and look to produce some fun toys for dogs, cats and children.  Some of our items will be fun, some practical while others quite unique. Each product will be carefully crafted with durable materials that are lightweight washable and non-toxic. The beds, plush animals, toys and other items will be unlike any other pet product on the market. And, they will all be made in the U.S.A.

More items are being designed and added to our lineup. (See gallery with concept art for future products) With your help and generosity, Bill, Ric and the Destiny Worldwide Entertainment staff will build the Quigley Product Brand prototypes, which will lead to manufacturing our lineup. Our creations will soon be available in a store near you.
Your PLEDGE will bring the first of all our ORIGINAL PRODUCTS right into your home.

Every product sold and every dollar generated from the distribution of the motion picture presently being planned will in part be a donation to various charities that save the lives of animals, promotes no-kill shelters, pet adoption centers and will help Autism and Epilepsy organizations.

When Ro hires thugs Mitch, his cat Samson, Vinnie and Moe to destroy the toy factory, a prayer rings the emergency bell in heaven. Next in line on the heavenly roll call and fresh from teaching heaven’s canine angels dance team, Thurmond is chosen for the mission and given an option to pick an angel to accompany him and save the town. New Team Members Jay Amor & Alessandro Folchitto

Isn't it stressful to keep holding onto essential items when you are out or traveling?
Isn't it a hassle for bringing huge or bulky wallet around these days?
Do you need a phone stand urgently?

column3: >Insert various items into the band simply!

column1: Why not just bring a few cards and notes out?
Ever seen a clip like this before?
A totally new versatile concept clip with a multi-purpose feature.
“CLIPIT” is a hands-free tool, adding on to conveniences and benefits in life. It can also be used as a phone stand, money clip.

1. As a Hands-free tool for Backpack

Isn't it a bother to keep opening and closing your bag to take out the items?
​CLIPIT solves the trouble and make it hassle-free! Simply use CLIPIT on your backpack strap and insert various items into the band!
CLIPIT is compact size and easy to install.
Be hands-free for various items such as earphones, charging cable, handy fan, selfie stick, sunglasses, portable umbrella and even more!
Use CLIPIT as a backpack-clip, clip on the bag strap and insert various items into the band to be hands-free.
Make use of various items such as earphones, charging cable, handy fan, selfie stick, sunglasses and more.
Isn't it a hassle for bringing huge or bulky wallet around these days? And there’s a high demand for wireless transactions.
• Why not just bring a few cards and notes out instead? Using CLIPIT, it’s hassle-free!
• Simply insert cards into the upper band and insert the cash in the clip part! (Note: coins are impossible)
• Utilize CLIPIT as a phone stand when you need it anytime, anywhere.
• Place CLIPIT on the table and insert any of your a card into the gap of the clip to create a support for your phone.
• CLIPIT will be useful when you need a phone stand outside urgently.

CLIPIT is designed as a fashion accessory that goes well with any apparel, belts, pockets, bags and even looking cool as a necklace pendant or keychain.






CLIPIT is essential in various situations.

PORTABILITY


 CLIPIT is compact and light (15g only)!  Let's just bring a few cards out!  Just put it inside your pocket simply!

EXTENSIBILITY 

 CLIPIT can be used with both sides depends on purpose.

Adding on more accessories such as pencil holder, a phone stand, an action cam mount and keys. We will release more options in the future.

SUIT TO ANYWHERE

We can install CLIPIT on Sling bag as well. CLIPIT is suit to any bag strap size and thickness. (best thickness : 2~8mm)

CLIPIT is strong and stable when clipped and the elastic band holds items tightly.
We use good quality for elastic band that can hold tightly.
• We still have tested with prototypes and the bands might be upgraded such as stitched silicone type or better type for the best result.
We introduce one more our product, MBAND, a perfect partner with CLIPIT.
MBAND is earbuds and cable magnetic organizer with minimal design you setting up a more effective and easier solution for wire management.
• MBAND is not included in the CLIPIT basic package. Pick any perks and MBAND will appear as add-on option.
• Tie the Magnet Bands(MBAND) on your any earbuds or phone cables then you can attach it to CLIPIT firmly. It's really simple but effective.
In the CLIPIT basic pack
*This package is rendering image. Final design might be changed.
*MBAND PACK is an add-on option. It will appear whenever you pick any main perks option.
• Two color for clip body are available, Black and Gray.
• Band color will be same as black.
The shipping will sent out by regular mail. But service is not available currently.

*Due to COVID-19 issue, shipping will be started after regular mailing service available again. Please note that delivery may be delayed or may proceed as originally on November depends on COVID-19 issue.

column3: >Now we're making the final sample (3rd sample) before production.

column1: Currently both the band and metal clip parts of the CLIPIT are being tested with samples.
Delivered items might be further enhanced and delivered. *Final design may differ from the images used.
Please check the production status via our update.
WE DESIGN PRODUCTS, BRANDS, AND EXPERIENCES.

We are product and brand designers who create, define and design brands by connecting creative flair and smart thinking. We are determined to create meaningful and brand experiences through a dynamic approach and a collaborative process.
We are dreamers who always reach for the most ambitious goals.

Dan is the senior product designer. He loves to explore, face new challenges in life, get inspired and never afraid to go beyond boundaries. 12 years in industrial design field and leaded many successful projects. Achieved many renown awards from competitions.

Mary is a visual communicator and marketing executive. She is a dreamer, cause without dreams, there will be no goal and determination. She believes that our transparent process of meticulous collaboration with everyone involved allow us to challenge each other and push the boundary.
It took us around 8 months to finish this work, and the quality still has been upgrading in it coming from the form of modern &
The main reason why we choose Indigogo is to introduce our idea and our attractive product, CLIPIT! This is first showing!
To achieve an affordable price we set for Indigogo with high-quality materials, we need more supporters.
We had tested our products and done many prototype to ensure the best quality and measurement.  So now, we really need your support to make this project a reality!
We need to reach around 3,000pcs MOQ (minimum order quantity) for manufacture. We need your help to place our first purchase order and in return you will get this best our product.

About the Manufacturing
There's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time during manufacturing due to the complexity of the production. However we are working very closely with our manufacturer, who has decades of experience, to make sure production goes smoothly. We even plan to deliver before the expected dates if possible.

About the Shipping
Due to the current global COVID-19 issue changing everyday, production and delivery dates could be subject to change though our factory has assured us that their production line and schedules have not been affected. We will make sure to keep everything transparent and ensure every backer is updated on a regular basis on the progress of production and shipping.
And there are shipping restrictions countries by Covid-19 issue. We hope this issue ends until our shipping date. We will try to ship reward as soon as this issue over for these countries.
*If there are any delays or roadblocks down the road, we assure you transparent and regular updates.

About shipping fee
Currently due to the COVID issue, there’s a limitation for courier and flights for shipping, therefore, the high hike for shipping cost. So we have decided using regular mail due to decreasing much the shipping cost.

We will hold shipping until regular mailing service available again after COVID-19 situation of the courier lightens up. Please note that delivery may be delayed or may proceed as originally on September. We will also try to find third party courier and shipping services. Let's pray hard until situation better.

About the Tax
The product price does not include VAT or import tax of your country. You will be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.

About the Customs
Some countries are very slow with customs from our experience. We are sorry that we cannot push the customs department to process deliveries faster, but we will ship the package as soon as possible. Kindly be patient and we’re sure you’ll receive your lovely package.

About faulty product
*This cases are not faulty product. Please note when you back us.
CLIPIT may have a little scratches on production or small cutting marks removed from the guide.
If you used for a long time, the paint may come off.
*We'll be updating the project progress frequently, so stay tuned!

MBAND is not included in the CLIPIT basic package. Pick any perks and MBAND will appear as add-on option.
Tie the Magnet Bands(MBAND) on your any earbuds or phone cables then you can attach it to CLIPIT firmly. It's really simple but effective.
One MBAND pack contains two magnetic Bands. (1pair)
Suitable wires' diameter from 1.5mm to 10.0mm (about 0.06~0.4 inches)
*This package is rendering image. Final design might be changed.
*MBAND PACK is an add-on option. It will appear whenever you pick any main perks option.
Two color for clip body are available, Black and Gray.
Band color will be same as black.
The shipping will sent out by regular mail. But service is not available currently.

*Due to COVID-19 issue, shipping will be started after regular mailing service available again. Please note that delivery may be delayed or may proceed as originally on November depends on COVID-19 issue.
Now we're making the final sample (3rd sample) before production.
Currently both the band and metal clip parts of the CLIPIT are being tested with samples.
Delivered items might be further enhanced and delivered. *Final design may differ from the images used.
Please check the production status via our update.
WE DESIGN PRODUCTS, BRANDS, AND EXPERIENCES.

We are product and brand designers who create, define and design brands by connecting creative flair and smart thinking. We are determined to create meaningful and brand experiences through a dynamic approach and a collaborative process.
We are dreamers who always reach for the most ambitious goals.

Dan is the senior product designer. He loves to explore, face new challenges in life, get inspired and never afraid to go beyond boundaries. 12 years in industrial design field and leaded many successful projects. Achieved many renown awards from competitions.

Mary is a visual communicator and marketing executive. She is a dreamer, cause without dreams, there will be no goal and determination. She believes that our transparent process of meticulous collaboration with everyone involved allow us to challenge each other and push the boundary.
It took us around 8 months to finish this work, and the quality still has been upgrading in it coming from the form of modern & industrial.
The main reason why we choose Indigogo is to introduce our idea and our attractive product, CLIPIT! This is first showing!
To achieve an affordable price we set for Indigogo with high-quality materials, we need more supporters.
We had tested our products and done many prototype to ensure the best quality and measurement.  So now, we really need your support to make this project a reality!
We need to reach around 3,000pcs MOQ (minimum order quantity) for manufacture. We need your help to place our first purchase order and in return you will get this best our product.

About the ManufacturingThere's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time during manufacturing due to the complexity of the production. However we are working very closely with our manufacturer, who has decades of experience, to make sure production goes smoothly. We even plan to deliver before the expected dates if possible.

About the ShippingDue to the current global COVID-19 issue changing everyday, production and delivery dates could be subject to change though our factory has assured us that their production line and schedules have not been affected. We will make sure to keep everything transparent and ensure every backer is updated on a regular basis on the progress of production and shipping.
And there are shipping restrictions countries by Covid-19 issue. We hope this issue ends until our shipping date. We will try to ship reward as soon as this issue over for these countries.
*If there are any delays or roadblocks down the road, we assure you transparent and regular updates.

About shipping feeCurrently due to the COVID issue, there’s a limitation for courier and flights for shipping, therefore, the high hike for shipping cost. So we have decided using regular mail due to decreasing much the shipping cost.

We will hold shipping until regular mailing service available again after COVID-19 situation of the courier lightens up. Please note that delivery may be delayed or may proceed as originally on September. We will also try to find third party courier and shipping services. Let's pray hard until situation better.
About the TaxThe product price does not include VAT or import tax of your country. You will be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.

About the CustomsSome countries are very slow with customs from our experience. We are sorry that we cannot push the customs department to process deliveries faster, but we will ship the package as soon as possible. Kindly be patient and we’re sure you’ll receive your lovely package.

About faulty product*This cases are not faulty product. Please note when you back us.CLIPIT may have a little scratches on production or small cutting marks removed from the guide.If you used for a long time, the paint may come off.
*We'll be updating the project progress frequently, so stay tuned!",58.0,0,"2 Campaigns

We ask your attention to the problem that is already on the threshold of our world. Lack of food for humanity in some regions of the globe. As well as the deterioration of the soil on earth. Our technology together with the equipment developed and produced by us will allow to avoid many problems faced by the farmer now. Namely, the lack of nutrition in the soil, lack of moisture, as dry years will become the norm in our time and rain does not fall in the main regions producing grain from April to June in the right amount. Our technology involves minimal work with the soil that would not impoverish it. Since all modern technologies used in agriculture today impoverish the soil and destroy its fertility. imagine if your house was demolished several times a year, and you were forced to constantly restore it, and in the end losing strength and patience, you whether Bo will die or leave it. So it is with living beings in the soil. Our technology also involves sowing without tillage directly into the ground at the level of the moisture horizon, which leads to an increase in yield by 20% and a reduction in the cost of machinery and fuel compared to intensive technology. That is, our technology not only protects the earth, but also causes less damage to the environment, since its application requires 40% less fuel per kilogram of production. we ask you not to remain indifferent to the problems of our time and if you do not even have money for this company , just help to spread this information.

Whether you grew up in a traditional hispanic household heating up tortillas on a comal or have used some other, equally cumbersome method to get hot tortillas on the table, you've likely been faced with the same problem as the rest of mankind throughout history–too few, too slow. The Nuni Toaster changes the game completely, offering a safer, faster, and more delicious method of preparing tortillas than ever before.

Growing up in a Hispanic household, I (Elliot) ate tortillas at every meal. My mom, who is now 59 years old, has prepared tortillas on a pan (or what is traditionally known as a comal) since she was 12. I calculated that over the 20 year period during which I lived at home, she had lost approximately 60 days to this labor intensive task. This revelation convinced me there had to be a better way to prepare hot tortillas at home.

We get design–and we get kitchens. So we know that there isn't always a ""one size fits all"" when it comes to color. That's why we're thrilled to introduce not just one color Nuni Tortilla Toaster, but five. That's right. Cinco. Functionality, meet design.

Aqua Blue
Jet Black 
Maize Yellow
Sangria Red
Paloma White

As the world's first tortilla toaster for home kitchens, the NUNI Toaster represents the height of progressive innovation. You'll never need to cook tortillas on a pan or in the microwave again! And yet, it's simple enough that anyone can use it - just drop your tortillas in the toasting slots and select one of five toast settings. In just about a minute, your tortillas will be toasted to perfection. Plus, there's no need to worry about safety - a rotating cover and electric shields are included to keep you safe.

Use the Nuni like you would an ordinary electric toaster: simply drop your tortillas into the six slots, turn the rotating oven up, and it will lock into place. Once the toasting cycle is complete, the oven will automatically disengage, leaving the now hot and tasty tortillas ready to eat. It's beautifully simple.

column2: >The modern, yet retro design of the NUNI Toaster fits even the most discerning kitchen decor. Its parallel heating elements are even fashioned after the grille of the classic 1957 Bel Air. The NUNI Toaster has taste, folks.

column1: Because you all have already been so supportive of our journey, we would dream of offering you nothing less than the greatest perks we can think of. Think we're missing something golden? Let our guys know so we can get it on here ASAP. This is a team effort, and we're excited you're on board! #TeamTortilla
*Note: Due to continual engineering improvements, the final product shipped to backers may vary in appearance from representations given here.
• Performed IP patent search on existing artwork
• Filed Improved Tortilla Toaster Patent with USPTO and 35+ other countries
• Received a licensing offer from a major kitchen appliance manufacturer (big win for the little guy - the deal not so much)
• Presented at the 2016 Home + Housewares Show in Chicago

We have the design, we have sourced, qualified, and have selected the factories in China ready, and we have the team to execute the plan–but we need your support to get the Nuni Tortilla Toaster in homes.
• We need $100,000 so that we can begin production of the first ever round of Nuni Toasters.
• We need you to spread the word! Like our Facebook page. Retweet us. Share our link with your mom. Every bit helps!
You are the most vital part of the Nuni Toaster project. Without you, we wouldn't be able to do any of this. Therefore, we want to treat you like your deserve.
• Some super awesome gear that only the best taco/tortilla fans deserve.
• One of the very first Nuni Tortilla Toasters to ever exist. Made specifically for you.
• The utmost and sincere gratitude of me, my family, and tortilla enthusiasts everywhere who (whether they know it or not) have been waiting their entire lives for this.

The NUNI Toaster isn't just about a better way to prepare the food you love. We see the success of this project as a statement that culture, tradition, and innovation can not only coexist, but thrive together.

When I began this journey, I had no concept of the magnitude of what I had just signed up for. The patent search, electrical engineering, food thermal engineering, industrial design, and intellectual property protection we walked through still makes my head spin. But we did it. We have overcome tremendous obstacles, and we're ready to take on the next challenge: the multi-billion dollar electric housewares industry. Here's what's challenging about launching a never-before-seen product in this space:
• You can't just order a few products to be produced. Our manufacturers need a large quantity in order to begin production.
• You have to pay up front. Our manufacturers also need payment for the production run before they can begin making NUNI Toasters.
• Spreading the word to the masses is difficult! As a start up launching it's first product, our voice is still young. We need your help to create buzz about how cool the NUNI Toaster is.

This is where you come in! You have the power to help us reach our minimum order quantity in order to get production off the ground. You have the power to pre-order your NUNI Toaster so that we can afford to pay our manufacturers up front. And most importantly, you are our best way to spread the word. Tell your mom, tell your friends, tell your boss - you are officially a part of our street team. If you want to see the NUNI Toaster become a reality as badly as we do, help us spread the word!
Don't worry if you can't contribute. We understand. But don't let that prevent you from making an incredibly valuable contribution to our project. It will mean the world to us if you:
• Give us a shout out on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or your own website.
Let our team know if there are any other perks you'd like to see!
• Tell your friends about the incredible thing we've got going here
Go spend some extra time with your family. This world needs it.

And that's all we've got. We sincerely hope that you will support our dreams of an elegant and convenient tortilla toaster by buying one for yourself, giving one as a gift, or at the very least sharing the news about our launch. We're ecstatic about this opportunity and cannot wait to get a Nuni Tortilla Toaster in every home. In the meantime...

Whether you grew up in a traditional hispanic household heating up tortillas on a comal or have used some other, equally cumbersome method to get hot tortillas on the table, you've likely been faced with the same problem as the rest of mankind throughout history–too few, too slow. The Nuni Toaster changes the game completely, offering a safer, faster, and more delicious method of preparing tortillas than ever before.

Growing up in a Hispanic household, I (Elliot) ate tortillas at every meal. My mom, who is now 59 years old, has prepared tortillas on a pan (or what is traditionally known as a comal) since she was 12. I calculated that over the 20 year period during which I lived at home, she had lost approximately 60 days to this labor intensive task. This revelation convinced me there had to be a better way to prepare hot tortillas at home.

We get design–and we get kitchens. So we know that there isn't always a ""one size fits all"" when it comes to color. That's why we're thrilled to introduce not just one color Nuni Tortilla Toaster, but five. That's right. Cinco. Functionality, meet design.
Aqua BlueJet Black Maize YellowSangria RedPaloma White

As the world's first tortilla toaster for home kitchens, the NUNI Toaster represents the height of progressive innovation. You'll never need to cook tortillas on a pan or in the microwave again! And yet, it's simple enough that anyone can use it - just drop your tortillas in the toasting slots and select one of five toast settings. In just about a minute, your tortillas will be toasted to perfection. Plus, there's no need to worry about safety - a rotating cover and electric shields are included to keep you safe.

Use the Nuni like you would an ordinary electric toaster: simply drop your tortillas into the six slots, turn the rotating oven up, and it will lock into place. Once the toasting cycle is complete, the oven will automatically disengage, leaving the now hot and tasty tortillas ready to eat. It's beautifully simple.
A BEAUTIFUL COLLISION OF MODERN + VINTAGE

The modern, yet retro design of the NUNI Toaster fits even the most discerning kitchen decor. Its parallel heating elements are even fashioned after the grille of the classic 1957 Bel Air. The NUNI Toaster has taste, folks.
THE GREATEST PERKS IN THE WORLD

Because you all have already been so supportive of our journey, we would dream of offering you nothing less than the greatest perks we can think of. Think we're missing something golden? Let our guys know so we can get it on here ASAP. This is a team effort, and we're excited you're on board! #TeamTortilla

And that's all we've got. We sincerely hope that you will support our dreams of an elegant and convenient tortilla toaster by buying one for yourself, giving one as a gift, or at the very least sharing the news about our launch. We're ecstatic about this opportunity and cannot wait to get a Nuni Tortilla Toaster in every home. In the meantime...
Elliot Benitez, Inventor and Founder",25.0,1,"1 Campaign
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP SPREAD THE NETT
• Show this video to your upline and ask them about it. Seriously, this is probably the best thing you could do. That’s why I said it twice (continue reading for second mention).
• Share this with that person whom ""they just know everybody""
Have you asked yourself this yet? Why should you contribute and pledge your hard earned dollars to this campaign?
• Because what matters most in business (especially networking businesses) is relationships

This campaign for Nett is not simply ANOTHER crm (customer relationship management tool). Nett is unique, in that, it takes your current habits of networking and gives you the data needed to make the right decisions about where you should spend your time.

If you’ve read this far, you understand that in our daily lives we meet people that we won’t remember in a year’s time. Yet we come across a new connection or idea that jogs our memory just enough to help us remember the location of where we were when we met someone who could help us. And yet with all of the networking and social tools available in our economy, there isn’t one that can organize our contacts by location. Personally...I think that’s a shame and this problem should be solved with Nett.
WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

The story thus far, entails a dreamer (Andrew) and his friend (John) working with a developer that quit before the product was finished. All businesses have set backs, I just view them as a setup for a better future.
• Our goal is $6,000. But honestly friends, my goal is 200 + contributors. This is CROWDfunding and my focus is serving YOU and YOUR NETWORK

I believe that we can crush this. A lot of people contributing a little is the best way to get things done. The $6,000 will be going to the right development team to get the MVP out. I have some bids from different companies. I don’t want to hire the wrong person again so I’m being patient. 5% of this will go to Indiegogo, less than 5% will go to the founding team to have more time to serve YOU.

The Perks you’ll receive are an extremely good deal! The Lifetime Value is literally the CHEAPEST Nett will ever be available. This is not a pop and drop company we’re building. This will last for as long as people use smartphones to manage their contacts. The annual subscription is only going to go up with the new features we will add in V1 and V2.

Hopefully you see my vision for what this can be in the not-so-distant future. By Pledging to Nett you will be apart of the innovators and visionaries who saw where the market was going. 5 years from now, will people still be passing out business cards...no. Nett will have a virtual business card and sync with your social profile. This will connect the internet to real live people.
• This can connect people and build healthy AUTHENTIC relationships for business people and networkers alike
Plenty of people “network” and “make contacts”. Not enough people truly connect and remember the meaningful aspect of the conversation when they meet someone.
In Chinese the word for “problem” is the same as “opportunity”. As in any business there are risks, the ones associated with this business are not perfectly clear.
• I believe that when there is an obstacle in your way it simply means other people quit before you did and there’s a way around it to your dream
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP SPREAD THE NETT
• Show this video to your upline and ask them about it. Seriously, this is probably the best thing you could do. That’s why I said it twice.
• Share this with that person whom ""they just know everybody""

In Chinese the word for “problem” is the same as “opportunity”. As in any business there are risks, the ones associated with this business are not perfectly clear.
I believe that when there is an obstacle in your way it simply means other people quit before you did and there’s a way around it to your dream
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP SPREAD THE NETT
Show this video to your upline and ask them about it. Seriously, this is probably the best thing you could do. That’s why I said it twice.
Share this with that person whom ""they just know everybody""",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >the Blueprint is an ecosystem to design your life, boost your productivity &amp
column3: achieve your dreams. Normalize daily maintenance with a planner that actually works.

column1: The Blueprint has a modular system where you can choose the tools that are beneficial to the way you work. We realize that all people cannot function the exact same way. A choice of these 6 Stacks are exhaustive of different activities, professions and management skills. According to the perk you select, you may choose any permutation or combination of stacks.
Your Blueprint order comes with a hardcrafted folder with 2 pockets and an Anywhere-Insert-Clip, 4 Bookmarks (2 coupled &
column2: 2 uncoupled), 1 Book Sleeve and a choice of 6 Stacks (See below). Each order is also supplemented with a FREE e-book on 'Everything Productivity and Beyond', 40+ phone wallpapers and an e-poster.

column1: • The Plug-and-Play model allows you to build your own planner.
• Customize according to your personal needs and working styles.
• In this Modular system you could mix and match stacks or repeat the same stack.
• You could also purchase additional stacks later according to your need.

After you chose your perk dont forget to check your email for a surprise. Each purchase of the blueprint comes with an E-book on productivity hacks, action-driven mobile wallpapers and an E-poster with motivational quotes.

The one thing that I have learned from 2020 is the fragility of time and therefore the importance of developing the skill to manage it. Since middle school I have been trying different techniques for managing my time and energy. I resorted to making my own planners after realizing that the one-size-fit-all solution offered in the market couldn't possible work for every human because we all function differently. I wanted to focus more on efficiency than aesthetic appeal of managing time.

the Blueprint was conceptualized in April 2020, while I was reading the Phil Knight's memoire, Shoe Dog. World of Nike and the story of its product, inspired me to distilled my experiences and research into making a product to share with the world. I like helping people grow through systems thinking and designing.

Alot of thought, research and hours have gone into designing each page of all our 6 stacks. The Blueprint is a premium quality product which is locally sourced and handicrafted supporting a sustainable supply-chain. ​With the blueprint I aimed to disolve the market gap of planners that could work for people with different organization styles. After conducting surveys, beta tests and theoretical research I designed the Blueprint to enable not intimidate. I wanted to make planning interesting for everyone not just people who wanted aesthetically pleasing notebooks.
You can support us by getting your copy of the Blueprint, gifting a copy or telling your friends about it through whatsapp groups. You love, support and feedback mean the world to me.

Are you an expat and streaming lover? Do you own a Firestick or Apple TV? Are you a modern cord cutter? AlwaysHome is the right tool for you to take your streaming subscriptions to anywhere you go in the world. It connects your streaming devices like Phone, Computer, Firestick, Apple TV or even Smart TV to streaming subscriptions such as Netflix, Hulu or Amazon from anywhere in the world.
With a home proxy set up at home, you can access the in-home network from anywhere you go and access in-home streamings from Xfinity, Spectrum, Verizon TV, etc.
column2: >Connect all your Wi-Fi devices with AlwaysHome companion dongle

column1: If you have a streaming device like Apple TV or Xbox that need to connect to streaming subscriptions, you can use AlwaysHome companion dongle. The dongle is a customized mini Wi-Fi router that is plug &
column2: play and portable. It is super easy to use, just connect it to network and wait for its four lights turned on, then you have a new Wi-Fi hotspot in the room. Then connect your Wi-Fi enabled streaming devices like Apple TV, PS4, Xbox, Phone, Tablet, Computer etc to it and then open up your favorite streaming Apps on those devices to enjoy your favorite shows from anywhere in the world.

column1: If you travel light or prefer to do everything from computer/phone/ipad, AlwaysHome App all you need. The App is designed to connect your mobile devices to subscriptions without using the dongle. On your devices, just download, run and click to connect AlwaysHome App and then go ahead to open the streaming Apps to enjoy your favorite shows from anywhere in the world. It is that simple. This App runs on Android, Windows, iOS, Mac and Fire OS. (AlwaysHome App can not be installed on some devices such as Apple TV, Roku, Xbox etc, for those devices, a dongle is necessary)

For people used or heard about VPN in the past, AlwaysHome runs different software stack and protocols that can connect to a residential place, rather than a data center server that VPNs or Smart DNS connect to. AlwaysHome users actually have a residential IP address when they access any websites. On the other hand, data center based VPNs are normally using IP addresses that allocated to businesses which makes them easier to be identified. You can google around “Why Do Some Websites Block VPNs?“ for more background information on why and how VPNs can get blocked by streaming sites.

column2: >VPN normally runs through a data center server

column1: When accessing streaming services from far away, AlwaysHome is 3-10 times faster than normal VPN and enables you to watch videos in full HD quality. For curious hearts, the technology we implemented is called WAN optimization, which has been widely used by a large company to connect their global offices and branches.
The technology is good for applications other than streaming as well. Through AlwaysHome, you get a faster email, research, collaboration, and pretty much faster everything,

As shown in the following diagram, you can set up a home proxy right within your home, for your own use. When at out of the home, you can connect back through this proxy device to access in-home network devices (such as IP camera, printer, computers, etc) or streaming services, just like accessing them from home, even you are physically far away from home.
You can use a dongle as the home proxy or your own devices like Firestick or Android TV box, as long as you can install AlwaysHome App on it.
Because the home proxy is on your home network, your access to the internet will have your home IP address and to any website, the access is right from your home.

You can find the perk(s) that fit your needs and then buy it. If you need multiple perks, just buy and pay for each one of them. Then we will set up the right configuration for you. If you purchase a dongle, we will preconfigure it as well and then ship it out. You will receive an email notification when things are shipped out. When receiving your order, it should take no more than a few minutes to get everything started, most of the time, it should be just plug&
column2: play.  If not, please contact our support@homingsystems and describe in detail the symptom.

column1: AlwaysHome is designed for average people who don't have much technical background. The system is very easy to set up. When you receive your order, the device(s) and account(s) are already preconfigured and tested working. All you need to do is plug and play. We also put up some instructional videos on our support website at www.homingsystems.com/support for your reference. Apps can also be download from links on the support page. As an example, here is a quick video to set up the Solo pack. There are videos for other perks on our support page.

column2: >Please note: If you receive the order and can not make it work in 20 minutes, it is likely you have missed some basis, so please contact our support@homingsystems.com to get things sorted out. Please provide as much detail as possible the steps taking and any symptoms you observed (screenshot or short video would be great information for us to quickly troubleshoot).
>Dongle can be used at home or places with Wi-Fi

column1: AlwaysHome is NOT a replacement to your basic Internet service. The AlwaysHome runs on top of the Internet. So you can NOT use AlwaysHome at places that do not have basic Internet services such as home broadband (Fiber, DSL, etc), WiFi or 4G/3G.
AlwaysHome is NOT a replacement to streaming subscriptions such as Netflix membership.

column2: >Since 2015 when we first launch the previous version in Kickstarter, AlwaysHome has been used by a few thousands of happy customers in many parts of the world such as US, Germany, Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, Turkey, Mexico, Brazil, UAE, Saudi, South Africa, and Egypt.  We are happy to see a small idea turned into a well-designed product and makes an impact on people's normal life. We truly believe the AlwaysHome products have been and will revolutionize the way people experience surfing the internet while traveling.

column1: Once you buy our product, a single share on your Facebook profile or Twitter would definitely help this amazing piece of gadget reach another enthusiastic. Please note: in the package, the adapter is US style and optional. You can use your own regular charger if this US style does not fit well in your country.
1) Why you have different shipping dates for perks and they are from the past?

The original campaign started in Sept 2017, products were shipped out since Oct 2017. Now we are in the in-demand status and people can still get special deals here on Indiegogo. We have sold out some perks (some for multiple times) and we have put them back. That's why the shipping dates vary. Because the products are in stock, the shipping dates are always in the past when you look at it.
2) I am an expat, I want to access US Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime Video, but I don't have family or friends that can host the home proxy for me, can you or your company host it for me?

Because the home proxy has to be in a residence which makes it infeasible for us to host it for multiple users. You need to have a residential place to set up the home proxy in your home country. Nowadays, many people already have devices like Amazon Fire Stick at home, so just ask them to install and run the AlwaysHome App for you. There is also a feature coming up this month that will prevent your access to their internal network devices (only websites through their the home network) so they don't need to worry about security issues this may cause.
3) I am not a technical guy and still a bit confused about the user license, could you explain more?

We don't charge the use of the home proxy. We charge a subscription to each remote App account that is used to connect to the home proxy. We also charge a subscription to each remote dongle that is connected to the home proxy.

For example, David travels to Asia from time to time. He wants to keep watching US version of Netflix, Hulu and Xfinity show when he travels. He set up a home dongle at his New York home and then installed AlwaysHome Mobile on his Mac computer. In Asia, he opens Mac computer, starts the App and then watches all the shows he wants just like at home. For David, he needs to buy a dongle hardware and then pay for a subscription license for App account to run on his Mac.

Another example, John lives in Dubai with his family. He set up one home dongle at Florida home and then at Dubai home, he set up a remote dongle for his Apple TV and other devices to connect back to Florida home. His daughter would be able to watch streaming shows just like at Florida home. For this, he pays for the home dongle hardware and the remote dongle hardware and one subscription license for the remote dongle to run. He then purchased another subscription license for his App so he can use it on his iPhone/iPad when he is out of Dubai home.
1) None of the perks meet my needs, I need a customized configuration. So what should I do?

You can claim multiple perks from our campaign. Order dongle and user license separately from different perks and combine them to meet your need. When adding dongle, use the perk that reads like ""add extra dongle (no shipping cost)"" in together with your other perk. This extra dongle perk has to be ordered when you have other otherwise there is no shipping address in the system so we never know it needs to be shipped.
2) Can you ship on time? I want it as a holiday gift for my family, it’s important for it to get it before the holidays.

Yes. The campaign is now in in-demand and we normally ship within 1-2 business days after receiving your order. When you see your order is in ""lock"" state, that means we are processing your order to be shipped out. If you only order subscription license, we will setup things and email you the details so you can start using the service right away.
3) 3-10 times faster internet, multiple device connectivity, space shifting revolution
column2: seems too good to believe! Is this for real?

column1: We have come to the 3rd major release of our product and thousands of users have been using it ever since its advent in 2015 for the first time. Along the way, we solved quite some challenging problems so our stuff is not just an idea that just sprouted out of the box.
Although every user is different with the internet infrastructure he is using, 3-10 times faster is a norm and observed by our customers especially those in Asia, Africa, and Mid East.

We offer the best price with the features untouched yet. That’s why we brought a software update which allows you to use your phone, tablet or streaming box as space shifted streaming device even without the dongle. Yes, it is real. Time to believe.
4) How do you compare your pricing with VPNs?

First of all, no VPN service out there can do what our solution can do. They normally get blocked by streaming service providers (a good search of ""Netflix block VPN"" will reveal the fact). We price the service in the lower end to mid range of all good VPNs. We are able to do so because our software is more efficient and cost less hardware resource to run. Also, our solution can leverage your home network bandwidth that you already have, that will reduce the number of servers we need to set up.
5) I know networking, could you elaborate on how you measured network performance to support your acceleration claim?

Measuring real-time network acceleration is just a piece of cake. We use mainly speedtest.net for this task. You can go to the platform and start to measure the download and upload speed of your network connection and compare it after connecting to the network with AlwaysHome.  And the results will look as just as ours. We have proven results from our customers around the world.

Note: the performance is subjected to ISP policy regarding bandwidth shaping, physical network bandwidth limit etc. Those are physical factors that AlwaysHome may not solve. However, almost all the ISP’s networks, we've tested have rendered the 3-10 network acceleration.
1) If the home proxy is down, can my remote devices fall to a server and access the blocked websites?

Yes. You log in to the web portal with your account and configure your devices or dongle to use our servers deployed in US/UK/Korea/German etc. Or you can email us and let us know the home proxy is down and we will manually switch your App/dongle to connect to our servers within a few hours. Connecting to our server will NOT get Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Instant Video who are aggressively blocking access from public servers, including many VPNs and our servers as well. Connecting to our server will get you to Google, Facebook, YouTube etc which are blocked in some countries.
2) How many users can the dongle support simultaneously?

When using the dongle as the home proxy, we suggest limiting the CONCURRENT remote devices up to 5. When using the dongle as a remote device, technically there is no limit of devices that can be connected to it simultaneously. But we suggest not to surpass the number more than 10.  Please keep in mind that the bandwidth will be shared among all users. If you are using your own devices such as Amazon Fire Stick as the home proxy, we believe it can support more than 100 devices.
3) I have an old phone, can I turn it into a home proxy?

Yes, it needs to be Android 4.4 or above, or iOS 10 or above. You need to make sure the AlwaysHome App keeps running all the time. That means you need to open the App and leave the screen saver off that the phone OS won't kill it even it is idling.

4) Between remote device and home proxy, is the communication going via the Homing cloud or directly between them? If it's the latter, how do communications traverse firewalls without port forwarding being set up?

It is mostly the latter. Remote device and home proxy all connect to Homing Cloud and they will be instructed to start a process called NAT traversal which enables a direct communication without port forwarding. In most of the cases, NAT traversal can work successfully. From then on, user data will be exchanged between these two directly. In some rare cases, NAT traversal does not work and a direct link is not possible. Then a middle server doing the piggyback will be utilized so the communication between the two dongles will go through our mid server.
5) What makes AlwaysHome stand out from the other VPNs in the market?

VPNs are good under certain conditions. But they typically become hard to manage when the user count goes up. VPNs are designed for data encryption. When the user count goes high with its popularity, they become slower &
column2: interrupted especially when the user can choose which server to get on. AlwaysHome is a cloud-based distributed server infrastructure that supports fault tolerance and great scalability to handle a large number of concurrent users.

column1: VPNs are using standard protocols like PPTP，L2TP，OpenVPN which can be easily identified by “middleboxes” such as firewall or proxy or routers with DPI (deep packet inspection) capabilities. Those boxes can easily block VPNs once identified. AlwaysHome, however, employs proprietary protocols that are not known to middleboxes. It means AlwaysHome does not suffer the blockage that VPNs are subject to.

VPNs were designed to be a security solution, never meant to accelerate network performance. AlwaysHome, on the other hand, has a technology called WAN optimization. This technology can significantly accelerate network speed over a long distance on the Internet.
So, if you are a VPN user and still think that it’s one of the precious technologies in the 21st century, you definitely want to check out AlwaysHome.
6) The dongle seems nicely designed. Can I use it at a coffee shop or hotel where there is no cable around and sometimes the captive authentication is needed?

Yes, dongle support to use public Wi-Fi for the Internet to connect itself to and at the same time provide downlink Wi-Fi to attached devices. You can attach a phone/computer to the dongle and then login dongle’s web management interface and configure the dongle to use a surrounding Wi-Fi hotspot. It also supports those Wi-Fi hotspots using so-called “captive authentication” that requires one to agree on terms, input a code etc. before using the Wi-Fi.
7) Does AlwaysHome support PPTP/L2TP or OpenVPN?
No. The data protocols are proprietary and developed by the AlwaysHome developers.
8) Technically, the dongle acts as VPN or proxy?
Technically speaking, AlwaysHome is not VPN but rather a TCP proxy service, with network acceleration capability. It is not HTTP proxy though.
9) I am worried that someone can access my home network through the home proxy. How can you guarantee security?

That’s a valid concern and we have addressed it deeply. All devices including home proxy are all behind a firewall and do NOT require you to open a port on your home router for port forward function. So your home proxy and home network are still protected just like your other devices at home. Accessing home proxy can only be done through a valid and configured dongle or App that requires valid user login.
Accessing of in-home devices can be disabled if you want to share your home proxy with friends so that they can access streaming websites, but not your home network devices, like your PC or NAS.
10) How stable is your system? Will there be network interruptions as other VPNs?

Our system is based on a cloud-based distributed server infrastructure which has high fault tolerance and scalability. Unlike VPN, which is normally point to point, in our system, the finding and switching to a working server is done automatically against a pool of servers. So the whole system works more reliably than VPN.
11) If I have an Android TV, can I connect it to the dongle and access content from out of my home country?

Yes, you need to install the App on your TV. So, as long as the Android TV has access to Google Play TV (AlwaysHome App is in Google Play) or you know how to install an APK manually onto your TV, you can watch your home country shows without geo-restrictions.
1) To which countries do you ship?

We ship globally excluding the following which has been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria &
column2: Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any of these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however, we cannot guarantee the shipment's arrival.

column1: 2) How will my order be shipped?

We have already mass produced the dongle. So once you buy a perk, your order will be processed within 2-3 days and then shipped out. For US backers, it’s expected to be delivered within 3-4 days using USPS First Class (there will be an email from stamps.com with all the tracking number etc).

For Non-US backers, products will be shipped out from China factory directly. We normally employ one of the express companies, DHL/FedEx etc and you normally receive the delivery within a week after shipping. On occasions post service is used for some hard to reach areas or countries, please expect 2-3 weeks or even longer delivery time.
It is very important to have your correct address and phone number on file. We had a couple of returns which are very high cost because of the incorrect address info.
3) Do I have to pay European VAT / GST?
Yes, the amount will depend on your country’s regulations. Only the dongle needs shipping though.
4) How can I be a distribution partner or reseller of AlwaysHome?
We'd love to hear from you! Please contact:  contact@homingsystems.com
We are also open for custom requests for leveraging our technology core and platform for your business goals.

AlwaysHome complies with Indiegogo refund policy. You can cancel the backing before the order is processed (status turned to be LOCKED). In general, there is NO refund after the products have been shipped.

If you bought the product by mistake, you can contact AlwaysHome customer satisfaction team through support@homingsystems.com. We normally ask you to return the product and then issue the refund. Please bear in mind that we will need to deduct the fees and charges that we already paid from the total refund.
AlwaysHome hardware including accessories comes with a one-year limited warranty. Contact our customer satisfaction team via support@homingsystems.com for faster response.

International shipments may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country. We don't have control over these charges and you will be responsible for fulfilling them. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause a delay beyond our delivery estimate.

It is also the recipient's responsibility for charges such as change of address, parcel holding, return fees caused by the recipient. So please make sure you have the correct address information including a phone number on file.
Got something which is not answered above? No worries! Send us a message or email contact@homingsystems.com.

By contributing now, you’ll no longer be tied down to a particular location for work, or to catch your favorite shows or sites.  Travel without worries, and experience your content wherever you are, just like you are Always Home. The AlwaysHome also makes a great conversation starter on those long international flights and layovers!

If you can share AlwaysHome with your friends, family or anyone who you think our product will be a huge leap in their lives especially to make it easier to live and work anywhere in the world, it will be a great support for us and for them too. So don't keep it a secret, let them see the game changer!

We truly believe the AlwaysHome products have been and will revolutionize the way people experience surfing the internet while traveling.

Once you buy our product, a single share on your Facebook profile or Twitter would definitely help this amazing piece of gadget reach another enthusiastic. Please note: in the package, the adapter is US style and optional. You can use your own regular charger if this US style does not fit well in your country.
1) Why you have different shipping dates for perks and they are from the past?

The original campaign started in Sept 2017, products were shipped out since Oct 2017. Now we are in the in-demand status and people can still get special deals here on Indiegogo. We have sold out some perks (some for multiple times) and we have put them back. That's why the shipping dates vary. Because the products are in stock, the shipping dates are always in the past when you look at it.
2) I am an expat, I want to access US Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime Video, but I don't have family or friends that can host the home proxy for me, can you or your company host it for me?

Because the home proxy has to be in a residence which makes it infeasible for us to host it for multiple users. You need to have a residential place to set up the home proxy in your home country. Nowadays, many people already have devices like Amazon Fire Stick at home, so just ask them to install and run the AlwaysHome App for you. There is also a feature coming up this month that will prevent your access to their internal network devices (only websites through their the home network) so they don't need to worry about security issues this may cause.
3) I am not a technical guy and still a bit confused about the user license, could you explain more?

We don't charge the use of the home proxy. We charge a subscription to each remote App account that is used to connect to the home proxy. We also charge a subscription to each remote dongle that is connected to the home proxy.For example, David travels to Asia from time to time. He wants to keep watching US version of Netflix, Hulu and Xfinity show when he travels. He set up a home dongle at his New York home and then installed AlwaysHome Mobile on his Mac computer. In Asia, he opens Mac computer, starts the App and then watches all the shows he wants just like at home. For David, he needs to buy a dongle hardware and then pay for a subscription license for App account to run on his Mac.Another example, John lives in Dubai with his family. He set up one home dongle at Florida home and then at Dubai home, he set up a remote dongle for his Apple TV and other devices to connect back to Florida home. His daughter would be able to watch streaming shows just like at Florida home. For this, he pays for the home dongle hardware and the remote dongle hardware and one subscription license for the remote dongle to run. He then purchased another subscription license for his App so he can use it on his iPhone/iPad when he is out of Dubai home.
1) None of the perks meet my needs, I need a customized configuration. So what should I do?

You can claim multiple perks from our campaign. Order dongle and user license separately from different perks and combine them to meet your need. When adding dongle, use the perk that reads like ""add extra dongle (no shipping cost)"" in together with your other perk. This extra dongle perk has to be ordered when you have other otherwise there is no shipping address in the system so we never know it needs to be shipped.
2) Can you ship on time? I want it as a holiday gift for my family, it’s important for it to get it before the holidays.

Yes. The campaign is now in in-demand and we normally ship within 1-2 business days after receiving your order. When you see your order is in ""lock"" state, that means we are processing your order to be shipped out. If you only order subscription license, we will setup things and email you the details so you can start using the service right away.
3) 3-10 times faster internet, multiple device connectivity, space shifting revolution
column2: seems too good to believe! Is this for real?

column1: We have come to the 3rd major release of our product and thousands of users have been using it ever since its advent in 2015 for the first time. Along the way, we solved quite some challenging problems so our stuff is not just an idea that just sprouted out of the box.
Although every user is different with the internet infrastructure he is using, 3-10 times faster is a norm and observed by our customers especially those in Asia, Africa, and Mid East.

We offer the best price with the features untouched yet. That’s why we brought a software update which allows you to use your phone, tablet or streaming box as space shifted streaming device even without the dongle. Yes, it is real. Time to believe.
4) How do you compare your pricing with VPNs?

First of all, no VPN service out there can do what our solution can do. They normally get blocked by streaming service providers (a good search of ""Netflix block VPN"" will reveal the fact). We price the service in the lower end to mid range of all good VPNs. We are able to do so because our software is more efficient and cost less hardware resource to run. Also, our solution can leverage your home network bandwidth that you already have, that will reduce the number of servers we need to set up.
5) I know networking, could you elaborate on how you measured network performance to support your acceleration claim?

Measuring real-time network acceleration is just a piece of cake. We use mainly speedtest.net for this task. You can go to the platform and start to measure the download and upload speed of your network connection and compare it after connecting to the network with AlwaysHome.  And the results will look as just as ours. We have proven results from our customers around the world.

Note: the performance is subjected to ISP policy regarding bandwidth shaping, physical network bandwidth limit etc. Those are physical factors that AlwaysHome may not solve. However, almost all the ISP’s networks, we've tested have rendered the 3-10 network acceleration.
1) If the home proxy is down, can my remote devices fall to a server and access the blocked websites?

Yes. You log in to the web portal with your account and configure your devices or dongle to use our servers deployed in US/UK/Korea/German etc. Or you can email us and let us know the home proxy is down and we will manually switch your App/dongle to connect to our servers within a few hours. Connecting to our server will NOT get Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Instant Video who are aggressively blocking access from public servers, including many VPNs and our servers as well. Connecting to our server will get you to Google, Facebook, YouTube etc which are blocked in some countries.
2) How many users can the dongle support simultaneously?

When using the dongle as the home proxy, we suggest limiting the CONCURRENT remote devices up to 5. When using the dongle as a remote device, technically there is no limit of devices that can be connected to it simultaneously. But we suggest not to surpass the number more than 10.  Please keep in mind that the bandwidth will be shared among all users. If you are using your own devices such as Amazon Fire Stick as the home proxy, we believe it can support more than 100 devices.
3) I have an old phone, can I turn it into a home proxy?

Yes, it needs to be Android 4.4 or above, or iOS 10 or above. You need to make sure the AlwaysHome App keeps running all the time. That means you need to open the App and leave the screen saver off that the phone OS won't kill it even it is idling.

4) Between remote device and home proxy, is the communication going via the Homing cloud or directly between them? If it's the latter, how do communications traverse firewalls without port forwarding being set up?

It is mostly the latter. Remote device and home proxy all connect to Homing Cloud and they will be instructed to start a process called NAT traversal which enables a direct communication without port forwarding. In most of the cases, NAT traversal can work successfully. From then on, user data will be exchanged between these two directly. In some rare cases, NAT traversal does not work and a direct link is not possible. Then a middle server doing the piggyback will be utilized so the communication between the two dongles will go through our mid server.
5) What makes AlwaysHome stand out from the other VPNs in the market?

VPNs are good under certain conditions. But they typically become hard to manage when the user count goes up. VPNs are designed for data encryption. When the user count goes high with its popularity, they become slower & interrupted especially when the user can choose which server to get on. AlwaysHome is a cloud-based distributed server infrastructure that supports fault tolerance and great scalability to handle a large number of concurrent users.

VPNs are using standard protocols like PPTP，L2TP，OpenVPN which can be easily identified by “middleboxes” such as firewall or proxy or routers with DPI (deep packet inspection) capabilities. Those boxes can easily block VPNs once identified. AlwaysHome, however, employs proprietary protocols that are not known to middleboxes. It means AlwaysHome does not suffer the blockage that VPNs are subject to.

VPNs were designed to be a security solution, never meant to accelerate network performance. AlwaysHome, on the other hand, has a technology called WAN optimization. This technology can significantly accelerate network speed over a long distance on the Internet.
So, if you are a VPN user and still think that it’s one of the precious technologies in the 21st century, you definitely want to check out AlwaysHome.
6) The dongle seems nicely designed. Can I use it at a coffee shop or hotel where there is no cable around and sometimes the captive authentication is needed?

Yes, dongle support to use public Wi-Fi for the Internet to connect itself to and at the same time provide downlink Wi-Fi to attached devices. You can attach a phone/computer to the dongle and then login dongle’s web management interface and configure the dongle to use a surrounding Wi-Fi hotspot. It also supports those Wi-Fi hotspots using so-called “captive authentication” that requires one to agree on terms, input a code etc. before using the Wi-Fi.
7) Does AlwaysHome support PPTP/L2TP or OpenVPN?
No. The data protocols are proprietary and developed by the AlwaysHome developers.
8) Technically, the dongle acts as VPN or proxy?
Technically speaking, AlwaysHome is not VPN but rather a TCP proxy service, with network acceleration capability. It is not HTTP proxy though.
9) I am worried that someone can access my home network through the home proxy. How can you guarantee security?

That’s a valid concern and we have addressed it deeply. All devices including home proxy are all behind a firewall and do NOT require you to open a port on your home router for port forward function. So your home proxy and home network are still protected just like your other devices at home. Accessing home proxy can only be done through a valid and configured dongle or App that requires valid user login.
Accessing of in-home devices can be disabled if you want to share your home proxy with friends so that they can access streaming websites, but not your home network devices, like your PC or NAS.
10) How stable is your system? Will there be network interruptions as other VPNs?

Our system is based on a cloud-based distributed server infrastructure which has high fault tolerance and scalability. Unlike VPN, which is normally point to point, in our system, the finding and switching to a working server is done automatically against a pool of servers. So the whole system works more reliably than VPN.
11) If I have an Android TV, can I connect it to the dongle and access content from out of my home country?

Yes, you need to install the App on your TV. So, as long as the Android TV has access to Google Play TV (AlwaysHome App is in Google Play) or you know how to install an APK manually onto your TV, you can watch your home country shows without geo-restrictions.
1) To which countries do you ship?

We ship globally excluding the following which has been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria & Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any of these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however, we cannot guarantee the shipment's arrival.
2) How will my order be shipped?

We have already mass produced the dongle. So once you buy a perk, your order will be processed within 2-3 days and then shipped out. For US backers, it’s expected to be delivered within 3-4 days using USPS First Class (there will be an email from stamps.com with all the tracking number etc).

For Non-US backers, products will be shipped out from China factory directly. We normally employ one of the express companies, DHL/FedEx etc and you normally receive the delivery within a week after shipping. On occasions post service is used for some hard to reach areas or countries, please expect 2-3 weeks or even longer delivery time.
It is very important to have your correct address and phone number on file. We had a couple of returns which are very high cost because of the incorrect address info.
3) Do I have to pay European VAT / GST?
Yes, the amount will depend on your country’s regulations. Only the dongle needs shipping though.
4) How can I be a distribution partner or reseller of AlwaysHome?
We'd love to hear from you! Please contact:  contact@homingsystems.com
We are also open for custom requests for leveraging our technology core and platform for your business goals.

AlwaysHome complies with Indiegogo refund policy. You can cancel the backing before the order is processed (status turned to be LOCKED). In general, there is NO refund after the products have been shipped.

If you bought the product by mistake, you can contact AlwaysHome customer satisfaction team through support@homingsystems.com. We normally ask you to return the product and then issue the refund. Please bear in mind that we will need to deduct the fees and charges that we already paid from the total refund.
AlwaysHome hardware including accessories comes with a one-year limited warranty. Contact our customer satisfaction team via support@homingsystems.com for faster response.

International shipments may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country. We don't have control over these charges and you will be responsible for fulfilling them. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause a delay beyond our delivery estimate.

It is also the recipient's responsibility for charges such as change of address, parcel holding, return fees caused by the recipient. So please make sure you have the correct address information including a phone number on file.
Got something which is not answered above? No worries! Send us a message or email contact@homingsystems.com.

By contributing now, you’ll no longer be tied down to a particular location for work, or to catch your favorite shows or sites.  Travel without worries, and experience your content wherever you are, just like you are Always Home. The AlwaysHome also makes a great conversation starter on those long international flights and layovers!If you can share AlwaysHome with your friends, family or anyone who you think our product will be a huge leap in their lives especially to make it easier to live and work anywhere in the world, it will be a great support for us and for them too. So don't keep it a secret, let them see the game changer!",24.0,0,"4 Campaigns
We are two friends who have always been really interested in 3D printing Technology.
column2: >Now we want to share our hobby with the world, so we came up with the idea to build a website where you can buy 3D printed things, for only a part of the regular costs.

column1: On our website you will not just be able to buy 3D printed objects like toys, iphone cases sculptures jewelry dishes... from a huge catalog for very cheap, you can also send us your projects or wishes and we will print them for you.
If you already have a 3D printer at home you will be able to just download the object for totally free, so you can print it.

Our motto is great quality for great prices! 
Our prices will allways be around  half the price of the regular not 3D printed object!
So what are you waiting for to get you more stylish and only have the price things on our website?
But to realize that we will need your help!
We are grateful from the bottom of our hearts for every little donation.
