P.S.: WowTimeKey's logo is full of secrets (some well hidden). We will talk about it later, after showing WTK's many advantages.

With 7 keys per line, each key is 42% larger than in QWERTY and its variations (QWERTZ, AZERTY...). It makes all the difference to get exactly what you want to type, and faster. QWERTY has 10 keys per line for numbers / letters. You can see in the image below that WTK letter keys are much larger.
Almost every syllable has a vowel. Having the 5 vowels centered in the keyboard (third line / base line), syllables will be formed easily.

Today, with QWERTY, the distribution of typing in 4 lines is 5%, 50%, 30%, and 15% (rounded mean). In WowTimeKey: 5%, 30%, 50%, and 15%, with typing concentrated in the so called base line of physical keyboards.

“H” is the exception in the alphabetical order. Please, believe me, it’s not an ego trip (my name is Hélio Hissao Shinsato...). “Th” is the most used bigram (pair of letters) in English, with 3.2%. Its position make it easier to type ""the"", ""has"", “she”, “he”, “sh”, “wh”, “lh”, and “ch” too.

WTK has neighbor keys for very used words. English: as, at, go, he, if, in, me, my, no, of, on, up. Other languages: as, da, de, di, ei, el, em, he, il, in, io, la, le, me, mi, ni, no, nu, oi, ou, un...
WTK has neighbor keys for other bigrams very used in several languages: ad, al, ca, ed, fe, fi, fo, ha, id, lh, ly, po, pr, qu, rk, sh, st, th, ts, wh…
The WTK for smartphones has two modes: key touch only, and border touch. The typing mode will be selected in “Config” like other configurations in smartphones.

Selecting “key touch only” mode, WTK will work like any other keyboard, but with the advantage of 42% larger keys, the most efficient distribution of letters ever, and the smart usage of the 1 sec. touch resource.

column2: >All variations of each letter in the same screen

column1: Like in other keyboards for smartphones, touching each letter key for one sec. you will access variations of the letter, but WTK shows, in the same screen, special characters of each letter for more than 160 languages based in the Latin writing system. See below the example for ""a"", the letter with more variations.

column2: >One sec. touch for upper case letters

column1: In the ""key touch only"" mode, the default for one sec. touch is the upper case of each letter, making it faster to type names, abbreviations, and start new phrases. Versions personalized for languages that use special characters will have specific defaults (coming next): á, é, í, ó, ú, à, è, ì, ò, ù, ä, ë, ö, ü, ê, ã, ñ, ç, etc.

With the ""border touch"" mode, we take advantage of the larger keys to introduce functionalities that speed up typing. This mode is recommended for smartphones with reasonably large screens (very common nowadays), and good sensitivity.

Selecting “border touch” mode, with a single touch at the borders of 2 or 4 keys, you will be able to type very used: bigrams, special characters, letters with accent, words (personalized for each language), and all the upper case letters.
With the ""border touch"" mode, touching the superior border of each letter, you will get the upper case version of the letter.
Touching the borders horizontally, you will get very used bigrams / words:
With the bigrams, you will reduce your typing. Just mentioning, in the physical keyboard, with more space, we could use this resource in another level.

Touching the borders of 4 keys, you will access very used English words. Each language will have its personalized set of words coming next (French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, and Italian are already designed).
Having space for 30 of the most used words, we found a playful way for you to memorize them easily.
I’m (ok). What (was) that about with “all will have”, and out there (you) are like (you) don’t want this know-how for you ever. Anyone get something here, right? Just the…

– I’m all (set). (Out) there this (is) ever(y)thing. – What will (happen)? Are (you) know(ing) any(thing) here that (I) have (to)? – Like how one (is) right about (to), and don’t forget? Just without (fear)! (I) want you (to see) some (of) the…

There is another mnemonic trick. We put various words next to letters that will help you remember where the words are: what (w h t), that (t h a), about (a b), will (w l), have (h a e), and (a d), like (l i e), don’t (d), for (f o), one (o n), get (g), right (r), just (j u).

Our selection of words and bigrams allows you to write faster: adhere (a+d+here), adjust (a+d+just), alone (a+l+one), another (an+ot+he+r), ant (an+t), anthem (an+the+m), anyhow (any+how), anyone yes (y+es), yet (y+et), your (you+r), zone (z+one), and much more.

Even if you think you type fast enough now, you can be benefited reducing the amount of typing, and letting your fingers travel small distances to type commonly used words. WTK can, possibly, cause less stress, and reduce joints' injuries.

My dream (I believe it’s not so crazy): I imagine some years from now researchers finding evidence that people who adopt WowTimeKey get more intelligent, augmenting their IQ. I think it is really possible because people will probably create new synapses in the process of finding the most efficient way to type syllables, words, and signs, and setting their mind to think ahead of just the next letter. People may consider typing this way tiresome for their brain at the beginning, but it gets easier and easier very fast. Kids may even consider instigating this learning process.
Programming started as planned (January 8). The virtual keyboard for Android smartphones is now available at Google Play (since May first).

I had to spend my own savings, so the first version do not have predictive text yet. It should be added for English in August. Even without it, I think you will notice that it makes sense migrate to WowTimeKey. Being rational, you will see that it’s time to leave QWERTY.
In order to activate (example for Samsung devices): Config ->
column5: Configuring enter methods (a blue link at the bottom of the box) -&gt

column1: In the first phase (Android), we will make the keyboard available for 160 languages. There are probably more, but I could not confirm other languages in independent realiable sources.
Very used internationally: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian.

column2: >60 min. in QWERTY reduced to 36 min. in physical WTK

column1: Just mentioning, the physical WTK has 19 innovations registered in the patent, and will make possible to type in 36 min. (mean) what is now done in 60 min. with QWERTY.

Next improvements include an optimized version – completely designed – for languages that use accents to speed up typing even more, based in their specific needs. Keyboards for Cyrillic and Greek are designed too, and will be added in the next steps, so that all countries and official/ local languages of EU, for example, will be benefited soon. The timing for all the other writing systems will depend on the support received.

Let me tell you about the logo. Every time I found a way to improve the keyboard (19 innovations), I had a “wow” moment. Then, at the end of the process, I decided to celebrate, my way, writing a visual poem. Having the word “wow” in my mind, I created what I later decided to use as the brand name and logo.

Maybe you’ve seen a person yelling in the 2 moving images. Good catch if it is the case, but... If you are a geek, or at least curious, I tell you that you can find 30… 60… hidden words, images, secrets. Here is a clue: it is full of references to “wow” moments in science, technology, culture, being human! Now, if you are curious, try to find them, and talk about your discoveries. It can be a good brain power test. I’m trying to say what “wow” means to me, and I hope we can share this connection, a particular way to look at us, humans.

Unfortunately adults in general did not believe in the keyboard’s advantages I mentioned in the invitation, and most did not even visited the page. You can believe in everything I say. I can, at least, prove right now that it's true my statement that the logo is full of secrets (there are probably other unintentional meanings).
MIT – Massachusetts Institute of Technology, representing research centers (technology)
WoW – World of Warcraft, representing games in general (culture)
Monet: Claude Monet – A founder of French Impressionist painting (culture)
Moe: Feelings of strong affection towards characters in anime, manga, game / The Simpsons / The Three Stooges (culture)
Nemo: Finding Nemo / Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea (culture)
“O” falling + Newton – Newton’s Law of Universal Gravitation (science)
“O” - Sun, “E” - Earth, “M” - Mercury/Mars, ""V"" - Venus – Copernican model (science)
""O"" - lamp, ""Ws"" - light, ""W"" - Watt, ""V"" - Volt, ""I"" - current, ""E"" - electricity (science)
“O” EMITted + Tim (worked at CERN) – Particle accelerator (science)
“O” launched + Tom + Von + moon – Conquering the moon (technology)
“O” fired + “W” sides – Cannon and ball / fireworks (technology)
“O” hole + squared case – Disc, CD, DVD, LP, floppy disk (technology)
Person yelling + “time” (team in Portuguese) – Cheering in a game (culture)
Colors of the Brazilian flag – reference to the keyboard’s origin (culture)
“MoM” turning figure upside down – moving images: birth of a baby (life)

Words formed with letters in the images may contribute to construct meanings. English: emotive, eon, ion, in, into, it, me, men, meow, met, mine, mom, moon, motive, move, movie, mow, neo, neon, net, new, nine, no, non, none, not, note, now, omit, on, one, owe, own, ten, tie, tin, to, toe, ton, tone, tow, town, two, vein, venom, vent, vet, veto, view, vomit, vote, vow, we, went, wet, win, wine, wit, women, won. Portuguese: e, ei, em, inove, me, menino, mito, mote, motive, move, movi, nem, neto, nome, note, notei, nove, o, oi, ontem, ovni, te, tem, temi, temo, ti, time, tio, tome, tomei, veio, vem, vento, veto, vi, vive, vivo, voe, vote, votei. Of course I’m aware of several words in other languages, but it’s not an easy task to provide a comprehensive list.

Being a sociologist, I know that some people will criticize me for talking about a “wow” world, instead of world’s problems. In my defense, I say that there are moments for criticism, and moments for joy. We should celebrate the quite few moments of enchantment. And no, I am not endorsing the Brazilian government by using the 4 colors of the flag.

I want to make public my gratitude to my friends, designers Augusto Citrangulo, Léia Emy Yamachi, and Luis Alexandre Lara. They gracefully used their minds and time helping me to decide about shades of color, suggesting ways to personalize letters, and helping me to achieve the proportions I wanted in the visual poem. Other friends contributed with their opinions and suggestions before I had this campaign ready to go: Frederico Catapani (with video too), Jorge Tateishi, Marisa Camargo, Rachel Moreno, Rudah Galli, and Suzel Figueiredo. Thank you all!

column2: >In front of a graffiti at Beco do Batman - Vila Madalena - Sao Paulo (Dec. 14, 2017)

column1: I am a sociologist, with bachelor’s degree from USP – University of Sao Paulo, and master’s degree from UCONN – The University of Connecticut. My professional area is Market and Public Opinion Research – Market Intelligence nowadays. Experienced analyst, projects' manager, director of business areas in renowned companies, and served as director and vice president of the national professional association, as well as president of its council. Uhnnn... Maybe you can have more confidence in me if I tell you that I am also an electricity technician, and frequented 2 semesters of mechanical engineering.

Inventor is my “B” side. When I was about 12 y.o. my mother bought a typewriter to me and my sisters. I was enchanted by the looks! It had a light green – almost blue – rigid plastic exterior. Really beautiful. Then I looked at the keys. It was so… nonsense! Only decades later I read that keys were placed in that way to minimize jamming, type bar clashes. At that time I thought someday somehow someone somewhere would come up with something, a somewhat better solution. Then the electric typewriter appeared, the PC, and many other devices. And QWERTY stayed alive with no more reasons to exist other than… inertia.
When I was about to turn 50, I remembered having this thought about QWERTY. Then: Well, if nobody succeeded in making a better keyboard in all these years, I will take this task.

The moments of inspiration (19 innovations) are just part of the story. In order to make the best keyboard for people all around the world, I studied the characteristics and needs of more than 200 languages, and had to make a good use of my analytical experience, taking into account lots of variables. And here we are. You and I.

column2: >Being a ""wow"" person, you are in the team

column1: If you had a “wow” reaction looking at the keyboard, then welcome to the team. You can see farther than most people, your eyes shine looking at something really new and relevant, and you probably enjoy spending some time helping others to understand the advantages of embracing the future.

column2: >You can be deeply involved in a historical change

column1: Depending on the contribution level, you can be a beta tester, helping to make the final product reach its full potential, so that people around the world will be willing to get out of the inertia. In the Diamond level, you will be a master beta tester, with certificate, and we will let you know in advance secrets of the physical keyboard that will allow people to reduce from 60 minutes to 36 minutes (rounded mean) the time spent typing, and you'll know about new resources that will be loved (I hope) as productivity tools. QWERTY, the keyboard used nowadays, will turn 145 y.o. in March 1st 2018. Let's put an end to the long lasting inertia. If not now, then when?

Even if you have other priorities, and will not be able to spend some of your money to help us, you can still be in our team, telling your friends / network about WowTimeKey, and recommending a visit to this page. Thank you for your interest. Welcome!
","P.S.: WowTimeKey's logo is full of secrets (some well hidden). We will talk about it later, after showing WTK's many advantages.

With 7 keys per line, each key is 42% larger than in QWERTY and its variations (QWERTZ, AZERTY...). It makes all the difference to get exactly what you want to type, and faster. QWERTY has 10 keys per line for numbers / letters. You can see in the image below that WTK letter keys are much larger.
Almost every syllable has a vowel. Having the 5 vowels centered in the keyboard (third line / base line), syllables will be formed easily.
Typing concentrated in the base line

Today, with QWERTY, the distribution of typing in 4 lines is 5%, 50%, 30%, and 15% (rounded mean). In WowTimeKey: 5%, 30%, 50%, and 15%, with typing concentrated in the so called base line of physical keyboards.

“H” is the exception in the alphabetical order. Please, believe me, it’s not an ego trip (my name is Hélio Hissao Shinsato...). “Th” is the most used bigram (pair of letters) in English, with 3.2%. Its position make it easier to type ""the"", ""has"", “she”, “he”, “sh”, “wh”, “lh”, and “ch” too.

WTK has neighbor keys for very used words. English: as, at, go, he, if, in, me, my, no, of, on, up. Other languages: as, da, de, di, ei, el, em, he, il, in, io, la, le, me, mi, ni, no, nu, oi, ou, un...
WTK has neighbor keys for other bigrams very used in several languages: ad, al, ca, ed, fe, fi, fo, ha, id, lh, ly, po, pr, qu, rk, sh, st, th, ts, wh…
The WTK for smartphones has two modes: key touch only, and border touch. The typing mode will be selected in “Config” like other configurations in smartphones.

Selecting “key touch only” mode, WTK will work like any other keyboard, but with the advantage of 42% larger keys, the most efficient distribution of letters ever, and the smart usage of the 1 sec. touch resource.
All variations of each letter in the same screen

Like in other keyboards for smartphones, touching each letter key for one sec. you will access variations of the letter, but WTK shows, in the same screen, special characters of each letter for more than 160 languages based in the Latin writing system. See below the example for ""a"", the letter with more variations.
One sec. touch for upper case letters

In the ""key touch only"" mode, the default for one sec. touch is the upper case of each letter, making it faster to type names, abbreviations, and start new phrases. Versions personalized for languages that use special characters will have specific defaults (coming next): á, é, í, ó, ú, à, è, ì, ò, ù, ä, ë, ö, ü, ê, ã, ñ, ç, etc.

With the ""border touch"" mode, we take advantage of the larger keys to introduce functionalities that speed up typing. This mode is recommended for smartphones with reasonably large screens (very common nowadays), and good sensitivity.

Selecting “border touch” mode, with a single touch at the borders of 2 or 4 keys, you will be able to type very used: bigrams, special characters, letters with accent, words (personalized for each language), and all the upper case letters.
One touch for upper case letters
With the ""border touch"" mode, touching the superior border of each letter, you will get the upper case version of the letter.
One touch for very used bigrams
Touching the borders horizontally, you will get very used bigrams / words:
With the bigrams, you will reduce your typing. Just mentioning, in the physical keyboard, with more space, we could use this resource in another level.
One touch for very used words

Touching the borders of 4 keys, you will access very used English words. Each language will have its personalized set of words coming next (French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, and Italian are already designed).
Having space for 30 of the most used words, we found a playful way for you to memorize them easily.
I’m (ok). What (was) that about with “all will have”, and out there (you) are like (you) don’t want this know-how for you ever. Anyone get something here, right? Just the…

– I’m all (set). (Out) there this (is) ever(y)thing. – What will (happen)? Are (you) know(ing) any(thing) here that (I) have (to)? – Like how one (is) right about (to), and don’t forget? Just without (fear)! (I) want you (to see) some (of) the…

There is another mnemonic trick. We put various words next to letters that will help you remember where the words are: what (w h t), that (t h a), about (a b), will (w l), have (h a e), and (a d), like (l i e), don’t (d), for (f o), one (o n), get (g), right (r), just (j u).

Our selection of words and bigrams allows you to write faster: adhere (a+d+here), adjust (a+d+just), alone (a+l+one), another (an+ot+he+r), ant (an+t), anthem (an+the+m), anyhow (any+how), anyone yes (y+es), yet (y+et), your (you+r), zone (z+one), and much more.

Even if you think you type fast enough now, you can be benefited reducing the amount of typing, and letting your fingers travel small distances to type commonly used words. WTK can, possibly, cause less stress, and reduce joints' injuries.

My dream (I believe it’s not so crazy): I imagine some years from now researchers finding evidence that people who adopt WowTimeKey get more intelligent, augmenting their IQ. I think it is really possible because people will probably create new synapses in the process of finding the most efficient way to type syllables, words, and signs, and setting their mind to think ahead of just the next letter. People may consider typing this way tiresome for their brain at the beginning, but it gets easier and easier very fast. Kids may even consider instigating this learning process.
Programming started as planned (January 8). The virtual keyboard for Android smartphones is now available at Google Play (since May first).

I had to spend my own savings, so the first version do not have predictive text yet. It should be added for English in August. Even without it, I think you will notice that it makes sense migrate to WowTimeKey. Being rational, you will see that it’s time to leave QWERTY.
Go to Google Play -> Categories -> Tools -> Type WowTimeKey to search -> Download it.

In order to activate (example for Samsung devices): Config -> General management -> Language -> Keyboard -> Configuring enter methods (a blue link at the bottom of the box) -> Activate Wow -> Go back one screen -> Keyboard -> Select English (US) Wow.
In the first phase (Android), we will make the keyboard available for 160 languages. There are probably more, but I could not confirm other languages in independent realiable sources.

“MoM” turning figure upside down – moving images: birth of a baby (life)

Words formed with letters in the images may contribute to construct meanings. English: emotive, eon, ion, in, into, it, me, men, meow, met, mine, mom, moon, motive, move, movie, mow, neo, neon, net, new, nine, no, non, none, not, note, now, omit, on, one, owe, own, ten, tie, tin, to, toe, ton, tone, tow, town, two, vein, venom, vent, vet, veto, view, vomit, vote, vow, we, went, wet, win, wine, wit, women, won. Portuguese: e, ei, em, inove, me, menino, mito, mote, motive, move, movi, nem, neto, nome, note, notei, nove, o, oi, ontem, ovni, te, tem, temi, temo, ti, time, tio, tome, tomei, veio, vem, vento, veto, vi, vive, vivo, voe, vote, votei. Of course I’m aware of several words in other languages, but it’s not an easy task to provide a comprehensive list.

Being a sociologist, I know that some people will criticize me for talking about a “wow” world, instead of world’s problems. In my defense, I say that there are moments for criticism, and moments for joy. We should celebrate the quite few moments of enchantment. And no, I am not endorsing the Brazilian government by using the 4 colors of the flag.

I want to make public my gratitude to my friends, designers Augusto Citrangulo, Léia Emy Yamachi, and Luis Alexandre Lara. They gracefully used their minds and time helping me to decide about shades of color, suggesting ways to personalize letters, and helping me to achieve the proportions I wanted in the visual poem. Other friends contributed with their opinions and suggestions before I had this campaign ready to go: Frederico Catapani (with video too), Jorge Tateishi, Marisa Camargo, Rachel Moreno, Rudah Galli, and Suzel Figueiredo. Thank you all!
In front of a graffiti at Beco do Batman - Vila Madalena - Sao Paulo (Dec. 14, 2017)

I am a sociologist, with bachelor’s degree from USP – University of Sao Paulo, and master’s degree from UCONN – The University of Connecticut. My professional area is Market and Public Opinion Research – Market Intelligence nowadays. Experienced analyst, projects' manager, director of business areas in renowned companies, and served as director and vice president of the national professional association, as well as president of its council. Uhnnn... Maybe you can have more confidence in me if I tell you that I am also an electricity technician, and frequented 2 semesters of mechanical engineering.

Inventor is my “B” side. When I was about 12 y.o. my mother bought a typewriter to me and my sisters. I was enchanted by the looks! It had a light green – almost blue – rigid plastic exterior. Really beautiful. Then I looked at the keys. It was so… nonsense! Only decades later I read that keys were placed in that way to minimize jamming, type bar clashes. At that time I thought someday somehow someone somewhere would come up with something, a somewhat better solution. Then the electric typewriter appeared, the PC, and many other devices. And QWERTY stayed alive with no more reasons to exist other than… inertia.
When I was about to turn 50, I remembered having this thought about QWERTY. Then: Well, if nobody succeeded in making a better keyboard in all these years, I will take this task.

The moments of inspiration (19 innovations) are just part of the story. In order to make the best keyboard for people all around the world, I studied the characteristics and needs of more than 200 languages, and had to make a good use of my analytical experience, taking into account lots of variables. And here we are. You and I.
Being a ""wow"" person, you are in the team

If you had a “wow” reaction looking at the keyboard, then welcome to the team. You can see farther than most people, your eyes shine looking at something really new and relevant, and you probably enjoy spending some time helping others to understand the advantages of embracing the future.
You can be deeply involved in a historical change

Depending on the contribution level, you can be a beta tester, helping to make the final product reach its full potential, so that people around the world will be willing to get out of the inertia. In the Diamond level, you will be a master beta tester, with certificate, and we will let you know in advance secrets of the physical keyboard that will allow people to reduce from 60 minutes to 36 minutes (rounded mean) the time spent typing, and you'll know about new resources that will be loved (I hope) as productivity tools. QWERTY, the keyboard used nowadays, will turn 145 y.o. in March 1st 2018. Let's put an end to the long lasting inertia. If not now, then when?

Even if you have other priorities, and will not be able to spend some of your money to help us, you can still be in our team, telling your friends / network about WowTimeKey, and recommending a visit to this page. Thank you for your interest. Welcome!",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hi, my name is John Mercouris. I am a computer scientist with a passion for changing the world. The instrument for change I employ is software. I've designed Next with the singular goal of making its users more productive, and by extension the world, a better place (hopefully).
Through supporting this campaign, you'll enable a whole new set of users (GNU/Linux) to gain access to Next, as well as contributing to the continued support and development of the project.

Most of the funding for the project will be coming out of my own pocket, but additional support would be very helpful, as my resources are limited. The funding you provide will be used for the following things:
• Paying for professional C development time (I've already partnered with a C developer)
• Paying for infrastructure, domain names, servers, build automation

In the event that the funding goal is not met, we'll take whatever we've amassed, and the rest will come out of my pocket in order to fund the project to its goal. I'm very passionate about Next, and I want to make it of the highest quality, so that its users may be fully empowered.

Next has been a passion project for over two years. It arose out of a need to create a web browser more useful for something beyond merely ""browsing"". Modern browsers have eschewed power in favor of simplicity. Their UI and feature-set is tailored to being as simple as possible to use. This has led to a compromise in their capability.

Next tips the power balance the other way. Next is not designed for the common denominator, but rather for the expert tool user. It is infinitely customizable, and designed to make you more productive, at whatever it is you do.
Next has gone through 8 releases, each time evolving significantly. On macOS it is fully usable as a main web-browser.

In order to facilitate better cross-platform support, I consulted the Lisp community and heeded the advice of Robert Strandh. Robert Strandh suggested a distributed architecture involving a Lisp core controlling a ""dumb"" GUI frontend.

This distributed Lisp core design has been something I've been working on for over 6 months. The API, design, and its principles have been validated in an Objective-C port, but in order to bring it to GNU/Linux, a GTK and (given enough resources, Qt) port implementing the remote server protocol have to be constructed (the purpose of this campaign).
If you haven't already, please star or follow the project on Github (https://github.com/atlas-engineer/next) it means a lot to me, and really increases the visibility of the project.
If you want to visit the official project website, you can do so at https://next.atlas.engineer.
Other things that you can do involve simply spreading the word to your friends via messages, social media, etc.

Lisp (http://lisp-lang.org/) is a powerful language that allows any part of Next to be modified and reprogrammed. For example, while you are running Next, you may decide that you want youtube videos to automatically download when they contain the word ""programming"" somewhere in the title. Normally you'd write a plugin, stop, and restart the browser and try reloading your plugin. In Next, because it is written in Lisp, you can write changes, and test them immediately.
There is a lot to say about Lisp, many articles have been written as per its suitability, a few of my favorites are provided below:

Lastly, I would like to offer some words of gratitude for those who have contributed to the project in the form of pull requests, issues, support, words of encouragement, and more. Thank you so much for making this project possible. I hope that together we can make the world if not a better place, at least a more productive one!

Introducing The Routakit M

The new Routakit M  has all the perks of a larger more powerful CNC machine in a fraction of the size. Etch, carve, and cut a wide variety materials for small craft projects, RC builds, or just about anything else you can imagine with extreme pin point precision. 

The Routakit M comes in two models, the M and the M Pro. The M is the standard model offering 8x6 inches of cutting area with a 600w spindle, while the M Pro offers a greater cutting area of 12x8 inches, an upgraded 1.5kw spindle, and an optional rotary axis for making 3D parts. Whether you're new to CNC machines or you already own one, we are confident that our new Routakit M series will take your projects to the next level.
column3:
>Routakit M Pro

 

Some examples of what you can do with Routakit M
column4: >Work with a variety of materials
column5: >Engrave fine detail (1/16"" ball nose end mill used)
column6: >Etch PCB with extreme precision
column7: >Cleanly cut metal such as aluminum
column8: >Etch fine text (Using a .1mm tip bit)
column9: >The word ""Test"" etched
column10:
>Etched Routakit logo using dot pattern style

 

Specifications

Dimensions: 380 x 400 x 530 mm / 15 x 15.75 x 20.85 in (Measured from base)  ​

Travel: ~200 x 150 x 100 mm   /  8 x 6 x 4 in

Rapids: ​4000mm/min (160in/min)- Direct Drive, 1800mm/min (70 in/min- Pulley Reduction Drive

​Step Resolution: ~0.0003mm/.00001in​​ (With Pulley Reduction Drive)

Repeatability: ~.003mm/.0001in (With Pulley Reduction Drive)  ​

Drive System: Custom Machined Ball Screw  

​Stepper Motor: Nema 23 175oz/in (x3)  ​

Plate Material: 6061-T6 Aluminum  ​

Rail Material: 6061-T6 Aluminum  

Spindle: 600w, ER11 Collet, 6k to 13k working RPM

 

Dimensions: 480 x 500 x 530 mm / 18.9 x 19.7 x 20.86 in (Measured from base)  ​

Travel: ~300 x 200 x 100 mm / 12 x 8 x 4 in

Rapids: 4000mm/min (160in/min) - Direct Drive ,  1800mm/min (70in/min)- Pulley Reduction Drive

Step Resolution: ~0.0003mm/.00001in​​ (With Pulley Reduction Drive)  

Repeatability: ~.003mm/.0001in (With Pulley Reduction Drive)  

Drive System: Custom Machined Ball Screw  

Stepper Motor: Nema 23 175oz/in (x2) , Nema 23 345oz/in (x1)  

Plate Material: 6061-T6 Aluminum  

Rail Material: 6061-T6 Aluminum   

Spindle: 1.5kw, ER11 Collet, 9k to 24k working RPM

Rotary Axis add-on available

 

Our Secret Sauce

In order to achieve high levels of cutting performance and extreme precision we designed our machines to be highly rigid using .25"" thick 6061-T6 aluminum plates and high strength extrusions. In conjunction with our custom industrial grade ball screws the Routakit M series is able to house heavier duty spindles over the competition and increase your productivity with faster and more accurate cuts. 

With our optional pulley reduction drive you can take precision to a whole other level giving you incremental spindle and table movements as small as .00001"" (one hundred-thousandth of an inch), that's over 350 times thinner than the average thickness of human hair!
column11: >Robust 16mm Wide Ball Screw
column12: >Smooth and Precise Movement
column13: >Pulley Reduction Drive on Z-axis
column14:
>600w spindle (Left), 1.5kw spindle (Right)

 

What's included?

We are offering two kit levels with each model that will meet various needs and budgets. 

The first level is called the ""Starter Kit"" and is aimed at users that want a functioning machine from the supplied parts. Some accessory items and upgrades are not included such as the pulley reduction drive and bellows.

 

Starter Kit includes:  

Anodized aluminum plates  

Custom ball screws (x3)  

Pre-cut extrusions &
column15:
rails  

Assembly hardware

T-slot Work bed

Spindle with mount  

Nema 23 stepper motors (x3)  

Motor driver boards (x3)

Power supply

Assembly hardware for starter kit

Planet CNC MK3/4 Controller

Planet CNC software license

 

The second level is called the ""Full Kit"" and includes all the upgrades and accessories that we offer. This is for the user that want's maximum performance, cleanliness, and that doesn't want to deal with the hassle of hunting down other parts to fully complete their machine. For the M Pro model a rotary lathe is even included to allow for the creation of 3D parts.

 

Full Kit includes:  

Starter Kit  

Pulley reduction drive set (x3)  

U-shaped bellows (x4)  

Adjustable feet  

Dust shoe

Rotary Lathe (M Pro model only)
column17: >Rotary Lathe Add-on
column18: >Custom Made Bellows
column20: >Lathe mounted onto Routakit M Pro
column21:
>Routakit M Full Kit with Dust Shoe Attached

 

Let's Kickstart This Project!

You may have seen this project last November at Kickstarter, and while it was a success many people reached out letting us know that they were not able to back our project due to the holidays. Now that we're in a new year and the holidays are over we want to offer another opportunity for people to back our project and pre-order a Routakit M. Producing and purchasing parts in bulk is a huge investment but is necessary to be able to bring a new product like this into market. We will use the funds to fulfill all rewards and build up an inventory so that we can continue offering these amazing new machines that we hope will push new boundaries in the DIY community. We can't wait to see what everyone will make with the new Routakit M series and we hope to gain your support so we can bring it into reality! 

On another note, while we would love for you to support our project we know that the Routakit M may not be for everyone so if you're in the market for a CNC machine but you want something larger than a desktop model please visit us at www.routakit.com and check out our other selections, we have something for everybody.

 

Risks and Challenges

There can be many risks associated with any project and ours is no exception. These can range from delays with our hardware partners to last minute design changes that address any issues that we may find as we continue to test the reliability and performance of the Routakit M series. However, since our first successful Kickstarter campaign over two years ago we have learned a lot on many fronts that has helped shape and mold us into what we are today. We have been successfully running and growing Routakit during this time and we are confident that if any issues arise we will be able to address in a timely fashion without major delays.

If any situation requires a change of plans, you can be sure we will continue to make frequent updates to keep everyone in the loop. We believe communication is key when a deadline needs to be met, we don't want to run the risk of disappointing our generous supporters!

column1: GROW TWC is an Australian-owned start-up ag-tech company that offers an integrated and sustainable agricultural solution for farmers, wholesale buyers, and even backyard veggie patch enthusiasts.

Our goal is to make fresh, nutrient dense, organically grown produce accessible, reliable and affordable.  We are passionate about small-scale farming operations and their ability to tackle the effects of climate change.

Our solution involves farmers, wholesale buyers and even you - climate conscious communities, backyard veggie growers, those dreaming of a more self-sufficient lifestyle and those wanting to teach younger generations where their food comes from, how to grow it and the positive impact that growing your own food has for the self, for the planet and for whole communities.

We currently provide 'farm in a box' services - for suburban household and commercial operations - through the sale of our GROWtunnels. We also offer organic certification services, organic seedlings and seasonal crop planning, as well as a Management Solution for investors lacking the time or drive to operate a GROWtunnel farming business.

Designed as a low-cost introduction to organic farming, the controlled, closed-loop environment of our GROWtunnels reduces crop losses to pests, wind borne diseases, pathogens and spray drift from chemical farmers. GROWtunnels also provide the ideal growing climate, protected from increasingly common extreme weather events where intense sun, rain, hail and wind can harm field farmed crops.

This campaign is designed to raise the funds required to build our proprietary digital platform, the GROW Marketplace, that connects wholesale produce buyers with local organic produce growers, and facilitating the sale transaction securely and in real time. GROW Marketplace will also connect backyard growers with each other, allowing communities to interact by buying, selling or even swapping their produce with each other.
The GROW Marketplace Digital Platform and APP
Our vision for GROW Marketplace is that it will be the leading wholesale marketplace for organic produce, both locally and internationally.
Built on a tiered subscription model, GROW Marketplace digital platform and subsquent APP will offer a Home Subscription for backyard GROWers and a Business Subscription for business operations.

The Home Subscription is designed for suburban backyard veggie growers who wish to sell*, buy, or trade their produce with others in their community. Additionally, the Home Subscription provides access to the GROW Wiki for growing advice and information on pest/disease control.
The Business Subscription is designed for business operations, from small-scale to commercial in size and is more than a platform for selling* your produce. The Business Subscription includes:
• an integrated accounting, inventory and invoicing software package,

'Food Futures' involves facilitating the 'pre-arrangement' of future crop requirements at a pre-negotiated price, which reduces wastage and allows both parties the ability to better manage operational forecasting and cash flow.
*Sales transactions may incur a Transaction Fee at the point of purchase.

Included in every GROW Marketplace subscription is your own personal access to the GROW Wiki. The GROW Wiki is designed for all GROWers regardless of your experience. From novice veggie growers to successful business enterprises, the GROW Wiki is a reference and knowledge centre full of expert advice and guides to help you find solutions to common issues.

We’ve considered many possibilities and additions for GROW Marketplace. In fact some we’ll implement in a future strategy, but for now our focus is to encourage existing farmers, new farmers, tree-changers, and even households in suburbia to grow organically and build a local ecosystem of buying, selling and trading their produce.
The benefits are broad for households, wholesale buyers, farmers and communities alike.

Our aim is to raise $250,000 to fund the development and launch of GROW Marketplace, by mid-2020, along with internal costs associated with management and sales through its growth phase of the first 12 months.
We aim to raise these funds by offering one time only discounts on our most popular GROWtunnels with added bonuses and early bird subscriptions to GROW Marketplace.

In the event that we don't reach our entire goal, all money raised will still go towards building the platform, albeit a lighter version, however we will require additional funds to be raised in order to launch the complete platform.
Split payment terms are available on our Rural and Commercial GROWtunnel perks. For further information please contact us at hello@growtunnels.com

GROW was founded on the core belief that the future of the planet is dependent on the strength of the communities that bind it. Ethical, conscious communities that understand the impact of climate change, and encourage one another to strive for a better way - together.
GROW Marketplace is designed to GROW the organic produce industry by providing an entry point for small scale farmers and communities to access growth opportunity whilst caring for the planet.
• contributing to the growth of the global organic produce industry,
• reduction in the Agriculture industry's reliance on poisonous chemicals and synthetic fertilisers,
• providing opportunity for communities - both thriving and emerging,
• improving the reliability of organic produce across seasons and
• increasing the volume of organic produce available to the consumer.

As with any startup, we face a limited risk of running out of funds to support growing our brand and concept. However with zero business debt and a great finance support team we don't run the risk of insolvency. A reduction of income from current activities will only slow down our growth trajectory and, as a startup, we're flexible in our approach and can 'steer the ship' onto a new course swiftly and without affecting our business model.

We also face the challenge of launching GROW Marketplace on time and as promised. There are any number of factors that can delay the development of a multi-level digital platform like ours, such as illness, lack of funding and unforeseen obstacles. We are confident that our team has the knowledge and capacity to face these challenges and risks head on, see below for a brief overview of our founders, Al, Neil and Robbie.

Armed with an honours degree in Organic Agriculture, Alasdair has extensive experience in organic certification, organic farming practices and was named Australia's Sustainable Farmer of the Year in 2014. Al provides the GROW team with operational excellence, and is strongly dedicated to supporting new farmers and farmers converting to organic practices.

With over 20 years experience, Neil has a long track record of delivering innovative solutions in the technology space, most recently heading up a program of digital transformation for an ASX-listed organic fast food chain.

Neil's passion for technology is focused squarely on the retail and food industries. He is dedicated to improving the world of food and farming through the application of technology at every available touchpoint.

column2: >A senior creative leader with 20+ years experience in design, marketing, business strategy and brand activation. Robbie recently led the marketing and brand portfolio for an ASX-listed organic fast food chain, and is the creative mind behind the GROW brand.

column1: We believe GROW is one piece of the climate change solution puzzle. Our focus on making organic produce accessible for anyone to grow and buy will ensure we, and the planet, reach our goals and succeed (as outlined above) - but we need your help to achieve it.

We understand not everyone is able to contribute financially, but there are other ways you can help. We need to get the word out, the more people that see it, the more chance we have at reaching our funding goal.
Please share our campaign by utilising the social share buttons and the top of this page.

The GROW Marketplace crowdfunding campaign is launched in partnership with 2040 Outreach, a philanthropically funded organisation founded by the team behind the 2040 film to promote and accelerate solutions to our most pressing global challenges. 2040 Outreach will receive a small percentage of donations and net profits from the GROW Marketplace crowdfunder to assist with ongoing campaign costs.
GROW TWC is an Australian-owned start-up ag-tech company that offers an integrated and sustainable agricultural solution for farmers, wholesale buyers, and even backyard veggie patch enthusiasts.

Our goal is to make fresh, nutrient dense, organically grown produce accessible, reliable and affordable.  We are passionate about small-scale farming operations and their ability to tackle the effects of climate change.

Our solution involves farmers, wholesale buyers and even you - climate conscious communities, backyard veggie growers, those dreaming of a more self-sufficient lifestyle and those wanting to teach younger generations where their food comes from, how to grow it and the positive impact that growing your own food has for the self, for the planet and for whole communities.

We currently provide 'farm in a box' services - for suburban household and commercial operations - through the sale of our GROWtunnels. We also offer organic certification services, organic seedlings and seasonal crop planning, as well as a Management Solution for investors lacking the time or drive to operate a GROWtunnel farming business.

Designed as a low-cost introduction to organic farming, the controlled, closed-loop environment of our GROWtunnels reduces crop losses to pests, wind borne diseases, pathogens and spray drift from chemical farmers. GROWtunnels also provide the ideal growing climate, protected from increasingly common extreme weather events where intense sun, rain, hail and wind can harm field farmed crops.

This campaign is designed to raise the funds required to build our proprietary digital platform, the GROW Marketplace, that connects wholesale produce buyers with local organic produce growers, and facilitating the sale transaction securely and in real time. GROW Marketplace will also connect backyard growers with each other, allowing communities to interact by buying, selling or even swapping their produce with each other.

an integrated accounting, inventory and invoicing software package,
along with a crop planning tool
GROW Wiki - expert advice and guides

If you are in the event planning community (DJs, Wedding Planners, Photographers, Venues, etc) you are likely as frustrated as I am with the current crop of tools out there to plan your events. To add to the frustration you are likely using one, two, three, or even more tools to help manage all the aspects of your events, to your financials, your communications. And I understand this because I am a Wedding DJ with a propensity to make things better.
And there is a better way to do this.

cue is the next-generation web-based platform of tools for the event industry, built by someone in the event industry, to help manage not only events but to help manage your business simply and effectively.

You may ask why would one start a campaign, now, with everything going on. I would make the argument that now is the best time for a project like this to become available. For event professionals that have the time as we wait for things to open back up to take on a new project like adopting a new platform.

This platform is a huge undertaking and reimagining of how to do things right from the start. With that, cue is being developed as two core offerings, Essentials and Premium. This campaign is to get Essentials fully funded and made available to the public.

The name Essentials is a bit deceiving because it’s really a very feature-rich application from the start. From being able to visually see where you are with your clients and events to being able to get contracts signed, Essentials can help to transform your business. Some of these great tools include:
• Business Discovery. You no longer need to constantly research and add businesses to the system.
• Step Progress. Visually see where you are in every event at a glance.
• Adding Leads. Quickly add leads without all the headaches.

column2: Invoices. Manage it all under one simplified experience

column1: Incorporating things like automation, payments, a unified timeline, business health dashboard, social media tools, and other key features
column2: cue Premium is going to take things beyond what you'd expect.

column1: • I have invested $30K personally to get the essentials version of cue to 80% completion. A walkthrough demo is available here and you can jump to the bottom to see screenshots of what is completed thus far.
• The final 20% requires $18K to get ownership of the code and complete that phase of development
• I have investors that are waiting for Essentials to launch that have pledged to fund once they see a working program with subscriber growth.
Although I have already sold a number of lifetime memberships to support funding (thank you!!), it’s going to take more to get this important domino knocked over and keep things moving.

So I am here to ask if people are interested in helping out. If I can get even enough small pledges, I can get essentials out the door. It's funny what a little money at scale can do to change an industry. You may not be part of the event industry and that is OK. That is why I am offering the Goodwill option for those that want to help push this along.

For the event professionals, I am offering now three levels of subscriptions to cue Premium when released. A 3-month offering at $50, a 9-month offering at $100, a 24-month offering at $200, and I am continuing with my lifetime membership at $450 which is a tremendous bargain.
If you can't contribute I'd sure appreciate you sharing this on any of your social media pages. Getting people in front of this is one of the most important aspects to raising funds.

There has been a lot of interest in people looking to invest $2500 or more into the project. For those interested I would love to set aside some time to chat with you one-on-one presenting my slide deck, talking over financials, and walking through the live alpha development of Essentials. Please contact me so we take these discussions further.
The current development for cue Essentials is approximately 80% complete. Here are some screenshots of what has been created thus far. You can gain access to the alpha release by contacting me here.

We started Inkinite early this year in order to reduce the harmful impact created by the overuse of paper. We have established ourselves with a good reputation among a prestigious client base. We follow an optimised approach to manufacture our products because of which we are able to achieve superior quality for minimum cost. Today we are here to introduce a new variation of our reusable notebooks which can replace the traditional planners and organizers. We need to start our production with a minimum quantity in order to achieve superior quality for a minimum cost.

Inkinite Planner comes with a monthly, weekly and daily schedule in a handy reusable notebook. One can effectively plan all the activities and track them based on their preferences. Adding to this, white sheets are provided to make notes and for brainstorming sessions. All the pages are treated with a special UV coating which makes them dry erasable and easy to clean surface. Like a whiteboard, one can reuse the planner any number of times.

Size : 5.8in x 8.3in A5 Size.
Page Format : Month x 2 , Week set x 4, Days x 2, Expense Tracker x 1,
Isometric x 1, Plain Sheet x 2.
Sheet Type : UV Coated.
• Weekly Format ( Personal/Work To-Do | Habits Tracker | Hydration tracker | To Read | Shopping List)

column2: Expense Tracker
Adding to this, white sheets are provided to make notes and for brainstorming sessions.

column1: • The reusable planner is packed with templates which covers a wide range of uses. This makes it an alternative to notebooks, planners and organizers.
• Being reusable makes it a great investment as it eliminates individual purchases and can be used any number of times.
• The materials used in the manufacturing are eco-friendly. So it does not create a mess like plastic.
• The reusable nature eliminates the wastage of resources as seen in traditional books. This helps conserve trees and makes the nature happy.

• We need a minimum number to start our production. The minimum number is needed to in order to achieve the minimal cost for a superior quality. By this we can make a great quality product for an attractively affordable price.

• With your support, you get to have the reusable planners from the first batch of production. The perks are designed in such a way that you get it for a price less than the intended retail price. Do check out the perks for great deals.

We ship our products to a wide range of client base. Our client base vary from individuals to large companies and they come with all kind of requirements and requests. We have catered all their requirements in a satisfactory and a timely manner. This journey has helped us in eliminating almost all the risks and challenges one can face in manufacturing and delivering our products. We are also good to scale up our production to any number. So the estimates and the timelines provided by us are up to the mark to the best of our knowledge and experience. Other than these, we are susceptible to the usual risks and challenges faced by any other business in the industry. There may be a minimal chance of delay in the delivery of the products, in case of any unforeseen and emergency situations.

Please spread the uses of reusable notebooks among your community. Educate the people about reducing the wastage of paper. Help the trees flourish in the nature. Also don't forget to spread the news of our campaign among your friends and family.

• In most of the countries, there are no import duties imposed for notebooks. In some cases, there may be a small amount of taxes imposed by your home country. Please check with the rules of your country for the same.
• We ship our products only to the following countries due to restrictions. Please check the list before you place your order.
List of countries to which we ship the planner

Short Summary

Two people. One vision of a greener hostel. But, all savings gone.
Welcome to Lloret de Mar, Spain and Welcome to the Klub! Wttklub Hostel!
A greener and socially conscious Hostel, and the first hostel in this city!

After traveling the world over the last 2-3 years, visiting over 100 different countries, Sebastian realized that he was tired of his old professional life. After graduating from a MBA Masters in Business Administration at a prestigious school in Canada, working for large corporations in the US, Canada, and the EU, Sebastian realized that something was still missing. He wanted to do something more from his heart and something better for the world. During his travels, he stumbled on Lloret de Mar, Spain, and fell in love. For someone with a rational business mind, it was all unexplainable. First, it was city, the culture, and beautiful weather. He took a job working in a bar to meet people. And to top it all off, a customer who walked in, ended up being his future partner, Daria.
What did they both decide to do?... to open a hostel in the city they both fell in with, and in.

column2: >We want to leverage the natural beauty, its people, and the sun, to make this a green and socially conscious hostel.

column1: We were looking at many different locations adequate for a 36 bed hostel, wrote a 50 page business plan to ensure we had our strategy and numbers just right, and  prepared for all of the difficult and complicated Spanish laws. And, we are almost ready to start, but, there are still a few obstacles to overcome:

- Location: The property agreement starts in March 2016. We have already paid the the upfront costs, but require funds starting in April to pay this cost for at least 2 months until revenues begin and grow throughout the summer to cover the costs themselves. (approx: 3,800 Euro for 2 months)
- Start-up Taxes and Fees: These costs are surprisingly high in Spain, and for our hostel of 36 beds will cost exactly 4,670 Euros.

column2: E: To cut costs, all renovations and repairs will be done with our own labour as well as friends. However, things like buying the wood to build the bunkbeds, the mattresses, and new linens, require some seed capital.

column1: - We still need enough left over to begin business operations until revenues grow.
But we are only asking for 10,000 Euros. The remaining 10,000 we will find a way to cover ourselves.

column2: >What You GetIn return for your contributions we will give you:

column1: - Thanks by having your picture on our hostel wall of fame
- A promotion of your business or cause somewhere in our hostel and on our website
- An opportunity to enjoy the beautiful place of Lloret de Mar, Spain!

The facility will be for 36 beds and will be a haven for travelers. Yes, we want to be the first hostel here, but our strategy is also unique, with a focus on the triple bottom line, society, the environment, as well as financials:
- Locally-Sourced Merchandise: We want to sell branded products in our hostel from the reception shop, however, strictly those that are produced and handmade by the locals
column2: to create jobs and promote the community.

column1: - Artist Promotions: Supporting local artists and businesses is another goal, as we plan to advertise local artwork and greener businesses throughout our hostel and the shop bar.

- Green Energy: Working in this sphere before, Sebastian can get high quality but lower cost solar systems for the hostel. Within 3 years we want to install an entire solar electricity and water heating system.

- Staff Support: All staff will have a place to sleep and 1 free meal/day. Moreover, staff will be encouraged to participate in social causes in the local community and internationally. We all have been in need at one point in our lives, and its important for everyone to give something back to the community.

We aren't new to this either... This past season, we also ran a successful small business renting apartments and homes within our network through our various online sales travel platforms. We surprised ourselves with our own success, because this last summer was extremely busy, the guests required a lot from us, and at the end of it we left with a new appreciation of what we loved to do, and what we can do even better and greener for next year!

Please, join us, contribute, and help us create something amazing together!

Have any ideas or feedback? Have a unique skill set (construction, artist, sales)? Contact us and volunteer your time to help us. At the least, you'll have a free place to stay. And, we sure could use all the help. 

Even if you can't contribute yourself, you can spread this video on Facebook, instagram, or other social media platforms. Tell your friends to tell your friend's friends to help us. Let's make this real together!

","Short Summary Two people. One vision of a greener hostel. But, all savings gone.
Welcome to Lloret de Mar, Spain and Welcome to the Klub! Wttklub Hostel!
A greener and socially conscious Hostel, and the first hostel in this city!

After traveling the world over the last 2-3 years, visiting over 100 different countries, Sebastian realized that he was tired of his old professional life. After graduating from a MBA Masters in Business Administration at a prestigious school in Canada, working for large corporations in the US, Canada, and the EU, Sebastian realized that something was still missing. He wanted to do something more from his heart and something better for the world. During his travels, he stumbled on Lloret de Mar, Spain, and fell in love. For someone with a rational business mind, it was all unexplainable. First, it was city, the culture, and beautiful weather. He took a job working in a bar to meet people. And to top it all off, a customer who walked in, ended up being his future partner, Daria.
What did they both decide to do?... to open a hostel in the city they both fell in with, and in.
We want to leverage the natural beauty, its people, and the sun, to make this a green and socially conscious hostel.

We were looking at many different locations adequate for a 36 bed hostel, wrote a 50 page business plan to ensure we had our strategy and numbers just right, and  prepared for all of the difficult and complicated Spanish laws. And, we are almost ready to start, but, there are still a few obstacles to overcome:

- Location: The property agreement starts in March 2016. We have already paid the the upfront costs, but require funds starting in April to pay this cost for at least 2 months until revenues begin and grow throughout the summer to cover the costs themselves. (approx: 3,800 Euro for 2 months)
- Start-up Taxes and Fees: These costs are surprisingly high in Spain, and for our hostel of 36 beds will cost exactly 4,670 Euros.

- Renovations and FF&E: To cut costs, all renovations and repairs will be done with our own labour as well as friends. However, things like buying the wood to build the bunkbeds, the mattresses, and new linens, require some seed capital. Cost of renovations and FF&E estimated at 6,923 Euros.
- We still need enough left over to begin business operations until revenues grow.
But we are only asking for 10,000 Euros. The remaining 10,000 we will find a way to cover ourselves.
What You GetIn return for your contributions we will give you:
- Thanks by having your picture on our hostel wall of fame
- A promotion of your business or cause somewhere in our hostel and on our website
- An opportunity to enjoy the beautiful place of Lloret de Mar, Spain!

The facility will be for 36 beds and will be a haven for travelers. Yes, we want to be the first hostel here, but our strategy is also unique, with a focus on the triple bottom line, society, the environment, as well as financials:
- Locally-Sourced Merchandise: We want to sell branded products in our hostel from the reception shop, however, strictly those that are produced and handmade by the locals
column2: to create jobs and promote the community.

column1: - Artist Promotions: Supporting local artists and businesses is another goal, as we plan to advertise local artwork and greener businesses throughout our hostel and the shop bar.

- Green Energy: Working in this sphere before, Sebastian can get high quality but lower cost solar systems for the hostel. Within 3 years we want to install an entire solar electricity and water heating system.

- Staff Support: All staff will have a place to sleep and 1 free meal/day. Moreover, staff will be encouraged to participate in social causes in the local community and internationally. We all have been in need at one point in our lives, and its important for everyone to give something back to the community.

We aren't new to this either... This past season, we also ran a successful small business renting apartments and homes within our network through our various online sales travel platforms. We surprised ourselves with our own success, because this last summer was extremely busy, the guests required a lot from us, and at the end of it we left with a new appreciation of what we loved to do, and what we can do even better and greener for next year!

Please, join us, contribute, and help us create something amazing together!Have any ideas or feedback? Have a unique skill set (construction, artist, sales)? Contact us and volunteer your time to help us. At the least, you'll have a free place to stay. And, we sure could use all the help. Even if you can't contribute yourself, you can spread this video on Facebook, instagram, or other social media platforms. Tell your friends to tell your friend's friends to help us. Let's make this real together!",3.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

From time to time, people ask me why I wanted to start my own business or why I’m so driven. Two words – my daughter.  I’ve heard mothers say that they gained an extra dose of confidence after having children – I totally agree!

Before Hayley (HLG-hint, hint), I had dreams and aspirations, but I never completely followed through.  Like the old saying goes, “it’s not how you start, its how you finish!”  I was starting in grand style, but not too grand with the finish.  Looking back on that time, I know it was fear.  I was making every excuse in the book as to why I couldn’t fulfill my dreams.  Fear can truly cripple your life.  I was in such a transition for many years.  I settled and coasted through my life, comfortable but never truly satisfied.

Hayley changed my whole mindset.  My whole thought process now is to make life better for her.  To be an example to her.  To show by example that you don’t have to be a part of the status quo.  I want my daughter to look no further. I want her to see what she wants to become in me.

Sometimes the universe aligns in our favor.  We see the vision clear and are ready to accept the challenge.  I decided to use my years of experience as a service to others.  The management of business records is very important.  Individuals usually take this aspect of their business lightly until something wrong happens.  Loss of files, identity threat, cost of printing, etc.  My thought has always been how I can make this aspect easier for my fellow business owners.

I have developed my full-feature database app from my years of working with piles of unnecessary paperwork and using non-user-friendly database system.  My goal is to make records management less of a hassle and more of an asset to your work environment.  Our database app is ideal for business owners on the go – either out of town on business or on location.  We believe our database app will help you get out of the old-fashioned way of handling your records and welcome you to newer technology, all at convenience of your phone!

According to Federal Government statistics, 500,000 IT vacancies are going unfilled and minorities only make up 2% of the IT workforce.  I’m aiming to change the status quo and face of technology…with your help, of course!  There’s opportunity for everyone.  Let’s do this together!
column5:
>The economic support you provide will go directly expanding our partnerships with clients and launching our app directly to consumers as soon as possible. The more resources we have, the more  likely it is that we can mobilize into the future.

Our proprietary process for processing record data relies heavily on perfecting our data-hungry machine-learning algorithms. Therefore, the more consumer data we receive, the more reliable our models become and the better and more efficient our tools will be for consumers. Without your support we run the risk of not having enough data to completely refine our pipeline and bring a mobilized record database directly to consumers.
column9:
>Like all software and app developments projects, however, we run the risk of unforeseen technological issues that could cause delays or product revisions.

How can YOU help?  SHARE, SHARE…SHARE! Please like and share campaign blog post, Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn post.  Every click matters and makes a difference.

Again, please support our movement, #HLGPaperStrike Campaign.  Thank you in advance for your support!

column1: The PetCare App was grown from an idea - a dream - from the mind of a true pet lover and pet industry business owner, myself, Dave Farris. TEP grew from the obvious challenges that my wife, Michelle, and I felt and saw through our collective 20+ years in the industry as owners of a boarding and grooming facility. Our main focus is to provide professionals with an avenue to be successful without costing a lot of money, along with giving customers the opportunity to take control of their pets needs, whether it be vets, groomers, boarders, or others.  We would love your help in making our dream come true as well as meeting your needs as pet owners and pet industry business owners.

Our goal, to support our current development efforts and ensure the release of the first version of our app suite, is to raise $10,000 throughout this campaign.  We have set up a variety of award levels to thank you for your support:
With a donation of at least $1 we will give you a high paw to show our thanks and you will have contributed to a great new app.
With a donation of at least $25 we will send you some amazing dog treats from The Dog Bark-ery to show our thanks.
With a donation of at least $50 we will send you our custom K9 Love t-shirt in your size and choice of color.

A donation of at least $100 will allow you to choose between two options:  1) receive business verification in the PetCare app for free once launched and we will send you our custom K9 Love t-shirt in your size and choice of color or, 2) we will send you our custom K9 Love sweatshirt in your size and choice of color.

A donation of at least $250 will allow you to choose between two options: 1) receive business verification in the PetCare app for free once launched, receive three months of the web-app for free once launched, and we will send you our custom K9 Love t-shirt in your size and choice of color or 2) we will send you our custom K9 Love sweatshirt in your size and choice of color, a custom K9 Love t-shirt in your size and choice of color, and amazing dogs treat from The Dog Bark-ery.

Our applications will solve two main challenges:  (1) small and medium pet care industry business owners need an affordable business management tool and (2) pet owners need a mobile application to manage the needs of their pets.
The Pet Passport app will allow customers to:
• track pertinent historical information for each pet added to the app
• schedule appointments with groomers, kennels, trainers, and more
The Petcare App will allow business owners to manage all necessary aspects of their business including:
This Petcare app will connect all pet businesses together in one marketplace.

Additionally, a desktop customer relations manager (CRM) will be developed to work in tandem with the Petcare app to provide even more robust options for the business owners to manage customization and more.
Your contributions will enable this to happen in a timely fashion.

While we are super excited about the launch of our app, we know we will experience some challenges along the way. We hope that you will assist us in overcoming these challenges. First, funding is always a challenge in such a huge project. While we have enough to reach our phase 1 goals, we know that continuing with our timeline could be at risk if more funds are not raised.  We hope to overcome this challenge through fundraising and via fees collected as we launch the apps.

The biggest potential challenge is ensuring we experience enough interest in the application suite. We have begun to build our network of interested businesses and will continue to do so through trade events, social media marketing, email campaigns, and word of mouth. We hope you will support us in this.
Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Help build our pack. Ask pet friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Remember, those who provide your pet care will benefit as well! Bark up the right tree and clue them in on the value of our apps.
Share our campaign on your social media accounts.
Reach out using the pawsitively easy share tools in this campaign as well!

In the pet industry? Click here to visit and ""like"" our PetCare app page on Facebook. 
Pet owners unite! Click here to visit and ""like"" our PetPassport app page on Facebook.
Keep up to date with our newsletter. Sign up here to get updates on our progress and launch details in the future!
Howl out to all who support us!

It's summertime and we all look forward to sharing food and good times with friends. Eating at picnics and BBQ's, hosting gatherings at home and dining out. These are just some of the ways we enjoy ourselves. Wherever we leave food though, THEY seem to appear.  Everyone finds them bothersome - Fruit Flies.

We've worked in the food industry for over a decade and one of the biggest issues to deal with were fruit flies.  After spending countless hours building and replacing our own Do-It-Yourself Fruit Fly traps, we realized the wasteful cost of time and materials without always having the best results.

We decided that the only way to effectively solve this problem was to invent our own solution that focused on our concerns: Time, Money and Waste.  We engineered the washable, reusable Fruit Fly Funnel which can convert most plastic bottles into a highly effective fruit fly trap.

What this means is the cost effective elimination of fruit flies and drastically reducing the dangers of contamination.  It also means creating a cleaner environment while giving yourself more time and money to focus on the things that really matter to you.

A SYSTEM TO HELP YOU USE SOCIAL MEDIA
You have spent a lot of time, and perhaps a lot of money, developing your social media profiles.  However, you may not be protecting, or even using it, the way you should be.
This isn't just going to show you how to use your profile to market yourself (or your company), though it will contain that information.  This guide will also walk you through:
• Ensuring That Your Privacy Settings are Set Properly
The bottom line: this will save you from a lot of unnecessary frustration!

What I am launching here is a way to share my knowledge of these powerful platforms - everything I know - every trick, every work around, every protective measure - in one place so that members can get the most out of them.

What I'll be building is a small network of help.  The initial ""front end"" will be a PDF that covers everything in an ""outline"" fashion.  Behind it will be a membership site with videos and other graphic media to further assist everyone in using this platform to its fullest.

My goal is to make this an ongoing, living, breathing system that keeps up with the latest changes on all the major social media sites that have a business focus, both technically and in terms of policy and other aspects.
The funding will pay for ""the team"", which will initially consist of myself and at least a half dozen others.  The initial funds will be used for:
• Development of API structures that will interface directly with the sites.

As time goes one, we'll be updating every aspect of the site so that when you need something fixed on LinkedIn, we'll be able to help you faster and in a much more comprehensive way than even their own internal staff would be able to do.

There are literally billions of registered members on the major business sites.  Only a small fraction of those members really use the platforms to their full potential, and only a small fraction of those users really understand everything that goes on behind the scenes

You may not think this is necessary for you at this point in time.  That's OK!  Ill bet that some of your connections and followers, however, might need this.  If you would be willing to share, we would absolutely appreciate it.

Launching in September 2018, this phase will focus on providing the initial PDF structure and back-end membership site for use with LinkedIn.  The initial version will be based on what can be done through the ""Free"" version of the LinkedIn account.  This will then be enhanced (available in November 2018) to include other features available to premium subscribers.
Phases 2 - 4: Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Pinterest, Instagram, Vimeo

Launching in January 2019, this phase will add other sites, including but not limited to Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, and Vimeo.  There will be no additional charges or fees for these additional platforms.

Knowing how to use each platform is important - knowing how to integrate them is the key to productivity.  The system will be enhanced over time to include the integration of these platforms with each other and with 3rd party systems such as IFTTT, Delivr.it, Scoop.it, and so forth.  The system will continue to be enhanced as new platforms and new 3rd party integration services are introduced.

The initial perks are very simple - up front discounts for those who jump in early.  Our goal is to keep this as affordable as possible for as many people as possible.  Even if we start to add features like ""live one on one assistance"", I do not expect the fees to rise.  In fact, if we are able to get enough folks on board up front, the ""retail"" prices may end up being lower than we are currently estimating.
