column2:
>

Exclusively available first to all our Indiegogo backers.
column3:
>

It's a two-sided time management platform that comprises of a calendar app and a web app that can instantly grab bulk schedules directly from a syllabus or other uploaded schedule content. JJ sends preset priority based notifications to allow you to prepare ahead of time for the important tasks that matter. The app engages through unique visual design to make it easier to prepare ahead of time.

All you have to do is instantly follow or add the schedules that you are enrolled in to populate your entire calendar. General users can also add their own tasks to populate their personal calendar.

Our goal is to consolidate the three primary aspects of an undergraduate’s campus life: the academics, the extracurricular, and social engagements. We seek to streamline the tedious process of attempting to achieve effective time management and organization into a simple and easy calendar platform that encourages a healthy work/study-life balance. We want to spark a movement among students in their ability to make an impact with their time on campus and enjoy a more fulfilling college experience.

It's almost 2019.

Aren't we overdue for a new category-changing and universally adopted fresh social platform, with actual positive social impact?

Sometimes it takes a while to understand what the real problems are and what to focus on trying to solve. That is why JJ was founded on the basis of creating a student impact.
column4:
>

The Impact

 

The reality is that the cost of universities internationally continues to put a strain on students and their families. The rising tuition fees leads to crippling student debt.

One of our core values to our contributors and to the world lies in tackling this problem which we believe Jibber Jabber can help solve by triggering a collective movement.

Our planned component of creating a Student Collective Fund will comprise from our subscription model, where we will reward those users in need, in their pursuit in affording university.
column5:
>

 

The magnitude of what JJ backers will help us achieve

 

Jibber Jabber is regarded as a social productivity and lifestyle calendar platform intended for but not limited to students. From our experience, we understand that raising early-stage seed funding for EdTech and productivity startups is difficult and tricky.

With your contributions and support, we will further grow our calendar concept, and spread the importance and value of time management for students coming of age.

Your early bird subscription comes with a year’s worth of unlimited access and features at a great discount. Once the year is up, you can keep using our latest version of the calendar with limited access as a student or general user – or you can renew your monthly subscription for unlimited access.
column7:
What You Get

 

With your support, we aim to reach the goal of raising $300,000. This would help us make Jibber Jabber a more accessible platform to more users, students, and universities by:

column1: • Formation of the scholarship education fund initiative. The ""Student Collective Fund"".

column2: European universities), expand our general user content scope of scheduled events, student content base, and a student ambassador program.

column1: • Expanding our social functionality and productivity task features for students on the app and web.
• Further grow our team in place. Adding Mobile Engineers, data protections, Encryption Engineers, Student Ambassadors, and student interns.
• Strengthen our legal structure and improve protections and privacy measures.
• Raise PR and presence through smart marketing allocated campaign budget.

column2:
>

Our Unique Perks

 

Our model is built on giving back to students and rewarding them for being efficient. A substantial amount of our campaign fund will be dedicated towards the education scholarships and grants program we are setting up. We aim to support students who use our social calendar to better manage their courses and enhance their time management skills.

The priority will go towards:

column1: <li>Delivering new functionality and social features in the calendar app
<li>Further strengthening our legal structure and improve protections
<li>Formation of the scholarship education grants fund initiative. The ""Student Collective Fund""
• Onboarding new content for our new users.
• Dtec- Successfully Incubated by Dubai technology Entrepreneur center (UAE) 2015
• Flat6Labs AD Accelerator-  Shortlisted finalist Spring Cohort (UAE) 2016
• Dubai Future accelerator - Selected as a white-label solution to run cohort(UAE) 2016
• Dubai Future accelerator - Shortlisted finalist winter Cohort (UAE) 2017
• Slush - Competition and showcasing Participant XcitED ( Finland) 2017

column3:
Challenges

 

University course syllabi come in all different forms and schedule types. The challenge for us at Jibber Jabber would be:

1. The process of gathering all university syllabi and schedules into our calendar platform. 

2. Consolidating every complex university course tentative schedule into a uniform comprehendible easy to digest schedule for students to easily adopt them.

3. Cater to our different student bases around the world in a timely manner.

4. Ensure privacy controls kept in place are well entact.
column4:
>

 

Overcoming the Challenges

 

From an ideation stage, Jibber Jabber founders raised awareness and capital for the project from a government incubator through a rigorous process over 9 months.

Jibber Jabber recognizes the challenge that students face in planning their schedules, and therefore we have designed a very user-friendly easy application to have an all in one feature that acquires calendar content. 

On the other hand, what Jibber Jabber realizes is that the uncertainty of establishing means to afford university can be daunting. Maintaining academic success to avail scholarships can cause a large deal of stress with students, thus we seek to tackle both: a streamlined platform to establish the work-life balance but also an opportunity for students to liberate themselves of a future of crippling student debt.
column5:
>

 

Recommendations from professors and ecosystem advisors

 

The Jibber Jabber team have identified an opportunity to reduce attrition and enhance academic services at University. By developing an innovative Calendar application that is built from the student perspective, an inclusive, social and pragmatic solution integrating academic schedules and the students social interactions. All within a user interface that is both immediately familiar and highly intuitive. The platform will become easy to integrate into University technology portfolios, and will have the ability to scale over time, by adding further API's and services to this student community.

Alan Greenberg (former Head of Apple Education)

 

My name is Patrick McClelland. I am an Associate Professor of Management and Director of Graduate Programs in the School of Business at the American University of Sharjah. 

Mr. Adams and I became acquainted in 2013 when he enrolled in my Business Policy and Strategy course. It was apparent to me that Mr. Adams was intellectually curious, meticulous, entrepreneurial and industrious. Among others, these are the attributes that Mr. Adams has brought to Jibber Jabber.

I have worked with Mr. Adams as an Advisor from Jibber Jabber's concept to inception. As a Professor, I have seen how the use of Jibber Jabber's highly rational application has created efficiencies for those that use it. As a business I have seen the company take on a strategic, technological, and commercial shape that will lend it to creating/satisfying a niche in the academic marketplace as the company continues to evolve, which with continued guidance and financial support it is sure to do.

Dr. Patrick McClelland (American University of Sharjah).

 

Our incubator invests in teams first, we seek passionate teams with big ideas. Jibber Jabber - JJ - is a great idea turned into a growing startup by a talented and driven team. 
Bootstrapping their way into entrepreneurship, the JJ team lead by Monty Adams has demonstrated passion, tenacity, intelligence and coachability. 
With our continuous support and the team's commitment, JJ has all it takes to become MENA's next success story.

Sirine Fadoul (VISA MENA)

 

I am pleased to recommend the Jibber Jabber team, who I have known for almost 3 years. Their calendar / time management app addresses a real problem that students face, and their solution is a simple and scalable one. We look forward to watching them gain traction as they pilot the app at various universities and educational institutions, and wish them the best with their global ambitions. The team has been very engaged with the Sheraa startup community, based at the American University of Sharjah, and has always stepped forward to inspire and support other aspiring young entrepreneurs.

Najla Al-Midfa (CEO - Sharjah Entrepreneurship Centre - Sheraa)
column7:
> 

Did we miss something? Email us here: info@myjjapp.com

","Exclusively available first to all our Indiegogo backers.It's a two-sided time management platform that comprises of a calendar app and a web app that can instantly grab bulk schedules directly from a syllabus or other uploaded schedule content. JJ sends preset priority based notifications to allow you to prepare ahead of time for the important tasks that matter. The app engages through unique visual design to make it easier to prepare ahead of time.All you have to do is instantly follow or add the schedules that you are enrolled in to populate your entire calendar. General users can also add their own tasks to populate their personal calendar.Our goal is to consolidate the three primary aspects of an undergraduate’s campus life: the academics, the extracurricular, and social engagements. We seek to streamline the tedious process of attempting to achieve effective time management and organization into a simple and easy calendar platform that encourages a healthy work/study-life balance. We want to spark a movement among students in their ability to make an impact with their time on campus and enjoy a more fulfilling college experience.It's almost 2019.Aren't we overdue for a new category-changing and universally adopted fresh social platform, with actual positive social impact?Sometimes it takes a while to understand what the real problems are and what to focus on trying to solve. That is why JJ was founded on the basis of creating a student impact. The Impact The reality is that the cost of universities internationally continues to put a strain on students and their families. The rising tuition fees leads to crippling student debt.One of our core values to our contributors and to the world lies in tackling this problem which we believe Jibber Jabber can help solve by triggering a collective movement.Our planned component of creating a Student Collective Fund will comprise from our subscription model, where we will reward those users in need, in their pursuit in affording university.  The magnitude of what JJ backers will help us achieve Jibber Jabber is regarded as a social productivity and lifestyle calendar platform intended for but not limited to students. From our experience, we understand that raising early-stage seed funding for EdTech and productivity startups is difficult and tricky.With your contributions and support, we will further grow our calendar concept, and spread the importance and value of time management for students coming of age.Your early bird subscription comes with a year’s worth of unlimited access and features at a great discount. Once the year is up, you can keep using our latest version of the calendar with limited access as a student or general user – or you can renew your monthly subscription for unlimited access.What We Need & What You Get With your support, we aim to reach the goal of raising $300,000. This would help us make Jibber Jabber a more accessible platform to more users, students, and universities by:

0,"

    We are a couple of farmers living in the island of Crete,Greece. The crisis in our country drove us back to the village, working as farmers. At the time that thousands of young Greeks (specially the well-educated) are leaving Greece, we decide to stay in our fatherland and try to make it here.

         Growing lettuces, cabagges and onions is not enough to earn our living so we started experiments on snail-breeding and after some years it finally worked! Now we need to expand the farm so the produced quantity could provide us with enough income to pay taxes and earn our living.

       A bigger farm and extra peripheral equipment could help us breed more snails and make things easier in sorting and packaging them. Two more snail breeding chambers can protect snails from mice. Mice are number one enemy in snail breeding because they eat them.Chambers also protect snails from very low temperatures during the winter (even snow sometimes). About 20.000 euros could buy materials to build two more snail-breeding chambers (iron pipes,steel sheets,shading net, e.t.c). Also solar panels and batteries for electric power autonomy as well as a new plumbing setup can make farming easier for us.

  Contributors will get different perks depending on the amount of assistance they provide. Different items will be sent to them such as key-rings, hats, aprons etc. Items are always decorated with our farms logo. They are not corresponding to the real value of the contribution but they will be mementos that you once helped a Greek couple not to leave its country but instead stay and succeed (hopefully) in their fatherland.

  About visiting the farm perk, it would be the greatest pleasure for us to welcome contributors as visitors. We provide a tour and a snail meal combined with other Greek traditional food and beverages. We also provide any information about our island, places to visit, our culture, or anything we can help you with.

 The farm is located 15 km from Heraclion city on the way to the village Anogeia. Our signs on the way should lead you to the farm without problems. We are also registered in Google Maps. Additonally, you can find us on Facebook as 'Tilissos snail farm' and read the reviews from people who have already visited us.

Whether you contribute or not, please spread our campaign on the net and use indiegogo share tools.

The content of the scripts and the visual material is not edited or guided from any professional, it's just US!
column2:
>THANK YOU !

 Wir sind ein paar Bauern auf der Insel Kreta, Griechenland. Die Krise in unserem Land fuhr uns zurück ins Dorf, als Landwirtetätig . Zur Zeit, als Tausende von jungen Griechen (besonders die gut ausgebildeten) Griechenland verlassen, beschließen wir, in unserem Vaterland zu bleiben und versuchen, es hier erfolgreich sein.

  Wachsende Salate und Zwiebeln reichen nicht aus, um unseren Lebensunterhalt zu verdienen, so dass wir Experimente zur Schneckenzucht begannen und nach einigen Jahren endlich gelang! Jetzt müssen wir die Farm erweitern, so dass die produzierte Menge könnte uns mit genug Einkommen zu zahlen Steuern und verdienen unseren Lebensunterhalt.

Ein größerer Bauernhof und zusätzliche Peripheriegeräte könnten uns helfen, mehr Schnecken zu züchten und die Sortierung und Verpackung zu erleichtern. Zwei weitere Schneckenzuchtkammern können Schnecken vor Mäusen schützen. Mäuse sind die Nummer eins in der Schneckenzucht, weil sie sie essen. Kammern schützen auch Schnecken von sehr niedrigen Temperaturen während des Winters (sogar Schnee manchmal). Etwa 20.000 Euro konnten Materialien kaufen, um zwei weitere Schneckenzuchtkammern (Eisenrohre, Stahlbleche, Schattierungsnetze, e.t.c) zu bauen. Auch Solarzellen und Batterien für die elektrische Energieautonomie sowie eine neue Sanitärinstallation können die Landwirtschaft für uns leichter machen.

Die Teilnehmer erhalten unterschiedliche Vergünstigungen je nach der Höhe der Unterstützung, die sie bieten. Verschiedene Einzelteile werden zu ihnen wie Schlüsselringe, Hüten, Schutzblechen etc. gesendet. Einzelteile werden immer mit unserem Bauernhofzeichen verziert. Sie entsprechen nicht dem wirklichen Wert des Beitrags, aber es werden Erinnerungsstücke sein, die einst einem griechischen Ehepaar geholfen haben, sein Land nicht zu verlassen, sondern stattdessen in seinem Vaterland zu bleiben und zu hoffen.

Wir würden uns freuen, wenn wir die Bauernfarm besuchen würden. Wir bieten eine Tour und eine Schnecke Mahlzeit in Kombination mit anderen griechischen traditionellen Speisen und Getränken. Wir bieten auch alle Informationen über unsere Insel, Orte zu besuchen, unsere Kultur, oder alles, was wir Ihnen helfen können.

Der Bauernhof befindet sich 15 km von Heraclion Stadt auf dem Weg zum Dorf Anogeia. Unsere Zeichen auf dem Weg sollten Sie auf dem Bauernhof ohne Probleme führen. Wir sind auch in Google Maps registriert. Darüber hinaus finden Sie uns auf Facebook als 'Tilissos snailfarm' und lesen Sie die Bewertungen von Leuten, die uns bereits besucht haben.

Ob Sie beitragen oder nicht, bitte verbreiten Sie unsere Kampagne auf dem Netz und verwenden Sie indiegogo Aktien-Tools.

Der Inhalt der Skripte und das visuelle Material ist nicht bearbeitet oder von jedem professionellen geführt, es ist nur UNS!

DANKE !

>Our Solution Is to Use State-Of-The-Art Technology That Is Not Only Convenient But Also Accessible And Highly Secure!
column3:
>The Biometric Wallet is our solution and our brainchild, and we can’t wait to share it with you.  

 

The Biometric Wallet – What Is the Biometric Wallet?

Protected and activated with multilayered cloud security ESN, our Biometric Wallet is a handheld and portable device that is sleek, slender and easy to maneuver. Similar in appearance to the store-bought leather-bound wallet, the electronic biometric wallet for convenient data access is designed to provide protection even from intruders who are inches away from scanning you.

Easy To Use and Even Easier To Carry!

With an HD color touch screen and the requirement of a strong password and biometric (fingerprint) verification for identification, our biometric wallet abides by our corporation’s word for the provision of utmost security.

Our Biometric Wallet consists of a slender card that will host and store all of your personal information within its software. Not only will this make traveling easy for you, but it will also make business and financial transactions highly accessible.

By storing all of the data on your credit card, debit card, social security card and others in our biometric wallet, you wouldn’t have to lug around any pieces of plastic ever again.

Our Biometric Wallet provides cloud protection for three bold sectors and therefore, can be used comprehensively without any fear of data breach due to utmost security.

These sectors – governmental institutions, financial organizations and healthcare establishments – work with the Biometric Wallet in order to keep your personal information at bay and at par with technology.
column4: >Cool Unique Slim Design​
column5:
>Main Menu Screen

Our Biometric Wallet for security comprises of a Main Menu Screen that is complete with 5 tabs for navigation purposes. Another tab is placed in the center (below) for biometric identification of your fingerprint.

The moment you access your Biometric Wallet with your fingerprint, you will feel not only safe and secure from creeping bugs (of all sizes) but also quite mature and proud of yourself for taking this decision.

It was a long time calling and we’re glad you tapped onto the screen with your finger! Let’s take a tour of the 5 different sections present on the screen of our Biometric Wallet so that you know what you’re getting into.

 

1)
column6:
'>    Secure Biometric ID (Secure ID) Section

Our Biometric Wallet’s cloud system recognizes only one person’s fingerprint for registration and immediate access. Therefore, this section can be used to replace documents that are usually in hard copy such as your driver’s license, national identity card and your passport with secure biometric means.

No More Paper Docs—Save Everything On Your Digital Wallet!

You can also add different sub-sections by saving all of your important cards including your employment and/or military cards as well.

For instance, this will allow you to access the data on your driver’s license while you’re on the road and your passport, if required, for verification in certain situations.

 

2)
column7:
'>    Banking and Credit Card Section

The banking and credit card section on our Biometric Wallet is designed to provide you with the utmost security and convenience. Now you can store all of the information of your banking cards in this little, portable device without the fear of being compromised or hacked during or prior to transactions.

Our biometric wallet requires your fingerprint verification in the form of a little ‘handshake’ for recognition by the cloud.

Streamline Your Financial Transactions And Stay Protected!

 

3)
column8:
'>    Bio-Pay Section

With the Bio Pay section in our Biometric Wallet, we have strived to make financial transactions between you and your colleagues or companies quite easier than before.

Provided with the protective legacy of a hovering cloud system, the Bio Pay section allows you to approve your financial transactions with your biometric signature.

Maximum Convenience with Just a Single Biometric Signature!

Fast And Easy To Use 

With the help of an authorization code that the Bio Pay section displays on the screen immediately as a token of approval and accessibility to the transferred account for the receiver, you can now process your transactions with utmost security and ease.

Then again, the cloud system requires a signal in the form of a ‘handshake’ to ensure safety and easy access to the accounts. Transactions are, therefore, protected and highly convenient with our Biometric Wallet.

 

4)
column9:
'>    Lifetime Health and 911 Emergency Section

Do you forget to take your medical records to the clinic whenever you go for a routine check-up? Or do you worry about presenting your previous complaints and the history of your past medications and surgeries in front of your doctor?

Well, not everybody is born with the memory of an elephant and sometimes, you can forget to take your medical records with you to the doctor’s clinic.

With the Lifetime Health and 911 Emergency Section of our Biometric Wallet, you don’t have to worry about going empty-handed – in more ways than one – to the doctor’s office on your next impromptu visit.

 

Store Your Entire Medical History And Documents In One Place!

This section has the capability to store all of your medical data within its software, making your personal and health details readily available whenever you need them.You can also store data regarding your medicinal prescriptions so that you can easily purchase your medicines without experiencing any hassle from a pharmacy. You can add or update the data stored in this section after every visit so that your doctor can easily access and recall your issues subsequently.

 

5)
column10:
'>    Merchant Mall Special Promotions and Offers

Our Biometric Wallet is highly functional and enjoyable in other ways as well. The affiliation of several companies and retail stores with our Biometric Wallet gives you exclusive access to special offers and promotions.

Enjoy Discounts, Promos And More!

 

 

Convenience At Your Fingertips

 

Why Do You Need the Biometric Wallet?
column11: >Excellent for Students, Business Travelers, Busy Housewives, Simply Everyone.

column1: • Our Biometric Wallet is not only light and portable, but also pocket-friendly! It can be easily slipped into the pockets of your jeans or jackets for you to carry anywhere you like.
• Our Biometric Wallet is available along with distinctive cases such as a belt case, wristlet case and a fold-over case, making it extremely feasible to carry around in your hand carry.

• Our Biometric Wallet is integrated with a system. It requires fingerprint authentication for access to financial transactions and banking cards every time. Remember, none of your personal data is stored on the cloud!
• Since our Biometric Wallet is integrated with Bluetooth, it can connect to your smart phone and send alerts and requests whenever someone tries to tamper with your wallet.

• In case you lose your wallet, then there is nothing to worry about. The GPS global tracking network records your wallet’s last as well as current location so that you can easily locate and retrieve it.
• Its innovative technology detects any threat to its interface. Therefore, providing your personal data with faster and greater protection.

• Our Biometric Wallet makes it easier for parents to transfer and students to receive money through remote transactions with guaranteed security. Whether your child is in a nearby High School or an overseas College, transferring payments is much safer and secured.

Our Biometric Wallet is swimming with innovative technologies and a steadfast protection system to provide you with safety and security wherever you go. So, before you go on your next expedition, make sure you remember to take our Biometric Wallet with you for the provision of utmost privacy and security.

 

Contact Us​

For more information and queries regarding our product’s operation or purchase, contact us via e-mail or give our customer support service a call during the day. You can also write to us at the address mentioned below.

","Our Solution Is to Use State-Of-The-Art Technology That Is Not Only Convenient But Also Accessible And Highly Secure!The Biometric Wallet is our solution and our brainchild, and we can’t wait to share it with you.   The Biometric Wallet – What Is the Biometric Wallet?Protected and activated with multilayered cloud security ESN, our Biometric Wallet is a handheld and portable device that is sleek, slender and easy to maneuver. Similar in appearance to the store-bought leather-bound wallet, the electronic biometric wallet for convenient data access is designed to provide protection even from intruders who are inches away from scanning you.Easy To Use and Even Easier To Carry!With an HD color touch screen and the requirement of a strong password and biometric (fingerprint) verification for identification, our biometric wallet abides by our corporation’s word for the provision of utmost security.Our Biometric Wallet consists of a slender card that will host and store all of your personal information within its software. Not only will this make traveling easy for you, but it will also make business and financial transactions highly accessible.By storing all of the data on your credit card, debit card, social security card and others in our biometric wallet, you wouldn’t have to lug around any pieces of plastic ever again.Our Biometric Wallet provides cloud protection for three bold sectors and therefore, can be used comprehensively without any fear of data breach due to utmost security.These sectors – governmental institutions, financial organizations and healthcare establishments – work with the Biometric Wallet in order to keep your personal information at bay and at par with technology. Cool Unique Slim Design​ Main Menu ScreenOur Biometric Wallet for security comprises of a Main Menu Screen that is complete with 5 tabs for navigation purposes. Another tab is placed in the center (below) for biometric identification of your fingerprint.The moment you access your Biometric Wallet with your fingerprint, you will feel not only safe and secure from creeping bugs (of all sizes) but also quite mature and proud of yourself for taking this decision.It was a long time calling and we’re glad you tapped onto the screen with your finger! Let’s take a tour of the 5 different sections present on the screen of our Biometric Wallet so that you know what you’re getting into. 1)    Secure Biometric ID (Secure ID) SectionOur Biometric Wallet’s cloud system recognizes only one person’s fingerprint for registration and immediate access. Therefore, this section can be used to replace documents that are usually in hard copy such as your driver’s license, national identity card and your passport with secure biometric means.No More Paper Docs—Save Everything On Your Digital Wallet!You can also add different sub-sections by saving all of your important cards including your employment and/or military cards as well.For instance, this will allow you to access the data on your driver’s license while you’re on the road and your passport, if required, for verification in certain situations. 2)    Banking and Credit Card SectionThe banking and credit card section on our Biometric Wallet is designed to provide you with the utmost security and convenience. Now you can store all of the information of your banking cards in this little, portable device without the fear of being compromised or hacked during or prior to transactions.Our biometric wallet requires your fingerprint verification in the form of a little ‘handshake’ for recognition by the cloud.Streamline Your Financial Transactions And Stay Protected! 3)    Bio-Pay SectionWith the Bio Pay section in our Biometric Wallet, we have strived to make financial transactions between you and your colleagues or companies quite easier than before.Provided with the protective legacy of a hovering cloud system, the Bio Pay section allows you to approve your financial transactions with your biometric signature.Maximum Convenience with Just a Single Biometric Signature!Fast And Easy To Use With the help of an authorization code that the Bio Pay section displays on the screen immediately as a token of approval and accessibility to the transferred account for the receiver, you can now process your transactions with utmost security and ease.Then again, the cloud system requires a signal in the form of a ‘handshake’ to ensure safety and easy access to the accounts. Transactions are, therefore, protected and highly convenient with our Biometric Wallet. 4)    Lifetime Health and 911 Emergency SectionDo you forget to take your medical records to the clinic whenever you go for a routine check-up? Or do you worry about presenting your previous complaints and the history of your past medications and surgeries in front of your doctor?Well, not everybody is born with the memory of an elephant and sometimes, you can forget to take your medical records with you to the doctor’s clinic.With the Lifetime Health and 911 Emergency Section of our Biometric Wallet, you don’t have to worry about going empty-handed – in more ways than one – to the doctor’s office on your next impromptu visit. Store Your Entire Medical History And Documents In One Place!This section has the capability to store all of your medical data within its software, making your personal and health details readily available whenever you need them.You can also store data regarding your medicinal prescriptions so that you can easily purchase your medicines without experiencing any hassle from a pharmacy. You can add or update the data stored in this section after every visit so that your doctor can easily access and recall your issues subsequently. 5)    Merchant Mall Special Promotions and OffersOur Biometric Wallet is highly functional and enjoyable in other ways as well. The affiliation of several companies and retail stores with our Biometric Wallet gives you exclusive access to special offers and promotions.Enjoy Discounts, Promos And More!  Convenience At Your Fingertips Why Do You Need the Biometric Wallet?Excellent for Students, Business Travelers, Busy Housewives, Simply Everyone.
Our Biometric Wallet is not only light and portable, but also pocket-friendly! It can be easily slipped into the pockets of your jeans or jackets for you to carry anywhere you like.
Our Biometric Wallet is available along with distinctive cases such as a belt case, wristlet case and a fold-over case, making it extremely feasible to carry around in your hand carry.

Our Biometric Wallet is integrated with a system. It requires fingerprint authentication for access to financial transactions and banking cards every time. Remember, none of your personal data is stored on the cloud!
Since our Biometric Wallet is integrated with Bluetooth, it can connect to your smart phone and send alerts and requests whenever someone tries to tamper with your wallet.

In case you lose your wallet, then there is nothing to worry about. The GPS global tracking network records your wallet’s last as well as current location so that you can easily locate and retrieve it.
It has access to Wi-Fi and 4G.
Its innovative technology detects any threat to its interface. Therefore, providing your personal data with faster and greater protection.

Our Biometric Wallet makes it easier for parents to transfer and students to receive money through remote transactions with guaranteed security. Whether your child is in a nearby High School or an overseas College, transferring payments is much safer and secured.

Our Biometric Wallet is swimming with innovative technologies and a steadfast protection system to provide you with safety and security wherever you go. So, before you go on your next expedition, make sure you remember to take our Biometric Wallet with you for the provision of utmost privacy and security. Contact Us​For more information and queries regarding our product’s operation or purchase, contact us via e-mail or give our customer support service a call during the day. You can also write to us at the address mentioned below.",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

column6: >We at Pangea, believe that an enjoyable navigation app is one that makes us feel confident.

column1: To achieve that, we took existing technology and made it better every way- creating the world's

column4: >Displaying groundbreaking ultra realistic visuals on your smartphone will let you enjoy the safest, most accurate navigation experience possible.

column1: Pangea 3D Navigation is brought to you by the same dedicated and highly professional team who developed AdasWorks Automated Driving running on NVIDIA Tegra K1 processor.
Have you ever come to a highway interchange or a complex junction and found it difficult to tell which lane to take - even with GPS?
The need for highly accurate lane guidance is tested in interchanges or complex junctions, where the road ahead has multiple lanes in the same direction.

Anyone who ever used a GPS navigation app knows how dangerous it can be to make that risky last-minute maneuver just to get into the appropriate lane, or how frustrating it is to make a wrong turn due to map visual limitations.
Current navigation apps offer a basic 3D map view using simplistic representation of junctions, forcing the driver many times to guess which lane to take next.
As you approach complex junctions and split-second decisions are required, the superior graphical display kicks in - putting you at ease in the driver's seat.
Pangea powerful graphic engine was designed to provide fast and secure decision-making as you drive through complex junctions, giving you the advantage of seeing which lane to take next in real-time.

column4: >Split second recognition of relevant road info helps you make the right choice and saves time, money and unnecessary risks!

column1: Enjoy the world's first 3D road network with stunning 3D graphics, and drive safely with the world's finest real-time lane guidance.

column2: videos were taken from ACTUAL MAP DATA provided by HERE (formerly NAVTEQ), representing real roads, buildings and landmarks.

column1: Animated visual display of your progress all the way through the complex junction provides reassurance your'e on the right path.
For added guidance, the system will also show real-time 3D overhead signs with highlighted sign to your designated lane, and any 3D landmarks nearby for improved orientation.
Pangea's powerful 3D engine immerses you into the world around you like never before - using ultra realistic rendering of multiple lanes, bridges, tunnels, landmarks and terrain level.
Know your lane before it's too late.
Using real-time lane level guidance, there's no need anymore to guess which lane to take at an upcoming turn.
Pangea will guide you to the correct lane for an approaching turn or exit, making unfamiliar junctions and interchanges easy to navigate.

As you approach a series of exits or interchanges, the app will smoothly display highly realistic real-time 3D animation, highlighting the correct lane and signs to follow - well in advance of the upcoming maneuver.
Continued 3D animation through the maneuver provides the added reassurance you take the correct exit, contributing to a less stressful and more enjoyable journey.

column1: The core technology is based on years of development of 3D graphic engines, map data optimization and benchmarking software solutions.

Built from the ground up with the specific goal of bridging the real world with the virtual world, our powerful graphic engine provides the utmost in navigation safety, and a totally new perspective of the way we drive.

Our  graphic engine was created, tested and optimized by veterans of the gaming industry, and It's the only tool today capable of converting large scale digital map data into complex 3D landscape and present it smoothly in real time.

column5: >Using the most advanced rendering capabilities of modern smartphones, we could reach the highest level of visual quality on mobile devices, letting you drive with confidence and ease.

column1: This is where technology makes your life easier.

XploreMax® search engine is an endless source of points of interest data, representing an immeasurable amount of information, that when combined brings the world into your hands to let you know what you can find any place and any time.
Looking for local guides? Look no further. XploreMax® got you covered.
While other navigation apps offer only one or two sources when searching for places, Pangea's Points of Interest search engine will provide you with results from 40+ of the world's top services!
Our search engine collects all relevant data about the world we live in, and more of it than anybody else.
Tap into the ultimate city guide data, with over 75 million businesses and points of interest worldwide, updated and improved real-time from 40+ of the world top services.
XploreMax® enables a new range of opportunities, being the most comprehensive and reliable database of places people love and recommend.
Current database consists of the following services:

column2:
>

Yahoo Local, Superpages, Yellowpages, Yelp, Citysearch, Foursquare, Insiderpages, Facebook, Yellowbook, Gogobot, Menupix, Urbanspoon, Twitter, Tripadvisor, Locu, Allmenus, Patch, Instagram Place, Menuism, Grubhub, Manta, Greatschools, Songkick, Menupages, Square, Opentable, Hotels, Hotelscombined, Dexknows, Fodors, Merchantcircle, Zagat, Restaurants, Seamless, Singleplatform, Michelin, Travelandleisure, Geoplanet, Stubhub.

column1: The service also empowers you to rate any point of interest or business, and enjoy content contributed by a community of drivers all over the world.
Logic clearly dictates that the knowledge of the many outweigh the knowledge of the few.
Relying on the wisdom of crowds is by far the fastest most reliable source of information.
Our social layer encourages you to share your world and make a difference, by reporting road hazards such as police checkpoints, speed traps, speed cameras, accidents, road construction and so on.

column2:
>

Pangea's flexible map data distribution brings the best of two worlds to you.

column1: By mixing offline and online data sources real-time, you will store a copy of the map without the need of network connection, while map updates will download upon request without disrupting functionality.
Simply download Pangea's initial small size app with full functionality from the first moment and choose the country (or state) you wish to store in your phone.
Get instant access to worldwide 3D maps via a network of cloud-based servers, so you can use it immediately after installing a small size file.
Instant access to the latest maps can save time, money and always keeps your maps updated.
Pangea is currently available with more than 10,000 of the world's most complex junctions - mainly in USA and W.Europe.
• Western Europe: Austria, Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, UK.
* Other countries will soon be available.
We have been steadfast in our commitment to make Pangea a reality, and made incredible advancements towards creating a navigation experience that sets us apart from current apps.
We believe we can make a profound impact with our app and the way it can cause people to re-think how enjoyable and safe their driving can be.
We are convinced it is important for the GPS navigation scene to evolve into a more user-friendly product and a better and safer driving experience.
Here's what we need to do in order to complete the  project:
1. Integrate complete 3D city road network, including multiple lanes roads, bridges, tunnels and landmarks into our graphic engine.
2. Add 10,000+ of the world's most complex junctions!
3. Convert vector data to 3D map algorithmically.
4. Add custom high-res textures.
We are highly motivated and professional team.

We have extensive knowledge in GIS (Geographic information system) performance analytics, 3D engine design, image compression, shader programming, digital image processing and optimizations of 3D data compression for mobile devices.
","We at Pangea, believe that an enjoyable navigation app is one that makes us feel confident.
To achieve that, we took existing technology and made it better every way- creating the world's first real-time 3D lane level guidance.
Displaying groundbreaking ultra realistic visuals on your smartphone will let you enjoy the safest, most accurate navigation experience possible.
Pangea 3D Navigation is brought to you by the same dedicated and highly professional team who developed AdasWorks Automated Driving running on NVIDIA Tegra K1 processor.
Have you ever come to a highway interchange or a complex junction and found it difficult to tell which lane to take - even with GPS?
Finding our way can be difficult.
The need for highly accurate lane guidance is tested in interchanges or complex junctions, where the road ahead has multiple lanes in the same direction.

Anyone who ever used a GPS navigation app knows how dangerous it can be to make that risky last-minute maneuver just to get into the appropriate lane, or how frustrating it is to make a wrong turn due to map visual limitations.
Current navigation apps offer a basic 3D map view using simplistic representation of junctions, forcing the driver many times to guess which lane to take next.
As you approach complex junctions and split-second decisions are required, the superior graphical display kicks in - putting you at ease in the driver's seat.
Pangea powerful graphic engine was designed to provide fast and secure decision-making as you drive through complex junctions, giving you the advantage of seeing which lane to take next in real-time.
Split second recognition of relevant road info helps you make the right choice and saves time, money and unnecessary risks!
Enjoy the world's first 3D road network with stunning 3D graphics, and drive safely with the world's finest real-time lane guidance.
PLEASE NOTE: All 3D screenshots & videos were taken from ACTUAL MAP DATA provided by HERE (formerly NAVTEQ), representing real roads, buildings and landmarks.
Animated visual display of your progress all the way through the complex junction provides reassurance your'e on the right path.
For added guidance, the system will also show real-time 3D overhead signs with highlighted sign to your designated lane, and any 3D landmarks nearby for improved orientation.
Pangea's powerful 3D engine immerses you into the world around you like never before - using ultra realistic rendering of multiple lanes, bridges, tunnels, landmarks and terrain level.
Know your lane before it's too late.
Using real-time lane level guidance, there's no need anymore to guess which lane to take at an upcoming turn.
Pangea will guide you to the correct lane for an approaching turn or exit, making unfamiliar junctions and interchanges easy to navigate.

As you approach a series of exits or interchanges, the app will smoothly display highly realistic real-time 3D animation, highlighting the correct lane and signs to follow - well in advance of the upcoming maneuver.
Continued 3D animation through the maneuver provides the added reassurance you take the correct exit, contributing to a less stressful and more enjoyable journey.
To achieve the finest, most precise navigation experience, all major cities in the US and W.Euope will be added with the following 3D City features:
- Highly realistic, textured roads, bridges, tunnels and landmarks
- 3D city junctions with lane level guidance (number of lanes, lanes divider marking, lanes forming/ending and lanes height &  width)

Our  graphic engine was created, tested and optimized by veterans of the gaming industry, and It's the only tool today capable of converting large scale digital map data into complex 3D landscape and present it smoothly in real time.
Using the most advanced rendering capabilities of modern smartphones, we could reach the highest level of visual quality on mobile devices, letting you drive with confidence and ease.

<ul><li>Hello! My name is Mario Salgado. I am a Marine Corps Veteran &amp
column2: a former college student. I was majoring in a Bachelors in Finance &amp
column3: Accounting until my Post 9/11 MGIB's tuition ran out. I turned to the only thing I knew how to do: Business &amp
column4: Finance. Thus, Salgado's Emporium of Toys was born.

column1: <ul><li>My small business is ran from my small apartment in New York City. I am a seller on Amazon's Market Place, on other various websites, and self-promote throughout various social media sites (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.).  I have been researching the ins &amp
column2: outs of this business, trying to be more knowledgeable and have an advantage against other small businesses like mine.
very meaningful to me. Not only do I get to do what I love, go into business for myself,  &amp
column3: be my own boss but I will get a chance to save money to move to closer to my son, who lives in Florida with his mother. He visits me 2 times a year for Christmas and a month in the Summer. That is not anywhere near the amount of time I would like to spend with him. He is one of the main reason why I would like to profit from this venture.

column1: <ul><li>I really thought it would be easy starting my own company. I sold my first item and was very excited. That was until I had to actually ship the product. I had to pay to print out packing slips &amp
column2: mailing labels, purchase protective insulation to ship the item  (bubble wrap &amp
column3: Styrofoam peanuts), buy the right size box for what I was shipping along with packing tape and finally pay for the shipping (Standard or Expedited). As soon as I finally shipped the item to the buyer, I realized that there was definitely a lot more to a business than I thought!

column1: <ul> <li>The main products that I sell are Funko Pop Vinyl Figures &amp
column2: I also make Nerd Cross-stitching Art (Video Games, Movies, TV Shows &amp
column3: Cartoons). Funko Pop! Vinyls are miniature figurines with likenesses of characters from Movies, TV Shows, Cartoons, Sports, &amp
column4: Anime. The perks I would like to give the gracious donors who fund my small business are as follows: a personal thank you letter, a Thank You via video (YouTube/Skype),  a monthly newsletter,  a Funko Pop Vinyl Figure,  and an Exclusive Funko Pop Vinyl Figure depending on the donation.

column1:
• If I do not reach my goal within the allotted time, I shall divide the donations. Half will go toward buying merchandise, the other half will go toward buying shipping supplies. It is just as I intended to do if I did meet or exceed my final goal.  

The Impact

• With my business, it would take the travel time and searching for that one store exclusive, special/limited edition figurine that the buyer is looking for, I already have set up a business email so that the buyer can contact myself if they have a certain item that they need. I would do the research for them, find it, and ship it to them.

<li>As of right now, I was contacted by a good friend of mine that heard of my business. He has a friend that lives in California that was looking for an exclusive figurine which was only manufactured and sold here in New York City. I went and bought it &amp
column2: shipped it to him the same day!

column1: • I have spent countless personal time researching places, prices, and shipping details. I have retailer's phone numbers, release dates of products, and information on  future products that are in production. The reason I have all this information is so that I DON'T have said risks and/or challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • I completely understand that we all live in a world with a horrible economic state. There are some that have it worse than others but they are also the ones that have a good heart and great intentions. You are more than welcome to contact me via e-mail and I can personally send you information how you can help me with my business ventures.
  • Also, along with spreading the word, you can help me by sharing my Indiegogo Campaign  on your Social Media Sites. (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, etc.)

Hello! My name is Mario Salgado. I am a Marine Corps Veteran & a former college student. I was majoring in a Bachelors in Finance & Accounting until my Post 9/11 MGIB's tuition ran out. I turned to the only thing I knew how to do: Business & Finance. Thus, Salgado's Emporium of Toys was born.

My small business is ran from my small apartment in New York City. I am a seller on Amazon's Market Place, on other various websites, and self-promote throughout various social media sites (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.).  I have been researching the ins & outs of this business, trying to be more knowledgeable and have an advantage against other small businesses like mine.

This business is important & very meaningful to me. Not only do I get to do what I love, go into business for myself,  & be my own boss but I will get a chance to save money to move to closer to my son, who lives in Florida with his mother. He visits me 2 times a year for Christmas and a month in the Summer. That is not anywhere near the amount of time I would like to spend with him. He is one of the main reason why I would like to profit from this venture.

I really thought it would be easy starting my own company. I sold my first item and was very excited. That was until I had to actually ship the product. I had to pay to print out packing slips & mailing labels, purchase protective insulation to ship the item  (bubble wrap & Styrofoam peanuts), buy the right size box for what I was shipping along with packing tape and finally pay for the shipping (Standard or Expedited). As soon as I finally shipped the item to the buyer, I realized that there was definitely a lot more to a business than I thought!

The main products that I sell are Funko Pop Vinyl Figures & I also make Nerd Cross-stitching Art (Video Games, Movies, TV Shows & Cartoons). Funko Pop! Vinyls are miniature figurines with likenesses of characters from Movies, TV Shows, Cartoons, Sports, & Anime. The perks I would like to give the gracious donors who fund my small business are as follows: a personal thank you letter, a Thank You via video (YouTube/Skype),  a monthly newsletter,  a Funko Pop Vinyl Figure,  and an Exclusive Funko Pop Vinyl Figure depending on the donation.

If I do not reach my goal within the allotted time, I shall divide the donations. Half will go toward buying merchandise, the other half will go toward buying shipping supplies. It is just as I intended to do if I did meet or exceed my final goal.      The Impact

With my business, it would take the travel time and searching for that one store exclusive, special/limited edition figurine that the buyer is looking for, I already have set up a business email so that the buyer can contact myself if they have a certain item that they need. I would do the research for them, find it, and ship it to them.

As of right now, I was contacted by a good friend of mine that heard of my business. He has a friend that lives in California that was looking for an exclusive figurine which was only manufactured and sold here in New York City. I went and bought it & shipped it to him the same day!

I have spent countless personal time researching places, prices, and shipping details. I have retailer's phone numbers, release dates of products, and information on  future products that are in production. The reason I have all this information is so that I DON'T have said risks and/or challenges.

Employchain founders Jan-Philipp Arps and André Teege were both university students who shared a passion for blockchain technology and programming.

While Jan-Philipp was attending Jönköping University, well-known for it’s large international student community, he noticed his friends struggling to get hired after graduation even though they were extremely qualified.
From this grew a mission between the two blockchain enthusiasts to create a mobile app that could help students find jobs in an easier and less stressful way.

The app would use a blockchain system to automatically match students with local companies – no job search required. Furthermore, students would have the option to make anonymous profiles which focused only on their qualifications and not on their nationality, name or appearance.

Jan-Philipp and André pitched their idea at several events for startups and quickly gained support from local organizations and companies who agreed to work with their mobile app - officially named Employchain.

Zaire is a student from Egypt with a bachelor’s degree in computer science from the University of Ain Shams in Cairo. After graduating, he moves to Sweden and completes a master’s degree in AI Engineering at Jönköping University. He decides to search for jobs in Sweden instead of returning to Egypt and sends out as many applications as possible on different platforms.

A year after beginning his search, Zaire is still unable to find a job even though he's talented, has in demand skills and relevant working experience. The process is overwhelming to adapt to the characteristics of a different labour market and CV's, cover letters, hiring practices and common search platforms add even more confusion. He keeps sending out applications but continues to get rejected without understanding the reason for it.

Problems continue to persist within the job search and hiring industry. Although recruiting companies exist, there is a missing link between their connection with skilled professionals who are a right fit for the job and for candidates who sometimes feel they don't get a fair chance.

Many applicants are overlooked because they don't understand how to properly communicate their skills - even if they are experienced and good at their job. This frustrates applicants who want to get hired and recruiters who aren't being matched with quality candidates. The holes can be filled with the Employchain mobile app, which has extensively studied the issues in the labour market and created a perfect solution for everyone.
Employchain has simplified the process for both job seekers and recruiters.

Applicants only need a profile consisting of keywords with skill levels -
no more confusing CV's or cover letters

The app automatically matches applicants to recruiters -
no more endless applying

Applicants are only alerted when a company is interested in an interview -
no more disappointing rejection letters

Profiles can be listed anonymously without pictures or name -
no chance for discrimination
• Applicants only need a profile consisting of keywords with skill levels

Zaire fills out a profile consisting of simple keywords in the categories of basic information, skill level and personal interests/hobbies.  The process takes approximately 10 minutes and doesn't require a complicated cover letter because all important information is posted on the profile in concise, easy-to-read sections.
• The app automatically matches applicants to recruiters

His profile gets shortlisted to companies that created job ads with certain criteria. Our algorithm matches his education, experience, skills, hobbies and more. This feature eliminates the need to spend countless hours browsing through available jobs or applicants because the app is constantly working to do the matching for Zaire and the recruiters.
• Applicants are only alerted when a company is interested in an interview

Only when a company is interested in him, he is notified about a match. Now it is his turn to decide whether he wants to get in contact or not to proceed with an interview. He no longer receives emails in his inbox with rejection letters - all notifications from Empoychain contain only positive messages and Zaire starts feeling excited about the job search process.
• Profiles can be listed anonymously without pictures or name

The Employchain app offers an option for Zaire to hide personal details such as his name, age and appearance. This offers a fair chance to represent himself based only on his qualifications and experience without worrying about other factors influencing the selection process. Companies will still be automatically matched with his profile based on keywords and therefore,  his skills will be the most important thing presented to the company.
What does this have to do with blockchain?

A blockchain is a series of data or records that are stored online and linked together in digital blocks. Each block contains timestamps and data of the previous block, therefore if there is a break in the chain link of data then it is revealed to all. There is no central authority, so the system cannot be corrupted or biased. This allows for secure exchanges of information on the internet which is neutral for all parties involved.

Employchain is building up a peer-to-peer blockchain network for universities, students and companies in order to verify and track users' education, work experiences and other information that can be validated with minimal effort. This will be done by working in collaboration with local companies, universities and organizations who can provide certificates that validate the backgrounds of users.

This provides a great benefit: recruiters or companies don't have to double-check qualifications anymore. As a result, information on a CV becomes more trustworthy and it is guaranteed that no one else, not even ourselves, can change or corrupt any of the data. The process is completely secured, unbiased and extremely efficient for both recruiters and applicants.

You are here because we are asking you for help to fund the alpha version of our product. In order to realise this, there are mainly development costs. This refers to our planned alpha version. The blockchain functionality will not be included in the beginning as we want to validate the user experience and acceptance of the app in the alpha version. As soon as the alpha version has been tested successfully, we will develop the first public beta release with improvements and blockchain network feature. In case we are able to collect more funds than the given goal, it will be used for the implementation of the beta version as well.
Our team consists of four motivated people:

column2: our team at Sweden Demo Day

NatiChat is a free, secure group messaging app for expats working and living far from their home countries. It is also perfect for exchange students who are studying on a foreign university or immigrants who would like to connect with their fellow citizens.
I built this app to let everyone freely communicate in larger groups and to discover new friends in the city. Chat rooms can host up to 500 people who can converse freely, in real-time with others.
The idea came from mIRC, which back in the days was one of
the most popular desktop client which worked just like Slack: people could
create channels, install themselves a chat bot and host hundreds of chatters in
one place. Worldwide, there’s a community of more than 350 million expats who
work far away from their native homes in a foreign country. This is a group the
size of United States and sends hundreds of billions of dollars back home to
When building NatiChat, I had in my his own experience
living more than 20 years in a foreign country. I always had the desire to
connect with people of the same ethnicity but lacked the tools to do so. Other
apps such as Facebook Messenger or Slack didn’t allow to discover new people in
the area and also was closed to a certain group of people, such as your own
network of friends and corporate colleagues.
- The app lets you create rooms that can host up to 500
- As the room creator, you have the powers to kick, mute and
change icons of the room you made,
- Every city can host endless chat rooms,
- Not only you can converse in groups - public or private -
but you can also directly have a 1-on-1 chat with anyone you choose, your
friend from your own contacts list or other group chatter,
- The app will notify you whenever there will be a new
message from the rooms that you are currently sitting in,
- You can send different GIF's and Emoji's - there's a wide
range of that embedded in the chatting bar.
NatiChat is currently funded by Risen. – a software

column2: CEO of MyBaze.com - a design marketplace for up-and-coming brands. You can check my LinkedIn profile here. I'm now running a software development and consultancy boutique called Risen.

column1: I was born in Ha Noi, Vietnam and I'm the 2nd generation of immigrants in Warsaw, Poland.
column4: >My dad finished his studies during the 80's in Gdańsk (Naval Academy). He majored in Ship Engineering (we used to build a lot of model ships when I was little). After his graduation he decided to come back to Vietnam and took a job in Polish Embassy in Ha Noi. During the 90's we moved as a family here, together with my mom they set up an import / export business and within a few years, it took off thanks to the Polish revolution of 1989 (transformation from Socialism do Democracy) that triggered massive demand of everything from clothing, foods to electronics and imported meat.

column1: I grew up in a strong, connected society of Vietnamese here in Warsaw, Poland. During my teenage years we were usually hanging out everyday on mIRC - a desktop messaging client that hosted millions of chatrooms across the globe. One of those channels was called ""Vietnamese in Warsaw"" that allowed us to communicate everyday with our friends. We were logged in 24/7 and had numerous meet-up's in real life. It was a wonderful time when we felt that everyday, there was someone out there that would listen to our stories and experiences. We helped each other a lot.

With that experience in mind, we at Risen. created NatiChat - a free messaging platform for expats and immigrants that are far away from their native homes. We would like to ask for your contribution to keep this app forever free and without ads. The money will go solely into renting servers and providing new features for the community.
Please visit NatiChat for more information on how the app works.

column1: The servers and new features will require funding. Here's a breakdown of how we intent to use your contributions:

The rest: $2 400 of funding will be used to promote this app among expats in different countries, mainly through sponsored PR content on blogs and expat news websites / magazines. The amount is also reserved for Indiegogo's and payment processing fees.
The app is now available for Android, but soon (ETA June 2016) wil be available also for iOS.

Why should you contribute?

The app will solve the problem of finding new international friends in your area, you should back this project if you are living overseas and would like to connect with people from your country, meet new expat friends or simply chat for fun, simultaneously with hundreds of people! It will also enable immigrant communities to better communicate with local citizens. Often, lack of communication leads to misunderstandings.

With the help of NatiChat, we could also help fuel better understanding of how different expat communities live, work and interact. This could be potentially a very interesting social experiment that I hope you, The Contributor, will join me to discover.
Besides, there are awesome perks for the founding members of our community! Please check what they are and hopefully you could be part of a new social phenomenon.

I've been asked a lot about what will encryption mean for governments and terrorist threats. This is a very important issue that we will face once we will implement Encrypted Private Rooms and Private Messaging.

As with every technology that is disrupting every possible industry in the world, it always has a good and a bad side. It's especially prescient against the backdrop of Apple's ongoing fight over encryption with the FBI. Think also about Facebook. Would you ever want your messages, private photos and sensitive information be traceable by every government, especially by the likes of CIA, NSA, FBI?

We will not introduce ads that will track you. We will always put your privacy first. So encryption will be one of the key features that we intent to implement. The ones that wage wars in the name of their religion will always find a way to communicate, even if they didn't have the tools such as NatiChat to do so. We strongly believe that entire societies will be better off if we introduced a safer and more private way of exchanging messages.

How can you help us other than funding?

If you have friends that were born in your native country, or families that are living overseas, please help us spread the word by sharing this on Social Media! Please download our app to see how easily it is to invite more people into the messenger.
Learn the story behind ""NatiChat - a secure group messaging app for expats"" and help us meet our goal @Risendot https://igg.me/at/natichat""

I was previously Founder & CEO of MyBaze.com - a design marketplace for up-and-coming brands. You can check my LinkedIn profile here. I'm now running a software development and consultancy boutique called Risen.

I was born in Ha Noi, Vietnam and I'm the 2nd generation of immigrants in Warsaw, Poland. My dad finished his studies during the 80's in Gdańsk (Naval Academy). He majored in Ship Engineering (we used to build a lot of model ships when I was little). After his graduation he decided to come back to Vietnam and took a job in Polish Embassy in Ha Noi. During the 90's we moved as a family here, together with my mom they set up an import / export business and within a few years, it took off thanks to the Polish revolution of 1989 (transformation from Socialism do Democracy) that triggered massive demand of everything from clothing, foods to electronics and imported meat.

I grew up in a strong, connected society of Vietnamese here in Warsaw, Poland. During my teenage years we were usually hanging out everyday on mIRC - a desktop messaging client that hosted millions of chatrooms across the globe. One of those channels was called ""Vietnamese in Warsaw"" that allowed us to communicate everyday with our friends. We were logged in 24/7 and had numerous meet-up's in real life. It was a wonderful time when we felt that everyday, there was someone out there that would listen to our stories and experiences. We helped each other a lot.

With that experience in mind, we at Risen. created NatiChat - a free messaging platform for expats and immigrants that are far away from their native homes. We would like to ask for your contribution to keep this app forever free and without ads. The money will go solely into renting servers and providing new features for the community.
Please visit NatiChat for more information on how the app works.
The app was created by myself (idea & mockups) and my wonderful team here at Risen. We are top-notch developers, designers and entrepreneurs from Warsaw, Poland.

The Worlds Story

Our group is comprised of one passionate 17-year-old founder and four experienced business advisors.

column2: >Garrett Jester, a high school senior and the founder of Worlds Inc. has developed his idea from a scribble on a post-it note to a vast collection of pitch decks, business plans, and demos. The board of advisors is there to provide Garrett with guidance as he develops Worlds into a major competitor in the social media market.

>With no small amount of luck and funding, we hope to develop Worlds into a functional app by late Fall 2015. 

How You Can Help

column1:
• Any contribution that you make brings Worlds closer to the app store.
  • We hope to raise at least $5,000 through Indiegogo to pay a hardworking crew of mobile developers and graphic designers as they optimize our demos for VC funding.
  • Even if we don't reach our entire goal, any money raised will fund the development of our app and its optimization for VC funding.

column2:
Challenges

Many of our objectives are ambitious, but they are definitely achievable. Not only are we dedicated to the success of Worlds, but we are also dedicated to proving that anyone can develop his or her idea into a successful business, despite age, gender, or ethnicity. Garrett has raised over $11,000 for various other causes and we are confident that he will see even more success in this endeavor.

Share Our Campaign

column1:
Make sure to share our link on your Fabebook and Twitter pages to help us bring Worlds closer to your fingertips.
","The Worlds Story Our group is comprised of one passionate 17-year-old founder and four experienced business advisors.

Garrett Jester, a high school senior and the founder of Worlds Inc. has developed his idea from a scribble on a post-it note to a vast collection of pitch decks, business plans, and demos. The board of advisors is there to provide Garrett with guidance as he develops Worlds into a major competitor in the social media market.
With no small amount of luck and funding, we hope to develop Worlds into a functional app by late Fall 2015.    How You Can Help

Any contribution that you make brings Worlds closer to the app store. We hope to raise at least $5,000 through Indiegogo to pay a hardworking crew of mobile developers and graphic designers as they optimize our demos for VC funding. Even if we don't reach our entire goal, any money raised will fund the development of our app and its optimization for VC funding.

Risks & Challenges Many of our objectives are ambitious, but they are definitely achievable. Not only are we dedicated to the success of Worlds, but we are also dedicated to proving that anyone can develop his or her idea into a successful business, despite age, gender, or ethnicity. Garrett has raised over $11,000 for various other causes and we are confident that he will see even more success in this endeavor.   Share Our Campaign
Make sure to share our link on your Fabebook and Twitter pages to help us bring Worlds closer to your fingertips.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: For big and heavy green wall or garden you can use aluminium, telescopic pillars and pillar fasteners from local IKEA.
You can raise these telescopic pillars (⌀ 50mm) between floor and sealing with distance 2,1 - 3,4 meter ( 6,9- 11,1 ft).

Attach PlantSteps® to one or two posts by using high quality IKEA fasteners. Water tank comes between posts. This is perfect solution for balconies and windows where this ""transparent"" but sturdy body structure can hold up really big,  <
Link and product code for STOLMEN telescopic pillars/posts: 201.799.40
Link and product code for posts fasteners: 501.799.34
You can also  order them on-line from IKEA. Cost for 2 pillars and fasteners is about $70 or 70 €.

Screw or nail plug attachment 

The most simple way to attach PlantSteps to wall or frame is to use long screws. This is especially good and simple way with green walls and and permanent garden structures inside and outside. 


General tube fasteners

You can also use standard pipe fasteners meant for 75 mm pipes and tubes. With these you can make really heavy and long lasting mounting  for you green wall and vertical garden.

PlantSteps have 75 mm pipe diameter on vertical pipe parts. This means that you can connect PlantSteps to normal 75 mm plastic pipes and and connectors and design then wild and free green wall and garden designs.
