NEW GARDENING SYSTEM FOR EASY GREEN WALL BUILDING AND WINDOW GROWING
new, easy care Home garden system with many use options. It has a automated hydroponic watering system and modular strucutre with PlantSteps®.
It can be used for  food growing and green wall building.
Please watch the animated video below or from  Youtube to understand better all the new gardening and design possibilities you can have with SUPRAGARDEN®.

SUPRAGARDEN® can be used also outside and with bigger plants by setting up garden horizontally. This way it is more easier to maintain tall plant from ground level. PlantSteps® can turn 360 degrees around their stand base.
Electronics type is selected and send based on receivers local country standard.
Electronics type is selected and send based on receivers local country standard.
Electronics type is selected and send based on receivers local country standard.
BASIC COLORS FOR FIRST PRODUCTION CASE

The colors on product pictures at this page are indicative. Target is to use these Basic colors for first production lot. We will arrange a vote for most desired future colors at our Facebook page during the campaign: www.facebook.com/supragarden

If some of the new colors would generates significant support from customers, we could also add some Basic colors. We will contact the customers by e-mail to confirm color choices and local electricity standards for orders after successful campaign.
Follow up the situation with color choices by making Like at the FB page.
Watch what happens in Supragarden prototype in 1000X times speed.
1. Time lapse video is 48 hours of plant Life in 2½ minutes. Just planted chilies and tomatoes are in  middle.
Same Chilies and Tomatoes 5 weeks later
Supragarden has automated watering system and it is easy to maintain.
Plants get nutrients from water and no soil is needed in this garden.
Same NFT grow technique is used globally in commercial green houses for farming herbs, salads, strawberries etc.
PlantSteps are made with 3 mm thick, heavy duty PE plastic and they can be attached to each other, so making water tight connections and multi forming grow channel.
Water runs down from top PlantSteps and waters plant roots growing inside the PlantSteps body,

You just need to assemble SUPRAGARDEN®, add plant seeds to net pots, maintain garden time-to-time and collect harvest. Please watch the concept presentation and great contribution from of local business school students:
You can start growing plants from seeds, cuttings or
you can continue to grow pre-planted grocery store herbs and lettuce at Supragarden.
We recommend to plant seeds and cuttings to rockwool,and
cover them with  clay pebbles or coco fiber and put them first to Nursery
level for rooting. When roots are showing you can lift them to upper level PlantSteps®.
You can also grow normal household green plants with same system, growing from cuttings is easy and you can fast grow even a big and flourishing green wall.
tank (> 50 liters) Supragarden is easy to maintain.
nutrients about one to 4 times in a month, depending what you grow and how much
operates water pump inside the water tank and lifts nutrient rich water to
inside PlantSteps feeding the plant roots and returns to water tank.
plants and plant new cuttings taken from them. Collect harvest.
Plant roots get lot of oxygen and typically grow 3 times faster than with soil
Nursery level with water tank is base for PlantSteps but you can also grow small and big plants there.
It can be used with several hydroponics techniques, even combined at the same time.
These watering techniques listed below have different benefits and each gardener should select the best method according to plants, size and their growing phase.

Nutrient film technique is perfect for salads and herbs, but great also for most household plants that like water. A stream of water flows inside PlantSteps body and/or at Nursery level and waters plant roots. With NFT you can use even constant water flow and optimize growing speed of lettuce etc.
Also called Flood and Drain. There water level is raised some 10-45 millimeters, time-to-time, according to timer setup. Typically 5-12 times in a day and none during night.
Ebb&flow is good for young plants who do not have yet roots reaching outside net pot.

Deep water culture means that plant roots are living in the water tank. Plants live in net pots at the PlantSteps holes (4) on nursery level. This is efficient way to grow big fruit plants like chilies and tomatoes.
With DWC you have to make sure water gets enough oxygen or plant roots will drown. This can be done by pumping the water often, almost constantly, or by adding a air-pump and air-stone to system.

COMBINATION OF MANYYou can also combine these techniques. PlantSteps can be using NFT and nurcery level Ebb&flow and also DWC with big plants on Nurcery level holes.You just divide water rise pipe from the pump to two pipes.One going to top of PlantSteps and one going to Nurcery level connection.

You can find more information about hydroponic growing techniques from internet. Like Aquaponics,  where aquarium is the water tank and fish waste as nutrient source for plants. That is the real local and organic food.

Supragarden system is self-standing up to four PlantSteps going directly up in indoor environment. We recommend always making separate fastening from top of the garden to wall or sealing to avoid garden to fall down on case of someone hitting garden by accident,  wind blowing happenings etc.
SUPRAGARDEN® packages come with erection support system.

When you have more than four PlantSteps going directly up on SUPRAGARDEN or if you are growing a living green wall with big plants, garden should be supported also with wall, frame or wire attachment from PlantSteps attachment points.

You can use following tested options for erecting your SUPRAGARDEN® and attaching PlantSteps® to window, wall or as self standing partition wall. Please remember, that plants will anyway mostly cover the system in few months or weeks.
Hanging rope can be a design solution
You can support PlantSteps® elegantly with hanging rope, string or wire from sealing or other attachment point.
At this picture PlantSteps® are attached to hemp rope simply with cable ties.
Metal wire, invisible support for glass walls
Metal wire and wire locks are easy and safe way also to support SUPRAGARDEN®.
With them you can make sturdy but light looking green walls and food gardens.
Telescopic pillars, easy way to make for green wall in middle of room as space divider
For big and heavy green wall or garden you can use aluminium, telescopic pillars and pillar fasteners from local IKEA.
You can raise these telescopic pillars (⌀ 50mm) between floor and sealing with distance 2,1 - 3,4 meter ( 6,9- 11,1 ft).

Attach PlantSteps® to one or two posts by using high quality IKEA fasteners. Water tank comes between posts. This is perfect solution for balconies and windows where this ""transparent"" but sturdy body structure can hold up really big,  < 75 kg food garden.
Link and product code for STOLMEN telescopic pillars/posts: 201.799.40
Link and product code for posts fasteners: 501.799.34
You can also  order them on-line from IKEA. Cost for 2 pillars and fasteners is about $70 or 70 €.

Screw or nail plug attachment The most simple way to attach PlantSteps to wall or frame is to use long screws. This is especially good and simple way with green walls and and permanent garden structures inside and outside. General tube fastenersYou can also use standard pipe fasteners meant for 75 mm pipes and tubes. With these you can make really heavy and long lasting mounting  for you green wall and vertical garden.

PlantSteps have 75 mm pipe diameter on vertical pipe parts. This means that you can connect PlantSteps to normal 75 mm plastic pipes and and connectors and design then wild and free green wall and garden designs.
The Garden design is limited by your imagination.

In this Aquaponics concept plants get nutrients from fish aquarium. Such small tree can be done   by combining PlantSteps with some general tube parts from hardware store.

The backround story of SUPRAGARDEN® and PlantSteps®

With them it is easy to make fertile window gardens and fabulous living walls. It is new way to grow food at homes, but also to decorate homes, offices and public places with green plants.

column5: >We are the developers of the Patent-Pending
column7: > technology, giving you complete control of those Smartphones, computers and tablets that have authorization to access your important digital accounts. We are
column8: > integrating our technology into a service to protect you, the consumer, from the damage that can be caused when your digital identity is compromised.  Our goal in this campaign is to raise funding to introduce and launch our UniversalSignin.Com (USi) data security service, targeted at consumers around the world.

column2: >Our team is composed of technology industry veterans who have focused their attention on the growing problem of how to protect our digital identities and important data from cyber hackers.   Many of the Invysta team members have themselves been the victims of identity theft or unauthorized account access, and know first hand the frustration and damage to your good name and financial standing that these events can cause.  What USi offers is the ability to protect your strategic online accounts against unauthorized access, while also offering a bonus of remembering a single password to gain access to those accounts.
>We are serious people on a serious mission and we need your support to make this happen...  You can learn more about us at http://www.invysta.com/.

column1: So what's the problem???

Hacking has been around since the beginning of the digital age.  However, over the last decade it has grown in epidemic proportions from being merely an inconvenience to a major threat to our digital way of life.  Even encryption technology has proven to be not enough to slow the advance of hackers.
<div>The Gallup organization reported  that <span style=""font-family: 'Benton Sans', Helvetica, sans-serif
column4: >62% of Americans polled in late 2014 consider hacking to be the number one crime threat that directly

column1: affects them.  Consider the fact that major data breaches occur on an almost weekly basis.  Consider further that the targets of these breaches are often large, well-organized companies such as Target, Anthem Medical Care, Home Depot, AOL, Ashley Madison, JP Morgan Chase, and the list goes on and on.  It is still too early to say what the fallout will be from the leak of the so called ""Panama Papers,"" where eleven million financial documents were hacked from one of the world's most secretive companies, Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca.

column4: >To make matters worse, even our most secure government sites are no longer safe, and agencies like the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), Office of Personnel and Management (OPM), and the U.S. Dept. of Veterans Affairs have all been victims of hacks.   Another important fact is that all of these breached organizations have spent and continue to spend a sizable amount of money on securing their data ... security that is obviously not being achieved.

column8:
> 

How does this affect you - the consumer?

column1: Most consumer-oriented digital services operate in a user ID/password environment.  Think about your email, social media, cloud storage and e-Commerce accounts, as well as online banking transactions.  Account providers attempt to implement various digital protection schemes to defeat breached credentials.  But being digital in nature makes them subject to the same attacks that hackers have used to penetrate large websites and collect a profile of digital information about you.  Once that personal information has been harvested, you are fair game for the hackers.
• The contents of your email becoming known to unauthorized viewer ... think Sony
• Have you ever had social media or Twitter messages attributed to you ...  but hey, you didn't send them
• Ever had someone get into your cloud storage accounts?  It happens, and even celebrities have had their most personal photos and videos spread around the web for all to view

• Who hasn't had the experience where we go to use our ATM or credit card and guess what ... no funds available.  This has become even more of a problem, given the rise in online purchasing and the porous nature of existing digital security
• Some social media accounts have the potential to create a great deal of embarrassment and consequences ... think Ashley Madison

column3: >Why did we start www.universalsignin.com?

column6:
>

It started with a Good Idea!  We began the process of linking physical devices to authorization of account access in 2010.  Our initial effort revolved around applying encryption technology to data on storage devices like Hard Disk, Solid State and USB Flash drives. That effort has morphed into our current focus on providing a non-digital element in the account authorization process.  Our goal is to move the hacker community out of its digital comfort zone, and to remove scale from the damage they can inflict with breached user credentials.

>Our patent-pending technology can be implemented in many market opportunities, and USi is the application of that technology to the consumer market ... a market in dire need of a strong security solution that can protect ordinary people from the clutches of the hacking community.

column1: How our Active Security Key Protects you!

column5: >Have you ever heard the phrase, ""they catch the ants while the elephants walk by?"" There are many companies involved in trying to improve digital security.  However, it has become apparent that many of these elaborate defense schemes ignore the obvious and focus on the corner cases.

column1: Our Patent-Pending Active Security Key technology  addresses the obvious, and makes the computing device being used for account access an embedded part of the authorization process.  In other words, if anyone tries to access your protected accounts, they can to do so only it they have access to your authorized physical device.  If you have not authorized a device to access your account, that access request will be denied.  USi builds an identity of each computing device registered by collecting specific identifiers of the hardware being used, and creates an Active Security Key that identifies that device. When access to a protected account is requested, USi regenerates this digital identity and compares it to the values stored in the USi validation database.  By adding the hardware to the access authorization process, we can eliminate scale from the use of breached user information.  If a device making the access request is not registered to your account,  it simply does not gain access!

We have worked hard to develop our technology and believe we have created something special and unique.  The founders of Invysta have filed a number of patent applications covering our basic Active Security Key technology used in your USi account.  The founders of the company are experienced in the pursuit of patents, and are listed inventors on nearly 40 issued utility patents.
What devices can you register to your USi account?
<div>Our goal is to support all the major hardware platforms that consumers use today. That includes Smartphones, Tablets, PCs  and Macs and running  Windows, Apple iOS &amp

column1: USi offers a number of plans for consumers, as well as our Ultimate plan for small business.  We also can work directly with larger businesses or government to meet their needs.  These plans are based on the number of devices you wish to register for access to your strategic accounts, and how many accounts you wish to protect.
As an added Perk for our loyal Indiegogo followers, each USi protection plan also includes guaranteed annual renewals for your selected plan at the same price paid during this campaign.

As a supporter in our crowdfunding campaign, you can chose the plan that best fits your needs.  The annual pricing in our Perks amounts to approximately 50% off our normal annual pricing.  In addition, you will receive 1-20 metal wallets, depending on the plan you select (see details in Perks).

column1: What kind of accounts should I protect with USi?

There is no need to register all the online accounts you access and use.  Many of them are informational and do not represent a financial or social threat to you, even if they are breached.  We recommend adding strategic accounts to your USi protection plan ... accounts which if breached, could cause financial consequences or damage to your good name and credit score.
Examples of strategic accounts that should be protected include, but are not limited to the following

The following table reflects the initial target websites we anticipate supporting at product launch.  We will continually be adding additional sites to our support list, based heavily on the input of our customer base.
What will the funds be used for?

Invysta has invested heavily in developing its Active Security Key technology, which has many applications beyond the consumer market. This includes business and government website protection, credit card transactions, and the fast approaching Internet of Things.

We have launched this campaign because we believe that it is imperative that we also expand our effort to protect consumers, who today are at the mercy of hackers. Consumers have been pummeled with the financial strains of hacked bank accounts and unauthorized purchases, as well as loss of their digital identity and good name.
The funds from this campaign will be used to create the USi website and to complete the technical integration of our Active Security Key technology into the consumer process.

column3: >What is the purpose of the Metal Wallet perk?

column1: For some years the Credit Card Industry has been moving toward a change in the method used to store card information and personal data on credit cards.  The old magnetic stripe that has been a staple of identification information for many years, had simply outgrown its usefulness and is very vulnerable to being compromised. The new technology implemented was embedding an  radio frequency ID tag (RFID) enabled chip into the card, as a replacement for the mag stripe.

Seemed like a good idea at first.  However the hacking community was able to design devices, some for as little as $8, that allowed a hacker to access and record the information on the chipped card with a very simple scanning device.  This can be accomplished by simply walking up to you, even when your credit cards are in your wallet or purse.
The aluminum wallet we are offering as part of our perk, shields the chipped card and defeats the scanning devices used by the hackers.

To understand more about why we have chosen to offer this simple solution as a perk, simply go to Google Search and type in ""RFID hacks of chipped cards"" ... you will get about 246,000 results.  A quick link to understand this problem is a three minute YouTube video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vmajlKJlT3U.

As with any venture, risks and challenges are always a part of the landscape.  We believe that our experience and dedication to what we are doing helps us to minimize those risks.  Our Active Security Key technology is working in beta form on Windows platforms, and we are in the process of porting it to Android/Chrome platforms, following with Apple OSX and iOS devices and Blackberry.

Our initial market focus was to work with business and government to offer IT professionals the tools to keep unauthorized hackers from gaining access to their networks and accounts.  However, the continued breaches involving consumers' digital ID information has convinced us that we also must focus our attention on how we can help people regain control over their digital identity.  The frustration and damage inflicted by these breaches has convinced us that we also need to launch our USi service to offer consumers real protection against the use of their breached data.
We understand the challenges we face and are dedicated to bringing digital data security to the people who so desperately need it.

Perks will only be available to contributors from the United States.  We expect to expand to foreign markets in early 2017, and may consider another campaign in those areas when we are ready to expand.
The Metal Wallet Perk will be fulfilled no later than 45 days after the end of our campaign.  Color may vary depending on availability.
For those who select one of our account protection plans, we are projecting that the USi site will be operational for Windows and Android devices in Q4/2016.  Apple iOS and OSX support is scheduled to commence in Q1/2017, with Blackberry support beginning in Q2/2017. 


Pitch in and let's make the digital world safer!!!

We realize that some people simply can't afford to contribute to our campaign.  But that doesn't mean you can't be part of the solution to this worldwide problem! Help us promote our campaign through word-of-mouth, and by asking people you know to use the Indiegogo share tools to make others aware of the good we can do in combating digital fraud.
Thanks in advance for your help and support.

We are Invysta Technology Group.   We are the developers of the Patent-Pending Active Security Key technology, giving you complete control of those Smartphones, computers and tablets that have authorization to access your important digital accounts. We are integrating our technology into a service to protect you, the consumer, from the damage that can be caused when your digital identity is compromised.  Our goal in this campaign is to raise funding to introduce and launch our UniversalSignin.Com (USi) data security service, targeted at consumers around the world.

Our team is composed of technology industry veterans who have focused their attention on the growing problem of how to protect our digital identities and important data from cyber hackers.   Many of the Invysta team members have themselves been the victims of identity theft or unauthorized account access, and know first hand the frustration and damage to your good name and financial standing that these events can cause.  What USi offers is the ability to protect your strategic online accounts against unauthorized access, while also offering a bonus of remembering a single password to gain access to those accounts.
We are serious people on a serious mission and we need your support to make this happen...  You can learn more about us at http://www.invysta.com/.

Hacking has been around since the beginning of the digital age.  However, over the last decade it has grown in epidemic proportions from being merely an inconvenience to a major threat to our digital way of life.  Even encryption technology has proven to be not enough to slow the advance of hackers.
The Gallup organization reported  that 62% of Americans polled in late 2014 consider hacking to be the number one crime threat that directly

affects them.  Consider the fact that major data breaches occur on an almost weekly basis.  Consider further that the targets of these breaches are often large, well-organized companies such as Target, Anthem Medical Care, Home Depot, AOL, Ashley Madison, JP Morgan Chase, and the list goes on and on.  It is still too early to say what the fallout will be from the leak of the so called ""Panama Papers,"" where eleven million financial documents were hacked from one of the world's most secretive companies, Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca.

To make matters worse, even our most secure government sites are no longer safe, and agencies like the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), Office of Personnel and Management (OPM), and the U.S. Dept. of Veterans Affairs have all been victims of hacks.   Another important fact is that all of these breached organizations have spent and continue to spend a sizable amount of money on securing their data ... security that is obviously not being achieved.
How does this affect you - the consumer?

Most consumer-oriented digital services operate in a user ID/password environment.  Think about your email, social media, cloud storage and e-Commerce accounts, as well as online banking transactions.  Account providers attempt to implement various digital protection schemes to defeat breached credentials.  But being digital in nature makes them subject to the same attacks that hackers have used to penetrate large websites and collect a profile of digital information about you.  Once that personal information has been harvested, you are fair game for the hackers.
Have you ever experienced the following?
The contents of your email becoming known to unauthorized viewer ... think Sony
Have you ever had social media or Twitter messages attributed to you ...  but hey, you didn't send them
Ever had someone get into your cloud storage accounts?  It happens, and even celebrities have had their most personal photos and videos spread around the web for all to view

Who hasn't had the experience where we go to use our ATM or credit card and guess what ... no funds available.  This has become even more of a problem, given the rise in online purchasing and the porous nature of existing digital security
Some social media accounts have the potential to create a great deal of embarrassment and consequences ... think Ashley Madison

It started with a Good Idea!  We began the process of linking physical devices to authorization of account access in 2010.  Our initial effort revolved around applying encryption technology to data on storage devices like Hard Disk, Solid State and USB Flash drives. That effort has morphed into our current focus on providing a non-digital element in the account authorization process.  Our goal is to move the hacker community out of its digital comfort zone, and to remove scale from the damage they can inflict with breached user credentials.

Our patent-pending technology can be implemented in many market opportunities, and USi is the application of that technology to the consumer market ... a market in dire need of a strong security solution that can protect ordinary people from the clutches of the hacking community.
How does USi keep your important accounts safe?

With USi we focus on the obvious. That means eliminating the hackers' ability to access your accounts by simply entering user IDs and passwords gained in massive data breaches occurring weekly.  Our goal is to securely  lock-up the ""front door"" to your accounts!  We have accomplished this by developing our Active Security Key technology, which integrates the unique identity of your hardware devices into the account authorization process.  It is likely a given that if you have a healthy online lifestyle, your credentials have become part of a hacker database.  A hacker can use your breached credentials to access your accounts by simply going to a different computing device and using these credentials to access your accounts.

Some account providers present digital hoops to jump through if the account suspects it is being accessed in an unauthorized manner.  However, the key word here is digital.  If the hacking community is good enough to get the data in the first place, putting a few digital obstacles in the way of experienced hackers, provides little in the way of real security.  With USi, we introduce the identity of the  physical device making the access request into the account authorization process, thus taking hackers out of their digital comfort zone.
USi is also a password manager on Steroids ...
Remembering passwords is something we all struggle with. With our USi service, only a single password is required.

When your important accounts are protected by USi, you need only remember a single password to access all of your important accounts that have been assigned to USi for protection.  Think of USi as a password manager on Steroids ...
How our Active Security Key Protects you!

Have you ever heard the phrase, ""they catch the ants while the elephants walk by?"" There are many companies involved in trying to improve digital security.  However, it has become apparent that many of these elaborate defense schemes ignore the obvious and focus on the corner cases.

Our Patent-Pending Active Security Key technology  addresses the obvious, and makes the computing device being used for account access an embedded part of the authorization process.  In other words, if anyone tries to access your protected accounts, they can to do so only it they have access to your authorized physical device.  If you have not authorized a device to access your account, that access request will be denied.  USi builds an identity of each computing device registered by collecting specific identifiers of the hardware being used, and creates an Active Security Key that identifies that device. When access to a protected account is requested, USi regenerates this digital identity and compares it to the values stored in the USi validation database.  By adding the hardware to the access authorization process, we can eliminate scale from the use of breached user information.  If a device making the access request is not registered to your account,  it simply does not gain access!

We have worked hard to develop our technology and believe we have created something special and unique.  The founders of Invysta have filed a number of patent applications covering our basic Active Security Key technology used in your USi account.  The founders of the company are experienced in the pursuit of patents, and are listed inventors on nearly 40 issued utility patents.
What devices can you register to your USi account?

Our goal is to support all the major hardware platforms that consumers use today. That includes Smartphones, Tablets, PCs  and Macs and running  Windows, Apple iOS & OSX, Android, Chrome and Blackberry.  Our plan is to initially launch our service with support for Windows and Android devices, and rapidly expand to support other operating environments.
What protection plans does USi offer?

USi offers a number of plans for consumers, as well as our Ultimate plan for small business.  We also can work directly with larger businesses or government to meet their needs.  These plans are based on the number of devices you wish to register for access to your strategic accounts, and how many accounts you wish to protect.
As an added Perk for our loyal Indiegogo followers, each USi protection plan also includes guaranteed annual renewals for your selected plan at the same price paid during this campaign.

As a supporter in our crowdfunding campaign, you can chose the plan that best fits your needs.  The annual pricing in our Perks amounts to approximately 50% off our normal annual pricing.  In addition, you will receive 1-20 metal wallets, depending on the plan you select (see details in Perks).
How do I setup and use my USi account?
Registering a device to your USi account :
During the account creation process, you will be asked to select a single password that will control access to the USi site, and all of your protected accounts.
Once your USi account has been established,  your first device can be registered to the
USi pushes a client agent to the device
being registered – that agent has a unique number which identifies the account
Once the client agent is installed, USi sends a character key that collects a set of predefined hardware and software identifiers, as specified by the character key.
Once these identifiers are collected, they are submitted to the USi cloud manager which controls the USi Validation Database.
The USi account holders can repeat the process and register as many devices as specified
within the USi plan they purchased.
Adding a Website to your USi account:
Once the first device has been registered to your USi account, you may begin adding strategic website accounts from the list of USi supported sites.
You may add sites up to the number defined within the plan you purchased.
During this process you will be asked to  provide the current user name and current
password required to access your account on the selected site.
USi creates a random password of hashed data
corresponding to the password template which matches the selected site.
USi electronically accesses your selected account, and
executes a change password routine, inserting the new hashed password created by USi.
Some websites may require independent validation of the password change from the account holder.
Once the password change procedure is complete, that account can only be accessed by a device that is already registered in the USi validation database.
You no longer need to fear that your selected sites can be accessed, based solely on your username and password which may already have been breached.
Accessing a USi protected website or account:
Go to www.universalsignin.com from a hardware device you have previosly  added to your USi account.
Enter your USi username and password.
The USi system institutes a regeneration of the specified
identifiers from the device initiating the access request.
The regenerated identifiers are then matched against the identifiers that were stored in the USi validation database at registration.
If the regenerated identifiers do not match the identifiers stored in the database, a match is not confirmed, and the account access request
If a match of the identifiers to those stored in the database is confirmed, you are then presented
with a listing of the websites/accounts that you have previously added to your  USi account.
You may now select the account that you wish to access, and USi automatically submits the username and the machine generated hashed password allowing you to access the account.

Just one username and password to remember, while adding the security of knowing that your accounts can only be accessed from a hardware device you have registered, and not from any of the billions of other devices around the world!!!
What kind of accounts should I protect with USi?

There is no need to register all the online accounts you access and use.  Many of them are informational and do not represent a financial or social threat to you, even if they are breached.  We recommend adding strategic accounts to your USi protection plan ... accounts which if breached, could cause financial consequences or damage to your good name and credit score.

A Community of Translators. The future of the translation
industry is at stake. Everyone who follows the progress of machine-based
translation can see the incredible steps taken by multinational companies to

We at Turris Babel believe the time has come to collect the best of the industry and create a community. A community to share knowledge and information, assistance and professional feedback, all in real time, anywhere and everywhere you need it. A social application focusing on what's important for us.

By bringing together translators, editors, proofreaders and interpreters from around the globe, we'll create the most professional community the industry has ever seen. With specified rooms for language pairs and fields of expertise, translators can receive answers to any question, live and immediately, from their colleagues around the world.

• The launch version of the T!B! app will include discussion rooms based on language pairs and fields of expertise, with continuous live chat around the clock from all over the world. The initial start-up cost of the app is USD 22,000. This includes market research, programming and design. An additional USD 7,000 is needed for marketing costs, such as advertising and preparation of PR materials. USD 6,000 is necessary for office equipment and back-office services.

• In case the launch version is successful, we will continue development and include downloadable glossaries, user-created rooms, personalized skins, design elements, translators' lists, a bidding platform for language service assignments, and much, much more. 
  • In case we don't reach our entire goal, all funds will go to the development of the application. Development will continue, though in a much slower pace.

By participating in the discussions and sharing terminology, translators can help each other where other sources have failed. A 24/7 live discussion platform for users from all corners of the world enables users to get real help from translators, proofreaders, editors and interpreters. The more you participate, the higher you go on T!B!'s rank, where businesses from all over the world can contact you for translation assignments.

column2: >Through our combined work industry-specific glossaries will be created, and later made available for download inside the app, which will be compatible and integrated into most other translation platforms. All glossaries will be created by the users, through the discussions in the rooms. Functioning as built-in mini-dictionaries, these glossaries will enable users to find quick answers to questions already discussed and approved by other experts in the field.

column1:
T!B!'s ark

The translation industry saw a huge rise in business in the early 90s. The world grew smaller, borders became less significant, and the amazing advances in communication made contact nearly instantaneous. Language barriers were and are still tackled on a daily basis, providing jobs to language specialists everywhere. However, as the need for professional translators grows, so do alternative solutions. Machine-based translation and interpreting are no longer science fiction. Not only do they function today (to a more or less acceptable manner), but current progress makes it more than likely that the need for human translation will decrease exponentially in the following decade. Our objective is to collect the best of the best. A community of survivors, T!B! will allow the remaining professionals a daily platform for communication, and will allow businesses an easy way to contact translators according to their language pair, field of expertise and rank.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word. If you don't have the option to contribute financially, then just spread the word. S
column2: >pread the message among your freelance colleagues.
column6: >Tell the translation agencies you work for to offer the app to all in-house and freelance translators, editors, proofreaders and interpreters. Recommend in language courses for both teachers and students.

A 24/7 live discussion platform for users from all corners of the world enables users to get real help from translators, proofreaders, editors and interpreters. The more you participate, the higher you go on T!B!'s rank, where businesses from all over the world can contact you for translation assignments.

Through our combined work industry-specific glossaries will be created, and later made available for download inside the app, which will be compatible and integrated into most other translation platforms. All glossaries will be created by the users, through the discussions in the rooms. Functioning as built-in mini-dictionaries, these glossaries will enable users to find quick answers to questions already discussed and approved by other experts in the field.

T!B!'s ark The translation industry saw a huge rise in business in the early 90s. The world grew smaller, borders became less significant, and the amazing advances in communication made contact nearly instantaneous. Language barriers were and are still tackled on a daily basis, providing jobs to language specialists everywhere. However, as the need for professional translators grows, so do alternative solutions. Machine-based translation and interpreting are no longer science fiction. Not only do they function today (to a more or less acceptable manner), but current progress makes it more than likely that the need for human translation will decrease exponentially in the following decade. Our objective is to collect the best of the best. A community of survivors, T!B! will allow the remaining professionals a daily platform for communication, and will allow businesses an easy way to contact translators according to their language pair, field of expertise and rank.

Other Ways You Can Help Spread the word. If you don't have the option to contribute financially, then just spread the word. Spread the message among your freelance colleagues. Tell the translation agencies you work for to offer the app to all in-house and freelance translators, editors, proofreaders and interpreters. Recommend in language courses for both teachers and students.",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3: >A Modular Smart Desk Overlay For Schools
column5: >TouchTop is the first and only smart surface overlay designed to enhance a school's existing investment in desks and student work surfaces.  With our snap-in accessory system, modular power and PC options, TouchTop is specially designed to empower students of all abilities.  Our removable USB battery pack charges a student's mobile device,  making it easy to keep their devices charged throughout an entire school day.
column13: >Students and schools embrace mobile technology like never before, and there's a lot of room for improvement.  Education has moved to a more hands-on approach, including ""flipped classrooms"", experiential learning and the maker movement.  The cornerstone  of this approach is a belief and understanding that students better retain knowledge and learn more deeply when they collaborate in small groups or get hands-on with their lesson material.
column14: >TouchTop is designed to address these needs, giving students amazing new capabilities at their desk and on their work surfaces to fully embrace mobile, cloud and accessible technologies.  Designed to fit on existing surfaces, TouchTop brings additional storage, protection, power and computing capabilities and allows those surfaces to be customized to each student's needs and abilities.
column15: >Join us on journey to create innovative technology for students all over the world.
column19: >TouchTop enables mobile devices such as phones and tablets to continuously charge throughout the school day. This ensures student productivity remains uninterrupted while using their devices.  TouchTop also includes accessories designed for additional storage capabilities and device management solutions without impeding on their existing work area.
column22: >Getting power to a student's desk is difficult in most classrooms.  So, we spent a lot of time focusing on how teachers and students would like to see this problem solved.  TouchTop provides an easily removable battery module that simply slides into the side of the unit.
column23: >Once docked in the module bay, power is delivered to a student's mobile device for charging.  The USB charging port is exposed within our smartphone and tablet stand and easily accessible by a student sitting at the desk.
column26: >Storing and using a student's mobile device is now possible while not interfering with the materials on the surface of their desk.  Our universal device stand is designed to support small form factor smartphones up to the largest iPads.  All accessories can easily connect to our standard accessory port located on the back and sides of TouchTop.  This allows for perfect positioning of their device for their needs or for collaborative work groups.
column27: >Our stand also articulates on 3 different axis which allows it to be moved into just the right position.  Rotation from landscape to portrait modes, vertical and horizontal adjustments allow a device to be positioned correctly for a student or to share screen contents in small group collaborations.
column30: >Our easy to use accessory attachment system allows students and teachers to adapt a student's work space to meet each lesson's or student's unique needs.  Our initial accessory we've designed is the universal smartphone stand to address the storage and protective needs students have while using smart technology during their classes.
column31: >From storage systems to hold books to storage systems for STEM and robotics kits or art supplies, the expansion capability of TouchTop is nearly limitless.  Testing and privacy partitions along with articulating arms and stands that hold external displays can enhance ease of use and accessiblilty for every student's needs.
column34: >Schools and students struggle to keep devices charged and in-use throughout an entire school day.  We met this challenge head-on with a simple, removable battery solution that can be easily removed to allow overnight charging to keep our student's up and running.
column35: >Rugged, durable and safe are the key design goals for our battery system.  The student's charging port is elevated above the surface of TouchTop to avoid spills and not get in the way of student papers and materials while their devices are in use and charging.
column37: >Like our removable battery, TouchTop has a removable PC module that slides easily into the unit and brings a full PC experience to our students.  Our TouchTop Scholar unit, which includes a built-in touch display, automatically connects to our PC when docked into the PC module bay.
column38: >We started our journey in education technology teaching coding and apps development to K12 students, so we are working hard to deliver TouchTop as an opportunity to embrace STEM and experiential learning for our students.  Our roadmap includes Windows 10, Windows 10 IoT Core edition, Raspberry Pi and Android modules to expose students to the depths of amazing technology available today.
column42: >TouchTop will initially support the popular, traditional 18"" x 24"" student desk.  We will design updated base layers and surface molds for our units to fit many different styles and size desks.  Contact us for more information to build units to meet your specific needs.
column48: >Ports:  1 USB 2.0 charging only port
column55: >Ports: 1 USB 2.0 data port (connected to PC module), 1 USB 2.0 charging only port
column60: >Adjustments: 2 vertical axis push-button adjustments, 1 axis (rotation) adjustment to rotate device into landscape or portrait position
column61: >Clamps: Minimum clasp width 2.5"", maximum clasp 10""
column62: >Ports: 1 USB 2.0 charging port for student devices, supports Android and iOS devices, charging cable supplied or students can use their own cable
column68: >Ports: 2 USB 2.0 5V-2A output charging ports, 1 USB 2.0 5V-1.1A output charging port,
column69: >  1 micro-USB input charging port
column73: >Ports: 1 USB 2.0 5V-2A input power port, 1 USB 2.0 data I/O port, 1 HDMI output port
column74: >Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 x86/32-bit
column75: >Processor: Intel Atom Quad Core Z3735F
column78: >Wireless:  Bluetooth 4.0,  802.11 b/g/n Integrated Network Adapter
column82: >Thank you for supporting TouchTop and the students we endeavor to support.  After the past few years of personal investment of time, effort, volunteer teaching and resources and seeing first-hand the impact we can have for students, our goal is to deliver a cutting edge solution to our students.  Your support means so much to us and our TouchTop customers!
column83: >We are focusing initial sales and perks distributions to USA and Canadian customers and backers.  We are open to engaging with anyone from all over the world and we will do our best to work with anyone that has a passion for helping students succeed.  Please don't hesitate to contact us via IGG or directly - info (at) apptouchtech (dot) com.
column89: >As we embark on our journey there are several milestones we will focus upon and we're hopeful that with your help we can deliver the world's most advanced, easy to use, affordable and amazing technology possible for our students.  We will have several channels open to solicit feedback from students, teachers, administrators and parents to deliver solutions that fit our user's needs and budgets.
column95: >Our skilled and dedicated team includes an experienced software developer, a passionate educator and amazing and talented product designers.  We're based in Atlanta, GA, so please reach out and let's work together to build an amazing solution for students all over the world.
column101: >TouchTop started with our founder's involvement with his son's special needs learning journey.  After volunteering his time to help the StarFall.com team build an iPad version of Learning to Read so his son could use their amazing content on a tablet, Mr. Douglass' passion for creating educational technology has only grown over the past several years.
column102: >With over 20 years of software development experience, our founder's focus on user experience and accessibility technology along with a devotion to supporting children with gross or fine motor control issues, TouchTop embodies our talents and focus on helping all students use technology.
column103: >As a Code.org coding volunteer teaching coding to hundreds of students in that Atlanta area, Mr. Douglass expanded his support for schools by building collaborative media centers focused on touch technology.  Thousands of students have used the solutions built by our founder and after hearing about the challenges facing school's successful adoption of technology from teachers, students and administrators throughout North America, the idea for TouchTop was born.
column104: >After a few years of hard work along with a commitment to delivering a great product, we are excited to launch TouchTop with the help of the amazing IndieGoGo community.
column105: >Thank you for your support!
column109: >Which models of TouchTop are you building?
column110: >TouchTop Student is our base model of TouchTop.  It will come standard with our smart device stand, USB battery module and customized graphics to match your schools colors, logo and them.
column111: >TouchTop Scholar is our model that will include our modular PC and built-in touch display.  This is a more advanced version of TouchTop that will require unlocking our stretch goals and then followed by an extensive period of pilot testing with several schools.  We are excited to bring something amazing to students!
column113: >How do we become a pilot testing partner school or institution?
column114: >We have several schools in our area lined up to help us with extensive, on-going testing of product designs and new features and accessories.  We are excited to hear from you and would like to expand our pilot testing programs internationally.  Please reach out and let's discuss your needs and how you would like to use and shape TouchTop's future with your students.  You can contact us at info (AT) apptouchtech (DOT) com.
column116: >Do you offer consulting services or expertise on mobile or cloud technology for schools?
column117: >Absolutely!  From Google Classroom, Microsoft Classroom and the entire Google Apps and Microsoft Office 365 Education suite of apps and services, we are experts in cloud, mobile app development and IT administration.  Please reach out to us, our roadmap includes extensive software offerings that we are building and will both bundle into TouchTop and sell separately to enhance the use, accessibility and effectiveness of cloud classrooms and apps.
column119: >What type of warranty is offered with TouchTop?
column120:
>All TouchTop products will include a comprehensive warranty and support program.  A standard 1 year warranty will be offered with additional, more extensive support offerings available.  Classrooms are challenging work environments, products used in classrooms must be rugged and well designed.  We are dedicated to using durable materials, excellent workmanship and building products that can sustain the demands of K12 and higher education students.

Campaign

column1: Vitalie, Maria, Adrian and Cristina. The Bee-Library project has unite us because we love to make a difference, to prove that we can be the change, because we care about the future and because we want to live in an educated society. Because we like to read!

The public Libraries from Moldova’s villages, are in need of serious investments in order to offer decent study conditions to their visitors, especially kids.  A donation for a set of books would be a good idea, but it is not enough in order to solve the long term problem.

Then, what would the solution be?

In order to improve the study conditions and the process acquisition of new books we decided to start up a small business, which will permanently support the libraries from Moldova. In other words, we will build a sustainable assistance for this institutions.

Taking into consideration the natural conditions, our work experience and knowledge in the field, we decided to create an apiary on the Cojusna village territory. Each year, half of the obtained profit will be offered as goods or services to the libraries from different villages from Moldova. Thus, starting with Autumn, 2017, we will be able to support the first library, from Cojusna, on its way to development. And this support will become bigger and bigger each year due to the development of our business and the support of other economic entities that we plan to attract as partners for our cause.
Your donations will help us build this apiary and to offer to hundreds of children from Moldova access to new, interesting books, to decent services and conditions for research and study.

Our project needs a total of 8300 Euros. We have collected 1800 Euros from local sources, but we still need 6500 Euros.  The amount of 8300 Euros will allow us to buy the hives (80 units), bee families (80 families),  the necessary tools and equipment for working with bees (tubes, centrifuge, masks etc.) and to decently organize the apiary. Three young people from Cojusna village will be involved in this project, a professional beekeeper and two seasonal workers.
The business budget will be divided in the following way:
<li>900 Euros = the centrifuge  (the device for honey extraction)
• 600 Euros = miscellaneous (buckets, pots, knives, tongs, mask  etc).
Any unforeseen expenses will be covered from the personal account of the Group of Initiative.

Dear Friends, please see on the right field the perks that you'll receive for your contribution and please, don't forget to provide an e-mail address. But the most precious perks that you'll get it's gratitude of thousands of kids and certainty that you are the source of their happiness!

As soon as we begin to implement our project, we will work in parallel with people from other places in Moldova in order to expand this business model. Our vision is, that in  few years we will have a network of small businesses which will stimulate and support the communities, to encourage the development process of small villages. And you can contribute NOW to the realization of this dream!

”Bee-Library” is a project that brings an innovative spirit in the field of small businesses in Republic of Moldova. Our idea is to create a business that is committed to serve the community and to develop itself. Why we have chosen to develop the library when we can invest in any field or we could assign all profit business just for us? Because by investing in education, we invest in our future. We all want to live in an educated society, with intelligent, responsible, active and valuable people.
A child who reads becomes a great personality. A society with people who love reading is a developed and respected society.

Our group had many ideas, but we chose the bees because it is the most eco-friendly activity from the agricultural ones and because we love nature. Beekeeping is profitable in Moldova weather conditions and does not require huge investments, so it can almost exist by itself, accumulating profit. A big advantage is that in the village there are several beekeepers who can offer their services at any time.

Risks that may arise in our work are related to the natural hazards more than to the anthropogenic factors. We will also seek the services of a veterinarian if we suspect any occurrence of diseases in bees.

Selling of the honey and bee products will be achieved in direct contact with consumers, both in food markets and shops, and on the Internet. The high quality of our products will reduce the risk of accumulation of big quantities for a very long a period. If necessary, we will consider the possibility of selling those products to companies exporting honey abroad.
Don't forget, YOU can BEE a LIBRARY!

Other ways you can help bring this project into reality are by sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and E-mail using the Indiegogo social media icons embedded at the top right-hand corner of this page.
Please spread the word about this campaign to help us gain the momentum needed to fully fund this project!
We truly want to thank each and every one of you for your support!

Vitalie, Maria, Adrian și Cristina. Proiectul Bee-Library ne-a unit pentru că ne place să schimbăm lucrurile în bine, pentru că ne pasă de viitor și pentru că ne dorim parte a unei societăți culte. Pentru că ne place să citim!
Bibliotecile publice din Moldova au nevoie de investiții ca să poată oferi condiții decente utilizatorilor săi, mai ales copiilor.
O donație pentru a procura un set de cărți ar fi un lucru benefic dar asta nu ar rezolva problema pe termen lung. Și atunci care ar fi soluția?
Pentru ca să contribuim la îmbunătățirea condițiilor și procurarea cărților am decis să înființăm o mică afacere, care să susțină financiar bibliotecile, în mod permanent. Cu alte cuvinte, vom construi un fel de asistență durabilă pentru această instituție.
Ținând cont de condițiile naturale, experiența de lucru și cunoștințele din domeniu am decis să înființăm o stupină de albine în teritoriul satului Cojușna. În fiece an, jumătate din profitul obținut din această activitate va fi oferit sub formă de bunuri și servicii către bibliotecă. Astfel, începând cu toamna anului 2017, vom putea sprijini biblioteca în calea ei spre modernizare. Și acest sprijin va fi tot mai mare cu fiece an, datorită dezvoltării afacerii noastre, dar și implicării pe parcurs, a altor agenți economici în această cauză a comunității noastre.
Donațiile Dvs ne vor ajuta să construim această stupină și să oferim sutelor de copii și tineri din Moldova acces la cărți noi, interesante, la servicii și condiții decente de cercetare și lectură.
Care sunt necesitățile proiectului și ce primești în schimbul unei donații?

Proiectul nostru are nevoie de un buget de 8300 euro. Din surse locale am colectat 1800 euro, mai avem nevoie de 6500. Suma de 8300 de euro ne va permite să cumpărăm stupii (80 bucati), familiile de albine (80 familii), ustensilele necesare lucrului cu albinele (unelte, vase, centrifugă, mască etc) și să amenajăm cumsecade această stupină. În afacere vor fi implicați 3 tineri din Cojușna, un specialist apicultor și doi lucrători de sezon.
Bugetul afacerii va avea următorul conținut:
• 600 euro = altele (căldări, vase, cuțite, clește, mască etc).
Eventuale cheltuieli neprevăzute vor fi acoperite din contul Grupului de inițiativă.

Imediat ce vom începe să implementăm proiectul nostru, vom lucra în paralel și cu alți tineri din alte localități din Moldova pentru a extinde acest model antreprenorial. Dorim ca în cațiva ani, în țara noastră să funcționeze o adevărată rețea de mici afaceri care să stimuleze și să susțină comunitatea, să o încurajeze să se dezvolte! Iar tu poți contribui ACUM la realizarea acestui vis!

”Bee-Library” este un proiect care aduce un suflu inovativ în câmpul micilor afaceri din Republica Moldova. Ideea noastră este să creăm o afacere care se angajează să servească comunității și să se autodezvolte. De ce am ales să dezvoltăm biblioteca, când am putea investi în orice alt domeniu sau am putea să ne atribuim tot profitul afacerii doar pentru noi?
Pentru că investind în educație, investim în viitorul nostru. Or, cu toții ne dorim să trăim într-o societate cultă, cu oameni inteligenți, responsabili, activi și valoroși. Un copil care citește mult se dezvoltă mult. O societate cu oameni care iubesc lectura este o societate dezvoltată și respectată.

Grupul nostru a avut mai multe idei, dar am ales albinele. Pentru că este cea mai eco-friendly activitate din cele agricole și pentru că iubim natura. Apicultura este rentabilă în condițiile climaterice din Moldova și nu necesită investiții foarte mari, astfel încât se poate întreține de sine stătător, acumulând profit. Un mare avantaj este că în localitate există câțiva apicultori care ne pot oferi serviciile lor la orice oră.

Se știe că în toată lumea albinăritul este ocupația cea mai prietenoasă mediului înconjurător, albinele fiind cele care țin în viață natura vie. De aceea înmulțirea albinelor este de departe un lucru foarte benefic pentru întreaga natură.
Pe de altă parte, piața de produse apicole din Moldova va dispune de un producător local, care va oferi consumatorilor produse ecologice, folositoare și gustoase.
Și da, suntem convinși că cu ajutorul vostru, albinele noastre vor moderniza biblioteca, făcând fericiți și iubitorii de miere și iubitorii de cărți bune!

Vitalie, Maria, Adrian and Cristina. The Bee-Library project has unite us because we love to make a difference, to prove that we can be the change, because we care about the future and because we want to live in an educated society. Because we like to read!

The public Libraries from Moldova’s villages, are in need of serious investments in order to offer decent study conditions to their visitors, especially kids.  A donation for a set of books would be a good idea, but it is not enough in order to solve the long term problem.

Then, what would the solution be?In order to improve the study conditions and the process acquisition of new books we decided to start up a small business, which will permanently support the libraries from Moldova. In other words, we will build a sustainable assistance for this institutions.

Taking into consideration the natural conditions, our work experience and knowledge in the field, we decided to create an apiary on the Cojusna village territory. Each year, half of the obtained profit will be offered as goods or services to the libraries from different villages from Moldova. Thus, starting with Autumn, 2017, we will be able to support the first library, from Cojusna, on its way to development. And this support will become bigger and bigger each year due to the development of our business and the support of other economic entities that we plan to attract as partners for our cause.
Your donations will help us build this apiary and to offer to hundreds of children from Moldova access to new, interesting books, to decent services and conditions for research and study.
What We Need & What You Get

Our project needs a total of 8300 Euros. We have collected 1800 Euros from local sources, but we still need 6500 Euros.  The amount of 8300 Euros will allow us to buy the hives (80 units), bee families (80 families),  the necessary tools and equipment for working with bees (tubes, centrifuge, masks etc.) and to decently organize the apiary. Three young people from Cojusna village will be involved in this project, a professional beekeeper and two seasonal workers.
The business budget will be divided in the following way:
900 Euros = the centrifuge  (the device for honey extraction)
600 Euros = miscellaneous (buckets, pots, knives, tongs, mask  etc).
Any unforeseen expenses will be covered from the personal account of the Group of Initiative.

Dear Friends, please see on the right field the perks that you'll receive for your contribution and please, don't forget to provide an e-mail address. But the most precious perks that you'll get it's gratitude of thousands of kids and certainty that you are the source of their happiness!

As soon as we begin to implement our project, we will work in parallel with people from other places in Moldova in order to expand this business model. Our vision is, that in  few years we will have a network of small businesses which will stimulate and support the communities, to encourage the development process of small villages. And you can contribute NOW to the realization of this dream!

”Bee-Library” is a project that brings an innovative spirit in the field of small businesses in Republic of Moldova. Our idea is to create a business that is committed to serve the community and to develop itself. Why we have chosen to develop the library when we can invest in any field or we could assign all profit business just for us? Because by investing in education, we invest in our future. We all want to live in an educated society, with intelligent, responsible, active and valuable people.A child who reads becomes a great personality. A society with people who love reading is a developed and respected society.

Our group had many ideas, but we chose the bees because it is the most eco-friendly activity from the agricultural ones and because we love nature. Beekeeping is profitable in Moldova weather conditions and does not require huge investments, so it can almost exist by itself, accumulating profit. A big advantage is that in the village there are several beekeepers who can offer their services at any time.

Risks that may arise in our work are related to the natural hazards more than to the anthropogenic factors. We will also seek the services of a veterinarian if we suspect any occurrence of diseases in bees.

Selling of the honey and bee products will be achieved in direct contact with consumers, both in food markets and shops, and on the Internet. The high quality of our products will reduce the risk of accumulation of big quantities for a very long a period. If necessary, we will consider the possibility of selling those products to companies exporting honey abroad.
Don't forget, YOU can BEE a LIBRARY!

Other ways you can help bring this project into reality are by sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and E-mail using the Indiegogo social media icons embedded at the top right-hand corner of this page.
Please spread the word about this campaign to help us gain the momentum needed to fully fund this project!
We truly want to thank each and every one of you for your support!
VERSIUNEA ROMÂNĂ  Scurtă prezentare a proiectului ”Bee-Library”

Vitalie, Maria, Adrian și Cristina. Proiectul Bee-Library ne-a unit pentru că ne place să schimbăm lucrurile în bine, pentru că ne pasă de viitor și pentru că ne dorim parte a unei societăți culte. Pentru că ne place să citim!Bibliotecile publice din Moldova au nevoie de investiții ca să poată oferi condiții decente utilizatorilor săi, mai ales copiilor.O donație pentru a procura un set de cărți ar fi un lucru benefic dar asta nu ar rezolva problema pe termen lung. Și atunci care ar fi soluția?Pentru ca să contribuim la îmbunătățirea condițiilor și procurarea cărților am decis să înființăm o mică afacere, care să susțină financiar bibliotecile, în mod permanent. Cu alte cuvinte, vom construi un fel de asistență durabilă pentru această instituție.Ținând cont de condițiile naturale, experiența de lucru și cunoștințele din domeniu am decis să înființăm o stupină de albine în teritoriul satului Cojușna. În fiece an, jumătate din profitul obținut din această activitate va fi oferit sub formă de bunuri și servicii către bibliotecă. Astfel, începând cu toamna anului 2017, vom putea sprijini biblioteca în calea ei spre modernizare. Și acest sprijin va fi tot mai mare cu fiece an, datorită dezvoltării afacerii noastre, dar și implicării pe parcurs, a altor agenți economici în această cauză a comunității noastre.
Donațiile Dvs ne vor ajuta să construim această stupină și să oferim sutelor de copii și tineri din Moldova acces la cărți noi, interesante, la servicii și condiții decente de cercetare și lectură.
Care sunt necesitățile proiectului și ce primești în schimbul unei donații?

Proiectul nostru are nevoie de un buget de 8300 euro. Din surse locale am colectat 1800 euro, mai avem nevoie de 6500. Suma de 8300 de euro ne va permite să cumpărăm stupii (80 bucati), familiile de albine (80 familii), ustensilele necesare lucrului cu albinele (unelte, vase, centrifugă, mască etc) și să amenajăm cumsecade această stupină. În afacere vor fi implicați 3 tineri din Cojușna, un specialist apicultor și doi lucrători de sezon.Bugetul afacerii va avea următorul conținut:
600 euro = altele (căldări, vase, cuțite, clește, mască etc).
Eventuale cheltuieli neprevăzute vor fi acoperite din contul Grupului de inițiativă.

Imediat ce vom începe să implementăm proiectul nostru, vom lucra în paralel și cu alți tineri din alte localități din Moldova pentru a extinde acest model antreprenorial. Dorim ca în cațiva ani, în țara noastră să funcționeze o adevărată rețea de mici afaceri care să stimuleze și să susțină comunitatea, să o încurajeze să se dezvolte! Iar tu poți contribui ACUM la realizarea acestui vis!

”Bee-Library” este un proiect care aduce un suflu inovativ în câmpul micilor afaceri din Republica Moldova. Ideea noastră este să creăm o afacere care se angajează să servească comunității și să se autodezvolte. De ce am ales să dezvoltăm biblioteca, când am putea investi în orice alt domeniu sau am putea să ne atribuim tot profitul afacerii doar pentru noi?Pentru că investind în educație, investim în viitorul nostru. Or, cu toții ne dorim să trăim într-o societate cultă, cu oameni inteligenți, responsabili, activi și valoroși. Un copil care citește mult se dezvoltă mult. O societate cu oameni care iubesc lectura este o societate dezvoltată și respectată.

Grupul nostru a avut mai multe idei, dar am ales albinele. Pentru că este cea mai eco-friendly activitate din cele agricole și pentru că iubim natura. Apicultura este rentabilă în condițiile climaterice din Moldova și nu necesită investiții foarte mari, astfel încât se poate întreține de sine stătător, acumulând profit. Un mare avantaj este că în localitate există câțiva apicultori care ne pot oferi serviciile lor la orice oră.

Se știe că în toată lumea albinăritul este ocupația cea mai prietenoasă mediului înconjurător, albinele fiind cele care țin în viață natura vie. De aceea înmulțirea albinelor este de departe un lucru foarte benefic pentru întreaga natură.
Pe de altă parte, piața de produse apicole din Moldova va dispune de un producător local, care va oferi consumatorilor produse ecologice, folositoare și gustoase.
Și da, suntem convinși că cu ajutorul vostru, albinele noastre vor moderniza biblioteca, făcând fericiți și iubitorii de miere și iubitorii de cărți bune!",1.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Over the past eight months, a group of talented engineers have worked long hours to address the most common problem in traditional recruitment (low quality and non-professional less skilled candidates) and developed something fresh called O’hire.
We are proud to say that 1000 users have already registered on our platform for the beta launch.

Our initial prototype has been tested and proven to ease the life of startups / companies / individuals of any industry who struggle to find the right talent and currently dependent only on traditional ways of hiring.
We are confident that the competitive cost of our system and the superior technological capabilities that it provides will quickly make it a leading product in the recruitment marketplace.

We’ve got a preliminary landing page up here: www.o-hire.com and we’re planning to demo our first version of application around 1st August..we’re currently starting engagement (candidates and clients) and coding like hell.
• Very challenging for the employer to filter out the best candidate based on their unprofessional, lengthy and overstated resumes.
• No proper judgement of candidate’s communication before spending a considerable time in face to face meetings.
• No single consolidated platform for all sort of job seekers like singer, dancer, IT, magician etc.
• No global recruitment platform allowing employers to hire candidates from a different country.
Video Resume : Jobseeker can upload a 2 minutes video describing his/her skills.
Hiring Approach : You can hire anyone either as a company or an individual.

Employer Invite only : Only employers can contact the candidates based on their interest in candidates’ pitching. Like other platforms, candidates are not allowed to flush the employers with a lot of non-relevant resumes.
Global  and local Hiring : O’hire is designed to serve all the local and global recruitment needs.
Make a pledge by clicking the PLEDGE button above, and choose whatever reward fits you. Feel the magnitude of your pledge. You aren't just contributing to something that can be of benefit to you
column2: you are also supporting people all over the world in creating meaningful change in their lives.

column1: Share our IndieGogo Campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through old fashioned conversations. O'hire will continue to come to life because a community wanted and created its emergence!

At the end of the campaign you’ll be able to tell us what more features you want us to incorporate in your O'hire app. Please do this! We want to use our community feedback as an important pointer as we build the next production version of the app!

column3:
Challenges

The greatest challenge was brainstorming with our team of developers in order to come up with ways to optimize and transcode the videos in real time for different mobile devices with internet bandwidth variations. We have resolved that challenge as well as other technical challenges and we feel the app will exceed the expectations of the users.

column1: All funds will be spent on the development of the O'hire App, and on costs surrounding that development. Included in those costs are personnel costs, marketing costs, hosting and design costs.
$20,000 gets us a mobile web app, $35,000 raised gets is an iPhone app, and $50,000 raised gets us an Android app.
Typically a project of this magnitude would be well into six-figure range. Due to strategic partnerships and the team’s experience level, we will be able to make O'hire magic with much less.

Funds above $50,000 will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimizing the application based on community feedback, readying the app for important clinical trial testing, and sharing the app with millions of people around the world.

It all began around two years ago with our other IT startup. We  successfully brought some new clients onboard to work with our existing IT and digital marketing team. Slightly, we observed an increase in demand of new resources from the same clients, to be fulfilled in short notice.

We were very excited to see the clients' willingness to go with us for new modules of the projects but at the same time, we faced some recruitment challenges in real time. We tried out all traditional ways of hiring like purchased the candidates' database, spent significant amount of money in hiring external HR agencies, third party contractors but nothing worked out that well. From every source, either we got a denial on providing candidates on such a short notice or their candidates were lacking the required skill sets.

Understanding the fact that customers are king, we immediately started looking into the recruitment by ourselves and thereby explored all the pain areas of this industry. After doing a thorough research so as to come up with a better innovative and technology product, available on the fly to both the employers and candidates.. we ended our search at O'hire. We kept into consideration the needs of the youth, that way made it a mobile app with a super UX. As an end user, we gave an initial try internally to the app's prototype and found it very much exciting :)

Our goal is to bring in early adopters to create the foundation Memberships and Mastermind Community Leaders.

In our soft launch, we are offering 100 Lifetime Memberships for only $100 each. Indiegogo contributors will have the option to create a Personal Leadership Center in Mastermind Communities for those motivated to inspire and empower others to achieve their personal and professional goals. These memberships are ready to start immediately after our 30-day campaign. 

In conjunction, we are building YouthAchievia.com, which is an online platform to empower disadvantaged youth nationwide. Contributions of any amount aside from our Perk Offerings will go directly into building our YouthAchievia platform and be greatly appreciated!
