I was after a small and robust firewall solution that, out of the box, provided my home and small office networks suitable protection while still being extremely customisable and flexible in deployment.
Simply put, I wanted protection with ease of deployment without the overhead that industry leaders require.

I fell short in my search, unable to find a product that provided stable and effective protection on my network, not only from external hosts, but from internal users doing bad things. Other products claim to provide this functionality, but they're either too expensive for your average Jill or Joe, or the method used to provide a secure connection is ... weird unstable. So I built my own home grown firewall that is small, lightweight, robust, and damn easy to configure.

I'm now running a prototype FirePi device providing some of the functionality described here, but it needs work. The concept is to provide DHCP, DNS, service proxying, VPN connectivity (IPSec, TOR, other VPN provider here), network analytics so you can see who or what is attacking you and intrusion detection and protection capabilities.
For the home user, it must be easy to configure, extremely low powered, and damn easy to install. What I've use currently is pretty simple, so, why can't everyone have one?
Stop the bad guys from getting in! You are actively being probed and attacks are attempted against your Internet connection right now, and you are probably relying on your domestic grade home router.

This small firewall provides protection suitable for all homes and small offices that do not want to rely on cloud services or have the money and technical expertise to purchase outlay substantial amounts of money for network protection. FirePi is entirely self contained, providing proxying, DNS, DHCP, and, of course, Internet access.

Scheduled to obtain updates regularly, it will always be up to date with patches, however, even without updates and the restrictive default firewall, it will continue working efficiently and effectively, stopping those bad guys from getting in.

The prototype I am running has a Cortex A7 quad-core processer, 512mb RAM, two Ethernet (one via USB) running Armbian, housed inside an ugly 3D printed case. I don't want the prototype to be this ugly or limited. The final product will be running a stable Linux or BSD based operating system with various case options, more memory, more power, and more storage capacity!

By using open hardware platforms and entirely open source software allows technical users to fully customise the FirePi and configure complex features such high availability and fail-over between multiple FirePi devices.

Out of the box the FirePi provides fully customisable packet filtering with a secure default to deny policy, malicious host blocking, and web content filtering, only requiring you to configure the basic settings to connect to the Internet, and it provides the rest.
This heat-map shows all of the malicious locations scanning and probing my Internet connection... simply being online attracts scans, probes, and malicious sources.

This means, if you are online, the bad guys (and some good guys) are scanning you for services published to the Internet and vulnerabilities presented by your router to (probably) add to their botnet. FirePi blocks these probes and scans, making it appear as if nothing exists on your IP address, meaning the malicious parties move on to another target (you're safe!).

Further, you can suck out the logs from FirePi and filter through your own analytics platform, such as a Security Information and Event Monitoring solution to analyse and determine the most common attacks and threats posed to your network.

What else could you want? For those tinkerers, you will have access to the full hardware specification of the device and hook directly into the headers, want to attach a screen to show current device statistics? No problems!
The project is currently a concept and the funding will help establish a solid product to be delivered.
The funding will go towards design, development, and ensuring that when shipped FirePi will not be just another ugly networking device!

I've got a very rudimentary prototype of a prototype running currently providing protection to my own network, and it has significantly reduced latency while maintaining maximum throughput. This device is the bare minimum of what I want to deliver.
$2,000 will progress this project from concept to prototype. This will cover development, hardware, and demonstration of a prototype device.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Tell the world about this campaign, tout it on LinkedIn, Instagram, and even Facebook!
• I will need assistance in developing the Web UI, marketing materials, and end device design... most of which will be advertised to UpWork unless you want to help? Contact me!
Everything is a bit crude at the moment, but expect this campaign and all things about it to improve as you fund me!

Tell the world about this campaign, tout it on LinkedIn, Instagram, and even Facebook!

Everything is a bit crude at the moment, but expect this campaign and all things about it to improve as you fund me!",1.0,0,"1 Campaign

We believe the present marketplace for private company valuations is priced too highly, delivers valuations too late, is incapable of comparing many different companies side-by-side and is inaccurate in its output.
Unlisted provides a platform to build real-time prices, with the possibility of comparing many companies against one another at the same time and using artificial intelligence to improve accuracy.

Valuations on our platform are built using real-time market prices. The platform is AI powered - which means the system learns from current market and transaction prices, and allows users to to build algorithms or build/train their own completely new models.  For example, these algorithms can be re-configured by selecting the data in which to build &
column2: train the models, by changing parameters such as time-frame, sector and size of previous deals, and we can optimise the model to be used to value a specific private company.

column1: Its cost-effective as our clients can do much of data processing/training on our platform, that normally they would do in-house hiring teams of analysts. Users have access to the platform throughout the year rather than a one-off PDF report as its currently done. Thereby, making our platform a fraction of the cost to what you'd pay today for same privileges.

• The funding will pay for a roadshow to raise public funds on an equity fundraising platform. We are looking for backers to become stakeholders and strategic developers of our Minimum Viable Product to scale up.
• Backers can become development partners and/or participate in the public funding round.

What makes us worth funding? Patent-pending technology and scalability. We are the first to provide real-time private company valuations in the U.K.. Our solution is faster (taking seconds to execute), cheaper (than running it in house or outsourcing one off valuation) and more accurate (we track the market and train the models to test accuracy).

Unlisted is a game changer for UK business - at present if you're an investor in private companies or an entrepreneur who has put time and effort into building up a business it's not easy to find a valuation. Until now it's been laborious, tedious, relying on multiple sources of information. The result has been a valuation that is out of date by the time it's calculated, often wildly inaccurate and jaw-droppingly expensive to produce. This is a staid and unresponsive industry that charges too much and offers too little, leaving stakeholders, and the economy in general, badly served.

Not any more -- Unlisted is the only utility that provides real-time valuations for private companies as and when they are needed. Our proprietary application allows investors, the source of key funding for many private companies, to measure as many businesses as they want against each other, helping identify those with the most potential. It even allows investors and companies to manipulate inputs so as to forecast a range of different valuations under many different scenarios.

What makes us different is that we are seeking to do this in real-time. Why is this important? Up until now the process of finding the value for a private company has literally taken weeks. Unlisted can turn this process into a job that takes seconds and allows investors to look up a much wider range of potential investments. This focus on increasing efficiency amongst the investment community will ultimately aid our economy in becoming more efficient.

For the entrepreneurs and business owners, Unlisted gives them greater visibility about the success of their efforts, can help them in their relations with financial institutions in terms of financial planning, and can help incentivise staff more productively.

We believe Unlisted is disruptive to a conservative and often captive market, is a force for good, and is progressive in supporting policies and aims which are accepted across the political spectrum, such as the democratisation of financial markets, the liberalisation and diversification of financial services, the encouragement of broader stake and share ownership across the population, and the encouragement of wider participation in the U.K. employment market.

We believe our product allows entrepreneurs easier and faster access to finance with better returns. At the same time our service offers the investment community, including pension funds and individual investors, the chance to diversify their holdings and the opportunity to achieve higher returns in a low yield environment.

Given easier access to finance, we feel that our engine will improve the quality of life for those individuals who seek to go out on their own and start businesses, and will boost social inclusion through rewards for a wider range of skills and labour. There is a risk that some jobs may be lost in larger traditional financial institutions as the efficiencies of our system become entrenched in those companies, however we believe that this will be more than offset by the new jobs created through economic efficiencies of the correct allocation of capital, which Unlisted will encourage.

Valuation Accuracy: We will use sensitivity of the prices to changes with respect to various input parameters, including current asset price, interest rates and volatility. An option-pricing (risk sensitivity) comparable framework will be built around the product to ensure any fluctuations in prices of private company with respect to the underlying basket of stocks are known, documented and explained, and within the parameters.

Data availability: The company obtains data from private and public sources. In the former, contracts will be put in place between Unlisted and data vendors(Bloomberg, Equifax and London Stock Exchange) to ensure uninterrupted access. We will extract private company data from Companies House.

Litigation: The company is not engaged in any litigation. The company will continue engagement with the regulator to ensure all applicable regulations and compliance requirements are understood and met. We will work with FinTech Scotland and it's cohort of members to support the roll-out of our services. We make appropriate legal disclosures regarding liability and the reliance on the valuations. We have sought legal advice about using these datasets to produce private company valuations.
• We would ask you to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

We believe the present marketplace for private company valuations is priced too highly, delivers valuations too late, is incapable of comparing many different companies side-by-side and is inaccurate in its output.
Unlisted provides a platform to build real-time prices, with the possibility of comparing many companies against one another at the same time and using artificial intelligence to improve accuracy.

Valuations on our platform are built using real-time market prices. The platform is AI powered - which means the system learns from current market and transaction prices, and allows users to to build algorithms or build/train their own completely new models.  For example, these algorithms can be re-configured by selecting the data in which to build & train the models, by changing parameters such as time-frame, sector and size of previous deals, and we can optimise the model to be used to value a specific private company.

Its cost-effective as our clients can do much of data processing/training on our platform, that normally they would do in-house hiring teams of analysts. Users have access to the platform throughout the year rather than a one-off PDF report as its currently done. Thereby, making our platform a fraction of the cost to what you'd pay today for same privileges.
What We Need & What You Get

The funding will pay for a roadshow to raise public funds on an equity fundraising platform. We are looking for backers to become stakeholders and strategic developers of our Minimum Viable Product to scale up.
Backers can become development partners and/or participate in the public funding round.

What makes us worth funding? Patent-pending technology and scalability. We are the first to provide real-time private company valuations in the U.K.. Our solution is faster (taking seconds to execute), cheaper (than running it in house or outsourcing one off valuation) and more accurate (we track the market and train the models to test accuracy).

Unlisted is a game changer for UK business - at present if you're an investor in private companies or an entrepreneur who has put time and effort into building up a business it's not easy to find a valuation. Until now it's been laborious, tedious, relying on multiple sources of information. The result has been a valuation that is out of date by the time it's calculated, often wildly inaccurate and jaw-droppingly expensive to produce. This is a staid and unresponsive industry that charges too much and offers too little, leaving stakeholders, and the economy in general, badly served.

Not any more -- Unlisted is the only utility that provides real-time valuations for private companies as and when they are needed. Our proprietary application allows investors, the source of key funding for many private companies, to measure as many businesses as they want against each other, helping identify those with the most potential. It even allows investors and companies to manipulate inputs so as to forecast a range of different valuations under many different scenarios.

What makes us different is that we are seeking to do this in real-time. Why is this important? Up until now the process of finding the value for a private company has literally taken weeks. Unlisted can turn this process into a job that takes seconds and allows investors to look up a much wider range of potential investments. This focus on increasing efficiency amongst the investment community will ultimately aid our economy in becoming more efficient.

For the entrepreneurs and business owners, Unlisted gives them greater visibility about the success of their efforts, can help them in their relations with financial institutions in terms of financial planning, and can help incentivise staff more productively.

We believe Unlisted is disruptive to a conservative and often captive market, is a force for good, and is progressive in supporting policies and aims which are accepted across the political spectrum, such as the democratisation of financial markets, the liberalisation and diversification of financial services, the encouragement of broader stake and share ownership across the population, and the encouragement of wider participation in the U.K. employment market.

We believe our product allows entrepreneurs easier and faster access to finance with better returns. At the same time our service offers the investment community, including pension funds and individual investors, the chance to diversify their holdings and the opportunity to achieve higher returns in a low yield environment.

Given easier access to finance, we feel that our engine will improve the quality of life for those individuals who seek to go out on their own and start businesses, and will boost social inclusion through rewards for a wider range of skills and labour. There is a risk that some jobs may be lost in larger traditional financial institutions as the efficiencies of our system become entrenched in those companies, however we believe that this will be more than offset by the new jobs created through economic efficiencies of the correct allocation of capital, which Unlisted will encourage.

Data availability: The company obtains data from private and public sources. In the former, contracts will be put in place between Unlisted and data vendors(Bloomberg, Equifax and London Stock Exchange) to ensure uninterrupted access. We will extract private company data from Companies House.

Litigation: The company is not engaged in any litigation. The company will continue engagement with the regulator to ensure all applicable regulations and compliance requirements are understood and met. We will work with FinTech Scotland and it's cohort of members to support the roll-out of our services. We make appropriate legal disclosures regarding liability and the reliance on the valuations. We have sought legal advice about using these datasets to produce private company valuations.
We would ask you to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

This campaign is your opportunity to bring TeamSpirit – and all the benefits of better team collaboration -- to the world. Be one of the first to receive your own TeamSpirit report, enjoy cool Perks, and take advantage of big savings on Teamability products and services! Many of the Perks can be delivered without delay – because they are based in Teamability, and are currently being delivered to TGI clients across the U.S., Canada, and overseas as well. ​

Teaming is a Life Force

The moment two or more people come together in pursuit of a common purpose, their mission becomes infused with an invisible, sustaining force that is ‘the team’ itself. When team members recognize the fundamental needs of the living entity that is their team, and begin to make harmonious team contributions to meet those needs, great things can – and do – happen.

Some people call this unifying force ‘team chemistry.’ Others call it ‘team spirit.’ Either way, it has always been considered as somewhat of a mystery that only appears in the presence of a great leader, or a special calling. But not anymore…

Teamability® Measures and Magnifies Teaming, With Many Benefits

“Teamability is an invaluable resource. The reports are especially helpful as we work to understand individual team members, and teams as a whole. We use Teamability to focus natural talents and Roles to achieve operational goals.”
          Jonathan Barnes, CEO, Staffing As A Mission

The founders of The Gabriel Institute devoted a quarter-century of research and tech development to understand and map the underlying dynamics of teaming. The result is Teamability, a completely new way to identify, develop, and guide people who seek to make meaningful team contributions.

Launched in 2012, Teamability is a fully functional ‘operating system’ of teaming. It is producing extraordinary results in organizations of all sizes and kinds:
• 30% new-hire turnover on new hires in a $350M company – completely eliminated
• severe collaboration issues resolved in a fast-growth health sciences company
• a derailed ‘lean manufacturing’ program put back on track, with huge success
• a woman with unrecognized potential, languishing as a low-level manager in a global HBA products company, promoted directly to Sales VP…and 5 years later, to COO

Now, consider what results like this would mean for church communities of all denominations. That’s what TeamSpirit – powered by Teamability – was meant to do!

TeamSpirit: Coming to You, and to Families and Ministries, Just Like Yours.

“Knowing how each person intrinsically seeks to team with others is invaluable in selecting, developing, managing and motivating people to reach new heights of team and ministry contribution.”
            Darryl King, Minister of Education &
column2:
Discipleship, Lake Norman Baptist Church

TeamSpirit came into being in 2016, thanks to the inspiration and dedicated work of Pastor Darryl King, of Lake Norman Baptist Church near Charlotte, NC. Pastor King is a longtime friend of TGI’s CEO, Dr. Janice Presser. While still studying at Gordon-Conwell Theological Seminary, he approached Dr. Presser with the idea of documenting the connections between Teamability’s ten modes of team service, and Ten Gifts of the Spirit.

The work began, the connections rapidly became clear, and TeamSpirit is now ready to go – except for one final task. The system that processes Teamability information must be overhauled so that it can produce more than one kind of reporting. This will be costly, and it will require us to meet and exceed our $110,000 crowdfunding goal.

Just as Teamability is bringing fragmented business teams together to create high performance, collaborative cultures, TeamSpirit will build upon spiritual gifts to inspire new levels of focus, fellowship, and evangelism, energizing the church’s mission and bringing younger generations back into the fold. Our technical experts are on stand-by, and the minute this crowdfunding campaign hits its target, system work can begin.

So please, take advantage of the Perks and Teamability offerings in this campaign. You’ll get the individual and team insights of Teamability now, AND (as soon as the new system is operational) your Teamability results can be regenerated in the form of new TeamSpirit reports.

Click here to read about the Origins of Teamability!

Physical Perks for Funding…

Spiritual Perks for Teaming…

All campaign participants will receive email updates, will have a permanent place on TGI’s ‘TeamSpirit Honor Roll,’ and may opt-in for special offers in the future. 

“People like best what they do best, and they do best what they like best.”                                                             Dr. Janice Presser, CEO, The Gabriel Institute

*Perks valued at $10 to $45 will be fulfilled 2-4 weeks after the conclusion of the campaign.*

**For all other perks, you will be contacted by email Monday-Friday between 9AM and 5PM with follow-up information. Pilots and bundles of Teamability reports can be delivered while this campaign is still underway. **

Bakary and Lamin are two young students in Gambia who are living in Kembujeh village.

They want to go to university to study in the autumn of 2022. Bakary wants to study computer science and Lamin wants to study nursing science.

To reach this goal they decided to build and start a poultry. They have succeeded to get a space to build the poultry-houses and also they have got a lot of help and coaching from a former businessowner of a poultry.  There is a restaurant and a supermarket interested in buying their products once their business is up and running.

They need your help to buy the material needed to construct the houses and to buy the first chickens and feed.  

The estimated cost for the construction of the two poultry houses is  1 450 euro / 1 770 dollar and to buy the chickens and the feed 2 100 euro / 2 565 dollar - in total 3 550 euro / 4 335 dollar.  This might seem to be a large amount but compared to what it would cost to build a similar business in Europe or in the U.S. the investment cost is very low.

If you would like more specific information of what needs to be bought and the exact costs of it please do not hesitate to send me an email. The budget is precise and clear and there is full transparency for everything that is bought.

In the coming weeks (and months) more photos and information will be shared on this page for you to take part in.

Do not hesitate to donate and help Bakary and Lamin to create their future in Gambia!  

Any amount small and big is welcome, together the raindrops create a creek that together with other creeks become a huge river.  Together we can help to create a better world!

The budget is precise and clear and there is full transparency for everything that is bought.In the coming weeks (and months) more photos and information will be shared on this page for you to take part in.Do not hesitate to donate and help Bakary and Lamin to create their future in Gambia!  Any amount small and big is welcome, together the raindrops create a creek that together with other creeks become a huge river.  Together we can help to create a better world!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

The purpose of this campaign is to raise money in order to participate in the Wokplace3.0 exhibition of Salone del Mobile Milano 2019 showing to the whole world our novel interactive collaboration furniture CORING, a furniture we believe that leads the evolution of business meetings!

We give a brave discount(over $2.000) to those people or companies who will also believe in our vision and they want to make a small investment guarding a reservation on this special discounted price and sending CORING to Milano next year! Please contact us for any further information...

CORING is designed for the business meetings among various clients, providing technological interaction with each other or among the employees of a company, in order to enhance their collaboration and productivity. It could be a very useful meeting tool for architects (who want - for their clients - to renovate/design the offices or working spaces of a company, as well), designers, creatives, artists, progressive presentations/evaluations, home appliances or cars industries, universities, hotels, hospitals, etc…!
CORING differs from any other touch-table, as it provides an innovative working space, that can be customized to meet the various needs of its users.

Business and social meeting trends have been continuously changing throughout the recent years and new standards for set-up and interior design aim at making meetings more casual and interactive. Dynamic collaboration spaces and workstations are usually provided by touch-screen tables, which are becoming increasingly popular nowadays.

CORING can be characterized as one of these, but it is not just another touch-screen table. It's a technology integrated furniture system with unique characteristics, like it's rotating round table top, a detachable standing support for up to 6 people, fully customizable device connectivity (DIY) and contemporary user-oriented aesthetics.
CORING combines superior elements and incorporates a unique and innovative design, creating a one-of-a-kind piece of furniture necessary in every modern business environment!
CORING family consists of 1(one) rotating touch-screen tabletop and 3(three) different leg variations. So, there are 3(three) product variations of CORING!
Apart from these, there are 4(four) colors available too!

CORING can accommodate up to 6 people with space for their personal items and/or beverages. Its rotating table system allows any of its users  to customize and use as his/her own personal computer “on-the-fly”. All of these 6 people can use the touch-screen table at a standing position, as long as the other can rest in a semi-standing relaxing position. This resting area can be easily removed in order for the table to be used in a different fashion.

In terms of PC system connectivity, CORING is very versatile, as long as the UI of the touch-screen system is ""plug and play"" and nearly every OS devise can connect and function with this. (only HDMI and USB ports are necessary!)

This characteristic allows many different users to convert their own devises easily into a large 43"" touch-screen computer, even during the same business meeting. It is also very easy for any technician (that usually mid or large sized companies have), to customize the table experience or fix any hardware problem that may occur.
screen_43"" 24/7 NEC MONITOR (external link press here)
touch_DISPLAX SKIN ULTRA (external link press here)
glass_CORNING GORILLA GLASS - 2 mm THICK (external link press here)
pc connectivity(HDMI+USB)_ANY DEVICE USING WINDOWS / ANDROID / LINUX / MAC OS X / CHROME OS

column2: >rotating touch-screen table allowing equal interaction for six(6) people​

column3: play with almost any device-PC even during the same meeting​

column2: >compatible with OBJECT RECOGNITION or pen or mouse/keyboard​
>CNC cut and handmade metal structure with easy on-site assembly​
>exceptional components for the touch system and cover top glass​
>detachable standing or sitting support following the overall design​
>uniquely designed interactive furniture with four(4) color options

column1: CORING is inspired, designed and produced by the Greek design studio ubisapdesign, a studio established in 2009 by civil engineer(with MSc in interactive products and systems design) Athanasios Kyratzis. The main activities of the office include residential and tourist's accommodation architecture, interior and product design. The holistic approach of design methods combined with the use of new technologies and materials consist follow up the principal philoshophy of the office.​

CORING - a.k.a. Collaboration Ring - is the first mid-sized furniture of ubisapdesign office. The main goal of this attempt was to create an exceptional expierence of business communication, providing functional versatility, technological potential and modern aesthetics in one piece of furniture - one that would enhance communication in every aspect through it's unique characteristics.

The team supporting this project consists of many professionals from different disciplines, such as structural and design engineers, HID and media engineers and last - but not least - experienced craftsmen. Every member of the team that has been involved in this unique product gave his best efforts and performance with accuracy, consistency and enthusiasm, in order to transform the initial design from idea to reality, taking into account every detail.

By making the prototype of CORING, we faced many difficulties and delays - but through this procedure we also managed to establish strong business relationships with our final suppliers. Thus, we are confident that our production line is set up! So, if nothing goes wrong beyond our responsibility, the production model will be as we expect in every aspect.

Despite being a quite new and small office, we  at ubisapdesign studio can assure the construction reliability and after-sales support for the CORING - and any other familiar to this - product. The triptych of our studio - reliable functional design - warranty a lifetime relationship with great potential.

We choose crowdfunding firstly as a good way to showcase our product to the whole world and secondly to raise money we need in order to get CORING exhibited at Salone del Mobile Milano/Workplace3.0 2019!

CORING is an office furniture and not a consumer product for everyone, but it is aimed at everyone, who works or has family/friends that work at a company/agency/office! These are the people who have the power to configure the working environment - this is the crowd we aim at for funding!

So, if you want to help us - apart from choosing one of our perks - this is how you can do it: spread the word! CORING is the core of meeting - it is the CO-ring(COmmunication, COllaboration, COnversation RING of meeting space), CORING is the new word for meeting!
Is this the final design of the product?

Yes!.. in terms of the external aesthetics, colors, dimensions and ergonomic characteristics. But the internal frame and cable arrangements will be redesigned depending on the feedback from the prototype making of.
You can find further information and contact options in our website https://www.coring.gr
Intentionally no! But it depends on your demand...

Warranty of CORING is ten(10) years limited for the frame(part replacement), 3(three) years for the NEC monitor and 2(two) years for the DISPLAX touch system and GORILLA table-top glass. Nevertheless, 24h-reply technical support is limitless, as the CORING team commits to provide the best possible support, regardless of any warranty limitations.
Is it available to be sold with a PC already installed?

CORING is actually a ""barebone"" technology integrated office furniture, as it comes calibrated ready and the only thing you need to do is to connect (HDMI+usb) any device you prefer, almost like plug&
column2: play! Nevertheless, we can pre-install any devise you want, but this will not make any major difference for you.

column1: What kind of PC can be successfully installed?

The redesigned cable arrangements allow CORING to be connected outside of the furniture with any Desktop tower / mini / HDMI Stick PC, as well as any notebook/laptop/tablet or any other device which supports HDMI connectivity with the monitor and has an import USB for the controller of touch system. This system works with MS Windows 8.1 or 10, Linux, Android, Mac OS X or Chrome OS.
What will you do if you succeed your funding goal?
If we raise more money from what we need, we will be able to exhibit in Salone del Mobile Milano/Workplace3.0 2019 and we will try to develop some extra features to our novel furniture CORING.
What will you do if you do not succeed your funding goal?

In this case, we will try to find the rest of the necessary funds from other investments. If this does not succeed either, we will RETURN all the funds and obviously CORING will not be presented at Salone del Mobile Milano/Workplace3.0 2019.
The prices are (Incoterms 2010) FOB. This means that you will have to pay at least for the transportation, import duties and taxes.
What are the package dimensions of one CORING product?
The dimensions will be 130X130X60 cm approximately and the package will be a wooden wheeled box.

Finally, we would like to thank all the people who selflessly helped us turn this project into reality: Nikos, Modestos, Pigi, Kostis, Sofia, Liliana, Alekos, Eleanna, Giannis, Dimitris, Aggeliki, Kalia, Viveta, ... and Wesley Krauss for his great music! Truly thank you again...

Welcome to the Hello Coding 3.0 - Anyone Can Learn to Code in 99 Days, the only course you need to learn programming. With over 50,000 reviews, our courses are some of the HIGHEST RATED courses online!

99 days, 1 hour per day, learn to build 1 project per day, this is how you master coding.

At 99+ hours, this masterclass is without a doubt the most comprehensive course available anywhere online. Even if you have zero programming experience, this course will take you from beginner to professional. Here's why:

The course is a taught by 5+ instructors with decades of programming experience.
 

We've taught over 800,000 students how to code and many have gone on to become professional developers or start their own tech startup.
 

You'll save $72,000, the average cost of 6 coding bootcamps. You'll learn completely online at your own pace. You'll get lifetime access to content that never expires.

The course has been updated to be 2021 ready. You'll learn the latest tools and technologies used at large companies such as Google, Facebook and Netflix.

We'll take you step-by-step through engaging video tutorials and teach you everything you need to know to succeed as a software developer.

The course includes over 99 hours of HD video tutorials and builds your programming knowledge while making real-world projects.

eDegree Overview  

Supercharge your career for the new decade!

In Level 1, learn the fundamentals of coding and computer science. No prior experience necessary! Learn how to code from scratch with the 3 fundamental languages every web developer needs to know. 

Learn the core fundamentals of web development and design. Code in the 3 fundamental languages HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Build your own landing pages, websites and web apps.

In Level 2, build web apps with React, Bootstrap, React Native, Vue, Node.js, Express, databases and more. Learn advanced JavaScript with hands on projects.

In Level 3, learn how to build apps quickly and effectively. You'll build apps for Android and iOS, including the iPhone, iMac, Apple Watch and Apple TV. Learn to code in Kotlin, XML and Swift. Build with Android Studio, Xcode and SwiftUI. Go all the way from building your first apps and games to implementing Core Data.

In Level 4, learn how to code in Python, the most hireable language of the year used by companies everywhere for web development, data science and more.

In Level 5, learn artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science from scratch. Use Google's TensorFlow library for data science projects. Build machine learning projects with TensorFlow Python and TensorFlow.js. Build mobile machine learning for apps with CoreML. Go all the way from beginner's linear regression to building your own neural networks from scratch and implementing object detection in the browser!

In Level 6, master coding interview question preparation. Learn algorithms and data structures. Practice the programming problems you'll be asked to solve at the software developer interview.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I obtain a certificate?

Each certificate in this bundle is only awarded after you have completed every lecture of the course.

Many of our students post their Mammoth Interactive certifications on LinkedIn. Not only that, but you will have projects to show employers on top of the certification.

Is this an eBook or videos?

The majority of this course bundle will be video tutorials (screencasts of practical coding projects step by step.) We will also  have several PDFs and all source code.

Can't I just learn via Google or YouTube?

This course is much more streamlined and efficient than learning via Google or YouTube. We have curated a massive 5-course curriculum to take you from absolute beginner to starting a high-paying career in AWS Machine Learning.

How will I practice to ensure I'm learning?

With each section there will be a project, so if you can build the project along with us you are succeeding. There is also a challenge at the end of each section that you can take on to add more features to the project and advance the project in your own time.

Read more FAQs in the FAQ tab.

About Mammoth Interactive

Mammoth Interactive's mission is to close the tech skills gap by providing affordable and accessible courses primarily targeting beginners. Our instructors make video tutorials that are practical and to the point. Learning at Mammoth Interactive will be the next step to improving your career and your life.

We are not laying anyone off during this recession. Because of this, we're offering so many benefits in this Kickstarter. We need a bit more funding to keep our operations running from home.

Trusted Company with 22 Kickstarter Campaigns

Unlock Your Completion Certificate

Upon completing any of our courses, you'll receive a Completion Certificate. You can feature this certificate in your portfolio and share on LinkedIn.

We have curated a massive 5-course curriculum to take you from absolute beginner to starting a high-paying career in AWS Machine Learning.How will I practice to ensure I'm learning?With each section there will be a project, so if you can build the project along with us you are succeeding. There is also a challenge at the end of each section that you can take on to add more features to the project and advance the project in your own time.Read more FAQs in the FAQ tab.About Mammoth InteractiveMammoth Interactive's mission is to close the tech skills gap by providing affordable and accessible courses primarily targeting beginners. Our instructors make video tutorials that are practical and to the point. Learning at Mammoth Interactive will be the next step to improving your career and your life.We are not laying anyone off during this recession. Because of this, we're offering so many benefits in this Kickstarter. We need a bit more funding to keep our operations running from home.Trusted Company with 22 Kickstarter CampaignsUnlock Your Completion CertificateUpon completing any of our courses, you'll receive a Completion Certificate. You can feature this certificate in your portfolio and share on LinkedIn. Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

column12: >in November 2018, nect WORLD’s founder, Misha, entered the café in the northern part of Kyiv, Ukraine. he was planning to have a glass of juice with some chips along working on some current business of his. he sat there for over twenty minutes until the waitress finally brought him the Wi-Fi password. success! not yet. It was a Friday evening, the café was overcrowded, and the Wi-Fi was not coping well with such responsibility. the sole goal he came there for, was unachievable in such conditions. he finished his juice, his chips and left the place with the idea in mind that later would become the nect MODEM.
column13: >after a brainstorming session with friends of his, Misha understood that this problem was more significant than he could ever anticipate. millions of people around the world were at risk of getting frozen screens during essential calls. they were at risk of going insane while looking at the loading screen using airport Wi-Fi. most tragically, they were risking their privacy whenever using public connections.
column14: >hundreds of days after, the nect MODEM was created, a little beast that equips your workstation with mobile secure high-speed Internet. It’s elegant - you stick it onto your laptop, and that little sexy modem gets you online fast while keeping your connection safe from intruders.

Overview
The Mobile Laptop Desk was created for hybrid work and work-from-home use, as well as for school. Making it easy to store and organize all your essentials. It is a laptop bag, stand, and organizer in one. Its unique patent-pending portability allows you to work where you want. Just unzip to start working.

 

For more than 60 years, Deflecto has helped make life more efficient at home, at work, and on the road. Innovation is at the core of our work, which is why we never stop looking for better ways to inspire, organize, and protect what is important. Deflecto's rich history of innovation continues today with the Mobile Laptop Desk.

Tired of taking our laptops in and out of our bag and ensuring we had all the needed tech accessories, we set out to find something better for hybrid work. After several sketches, fabric, and hot glue we developed our first Frankenstein-working sample. 

After refinement and further prototyping, we are pleased to offer the Mobile Laptop Desk directly to you via crowdfunding exclusively on Indiegogo.com.  

Consumer Tested
The Mobile Laptop Desk was consumer tested, receiving an 8+ out of 10 on all key attributes, with consumers calling it ""A Fresh and New Helpful Tool"" and ""A Carrying Case on Steroids!"".  Join the others who have funded the Mobile Laptop Desk.

Features Include

•    Large front pocket stores essential items like business cards, writing instruments, keys, and mobile phones.
•    Interior ergonomic adjustable stand allows for the perfect height of your laptop or ease of viewing for a tablet.
•    Slide-out mobile phone holder keeps your device at the ready. Easily attaches to left or right side.
•    Large interior pocket and elastic grid hold all your tech accessories and keeps them within reach. The large pocket can accommodate your letter-size journals and file folders as well.
•    Optional mouse tray attaches to either side for focused work.
•    Fold-out flaps hold additional essentials from cords to notepads to writing instruments.
•    Easily transition from tabletop to lap work.
•    Adjustable shoulder strap, sturdy carrying handles, and metal zippers.


 

Specifications

Designed to fit laptops with up to 15.4"" screens.

Exterior fabric 900D polyester
Weight = 0.76 lbs
Exterior Dimensions = 14” x 12.5” x 2.50” (W x H x D)
Laptop Compartment = 13 x 11 (WxH)

Social

LinkedIn: https://bit.ly/2Wrhoom

Facebook: https://bit.ly/2VfTM5i

Instagram: https://bit.ly/3BLGONy

Twitter: https://bit.ly/2VhA8pv

Bitmi I is a portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one.
It can be ready to print or ready to go in 5 minutes.

We want to ensure that everybody receives their pledge in time. After this, we will evaluate the campaign and see if it was a success. If at the end of the campaign there will be more requests, we will provide the InDemand option BUT the printers will be shipped starting December 2017.
Portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one
Affordable and easy to find spare parts

As tech enthusiasts, we love innovating things. Bitmi stands for Break It to Make It, as Ciprian, the founder of the company, was always disassembling all kind of devices with the purpose of rebuilding and making them better when he was younger.

3D printing technology changed many people’s lives and this is what happened to us too. When we began working on Bitmi I we considered the most important elements that define a 3D printer - portability, building area no matter the 3D printer size, mechanics, electronics and expansion.  When we put it all together, the result was something entirely new.
Because we want to create a prolific playground for actual and new generations in order to help them be better versions of who they are.

We thought a lot and we did multiple tests to design the final structure of Bitmi I. In order to create a great product that can also be portable, we decided to adopt the H-Bot system technology. Many of you know this system for its limitations. But we love challenges. So we found ways to transform them into advantages. We decided to assimilate this mechanism with words like Quality, Portability and Strength.

Bitmi I was engineered around a power structure that uses a 4mm thick high quality aluminium for the body. This is the perfect balance we have found between strength and lightness. Because of its final compactness, now you can enjoy 3D printing by taking your personal Bitmi I  at school, at your office or everywhere on your free time so you can express yourself better.

We also had to rethink an entire new system for the Z axes. One that can easily be removed and  assembled  by  everyone with the minimum of effort and amount of time. Our QuickZ System is the key for a portable 3D printer and we hope you'll love it as much as we do.  Let's see how easy the process can be.

The Hotend is one of the most important part in the process of 3D printing. With Bitmi I, you can achieve fast and qualitative prints with the original E3D V6 Full manufactured by E3D from United Kingdom. Immersed in our design, it's really doing its job. One of the best Hotend in the world is now also one of the most accessible component of our 3D printer. Why is this so important? It will give you a simple way to change different nozzle sizes when it's needed and enables fast access for a possible maintenance.

How did we solve the portability problem without damaging any part of the printer during transportation? From the beginning our desire was to engineer something that will fit in your backpack without affecting performance. So we created a light and simple system and the only thing you need to do is to lock it.

For the Z axis we have a simple system in order to secure everything for portability. This one and our design of spool holder are optional. Free files will be found to be downloaded from our website that is currently under construction.

Bitmi I wants to communicate with you. And the best way we have found to let it do this is through an integrated LCD and SD card controller. This will help you a lot when you don't have a PC, like when you are on the go but you still want to print. It comes with an 8GB Storage Memory card included so you can have more space for your ideas.

Your ideas are everything that matters when you use our 3D printer. The objects you are printing  deserve all the attention, that's why Bitmi I is equipped with smooth back lights for a greater experience.

As it is a portable 3D printer, we kept an eye on weight vs quality by choosing the right components. And the most important one is the frame. That's why we choose aluminium for the power structure and aluminium composite for the base. So Bitmi I weights under 5.5 Kg.

Bitmi I respects your intimacy. From the beginning we knew that for creating a friendly 3D printer we have to focus on signal rather than noise. Our extruder system is equipped with 2 fans. One is for cooling down the hotend assembly and the other one is taking care that your object looks nice. Our experiments show that our printer voice respects the sound level of an average normal conversation. And this without any shock absorbers or, special anti-vibration feet. You can place it straight on your desk.

All good until now an we hope you're already excited about this printer's features. BUT, when you want to make something great you know it's not only about design, lights and interaction. Performance is also a very important aspect. We challenged ourselves to create one of the greatest portable 3D printer that you can use as a desktop version without loosing any of the performance.

Whether it's a little project, a simple object or your next revolutionary idea, make it great. Bitmi I was built within this spirit. With amazing ideas. And we can't wait to see what you'll create with it.

Every component of Bitmi I is optimized for performance.  We know that time matters the most so let's start with this. Because it's a portable 3D printer that can also act as a desktop one, we had to think a way to pack it. This is where the QuickZ system comes in. In the video below, you'll see how you can go from backpack to a fully prepared 3D printer ready to be used. And all of this takes LESS THAN 5 MINUTES.

We're trying to pull this technology to the point where you can simply turn off the printer and take it outside like you do it with a laptop. The reverse process is not too different than the assembly one. If you don't have a filament inserted in the hotend and your printer is cold, again you're ready to go in LESS THAN 5 MINUTES.
It's known that the most used filaments for 3D printing in our days are PLA and ABS. Our preset values for PLA are 210/45 and for ABS 230/90.

Because Bitmi I is a portable 3D printer, we thought of a convenient temperature so you can safely place it in your backpack. And this value is 50 degrees Celsius. If you are under, you can safely start packing it.
Bitmi I: 3D printing timelapse - Benchy by Wayneuk
Bitmi I: 3D printing timelapse - Buddha by Geoffro
Bitmi I: 3D printing timelapse - Dragon by Loubie
We'll keep you posted. Subscribe to our youtube channel and give us a like on Facebook.

We are young and active enthusiasts who love technology. We worked on different projects that involved using 3D printing on the go. So we wanted to design a portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one. We looked at the market but we saw only Cubes. That's why we decided to take a different approach and create our own 3D printer. A portable one with the performance of a desktop machine that can be packed in a matter of minutes.
What surface for printing does Bitmi I uses?
Bitmi I is equipied with an MK3 heat bed that has a BuildTak sheet over it.
What materials and filaments can I use for printing?
You can use only 1.75mm standard filament. Due to original E3D V6 full you can print with alot of types of filaments like PLA, ABS, PET, Ninjaflex, Nylon, HIPS, Laywood, Flex PP, ASA and so on.

Yes, you always can print with multiple colours using the Change filament function. The only thing you need to do is to insert the filament into the bowden tube up to the sign and press resume. Bitmi I will do the rest.
It's a modified version of Marlin firmware.
What slicers can I use for preparing the STL files?
We recommend that you use Cura or Slic3r. You'll find our tested default settings for the machine and also three profile prints on our web page that is currently under construction.
You'll also find some prepared STL files on the SD Card so you can print as soon as you take it out of the box.
How can I interact with my 3D printer?
You can use the USB cable or upload models on the included 8GB SD Card.
What stage of production are we at?

Bitmi I is a fully working prototype stage. In order to refine the product, few small things will change  on hardware and also firmware until the shipping date. Hardware modifications will focus on making Bitmi I lighter than it's presented here.
Bitmi technologies is headquartered in Romania, Europe. Here is the place where your 3D printer will be crafted with a mix of custom and imported parts.
How I'm going to receive my perk?

We'll going to find the best way to deliver your perk. Shipping cost and other taxes and fees like VAT or federal taxes are not included. We'll going to do our best on packing it  so you will get your product safely at your door with no issues.
I'm a journalist and have questions. Who do I contact?
We're happy to hear this. It's our pleasure to offer more info about this project. You can contact us at bitmitechnologies@gmail.com.

You are the one that can help us with this project by backing us today and making it possible to start the production of Bitmi I. You can also help us by spreading and sharing this campaign to your friends via social media.
Ok ok...But what do I get from this?
• We're making our best so you can receive what we promise. A portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one.
• You'll receive our support in order to ensure technical or other types of issues.
• You'll receive the freedom of not carrying heavy boxes with you in order to take advantage of your 3D printer.
• If you are a maker, you can make changes so it can fit better for your needs. If not, you'll have a printer that you can count on.

We're starting from the ground. That's why we're on Indiegogo. The main reason we are focusing on selling the Bitmi I as a perk is that we need a proof that our concept has value. As you saw, we need 50.000$ in order to have a good start. With this funds we'll going to do three main things along with others:
• Hire 2 new young tech enthusiasts ( one programmer and one electronics engineer)
If we're not going to reach our fixed goal, don't worry.
You can preorder Bitmi I directly from our website.

,,People value your transparency''. This is what we've learned from Indiegogo. And this is what we believe in. We are not overpromising. That's why we choose to focus mainly on videos, timelaps and photos. We are new on the market and this Indiegogo campaign is our introduction. As we said before, we don't want to create something temporarily. Our vision as a company is to help people discover their best so they can create value through unicity.
Hardware startups are one of the toughest ones and there are many risks involved. But we are doing our best so you can receive what we have promised in this campaign.

Going from prototyping to series production is a huge difference. Our advantage is that we don't need injection molding fabrication in order to create custom parts. We use 3D printers to do this and we can always scale it up by adding new ones. The main power structure is created in Romania so we constantly can improve the quality of it. And if something goes wrong we can take action fast.

On the other hand, we import parts like electronics and motors. We're working for over one year with different suppliers abroad and if something goes wrong (shipment delay, bad manufacturing or broken parts during shipment) our production can be affected. During our collaboration we didn't have such problems. And if some are affected this will not be a problem because they are also available in Romania.
If you like our project, please share it with the world so everybody can hear about it. Subscribe to our Youtube channel and Like us on Facebook.
","Bitmi I is a portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one.
It can be ready to print or ready to go in 5 minutes.

We want to ensure that everybody receives their pledge in time. After this, we will evaluate the campaign and see if it was a success. If at the end of the campaign there will be more requests, we will provide the InDemand option BUT the printers will be shipped starting December 2017.
Portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one
Affordable and easy to find spare parts

As tech enthusiasts, we love innovating things. Bitmi stands for Break It to Make It, as Ciprian, the founder of the company, was always disassembling all kind of devices with the purpose of rebuilding and making them better when he was younger.

3D printing technology changed many people’s lives and this is what happened to us too. When we began working on Bitmi I we considered the most important elements that define a 3D printer - portability, building area no matter the 3D printer size, mechanics, electronics and expansion.  When we put it all together, the result was something entirely new.
Because we want to create a prolific playground for actual and new generations in order to help them be better versions of who they are.

We thought a lot and we did multiple tests to design the final structure of Bitmi I. In order to create a great product that can also be portable, we decided to adopt the H-Bot system technology. Many of you know this system for its limitations. But we love challenges. So we found ways to transform them into advantages. We decided to assimilate this mechanism with words like Quality, Portability and Strength.

Bitmi I was engineered around a power structure that uses a 4mm thick high quality aluminium for the body. This is the perfect balance we have found between strength and lightness. Because of its final compactness, now you can enjoy 3D printing by taking your personal Bitmi I  at school, at your office or everywhere on your free time so you can express yourself better.

We also had to rethink an entire new system for the Z axes. One that can easily be removed and  assembled  by  everyone with the minimum of effort and amount of time. Our QuickZ System is the key for a portable 3D printer and we hope you'll love it as much as we do.  Let's see how easy the process can be.
Only two screws apart from it...

The Hotend is one of the most important part in the process of 3D printing. With Bitmi I, you can achieve fast and qualitative prints with the original E3D V6 Full manufactured by E3D from United Kingdom. Immersed in our design, it's really doing its job. One of the best Hotend in the world is now also one of the most accessible component of our 3D printer. Why is this so important? It will give you a simple way to change different nozzle sizes when it's needed and enables fast access for a possible maintenance.

How did we solve the portability problem without damaging any part of the printer during transportation? From the beginning our desire was to engineer something that will fit in your backpack without affecting performance. So we created a light and simple system and the only thing you need to do is to lock it.

For the Z axis we have a simple system in order to secure everything for portability. This one and our design of spool holder are optional. Free files will be found to be downloaded from our website that is currently under construction.

Bitmi I wants to communicate with you. And the best way we have found to let it do this is through an integrated LCD and SD card controller. This will help you a lot when you don't have a PC, like when you are on the go but you still want to print. It comes with an 8GB Storage Memory card included so you can have more space for your ideas.

Your ideas are everything that matters when you use our 3D printer. The objects you are printing  deserve all the attention, that's why Bitmi I is equipped with smooth back lights for a greater experience.

As it is a portable 3D printer, we kept an eye on weight vs quality by choosing the right components. And the most important one is the frame. That's why we choose aluminium for the power structure and aluminium composite for the base. So Bitmi I weights under 5.5 Kg.

Bitmi I respects your intimacy. From the beginning we knew that for creating a friendly 3D printer we have to focus on signal rather than noise. Our extruder system is equipped with 2 fans. One is for cooling down the hotend assembly and the other one is taking care that your object looks nice. Our experiments show that our printer voice respects the sound level of an average normal conversation. And this without any shock absorbers or, special anti-vibration feet. You can place it straight on your desk.

All good until now an we hope you're already excited about this printer's features. BUT, when you want to make something great you know it's not only about design, lights and interaction. Performance is also a very important aspect. We challenged ourselves to create one of the greatest portable 3D printer that you can use as a desktop version without loosing any of the performance.

Whether it's a little project, a simple object or your next revolutionary idea, make it great. Bitmi I was built within this spirit. With amazing ideas. And we can't wait to see what you'll create with it.
From Backpack to printing and reverse...

Every component of Bitmi I is optimized for performance.  We know that time matters the most so let's start with this. Because it's a portable 3D printer that can also act as a desktop one, we had to think a way to pack it. This is where the QuickZ system comes in. In the video below, you'll see how you can go from backpack to a fully prepared 3D printer ready to be used. And all of this takes LESS THAN 5 MINUTES.

We're trying to pull this technology to the point where you can simply turn off the printer and take it outside like you do it with a laptop. The reverse process is not too different than the assembly one. If you don't have a filament inserted in the hotend and your printer is cold, again you're ready to go in LESS THAN 5 MINUTES.
It's known that the most used filaments for 3D printing in our days are PLA and ABS. Our preset values for PLA are 210/45 and for ABS 230/90.

Because Bitmi I is a portable 3D printer, we thought of a convenient temperature so you can safely place it in your backpack. And this value is 50 degrees Celsius. If you are under, you can safely start packing it.
Adalinda: The Singing Serpent by Loubie
Bitmi I: 3D printing timelapse - Benchy by Wayneuk
Bitmi I: 3D printing timelapse - Buddha by Geoffro
Bitmi I: 3D printing timelapse - Dragon by Loubie
We'll keep you posted. Subscribe to our youtube channel and give us a like on Facebook.

We are young and active enthusiasts who love technology. We worked on different projects that involved using 3D printing on the go. So we wanted to design a portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one. We looked at the market but we saw only Cubes. That's why we decided to take a different approach and create our own 3D printer. A portable one with the performance of a desktop machine that can be packed in a matter of minutes.
What surface for printing does Bitmi I uses?
Bitmi I is equipied with an MK3 heat bed that has a BuildTak sheet over it.
What materials and filaments can I use for printing?
You can use only 1.75mm standard filament. Due to original E3D V6 full you can print with alot of types of filaments like PLA, ABS, PET, Ninjaflex, Nylon, HIPS, Laywood, Flex PP, ASA and so on.

Yes, you always can print with multiple colours using the Change filament function. The only thing you need to do is to insert the filament into the bowden tube up to the sign and press resume. Bitmi I will do the rest.
What firmware does Bitmi I uses?
It's a modified version of Marlin firmware.
What slicers can I use for preparing the STL files?
We recommend that you use Cura or Slic3r. You'll find our tested default settings for the machine and also three profile prints on our web page that is currently under construction.
You'll also find some prepared STL files on the SD Card so you can print as soon as you take it out of the box.
How can I interact with my 3D printer?
You can use the USB cable or upload models on the included 8GB SD Card.
What stage of production are we at?

Bitmi I is a fully working prototype stage. In order to refine the product, few small things will change  on hardware and also firmware until the shipping date. Hardware modifications will focus on making Bitmi I lighter than it's presented here.
Bitmi technologies is headquartered in Romania, Europe. Here is the place where your 3D printer will be crafted with a mix of custom and imported parts.
How I'm going to receive my perk?

We'll going to find the best way to deliver your perk. Shipping cost and other taxes and fees like VAT or federal taxes are not included. We'll going to do our best on packing it  so you will get your product safely at your door with no issues.
I'm a journalist and have questions. Who do I contact?
We're happy to hear this. It's our pleasure to offer more info about this project. You can contact us at bitmitechnologies@gmail.com.
What We Need & What You Get

You are the one that can help us with this project by backing us today and making it possible to start the production of Bitmi I. You can also help us by spreading and sharing this campaign to your friends via social media.
Ok ok...But what do I get from this?
We're making our best so you can receive what we promise. A portable 3D printer with the performance of a desktop one.
You'll receive our support in order to ensure technical or other types of issues.
You'll receive the freedom of not carrying heavy boxes with you in order to take advantage of your 3D printer.
If you are a maker, you can make changes so it can fit better for your needs. If not, you'll have a printer that you can count on.

We're starting from the ground. That's why we're on Indiegogo. The main reason we are focusing on selling the Bitmi I as a perk is that we need a proof that our concept has value. As you saw, we need 50.000$ in order to have a good start. With this funds we'll going to do three main things along with others:
Hire 2 new young tech enthusiasts ( one programmer and one electronics engineer)
If we're not going to reach our fixed goal, don't worry.
You can preorder Bitmi I directly from our website.

,,People value your transparency''. This is what we've learned from Indiegogo. And this is what we believe in. We are not overpromising. That's why we choose to focus mainly on videos, timelaps and photos. We are new on the market and this Indiegogo campaign is our introduction. As we said before, we don't want to create something temporarily. Our vision as a company is to help people discover their best so they can create value through unicity.
Hardware startups are one of the toughest ones and there are many risks involved. But we are doing our best so you can receive what we have promised in this campaign.

Going from prototyping to series production is a huge difference. Our advantage is that we don't need injection molding fabrication in order to create custom parts. We use 3D printers to do this and we can always scale it up by adding new ones. The main power structure is created in Romania so we constantly can improve the quality of it. And if something goes wrong we can take action fast.

On the other hand, we import parts like electronics and motors. We're working for over one year with different suppliers abroad and if something goes wrong (shipment delay, bad manufacturing or broken parts during shipment) our production can be affected. During our collaboration we didn't have such problems. And if some are affected this will not be a problem because they are also available in Romania.
If you like our project, please share it with the world so everybody can hear about it. Subscribe to our Youtube channel and Like us on Facebook.

My name is Dr. Henry Bell, a Chiropractic Physician for the past 23 years.  My prior work endeavors consisted of teaching, pharmaceutical sales and management. My entire life, I always sought out ways to help other people, always striving to improve peoples lives. So therefore, continuing in that direction, I brought a team together that would help bring to you... to the world... the Roc-A-Vee. The first patented stroller/swing combination that utilizes smart technology.

Our campaign is designed to make comforting and soothing a new born child up to a 45 pound toddler easier by bringing the stroller and the swing industry into the 21st century. Our goal is to re-invent the industry so that no mother, father, care giver or grandparent has to experience any sort of discomfort in lifting or carrying their precious loved one. It will also no longer be necessary to place your infant carrier on the floor, the ground, bench or in a chair which addresses sanitary issues typically found in most public facilities.

This is ""Big"" because on April 19, 2016 I was awarded the first United States Utility Patent for a ""Baby Carrier Swing  Conversion Support Device"" that operates with Smart Technology and is also equipped with Blue Tooth and Camera capability.

Now, most people build a prototype first and then say they are patent pending.  I conceived the Roc-A-Vee in my mind and saw it working there first.  Here is where you have major input on this evolutionary product.  We need you to join the movement and become part of our community by bringing the Roc-A-Vee to life and to the world. Understand, the Roc-A-Vee is not just another stroller or swing, it is a totally new concept that has the ability to create a totally new category in the baby industry.

We need you to become a part of the Roc-A-Vee movement.  We need to raise $200,000.00 to build a working prototype that will include all the necessary applications to allow the Roc-A-Vee to swing, monitor your child, stream video with two way Audio Playback (Ability to play audio files)  Monitor and Motor control for swinging using Android and Apple App Development with WiFi and or Bluetooth communication of your favorite tunes to your child.  We have partnered with a Global Manufacturing Company which has the ability to produce products in the United States and in China providing the skill sets that allow them to be certified in micro and high precision manufacturing which includes aerospace. We have also partnered with an Engineering and Development Company in Maryland who was also certified in aerospace capabilities. They are the company that produced this 3D CAD design. All you need is a swipe of a finger to control the multiple functions of the Roc-A-Vee.  All of this will be produced within the standards of ASMT International who's strict standards for infant swings and baby carriages and strollers must be adhered to.

After development, the unit will be independently tested again to ensure maximum child safety and performance. Feasibility studies have been performed showing that the Roc-A-Vee can be mass produced once final testing is completed. This will confirm proof of concept. Upon completion of the prototype, the Roc-A-Vee will be presented as a finished product to larger established companies in the stroller and swing industry. This will be performed to see if interests exist in partnering with our company. During that same period of time, our manufacturer, will go into limited production of the Roc-A-Vee. Once produced
column2: direct to the consumer internet sales along with retail distribution will be established. This strategy is designed to introduce our patented technology to the industry as an entry level player with hopes of aggressively grabbing more market share.

column1: Contingency plans for proceeding forward should our team not reach our initial financial goal
column2: will consist of reducing the number of initial units produced and focusing on greater internet presence and sales. This will be accomplished with the assistance our Global Marketing partner who already has extensive contacts around the world. This should help substantially lower overhead based upon reducing the profit entity that an outside manufacturer would insist upon leveraging on this venture. The passion behind bringing the Roc-A-Vee to life is so intense it has consumed most waking hours since being awarded the Utility Patent. This Patent now protects how the unit works thus protecting its design for the next 15 years.

column1: Your impact, by funding this campaign, will fundamentally transform the baby stroller and swing industry bringing it into the 21st century with the use of smart technology. The Roc-A-Vee will stroll, swing, capture images, musically sooth a fussy child while simplifying how parents and care givers interact with their children.

We know the project is valuable to us and to you including those around the world because it changes the industry as we currently know it. You are no longer bound to a specific manufacturer's accessories.  You maintain control as it should be, defining the preferences that best suits your child's needs.  This gives you the ability to decrease the overall cost while multiplying the ""must have"" features no other stroller or swing manufacturer currently has
column2: that is providing multi functionality, reduced weight, compact design, and portability. The Roc-A-Vee is and will be a universal fit to most households.

column1: Team ""Roc-A-Vee"" already has ideas for next generation units that will allow the Roc-A-Vee to excel in market share for generations to come. This due to its projected appeal in various settings such as malls, restaurants, day care centers, sporting events and or any other outdoor or indoor activity where a light weight, portable stroller/swing device is desired.

Any time a new product is brought to market there are always inherent risks. No one can truly predict the future, however if you follow the trends, you can agree that a product that is multi purposed and reduces it's foot print should have the ability to establish itself within the market. It will be necessary to stay ahead of the curve and anticipate the next change in the industry.

Needless to say, one trend will never change, the need to transport newborns and children safely.  The innate desire and need for nurturing children has always been accomplished by rocking as noted in famous nursery rhymes and children's fairy tales. This then becomes the working model for not just doing it safely but comfortably and enjoyably for the child and all others involved. As long as there are children there will be children who love to swing and the Roc-A-Vee makes it obtainable in a compact and user friendly package with multiple functions that will make the rest of the industry stand up and take notice.

It would be phenomenal for everyone who sees the potential in the Roc-A-Vee to contribute financially however, sometimes larger sums may not be an option. Remember, every contribution large or small helps bring the Roc-A-Vee closer to you. Therefore, as you look at our designs and an idea should enter your mind no matter how insignificant you may think it may be, feel free to email us at hjgumpteam@roc-a-vee.com. Now join the Roc-A-Vee community by engaging in the Movement of the Stroller/Swing Revolution.  Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools as you spread the word.

column2: >Thank you for your support in bringing the Roc-A-Vee to the World. With every pledge we are closer to reaching our goal of transforming the stroller and swing industry.

Welcome to The Jumper App.

We Have Always Believed That Roadside Assistance Has Always Been Pretty Laggy, Long Wait Times, Or You just Simply Dont Know Which Company To Call... Also, Asking a Random Stranger For Help Never Really Works Out Unless Your Some Super Hot Chick. So What Else Is Out There???  

I Mean I Guess You Could just Leave Your Car And Hope For The Best. Or You Could Download The Jumper App And Get Help Right Away. We Make yours options a bit more simple , just go with the more optimum service !
column4: >
column6: >Welcome  To The Jumper App founded By  Monjae Brown ,  Previously a freelance  Graphic Designer From Seattle, WA, And Co founded  By Juelette Stephenson a experienced family friendly barista ! together we Are seasoned visionaries with a history  of success ventures together!
column8:
> “We’ve  Always Had The Dream, We've All Had It. Having Started Your Own successful Company , Resulting in a low risk lifestyle for your Beautiful child, its a no Brainer.. But The Jumper App Was never completely about Us, Its About The People. Its about creating job opportunities as well as simple and efficient roadside assistance, For not only the consumer market but For Businesses as well!” everyone else who exists and drives a vehicle. New Or Old. And There are qualified individuals all around us in every community. And now we’re hiring them, For you!!

 

 

Think of it as ""Uber"" For Roadside Assistance Without The triple AAA Membership. You simply Open Your Jumper App on Your Mobile Device And Book Your On demand jump start, Lockout service, towing , spare tire replacement or even junk car removal. Remember this is On Demand Roadside Assistance, The Second That consumers book a service, it will notify a Jumper Driver in the area who fits the job criteria. Back on the road in less than 20 minutes.
 


 

 

Both consumer and employee apps communicate with each other which makes life easy. This can be a Part time, full time or just a side gig for jumper drivers But in a world full of jumpers your never alone.

 

We are training high potential candidates and will provide them with the necessary equipment to keep everyone safe. Our company compared to competitors seems completely optimum, that’s because it is! We are promising Lower service costs, faster arrival time , and competitive service level agreement. Our app is  efficient and very simple to use for even those who aren’t tech savvy

 

.

We Are Creating a community based business, people helping people , if you subtract The Jumper App from existence people would see that! The Jumper App has helped me understand if your business is built off of “you"" and not for the greater good, then it wont be great or good lol.

We’re Raising money to fill these much needed potholes also to complete our product to launch and operate officially. Donations will Go To, Equipment, advertising, payroll Backing Etc

Welcome to jumper app and thank you for your support. Lets share this vision together. Be apart of the process and Stay up to date on business progress we’re proud to have supporters like you.
