Schedule Your Demo Today !Our Jumper App & Jumper Driver Fleet App Are Now Avaliable in the Apple Store. We Are Creating a community based business, people helping people , if you subtract The Jumper App from existence people would see that! The Jumper App has helped me understand if your business is built off of “you"" and not for the greater good, then it wont be great or good lol.We’re Raising money to fill these much needed potholes also to complete our product to launch and operate officially. Donations will Go To, Equipment, advertising, payroll Backing EtcWelcome to jumper app and thank you for your support. Lets share this vision together. Be apart of the process and Stay up to date on business progress we’re proud to have supporters like you.“The Jumper App” Team Players :CoFounder: Juelette StephensonPartner:  Ernest AllenPartner: Jian Pena",12.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column7:
>What is monday. entrepreneur’s notebook?

monday. entrepreneur’s notebook. is a premium quality paper notebook created  for entrepreneurs. It has a special structure which helps to keep notes organized and accessible. The notebook motivates and encourages you to write in it. It’s a perfect tool for dreaming, planning and thinking on paper which will help your great business ideas and plans make their first step into becoming a reality.

column5: />

column1: monday. entrepreneur’s notebook. is built by a bookbinding company, which combines craft tradition with modern technologies.

column2:
>

Take a look inside.
column3:
>Months of work, dozens of options resulted in the design, which is perfect for entrepreneurs. As you can see, the notebook has a certain structure but gives an entrepreneur a lot of freedom and doesn’t put strict frames.



Imagine that you are holding your monday. entrepreneur’s notebook. and browse through its pages.

column6: source=webclient"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

column3: >How does the structure of monday. entrepreneur’s notebook. fit entrepreneurs’ needs?

column1: Do you know why many people love driving, doing extreme sports? One of the reasons is the necessity of staying very concentrated. The process is consuming all your attention, you should be right here, right now! The world doesn't change during these moments and it's still full of interruption, but your perception does.

Pen and paper have similar power and effect. When your business idea is only in your head there are hundreds of other thoughts which may interfere with it. But when you are writing the idea down, all your attention gets automatically focused on it.

Writing down helps you to concentrate on one single thought, idea, plan. Each thought or project needs some proper space to be written on - that is why a concept 1 page = 1 piece of content was developed.
<h4>Why do I need a special notebook for my business ideas <span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)

It is important to have a tool where your business plans, ideas and thoughts are not mixed with grocery shopping lists, travelling plans, etc. You use this notebook only for your business projects. monday. entrepreneur's notebook. was created especially for people who identify themselves with entrepreneurial world, it also has a special structure which is helpful for entrepreneurs but doesn't put any strict frames.
What is the story behind the name?

I've always honestly loved Mondays. It belongs to people who are passionate about what they are doing - a new week, a new start, new power for your projects. I heard a saying “Entrepreneurs love Mondays” and I couldn't put it better. Sometimes it might be tough but when you are making your dreams come true, Monday becomes a very good day.

column3: >What kind of paper do you use?

column1: Agenda Creme Satine is French, high performance, offset writing paper in warm chamois colour. It is  glazed and wood-free paper, which has been developed especially for the production of notebooks and albums. This paper is very smooth and silky. It is produced without the use of elementary chlorine (ECF) and meets the ISO 9706 standard requirements as regards durability (long lasting paper). It's used for any application where acid free paper is required.
How can I get more than 20 notebooks?
Please, write me an email on nadia@lovemonday.biz and I will be happy to help.
When will I get my monday. entrepreneur’s notebook?

After the crowd funding campaign has run we will start production process. It should take up to 2 months. Then we will pack the notebooks and send them to you. If any unexpected challenges come up during production you will be informed about it and the time when they will be fixed. Our goal is to deliver the product as soon as possiible.

First there were Websites,

then there were Apps….

Now, there are BOTs.

“…The growing frustration with today’s mobile apps mirrors the irritation caused by Windows application proliferation a decade or more ago. The hassle of managing multiple Windows applications took its toll then — just as the mobile app explosion is doing now.” — FORTUNE Magazine.

About What?

All experts in the world have declared that BOTs will replace apps. The reason some of the tech elite (Facebook, Microsoft, Apple, and Google) are banking that a new generation of chat bots will supplant mobile apps.

So the BOT RUSH has started and a big market awaits it. We are early to enter this market.

Like how every business that had a website made a Mobile app. Now everyone who has a Mobile app will need to develop a BOT.

Still it has not become main stream, but there are already 100,000 bots developed in the past 7 months. Its just the tip of the ice berg. These numbers will explode any moment!

What We Made?

We develop ready-made software / Mobile apps, which businesses Pay and download online.

Now we have developed a ready-made BOT product. Using this any business can instantly deploy an intelligent BOT for any business.

Who are we?
 

The Xtalin Ltd. has been founded in March of 2010. The main profiles of the company are electrical engineering design and consulting. We have been involved in dozens of development projects in the past years. As the employees of the Xtalin Ltd. we have helped out our clients when they were struggling with general hardware problems, reliability, EMC problems, etc. We have learned a lot and became self-confident in HW-development.
column15: padding-left:10px
column35:
>Ratherboard:

Ratherboard is a industrial grade motherboard for the Raspberry Pi, but it isn’t only a Raspberry motherboard. It is also the box, the connectors, and the printed circuit board (PCB) with many useful features. To summarize these:
column36: >■ The box is IP67 grade, which means, that is has complete protection against contact with solid particles (dust-tight), and ingress of water in harmful quantity is not possible when enclosure is immersed in water up to 1m.
column37: >■ A full connector set contains 4 pieces of 12-pole connectors, 50 pieces of contacts, 50 pieces of sealing plugs, a standard 5.5/2.1 mm power supply connector, cable for providing supply voltage.
column38: >■ The PCB has 4 layers and appropriate ground planes, which facilitate excellent EMC behaviour. We have also paid close attention to ESD protection while designing the product, therefore components dedicated for this purpose can be found at all the right places.
column39: >■ One of its main comfort functions is that the RB generates the 5V supply voltage for the RPI, and 3.3V for other electronics which makes the integration of the components very easy.
column40: >■ The standard 40-pin Raspberry connector is compatible with the Raspberry Pi 3 and the Raspberry Pi 2 devices. (Their main features are the easy-to-use operating systems, handling of an SD-card and any computer-peripherals.)
column41: >■ One major advantage of the RB is that it can be modularly expanded with the help of the extension boards as the used sensor inputs and output actuators require. By using either the existing extension boards or developing your own, you will be able to create a unique product in a faster and cheaper way. This is ideal for hobby-users and Sw-developer companies.
column42: >■ A built-in U-Blox GPS module enables the RB to be used in positioning and in anti-theft applications.
column43: >■ Six current-limited (protected) outputs are controlled by an I2C (TWI) interface port expander IC, and their hardware switches off automatically if the load exceeds 2.2 Amps. This protects the hardware in any unwanted situation.
column44: >■ A built-in I2C light sensor detects box-opening or sabotage, which can be logged or used to generate an alarm signal.
column53:
/>

Just assemble your well-known Raspberry or a brand-new RB Embedded module with a Ratherboard, connect a 12V (7-17V) power supply, and you will be capable to achieve everything your processor enables.
column89:
>EXTENSION BOARD 1

The E1 extension board is an interconnection card, which contains built-in series input resistors, and ESD diodes. The user has the possibility to use pull-up or pull down resistors on these 12 specific inputs. We also provided a really cool, small-outline-18 breakout possibility, which will enable you to use a wide variety of integrated circuits in the prototyping area.
column115:
>EXTENSION BOARD 2

The E2 extension board incorporates 5 optocoupler inputs, and 5 optocoupler-outputs, which will be able protect the RPI mini-computer’s inputs in the most cases. E2 has huge prototyping area to create your own innovations!
column141:
>EXTENSION BOARD 3

The E3 extension board contains an eight-channel analog-to-digital converter, two pieces of single-channel digital-to-analog converters, and eighteen rail-to-rail operational amplifiers with user-configurable amplification, and a prototyping area.
column164:
>Ratherboard Embedded:

Ratherboard Embedded is a small and strong embedded control device for the Ratherboard, which can be used not only with the motherboard, but also by itself, since it is a complete device with a lot of functions. We summarize these:
column165: >■ Small design that means the board is only 85mmx56mm.
column166: >■ The system’s core is the STM32F765ZI high-performance microcontroller with 216 MHz maximum frequency, 2Mbyte Flash and 512Kbyte RAM.
column167: >■ The RB Embedded generates the 3.3V supply voltage from 4-17V, which can be supplied from the 40-pin connector or from the micro USB connector.
column169: >■ A built-in low energy Bluetooth module from ST. The connection with other devices is very easy with SPBTLE-RF module.
column170: >■ The 40-pin Ratherboard compatible connector includes two SPI, I2C, UART, two CAN buses and a lot of GPIOs. This can communicate with and control other devices or modules.
column171: >■ A built-in Wi-Fi module from ST. The SPWF04SA is a ready-to-use module for IoT applications. This means, the module has a complete protocol package including application and security layers.
column172: >■ USB A and micro USB AB connectors with ESD and EMI protection. If you want to use the USB connections, you have to supply 5 Volts to the appropriate pin on the 40-pin connector.
column174: >■ There is a JTAG connector for microcontroller programing and software debugging.
column181: >Embedded board's Top side :
column188:
>Embedded board's Bottom side:


 

We have thoroughly tested our prototypes for three months and now we are ready to bring Ratherboard Embedded to you.

Developing software for the board is very easy with STM32CubeMX – a free, graphical software configuration tool by ST that greatly simplifies the process of configuring the microcontroller and generating initialization C code. We will provide a sample configuration file with all the pins already set up for you!
column203:
>Ratherboard Battery Management System:

Ratherboard BMS is a professional battery management system, which monitors and protects the battery. We offer a complete hardware and software solution that can measure the cell voltage and temperature, and control contactors. The Ratherboard BMS’s core features are the following:
column204: >■ It’s a complete software and hardware solution.
column205: >■ The BMS can work with 2.5 – 4.3V cells, for example any cell with Lithium-based chemistry.
column206: >■ The system’s core is a STM32 microcontroller,which can be re-programmed via CAN-bus by our CAN bootloader.
column209: '>■ One single module can measure 18 cell voltages and 6 temperature values.
column210: >■ The measured values are transmitted over CAN bus.
column211: >■ Ratherboard BMS modules can be connected in series, the maximum nominal system voltage is 600V.
column212: >■ The cell balancing current is 120-140 mA.
column213: >■ The BMS can control contactors and verify their state.
column214: >■ The box is IP67 grade. (Width: 160mm, Height: 215mm + cables, Depth: 55mm)
column215: >■ A full connector set contains 4 pieces of 12-pole connectors, 50 pieces of contacts, 50 pieces of sealing plugs.

This can communicate with and control other devices or modules.■ A built-in Wi-Fi module from ST. The SPWF04SA is a ready-to-use module for IoT applications. This means, the module has a complete protocol package including application and security layers.■ USB A and micro USB AB connectors with ESD and EMI protection. If you want to use the USB connections, you have to supply 5 Volts to the appropriate pin on the 40-pin connector.■ A built-in SD card slot.■ There is a JTAG connector for microcontroller programing and software debugging. Embedded board's Top side :Embedded board's Bottom side: We have thoroughly tested our prototypes for three months and now we are ready to bring Ratherboard Embedded to you.Developing software for the board is very easy with STM32CubeMX – a free, graphical software configuration tool by ST that greatly simplifies the process of configuring the microcontroller and generating initialization C code. We will provide a sample configuration file with all the pins already set up for you!Ratherboard BMSRatherboard Battery Management System:Ratherboard BMS is a professional battery management system, which monitors and protects the battery. We offer a complete hardware and software solution that can measure the cell voltage and temperature, and control contactors. The Ratherboard BMS’s core features are the following:■ It’s a complete software and hardware solution.■ The BMS can work with 2.5 – 4.3V cells, for example any cell with Lithium-based chemistry.■ The system’s core is a STM32 microcontroller,which can be re-programmed via CAN-bus by our CAN bootloader.■ One single module can measure 18 cell voltages and 6 temperature values.■ The measured values are transmitted over CAN bus.■ Ratherboard BMS modules can be connected in series, the maximum nominal system voltage is 600V.■ The cell balancing current is 120-140 mA.■ The BMS can control contactors and verify their state.■ The box is IP67 grade. (Width: 160mm, Height: 215mm + cables, Depth: 55mm)■ A full connector set contains 4 pieces of 12-pole connectors, 50 pieces of contacts, 50 pieces of sealing plugs.Perks

Build your business through good acquisitions, or sell your business for what it is really worth. Our Deal Engine is the toolkit you need.

At first, with a wave of company owners approaching retirement age, we thought we'd buy some businesses. We wanted deals fair to both sides so we could grow those businesses. Sometimes we stumbled upon owners who weren't ready to sell yet, but needed advisory services to start positioning for their exit.

We built a proprietary toolkit for this. Gurus and brokers often use just one or two methods to decide how much a business is worth, and that won't always fit. Our Deal Engine crunches the numbers through 8 valuation methods and makes it obvious where the genuine value is.
We also analyze different deal structures, check for affordability, calculate growth projections, and consider how extra cash could be generated quickly.
Why Are We Making It Available to the Market?

We shouldn't keep this to ourselves. We should make Pinnacle Deal Engine available for people the pandemic has pushed toward an earlier exit than planned, and for people who have the ability and desire to keep businesses going after the founders step out.

To open up our Deal Engine to you, it needs to become software hosted online, accessed through a web browser, with login security so each account can only see information about the businesses it is analyzing. We've written the detailed software specification, put out Requests for Proposals, and received bids.
Up to now we have funded everything ourselves. We are only asking you to help us fund software coding for Version 1.

Because we can see what you're likely to need next and we don't want you to have to wait any longer than necessary. We've worked with funding sources to prototype the ability to generate projections that funding sources like to see when you ask them to fund a deal. If you help us with coding of Version 1 now, while Version 1 is being built we'll pour our resources into specifications to add that feature ASAP.
What will you get in return for helping us accelerate development this way?
• You will remain entitled to that pricing as long as you want to continue with our Deal Engine, until you cancel or let your subscription expire.
• If you choose a professional subscription, when we roll out Version 2, at no extra charge you will get access to the new feature that helps you approach funding sources to fund deals.
If we don't achieve our fundraising goal here, the funder-satisfying projections will simply take longer to specify, design, develop and release.
The impact of our Deal Engine goes beyond the sale price of a business. It can provide key insights that enable a deal to go ahead.
As an example, one of us was selling a business in the USA.  A prospective buyer had been found and negotiations were close to final.

As a sanity check, we hired an expert with a good reputation and local market knowledge to value the business. He charged $2500. He ran just two valuation methods. His two figures understated the value of the company, overlooking significant elements of value. Our Deal Engine produced far more accurate valuation, close to what the buyer was really considering (which means our valuation, not the consultant's, was what the market thought of the company).
Going with the expert's figures would have left a third to half of the company's value unrealized.
On top of that, Pinnacle Deal Engine's analysis revealed that the deal structure the buyer proposed would collapse after about two years.
• For us, this meant if we seller-financed any of the deal, we wouldn't be fully paid.
• For her, with plans to integrate our business into her holdings, that collapse would endanger everything she owned.
Using our what-if tools, we were able to suggest safer ways to structure the deal so all of us would thrive.
How You Can Use the Deal Engine

If you are building up your business holdings by acquiring companies, Pinnacle Deal Engine provides the tools you need to assess and act upon opportunities better, faster and with less personal effort. It shows which opportunities are worth pursuing, shows you what they are worth and helps you devise the right deal structure to offer.

If you are examining multiple opportunities, you can fill in summary values from the financials to get quick valuations and only bother to fill in more detailed data for the opportunities that are in the valuation range you are targeting. This boosts your productivity and effectiveness.

If you are a business owner preparing to exit, Pinnacle Deal Engine shows how potential buyers will value your business. It lets you evaluate offers you receive so you know whether the deal will be sustainable (and able to pay you any deferred portions of the purchase price) or unsustainable (and likely to leave you not completely paid or even having to take over the business again in a damaged condition). At any level of service above the lowest, it shows where cash can be generated quickly, either to boost the business for you right now or for a buyer later. Subscriptions include growth generation projections, and lower levels of service can get that as an add-on.

What is this worth? More than just money. We can't guarantee deals will be successful, but our Deal Engine tilts the odds toward success while reducing the effort needed to make deals turn out as well as possible.
What Skills Do You Need to Use This?
You don't need to be an accountant or financial services professional to use our Deal Engine. You only need an understanding of how to use standard financial reports such as Profit &
column2: Loss and Balance Sheet in order to fill in the data that drives Deal Engine. As a business person, you know that information.

column1: We have chosen our development vendor. We have worked alongside them on a mission critical project for another company, so we know how they operate. They meet our quality standards, which are based on our deep IT experience (including NASA and complex mission critical systems). We have no concern about the caliber of the software.
The main risk in our implementation is possible schedule slippage. The implementation company has adapted for the pandemic, which reduces the chance of slippage, and their delivery record is strong.
We anticipate making valuation capabilities available about 4 months into implementation and the complete feature set within two months after that. We will do all we can to move those dates forward.

If you choose a funding level that entitles you to a one year professional subscription, the clock on your subscription will start when we release the full feature set. However, we will let you in as early as possible. You will be able to run valuations as soon as that feature is ready, and your subscription will treat the weeks between then and release of the remaining features like a free extension of your subscription. As we said earlier, for renewals or further purchases you will continue to get the deep discounts of the perks in this campaign until you cancel or allow your account to expire.
You may not need our Deal Engine yourself. In these times, chances are that you know someone who does. We've set up the perks to suit a range.

column2: Pop business preparing to exit and just needing to run their business through it? They can get help from the Deal Engine at a fraction of what they would pay elsewhere.

column1: • Do you know a business broker handling multiple businesses for sale every month? We have perks designed for them too.
• Do you know someone in a situation between those two ends of the scale? We have perks for them too.
Please let them know. (Indiegogo's sharing tools make that easy.) The help they need is around the corner.

social system where people can interactive immediately.

Nixpod is a product from Tecbasics Inc., a tech startup based in Toronto, Canada, founded by Sonny Bombhore. Nixpod is the first unit of the series that we call Linux Unit of Computing. Our goal is to build Linux powered Nixpod devices in various form factors and for specific applications. We embarked on this project in response to growing needs of smaller, but powerful computing devices for fast growing needs of Internet of Things (IoT.)

Nixpod, in it's maiden release is a versatile and a portable Linux PC that can be used not just as a  productivity workstation, but also to serve other functionalities such as home networking, gaming, media and file sharing. Nixpod also serves as a Linux Server for developers to build and test their application locally. The device delivers a rich 4K display for viewing or building rich media applications. We built Nixpod in such a way that there simply isn't another ready and ""out of the box"" Linux PC that will readily plug-in and be operational upon startup!

Nixpod is built with a powerful Single Board Computer (SBC) hardware with ARM Cortex A53 high efficiency 64 bit processor, 2GB RAM with 4K UHD video support along with an expansion board to accommodate an mSATA SSD drive for space and speed. Nixpod can be configured with your choice of supported Linux Operating System.

We have successfully prototyped a fully functional device (see image gallery below) and tested with the hardware, software and other networking parameters. We are currently using it as a in-house development server for our application development and a secondary linux desktop using Debian 9 distribution of Linux. The device does everything that is supposed to do flawlessly.

We need funding in the amount of USD 105,000 to build the initial set of production devices and launch it commercially. This estimate includes production, initial launching and marketing costs. We are offering you a fully functional commercially packed device upon launch at various levels of rewards depending upon your pledge.

The Internet of Things is growing fast fueling the growth of Digital Smart Homes, and there is a greater demand for smaller and powerful devices to design and build applications as well as manage networking and other devices.  Our aim is to build a series of Nixpod devices that will power these IoT gadgets and manage them on the network. Your contribution helps us produce this device, followed by other devices and make them available for the users in a very cost effective way.

All models are shipped with full list of accessories that includes cables, connectors and an expanded USB hub with SD card connectors just so you don’t have to run to the nearest store looking for a missing cable or connector! Our aim is to deliver a powerful and versatile linux computing device with everything that you will need to get started with your next Home Networking or Development project.

Nixpods are built and tested right here in Toronto. Once we receive the funding we will immediately go ahead and get started with the case manufacturing and importing the materials for final assembly. We will also order the packaging for the product rollout. We plan to host a launch event in June 2018 and invite various groups of people including home users, college students specializing in IT and Computers, DIY enthusiasts and some businesses. Shortly after the launch we will start to ship the final product to all those that subscribed and paid for this product on Kickstarter.

The risks and challenges associated with this project are no more than those with any startup project. Specifically, our major challenge is the quality and pricing of the components that we use. Fortunately, for us, we found suppliers from China, whose products have been very well received and reviewed in the United States and Canada. As regards the main hardware board we use the well known Raspberry Pi board that has been well received and tested. The other challenge is the protection of the case design from being stolen and duplicated. To mitigate this risk we decided to keep the case manufacturing locally within Canada under a legally binding NDA. We will also be completing a Trade Mark application with Canada and the United States to protect the design of the case and the device in the next few months.

We realize that not everyone is able to pledge support financially at reward levels. You can contribute as little as $1, and it will make a difference. And, if you are unable to make any financial contribution that's OK too. We would very much appreciate it if you will spread the word or tell your friends and family about this campaign by using the Indigogo share tools.

Do you have trouble in storing large amounts of data and files?

Do you have difficulty in choosing among the many mobile hard disk cases in market?

Do you have slow data transfer speed issue of old hard drives?

Don't worry, EasySSD is your best choice!

EasySSD is small and exquisite, with fast data transfer speed, easy changeable SSD, and fast heat dissipation, which will bring you extremely convenient experience.

 

 

Tool-free Installation: With innovative sliding cover design &
column2:
built-in magnet, you don't need to use any tools, plug and play  your mobile SSD.

Fast Heat Dissipation: Full CNC aluminum alloy casing with dense small holes bring good ventilation and a better cooling function. No power consumption. No noise.

Fast Transmission：Support 10Gbps data transfer rate by using RTL9210 chip and with USB3.1 Gen2 USB-C port.

Lightweight &
column4:
width is 125mm * 30mm. Small, lightweight, portable and durable, without taking up space.

Wide Compatibility: Supports Android/Windows/Linux/Mac and other systems

LED Light Indicator: The blue light is signal for hard drive working.

Aluminum Case: Made by premium aluminum alloy,  slim design, durable and solid.

High Quality Master Chip：Advanced RTL9210 chip greatly ensures data steady and speedy transfer, maximizes the performance of any PCIe NVMe SSD. 

 

 

 

 

The EasySSD case is designed as a sliding cover, making the installation of SSD easy and simple. The built-in magnet makes the cover firm and secure. You can install and replace SSD without any tools. Easy to install, easy to setup and easy to use.
column10:
id=18UObkvFuaQEvcYgtvRC5oXlcMTg05xXz"" data-was-processed=""true"" src=""""/>

 

According to the following 3 steps, you can easily install or replace the SSD. No matter where you are, or any kinds of use cases, EasySSD is just flexible supported your data usage.
column12:
showinfo=0"">

 

EasySSD uses the most advanced aluminum housing with dense small holes,  ensure the proper temperature for longer service life and durability. These enhanced heat dissipation design helps to rapidly cool down internal NVMe SSD, and to make sure your precious data is safe while the drive runs at maximum speed. 

 

EasySSD supports Windows/Linux/Mac/Android and other systems. The USB-C port is USB 3.1 Gen2 (10Gbps) and backwards compatible. Especially suitable for creators, designers, photographers, and other people who need to store a large volume of data with instant speed requests.

 

EasySSD is high-speed SSD case. It can support 10Gbps transfer rate with the original USB-C to USB-C cable theoretically by using RTL9210 chip and with latest USB3.1 Gen2 Type-C port. 

With gigabytes read and write speed, all your data is transferred in lightning speed. (Based on internal testing, performance may be lower or higher depending on drive capacity, host device, OS and application.）

 

 

 

EasySSD comes in a portable stick form that is easy to carry around.  Weighing 79.5g, its perfect as an everyday carry item. 

The length is 125mm and the width is 30mm. It is so small, light, portable and durable that you can carry to outside or workplace without taking up space.

 

LED light indicator inside the case is the most accurate signal for hard drive working. Designed with a soft LED light, it will monitor working status of SSD anytime. With the blue light is on, the power in, and the blue light flashes when the data transferring.

 

 

EasySSD M.2 NVME SSD Case only for NVMe M-Key M.2 SSD (PCIE-based), applicable to sizes 2230 / 2242 / 2260 / 2280 solid state drivers. [Please note: It doesn't support SATA M.2 SSD，feel free to check with us if you are not sure]

 

 

You may ever meet cable clutter, need many wires to link your different devices, and they are messy around on your desk. Many cables are twisted into a ball and take up a lot of space in your bag.

Imaginably, it's too messy and horrible. Now EasySSD is packed with EasyCable for you.

EasyCable liberates you from clutter and streamlines your data connection by just one 4-in-1 multi-function cable.

 

With EasyCable, you only need one cable to run everything, fast data transfer across devices, or fast charging your phone or laptop.

 

 

 

 

We estimate start shipping in February 2021, and it will be shipped in batches.

The shipping fee is excluded in Perks. Each express delivery would be about USD13. The specific freight rate will be adjusted according to the latest situation at that time.

column1: Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:
• Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
• Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.
Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?
Break it down for folks in more detail:
• Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
• Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
• Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:
• Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
• Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
• Make it real for people and build trust.
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.
• Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
• Describe your plan for solving these challenges.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Any farmer or manufacturer can sell on Megafresh!

Megafresh provides another avenue for farmers and manufacturers to sell their products all over the country with no restrictions. To sell post your product just like you would post on instagram or twitter and send your product to our fulfillment centers and we do the rest. Your post is immediately live. A status symbol on the post tells shoppers if the product has arrived at our warehouse and is available for delivery. If the product has not yet arrived at our fulfillment center buyers can ""pre-order"" the product and wait till it arrives, however to protect the buyer no money is sent to the seller until the product is received at the warehouse. If the product is not received at our warehouse by the date indicated by the seller on the listing the sale is automatically cancelled and money refunded to the buyer.
Farmers and manufacturers can now sell direct to consumers with ease and without the need to handle fulfillment. We do that for you!

Each fulfillment center will service a given area. For example the Los Angeles fulfillment center will service the southern half of California from Bakersfield to San Diego and the San Francisco center will service the northern half of California from Fresno to the northern border. If a seller wants to sell only to southern California they will send their product only to the Los Angeles fulfillment center. If they want to sell to the whole state they must send their products to both warehouses. Fulfillment centers will be rolled out to all major cities across the country.
Just sides-swipe the image for more details, images and videos.
One of the tabs on the above screen also allows you to create your own shopping and wish lists.
The above screen allows buyers to select which click and collect pod they want their order delivered to and when. Orders can be delivered on the same day in most cases except for more remote areas.
Click and collect pods will be located within easy walking distance in most areas.
The above screen allows buyers and sellers to keep track of all activities including what was purchased, when it was purchased, who from and for how much. Any item can be easily deleted too.
MegaFresh - Is also an elegant solution to a ugly problem
MegaFresh reduces food waste by allowing grocery shoppers and farmers to bypass the supermarket system and deal direct.

About 40% of the food grown is wasted, this is due to large retailers not being willing to purchase the produce for a variety of reasons including specifications not being met. This does NOT mean that the produce is bad, it simply means that the orange may not be orange enough or the grape is a bit too small and the banana not curved at the right angle etc. In these cases farmers simply leave the produce on the tree to rot because it costs money to harvest it. And there is no point is paying harvesters if they don't have anywhere else to sell it. On the other hand produce is often left to rot because retailers offer to pay them less than it cost to grow and harvest. And if they did harvest it for the retailers they would be losing money.
Megafresh is designed to reduce this waste and save farmers by giving them another avenue to sell their produce direct to consumers .
The MegaFresh Platform is Made Up of:
• A mobile app and website that is an e-commerce platform and integrated social network centered around food and groceries (think Twitter/Amazon/instagram)
• A nationwide network of fulfillment warehouses located in major cities and
• A network of hundreds of fully automated parcel click-and-collect pods located within easy reach of residential areas.

The Plan

This crowdfunding campaign will fund the establishment of our first fulfillment center to be located in Los Angeles. Any seller from around the country or abroad will be able to send their product to this or any future warehouse to be sold.

Over the next 12 months we will be establishing the following number of fulfillment centers in each country.

Each of these fulfillment centers will be strategically located to enable us to deliver to every part of each country. So, if you live in any of these countries you will be able to use our service and more importantly you will be able to redeem your reward. 

What You Get

For supporting this project you will be given discount vouchers that can save you thousands of dollars on groceries.

NOTE TO SELLERS: Sellers can use the discount vouchers to receive equivalent discounts on advertising on the platform. This could turn a small farm into a household name.

NOTE TO ALL BACKERS: In order to claim the bonus referral reward, backers must be logged into their Indiegogo account and use the share tools provided by Indiegogo so we can track referrals and contributions.

The Impact

Your contribution will create a real food democracy, help farmers and food producers and reduce food waste on a large scale:
• Eliminate thousands of tons of food waste
• Help thousands of farmers nationwide sell their products direct to consumers
• For the first time ever give consumers the option to purchase based on nutritional quality instead of just weight.
• Connect consumers with the people that grow and make the food they eat.

About Me

I currently operate a successful cold pressed juice company in Australia called Feast Cold Pressed and am familiar with the wholesale food industry and how manufacturers, farmers and wholesalers operate. My business qualifications include a master degree in Entrepreneurship and Innovation and in a previous life I taught entrepreneurship and innovation for almost 6 years to undergraduate and postgraduate students at the Australian Graduate School of Entrepreneurship, Swinburne University, Melbourne.

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one). Make it real for people and build trust. Risks & Challenges People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal. Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles. Describe your plan for solving these challenges. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help: Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools! And that's all there is to it.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

What is EVE ?

it's the first Application that is totally dedicated to women employment , through eve all companies can publish job ads and hire women and all women can apply and build up career

 

why women need eve ?

2,7 billion woman don't have the same choice of jobs as men

104 economies still have laws preventing women from working in specific jobs

75% of women that face workplace harassment and discrimination against females avoids reporting or even complaining due to the fear of getting fired and losing their jobs

that's why we decided to create EVE a Application that presents huge job opportunities to women around the world with the right suitable jobs and career paths to reach the goal of gender equality in the market and the working field to make employing based on qualification and talent no gender 

 

 

Why did we choose crowdfunding ?

We explored different financing methods and options, like the banks and the investors who are concerned about women rights but those methods didn't go with our idea of building up an platform to assist women and upgrade their value in the job market from women, by women, through women, for women.

 

How will we spend the funding?

Building up the application and the website, building an advertisement and marketing net , outbreaking and spreading them as wide as possible , allowing us to reach millions of women.

 

 

 

 

 

support EVE startup for the job market equality .

 

 

we are grateful for all your support .

column2: >Early version of this construction system was developed by Ken Isaac in the late 1940s. He used 2x2 lumber and three dimentional joints to create living structures. He called this construction system - Matrix and later publish a book How to Build Your Own Living Structures. After this book a group of artists, designers and builders continued to work on developing this construction system. They upgraded and standardized it, made it fully modular. Three of them later summarized their work in a book How to Build with Grid Beam: A Fast, Easy and Affordable System for Constructing Almost Anything. And I`ve learned about Grid Beam from Kevin Kelly Cool Tools blog (which is also awesome, you should check it out).
>(this is a prototype. backers will receive v1.0 with more features listed below)

column1: • works with lumber or aluminum square tube
• X form factor compensates material size variations and small curvature that off the shelf lumber often has
• suitable for beams from 20mm up to 50mm (from 3/4 to 2 inches) of any length
• drilling pattern set by gcode file (you can generate your own patterns)

column2: >Things I will upgrade in v1.0 before shipping it to backers:

column1: • whole length (drilling near the ends of the lumber)
• better dust collecton (it is almost dustless with current dust collection design, but I want to make usability a bit easier)

column2: >You will be able to mockup designs from grid beam. Share your designs and explore what other people have designed. Get best spliting setup for a project to minimize leftovers. Generate custom gcode files. Find or become a local manufacturer. Every backer who has bought an original BeamCNC will automatically get an autorisation code for becoming a local manufacturer. It`s up to you to decide whether to use BeamCNC for yourself or introduce yourself as a local manufacturer.

>While web is under development I`m starting a Facebook page for people to share thier ideas. And you can download a template file for mockups in Fusion 360 (copy-paste beams of needed length for your design. By default they are hidden, so you can`t see them on preview)
>Quick camera mount on any grid beam surface. Or even whole camera arm.

>Linear actuators and CNC are one of the interesting cases. You can set hole sizes to fit linear rails and with a couple of brackets make low-precision CNC setups. Also, if you glue up grid beams at bottom and cover holes on one side you can get a nice vacuum table.
>Workbench, clamping table, sanding/vacuum table (as described in previous example).

>BeamCNC Plasma (with plasma torch and horizontal axis instead of router). On the photo below is LifeTrac project by OpenSourceEcology and rough sketch of the design. If you are particularly interested in this version, please fill up this form. Coming soon.

>Fastbeam variation. You can drill one side with a smaller drill bit and then thread it. I guess it will be one of the fastest construction systems that way. Video about how strong are threads in wood. And DIY wooden thread taps from Matthias Wandel.
>You can use BeamCNC with forstner bit or use a template for forstner bit afterwards.
>
>All design files will be released after campaign ends. If you are particularly interested in this, please fill up this form.

>We see how digital fabrication tools affects production of the goods. We can spot a pattern. Broadly available materials + Broadly available tools + Open source designs + Web service for finding local manufacturers.

>For example: Plywood + CNC router + Open sourсe designs + Web-service to find local manufacturer (like https://www.opendesk.cc/) = awesome plywood furniture and projects produced locally. 3d printing filament + 3d printer + https://www.thingiverse.com/ + https://www.3dhubs.com/ = all kinds of 3d printed projects nearby.

>BeamCNC can create another one of such distributed systems. Square lumber / tubes of different sizes + BeamCNC + Open source designs + Web-service for finding local manufacturers = all kinds of Grid Beam constructions and projects for makers and local communities.
>Hackaday, Core77, Maker Update, Wevolver, TrendHunter

column1: Early version of this construction system was developed by Ken Isaac in the late 1940s. He used 2x2 lumber and three dimentional joints to create living structures. He called this construction system - Matrix and later publish a book How to Build Your Own Living Structures. After this book a group of artists, designers and builders continued to work on developing this construction system. They upgraded and standardized it, made it fully modular. Three of them later summarized their work in a book How to Build with Grid Beam: A Fast, Easy and Affordable System for Constructing Almost Anything. And I`ve learned about Grid Beam from Kevin Kelly Cool Tools blog (which is also awesome, you should check it out).
(this is a prototype. backers will receive v1.0 with more features listed below)
works with lumber or aluminum square tube
X form factor compensates material size variations and small curvature that off the shelf lumber often has
suitable for beams from 20mm up to 50mm (from 3/4 to 2 inches) of any length
drilling pattern set by gcode file (you can generate your own patterns)
Things I will upgrade in v1.0 before shipping it to backers:
whole length (drilling near the ends of the lumber)
better dust collecton (it is almost dustless with current dust collection design, but I want to make usability a bit easier)

You will be able to mockup designs from grid beam. Share your designs and explore what other people have designed. Get best spliting setup for a project to minimize leftovers. Generate custom gcode files. Find or become a local manufacturer. Every backer who has bought an original BeamCNC will automatically get an autorisation code for becoming a local manufacturer. It`s up to you to decide whether to use BeamCNC for yourself or introduce yourself as a local manufacturer.

While web is under development I`m starting a Facebook page for people to share thier ideas. And you can download a template file for mockups in Fusion 360 (copy-paste beams of needed length for your design. By default they are hidden, so you can`t see them on preview)
Quick camera mount on any grid beam surface. Or even whole camera arm.

Linear actuators and CNC are one of the interesting cases. You can set hole sizes to fit linear rails and with a couple of brackets make low-precision CNC setups. Also, if you glue up grid beams at bottom and cover holes on one side you can get a nice vacuum table.
Workbench, clamping table, sanding/vacuum table (as described in previous example).

BeamCNC Plasma (with plasma torch and horizontal axis instead of router). On the photo below is LifeTrac project by OpenSourceEcology and rough sketch of the design. If you are particularly interested in this version, please fill up this form. Coming soon.

Fastbeam variation. You can drill one side with a smaller drill bit and then thread it. I guess it will be one of the fastest construction systems that way. Video about how strong are threads in wood. And DIY wooden thread taps from Matthias Wandel.
You can use BeamCNC with forstner bit or use a template for forstner bit afterwards.
All design files will be released after campaign ends. If you are particularly interested in this, please fill up this form.

We see how digital fabrication tools affects production of the goods. We can spot a pattern. Broadly available materials + Broadly available tools + Open source designs + Web service for finding local manufacturers.

For example: Plywood + CNC router + Open sourсe designs + Web-service to find local manufacturer (like https://www.opendesk.cc/) = awesome plywood furniture and projects produced locally. 3d printing filament + 3d printer + https://www.thingiverse.com/ + https://www.3dhubs.com/ = all kinds of 3d printed projects nearby.

BeamCNC can create another one of such distributed systems. Square lumber / tubes of different sizes + BeamCNC + Open source designs + Web-service for finding local manufacturers = all kinds of Grid Beam constructions and projects for makers and local communities.
Hackaday, Core77, Maker Update, Wevolver, TrendHunter",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

Each of you is special and unique. Like your selfies!! So get this special space and simply perfect place specialized for selfies.
In 2013 ""Selfie"" was selected by Oxford Dictionaries as the Word of the Year.
In 2017 a study by Now Sourcing and Frames Direct revealed the average millennial is expected to take more than 25,000 selfies in their lifetime.
But First, Let Me Take A Selfie!""
No surprise that we see selfies almost all around and as the best way to show or to be seen.
So to say that selfies changed the way we see, capture, and share our living moments is to say the true. Actually most are even living for those moments.

We know - behind 1 successful selfie there may be 99 failed and deleted ones. That is why we are here to care about your every selfie. That is why ""Elate With Your Selfie"" is the SelfieElate slogan.

Yes, Selfie Spreading Space. This is how we describe SelfieElate in short. Simply because SelfieElate strives to become the world’s way to get and use such space specialised for selfie generation: selfie enthusiasts and influencers. (And - with all those special Features as well as solid Benefits of our point & reward system.)
Help us to help you to have it all!
You time, your energy, your efforts you put in every successful selfie don’t have to be wasted and your selfies left unseen or simply lost in that fast flow with the rest of different photos there.
Get the mobile app dedicated for selfie addicted ones! (As well as so perfect & exclusive perks.)

As you see, only 1,000 units will be made from this Collection Edition.And yes - you would find out the design of the T-shirt only after receiving and opening the parcel.'Cause all you could choose is only its size and model (we have the model for men and for women). Or it would be better to say - for #sefieKing and #sefieQueen Take your chance to find out will the received T-shirt be black or white, and what exact crown will adorned the symbol.
At the same time this crowdfunding campaign is your rare opportunity to choose and get other special perks we have for our contributors.Take a look and choose at least one or even few!

Even if you simply like to scroll and slide selfies taken and shared by others, with the SelfieElate app you will get a way to do that so conveniently. And if you are a selfie enthusiast, SelfieElate sounds as a right extra place to share it (globally or locally). While for opinion leaders (even for micro-influencers) this selfie spreading space gonna give an extra instrument and tool in their race for power as well as efficiency. You are also welcome to contribute even if that would be your act of kindness!

The SelfieElate team strives to bring you benefits you deserve. Of course, if you too do belong to the selfie generation. Because and as mentioned above: the SelfieElate project with its features and benefits may take all us to the next level of how your every selfie taken to share has to be treated and handled. (At least here - at SelfieElate.)
Help us to do our best for your best!!
Amount(s) We Need To Make Things Happen And Done
All that depends on the amount raised during and after the campaign.
Actually we could keep on making even with $5,700 This would let us to launch the SelfieElate app with its basic elements and functions. (But just as so called Cross-platform Mobile App).
While with $57,000 USD we would be able to do that on another level - with so called Native Mobile App. (For both operating systems: Android and Apple iOS).
Where The Funds Go (After Succeeding With This Campaign)
We prefer to add more value and to do so faster.
With 5,700 USD (or more) we will finalise & launch it as a cross-platform mobile app.
With 15,700 USD (or more) we will also undergo its testing [Alpha and Beta testing] and will improve its stability.
With 25,700 USD (or more) we will also implement the next extra features and will get going with the SelfieElate community growth.
With 35,700 USD (or more) we will also move on with UI [User Interface] and UX [User Experience].
With 45,700 USD (or more) we will also go with generating the SelfieElate user base growth.
With 57,000 USD (or more) we will accomplish all that but already having it as a native mobile app [exclusively for Android and iOS].
You see clearly the impact your contribution could make. And you feel the potential of this project.

That some kind of community SelfieElate has at Instagram.com/SelfieElate_repost already helped to gain in popularity. (Yes, we do repost there some selected selfies and do so twice a day. People just love it!) At the same time it shows how important and useful is to have extra spots to spread selfies.
How Much Are You Ready To Contribute?
Every buck counts. Same as every your contribution. So simply choose to do so on any level. Thanks.
And choose not to loose this chance!!

column7:
>Fidgeting is great! Focusing is even better!

Team Squidget thinks it is not how you fidget, rather how you focus that matters.

Just asks the head of the Neuro-Surgical Residency program at one of the most prestigious research universities in the world.

​""Brilliant"" was how described our design. He is an invaluable member of our research and product development team and is Chairman of our Board of Advisers.  He sees very clear benefits to the Squidget..

That's why we are asking for your support to go into full production.  

We are not a ""KPNAC""....we are a real company with sixteen professional partners with over  400 years of professional experience.

We have an experienced manufacturing partner and will employ individuals at a sheltered workshop, all dedicated to our Vision - namely helping millions of individuals improve their lives with Squidget.

Everyone fidgets - hair twirling, pencil rolling or pen clicking - we all do something to stay focused, but sometimes fidgeting can draw negative attention. 

We waited to introduce the Squidget because we had to get it right, the first time!

Our nine years of research shows that each year 2 million student learning years are irrecoverably lost to disruptive and potentially self-harming fidgeting.

Years before the 'bros' claimed to have invented something, we had already filed our patent for this 'brilliant design' that was tested worldwide and proven to work!

They just felt they could get away with this but they were very WRONG!  

Ask the Better Business Bureau where they already have massive numbers of unresolved complaints for not delivering at all and product breaking.

We have helped dozens of their customers who either paid and sadly never even got their product, or exposed their children to great risk because the copycat cube broke almost immediately.
column12: >Who loves Squidget and Why?
column13:
>

Current medical and therapeutic clinical research concludes that fidgeting is a beneficial and effective way for individuals to self-calm, stay centered and Focus to  begin and complete tasks.

Squidget uniquely transforms normal fidgeting into exceptional productivity.  

Principals, Teachers, Special Education Experts, Autism &
column14: ADHD Advocates, Parents worldwide have participated in our research and more than validated value and benefits their students experience with their Squidget.
column15: ><span style=""font-size: 36px

column1: Squidget is a small, handheld device that currently contains seven options that replicate the most common fidgeting habits, designed to enable almost noiseless fidgeting.
Squidget offers many options in just one solution.
Each option on Squidget fulfills a specific fidget need, all in one patented device:
Provides an exact replica of the top of a pen to allow the Squidgeter to enjoy all of the tactile satisfaction of pressing a pen-top repeatedly without making the annoying clicking noise.
Allows Squidgeters to twirl Squidget's button with greater twirling movement than a regular button for a more substantial tactile satisfaction and this button won't ever fall off!
Provides a safe and satisfying alternative for those who twirl their hair, most times unconsciously but can lead to serious health issues such as Trichotillomania.

Allows Squidgeters to roll a pencil surface without distracting other students around them. These children need the tactile satisfaction, namely vibration, from rolling their pencil on a desk. Our option gives them even more satisfaction while both allowing them to work with their pencil and not distract or disrupt others in their class.  Teachers LOVE this option both for the child and their 'connection' with the child - meaning more collaborative rather than adversarial.
Presents a smooth, curved interrupted surface of five 'bubbles' that  allows individuals to rub their fingers across it without creating callouses.

Users can dig their nails into the deep grooves on the periphery of the surface, rather than their own skin, thus gaining the necessary tactile satisfaction without the risk of harming themselves from other forms of 'deep nail pressure satisfaction'.

Presents a lightweight tab Squidgeters can flick, spin or grasp to spin the entire Squidget to help calm, center, and focus to complete tasks. Numerous adults have told us they never get on a conference call without picking up their Squidget so they can pay closer attention to the call.
With seven unique options, Squidget promotes greater focus, unleashes immense creativity all the while enhancing calmness.
It also allows children to reclaim their self-dignity and confidence that might have been lost due to constant reprimands for doing exactly what they MUST do to succeed.

We have already teamed up ICSN, Inc.
To produce our Squidgets using a state of the art injection molding process so we can deliver to each of you this unique, innovative new product that will be
• Help millions start to reclaim their lives

JERRY SNEE, Jr.
CEO / Chairman and Chief Squidgeter

Jerry received his Bachelor of Arts in Psychology from the College of the Holy Cross and has spent over four decades in sales, management, organizational development, marketing and training. During this period, he has launched numerous innovative products and two previous successful start-ups.

Naomi earned both a BA in English and her Master’s in Education from Clark University. She is an accomplished teacher and designs distinctive jewelry.  Naomi designed her first Squidget for her best friend – using her gift of observation of fidgeting mannerisms to design effective mechanical alternatives, namely options on Squidget.

Suzanne received her BA from the College of the Holy Cross in English and Masters from Bryn Mawr in Social Service with a focus on program development. Most of her career has been in nonprofit leadership positions developing programs, managing staff and mentoring volunteers.
The Geaney/Nickey families provided critical seed funding to Squidget while Suzanne and John Nickey have also been true, inspirational Thought Leaders throughout this entire process.

Sean Snee received his BS in Civil Engineering from the University of Massachusetts, Dartmouth. Sean has experience with a variety of different 2D and 3D CAD software and leads Squidget's design and manufacturing teams.

Collaborating with Squidget partners AutoDesk and Afinia, he completely re-designed the Squidget and used the H800 Afinia 3D printer to produce new Squidget prototypes. He will also work closely with partners ICSN Group and Seven Hills Foundation on supply chain and shipping functions. Needless to say, Jerry and Sean have known each other for a very long time!

Jared received his Bachelors Degree in Marketing from Valparaiso University with a focus in Graphic Design. After over a decade working for some of the largest distributors of emergency medical products in the United States, Jared started his own business providing graphic design and photography services in the central Ohio area.

Jerry, a long-time family friend, approached Jared at a family event and asked if he would provide some creative vision for team Squidget. As our VP of Marketing, Jared handles our photography and visual design, as well as copy-writing, website consulting, and any other creative tasks that arise!
Please visit our website to see additional Team Squidget members, our key partners and our outstanding Board of Advisors.......www.squidgetinc.com

","Fidgeting is great! Focusing is even better!Team Squidget thinks it is not how you fidget, rather how you focus that matters.Just asks the head of the Neuro-Surgical Residency program at one of the most prestigious research universities in the world.​""Brilliant"" was how described our design. He is an invaluable member of our research and product development team and is Chairman of our Board of Advisers.  He sees very clear benefits to the Squidget..That's why we are asking for your support to go into full production.  We are not a ""KPNAC""....we are a real company with sixteen professional partners with over  400 years of professional experience. We have an experienced manufacturing partner and will employ individuals at a sheltered workshop, all dedicated to our Vision - namely helping millions of individuals improve their lives with Squidget.Everyone fidgets - hair twirling, pencil rolling or pen clicking - we all do something to stay focused, but sometimes fidgeting can draw negative attention. We waited to introduce the Squidget because we had to get it right, the first time!Our nine years of research shows that each year 2 million student learning years are irrecoverably lost to disruptive and potentially self-harming fidgeting.Years before the 'bros' claimed to have invented something, we had already filed our patent for this 'brilliant design' that was tested worldwide and proven to work!They just felt they could get away with this but they were very WRONG!  Ask the Better Business Bureau where they already have massive numbers of unresolved complaints for not delivering at all and product breaking.We have helped dozens of their customers who either paid and sadly never even got their product, or exposed their children to great risk because the copycat cube broke almost immediately.Who loves Squidget and Why?Current medical and therapeutic clinical research concludes that fidgeting is a beneficial and effective way for individuals to self-calm, stay centered and Focus to  begin and complete tasks.Squidget uniquely transforms normal fidgeting into exceptional productivity.  Principals, Teachers, Special Education Experts, Autism & ADHD Advocates, Parents worldwide have participated in our research and more than validated value and benefits their students experience with their Squidget.Meet Squidget
Squidget is a small, handheld device that currently contains seven options that replicate the most common fidgeting habits, designed to enable almost noiseless fidgeting.
Squidget offers many options in just one solution.
Each option on Squidget fulfills a specific fidget need, all in one patented device:
Provides an exact replica of the top of a pen to allow the Squidgeter to enjoy all of the tactile satisfaction of pressing a pen-top repeatedly without making the annoying clicking noise.
Allows Squidgeters to twirl Squidget's button with greater twirling movement than a regular button for a more substantial tactile satisfaction and this button won't ever fall off!
Provides a safe and satisfying alternative for those who twirl their hair, most times unconsciously but can lead to serious health issues such as Trichotillomania.

Allows Squidgeters to roll a pencil surface without distracting other students around them. These children need the tactile satisfaction, namely vibration, from rolling their pencil on a desk. Our option gives them even more satisfaction while both allowing them to work with their pencil and not distract or disrupt others in their class.  Teachers LOVE this option both for the child and their 'connection' with the child - meaning more collaborative rather than adversarial.
Presents a smooth, curved interrupted surface of five 'bubbles' that  allows individuals to rub their fingers across it without creating callouses.

Users can dig their nails into the deep grooves on the periphery of the surface, rather than their own skin, thus gaining the necessary tactile satisfaction without the risk of harming themselves from other forms of 'deep nail pressure satisfaction'.

Presents a lightweight tab Squidgeters can flick, spin or grasp to spin the entire Squidget to help calm, center, and focus to complete tasks. Numerous adults have told us they never get on a conference call without picking up their Squidget so they can pay closer attention to the call.
With seven unique options, Squidget promotes greater focus, unleashes immense creativity all the while enhancing calmness.
It also allows children to reclaim their self-dignity and confidence that might have been lost due to constant reprimands for doing exactly what they MUST do to succeed.
At the end of the campaign you can pick whichever Squidget you wish to receive:
How did we get here and what's next?
A quick timeline of our amazing journey to this important milestone
2009 - Jerry and Naomi meet while building a tutoring company dedicated to helping                                                      students with ADHD and ADD.
2009 - 2014   Jerry and Naomi focus on building Team Squidget and creating the                      final design that would be safe, affordable, durable, discrete and fun!
January 2014    - Patent application is filed in and should be issued any day
October 2016    - Final design completed , in compliance with our Patent
May 2017            - Launch our brand new website
February 2018  - and introduce our next Squidget - #4!
October 13th - Receive Production samples for final approval
October 27th - Complete testing by Consumer Product Safety for Ages 5+
October 27th - Place final order for all inventory

Please note, these are 'worst case scenario' dates.  We have built our Team and business on the 'under commit and over deliver' philosophy.  There could be as much as 3-4 weeks of improvement but we don't want to promise and let down those who pledge to us.
Squidget is for everyone and anyone:
Additionally, Squidget is ideal for individuals diagnosed with:
Because we spent 9 years working on a design that would guarantee that Squidget is:

Safe - Created with an innovative design, ABS plastic as the material of choice, and injection molding. Our goal is to have Squidget exceed the Consumer Product Safety Standards for use by children ages 5+
Affordable - Produced from the most cost effective injection molding
Compact - Fits in the palm of the hand to focus discretely without creating a noisy distraction
Aesthetically Pleasing - Features a bright multi-color design with each option featuring a different color for clear fidgeting differentiation
Portable - Comes in a convenient carrying case
Squidget can help Millions of Individuals improve their lives
By reaching our goal of $15,000, Squidget can order the molds necessary to begin to give everyone the opportunity to immediately, predictably and consistently improve their own lives.
By exceeding our goal, Team Squidget can continue to finally both bring this Squidget to market and to develop new options with the goal of addressing an ever increasing number of fidgeting needs.
Our mantra has and will continue to be:

column1: Bridge is an application which will be available on iOS and android. Bridge App gets you connected with your new friends across all social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Instagram and snapchat etc. using just a single tap of your mobile phones.

Hi there! welcome to the Bridge campaign I am Harsh Mudgil. I am a college student who happens to be in second year of Electronics Engineering. When I was in high-school I wanted to make a social networking site which would be most intuitive and easy to use. I figured out pretty soon that if I wanted to succeed in a race among social media giants like Facebook and Snapchat I had to do something unique. I started looking for a real life aspect of our social life, which was not captured by any of these mega giants. I figured out that the most important component of our social life which happens to be a handshake wasn't captured by any one before. A social media profile is a digital representative of a person. If I wanted to implement Handshake in the digital world I had to do it, so that it enables two social media profiles to be friends together. So I  realized that, in order to succeed, I did not have to make a social media platform, but I had to build something which would help people to connect on existing social networks in a more intuitive way. As I moved to my college in first year, I got to know hundreds of new people who eventually became my friends. I wanted to add all these people to my different social networks. Back then I used 5 different social networks. I realized that the process of adding all these new friends to 5 different social networks is a tedious process.To add one single friend on 1 social network you need to do the following steps
• Search the right profile amongst so many similar looking profiles
• Finally tap the ""Add as a Friend"" button
• Wait for your friend to accept the request
Now just imagine doing all of this for so many friends on 5 different social networks. Feels tiring and time consuming, doesn't it?

By now it was the beginning of my second year and I had realized what I had to do for success. I wanted a software which could get me connected with one single friend across all social networks like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat and WhatsApp by using just one step just like a handshake for all our digital profiles. That's when I came up with Bridge App.
When you make a new friend in real life,
1) You and your friend need to open the Bridge app.

column2: 3) Then you have to tap the back of your mobile phone with the back of your friend's phone

column1: 4)  Within seconds you and your friend are connected to each others profile across all different social media platforms  like Facebook and Instagram using your phone's NFC, just like a digital handshake.

The stage of our product is not conceptual. We are one stage ahead of conceptual stage and one stage below prototyping. We have completed all the necessary documentations regarding User Control Flow and functionality. We are working  very hard on the code day and night, to make this thing a reality . Your support is more than essential to help us realize our goal. It will help us to establish our digital and physical infrastructure which would enhance our capability to make it a little sooner.

This application changes how we connect with people around us. It does not only have an impact on digital world, but it also effects how we socialize in our society. Your contribution will help us to make this world a little more faster, smarter and better. Our app helps people to connect with each other faster in a more intuitive way. When we can socialize in real life with just a handshake, why should socializing on digital medium be so tedious? A handshake for our digital profiles, that's how intuitive it is and that's what it is. So, help us to help the world to save time and to do digital handshake.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Help us by spreading our campaign among your friends and family.
• You can help us by spreading our word to any potential backers that you might know.
• Please spread our word by posting it on all your social media profiles.

column1: We want a product that is very easy to use by everybody. This is why we excluded the smartphone Apps. For the same reason, it has only one button. The system has to be easy to use even by a grandmother or a toddler.

Existing smart doorbells  are too complicated to use. Available smartproducts work mainly with WiFi, but what if the WiFi is not accessible, or you don’t have mobile data available? Then your doorbell does not work.  With , such situations will not occur because we use a simple cell phone call.

column1: Our team has helped to create various products for the past 15 years. Our mission is not to develop items that are just beautiful or cool — we want to help people.
• You can support this campaign just by sharing with your friends on social media with Indiegogo share tools.

There's always risks  We thought it might be good to share some of them so you know what we are dealing with.

Component supply: any product for that matter, contains a significant amount of components. These components come from different suppliers which have different lead times for their components. If ONE of these suppliers has a short supply or a long lead time this will delay the entire production if a substitute is not found for that component.

Enhancements in production: When in production there are a couple of parameters that can be improved during the process such as the color, click feeling, translucence, IP class etc. Making such enhancements during the process will be in order to improve your experience with . We will do everything we can to ensure that ships with superior quality.

Shipping and customs: When we start shipping there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We have prepared as well as we can and hopefully there won't be any delays.
