• Hi Everyone, my name is Dave Coffin, Founder and CEO of VKLiQ. I am a husband, father, outdoor enthusiast  and small business owner in Idaho. I am working together with my business partners, who have had tremendous success in building thriving companies.
• We are continuing to raise capital to grow our business and further develop our software. We want to reach out to a broader audience and enrich as many lives as possible.

• Your contribution will help in getting this generation back to real social interaction, with real people. Helping to limit the virtual engagement they are drawn to. Creating a healthier, happier more engaged life.

We need to get back to the original ways of human interaction. Face to face engagement. One on one and group interactions among friends and in making new friends. We need the help in overcoming social awkwardness and fears. You will help us expand the idea of VKLiQ and the use of our devices to get away from our devices. As you help us become successful in this market we will move into other sectors of society, duplicating this same technology and advancement for everyone.

• Your contribution will provide a safer, more effective way to engage in social activities, for yourself, for a loved one, neighbor and simply the world. Not only do we want our social engagement to be more fulfilling and never miss out on the best that college life has to offer. But we also want to decrease the plague of date rape and human trafficking among our students. Whether you are attending a party, outdoor activity, bookclub or study group. Fun and Safety are our main concern.
• Members of our team have had success in launching problem solving software in multiple markets and are putting the same experience and enthusiasm into VKLiQ.

• Any amount we raise will help us in furthering our goal and getting our product to market. We have already launched in iOS format and will move to launch to our Android customers first so we can reach as many of our market as possible. Reaching our funding goal entirely will ensure that we can begin to add the premium features of VKLiQ for safety to the community  of students.
• Marketing of the app is key. But having a vetted software team and co-founders that have overcome similar hurdles and challenges in the past gives us a strong foundation to build from.

• We have hired a strong marketing company to push our campaign and get the word out. But one unique approach we have taken is to enlist student ambassadors from a variety of campuses across the nation to help beta test and spread the word. They are putting together key focus groups as wall as hosting events and creating content on VKLiQ

• If donating $$$ is a little out of your reach but you still believe in all the good our campaign and app have to offer, then please take the time to spread the word and even ask your loved ones to download the app from the AppleStore and to look for it soon in the Play Store from Google.
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to share on social media as well! Thank you for your support

Hi Everyone, my name is Dave Coffin, Founder and CEO of VKLiQ. I am a husband, father, outdoor enthusiast  and small business owner in Idaho. I am working together with my business partners, who have had tremendous success in building thriving companies.
We are continuing to raise capital to grow our business and further develop our software. We want to reach out to a broader audience and enrich as many lives as possible.

Your contribution will help in getting this generation back to real social interaction, with real people. Helping to limit the virtual engagement they are drawn to. Creating a healthier, happier more engaged life.
What We Need & What You Get

We need to get back to the original ways of human interaction. Face to face engagement. One on one and group interactions among friends and in making new friends. We need the help in overcoming social awkwardness and fears. You will help us expand the idea of VKLiQ and the use of our devices to get away from our devices. As you help us become successful in this market we will move into other sectors of society, duplicating this same technology and advancement for everyone.

Your contribution will provide a safer, more effective way to engage in social activities, for yourself, for a loved one, neighbor and simply the world. Not only do we want our social engagement to be more fulfilling and never miss out on the best that college life has to offer. But we also want to decrease the plague of date rape and human trafficking among our students. Whether you are attending a party, outdoor activity, bookclub or study group. Fun and Safety are our main concern.
Members of our team have had success in launching problem solving software in multiple markets and are putting the same experience and enthusiasm into VKLiQ.

Any amount we raise will help us in furthering our goal and getting our product to market. We have already launched in iOS format and will move to launch to our Android customers first so we can reach as many of our market as possible. Reaching our funding goal entirely will ensure that we can begin to add the premium features of VKLiQ for safety to the community  of students.
Marketing of the app is key. But having a vetted software team and co-founders that have overcome similar hurdles and challenges in the past gives us a strong foundation to build from.

We have hired a strong marketing company to push our campaign and get the word out. But one unique approach we have taken is to enlist student ambassadors from a variety of campuses across the nation to help beta test and spread the word. They are putting together key focus groups as wall as hosting events and creating content on VKLiQ

If donating $$$ is a little out of your reach but you still believe in all the good our campaign and app have to offer, then please take the time to spread the word and even ask your loved ones to download the app from the AppleStore and to look for it soon in the Play Store from Google.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to share on social media as well! Thank you for your support
Pyxa is an Arduino-compatible DIY game console.
Pyxa comes as an all-inclusive do-it-yourself kit allowing users to build their game console and create their own video games whilst learning about coding.

During the assembly, users will get familiar with each component of a game console and explore their functions. Assembly is fairly simple and does not require any tools or special skills. No soldering is required.

Resolution of Pyxa is 128 x 160 pixels and it is capable of displaying full 18-bit colour. Pyxa is based on ATmega328P processor, and it accommodates a micro SD card socket for displaying bitmap images and a buzzer to add sound to your video games.
Rechargeable battery has 600 mAh storage, which will provide at least 4 hours of non-stop gaming.

Once done with the assembly, users can start coding with Arduino Software (IDE). Our educational guide is aimed at new beginners and will take you through every step of creating a video game. Alternatively, you can simply download the video games we have already created, upload them to your Pyxa and start playing!

Pyxa is a great way for everyone to learn about programming algorithms and game development. With Pyxa, you can create your own video games from scratch, replicate any retro video games you like or make storytelling games by using actual images.
Explore how a game console works, create your own video games, and share them with your friends.
Below is the unedited video of Pyxa that is ready to go into production.

As Creoqode, we are in the market for more than two years now and gained a valuable experience about manufacturing, packing, customer service and international shipping. We are already in touch with manufacturers for Pyxa and arranged the production. Pyxa can get into production straight after the funds are received. As the founder of Creoqode, I strongly believe that risks involved for on time delivery of Pyxa will be extremely unlikely.

However, it would be fair to note that we will be shipping the product globally, and the taxation, customs duties and other regulations might be different across some countries which might cause some minor delays. However, Creoqode team has extensively researched global delivery of Pyxa and partnered up with DHL in order to preempt any challenges we may face. Additionally, we have set the delivery date as June 2019 leaving us plenty of time to ensure on-time delivery.

Additionally, we will be putting all our effort to prepare detailed and easy to follow tutorials for hardware, assembly and coding. However, after the delivery of Pyxa, some users might still have questions regarding technical aspects of the product or might require assistance, which Creoqode help desk formed of 3 programmers and 2 electrical engineers will be able to answer immediately. We are all prepared for you to have an exciting and smooth experience with Pyxa.
For any enquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@creoqode.com

TBoard multitouch keyboard mouse

Use a 10' tablet as a multi touch professional keyboard to increase comfort and productivity, integrating mouse and gestures to control your pc.

WiFi Keyboard. MultiTouch virtual Keyboard and mouse for developers, designers and professionals. Controls: keyboard, mouse pointer, text cursor, selection, switch, swap, cut, copy, paste, esc, undo, backspace, tasks and more, moving your fingers.

Change layout in a tap!

Requires a tablet and TBoard-Server on PC.

There are some tips to use a tablet with comfort. We are developing the best solution.

 

 

TBoard is unique and exclusive:
• all the surface is multi touch, not only a little touchpad
• intuitive use of multi touch and keyboard at same time
• Caps Lock key and Enter key at spacebar side
• swap key, to extend keys and change layout on the fly
• special layout to help people to write looking the screen
• helps the user to hold a correct anatomical posture

no bad posture

no pains

 

 Pros:
• reduction of stress and time loss in repetitive actions
• typing may be less fast respect to mechanical keyboard
• needs tricks and specific conditions to slide your fingers well

Work status

Android and Windows 10:
First evaluation version of WiFi TBoard app is working and ready to use on Google Play for beta testers.

 

To do:
• dedicated web site on how to use
• multi point connection to use TBoard to control more pc at same time

What's better than having your logo on a T-shirt? Having your logo on a T-shirt today!
We understand that turnaround time has the biggest impact on whether you use us to print your shirts, or the next guy. Our current equipment has been slowing us down and creating a bottleneck while producing items. So, in turn, turnaround times are slow. (As slow as 2 weeks)
We want to purchase new equipment to produce items at a faster pace, and have them in your hands today, instead of tomorrow.
Each perk level has different items, with added value the higher you contribute.
We have items such as personalized Dog Tag Necklaces, Coffee Mugs, T-shirts, and everything in between.
Your contribution will help us succeed in the world of screen printing by being quicker at producing T-shirts.

It's a dog eat dog world out there full of printers. Our goal is to be a top choice among printers. When someone asks ""Who makes T-shirts?"" Or ""Where's the best place to get T-shirt printed?"" We'd like to be at the top of the list.
We love printing T-shirts. It's our passion. Our dream.
We understand that not everyone is capable of contributing. So here's some things that you can do to help us achieve our goal.
• Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and anywhere else you can.
• Send people our way if they need T-shirts or other items printed.

Hello, my name is Tony and I am a single father living in Athens, Greece. When the 2nd Covid lockdown wave hit Athens my daughter Elena (9 years old) had to start wearing a mask to school and that was the trigger! Elena was losing 4 out of 5 masks every week so I asked her ""hey, what's going on with you and the masks? How come you never lose your phone?""
She was like ""eh, daddy, the phone is important..."" So I thought ""Ok then, I'll make an app on your phone to alert you not to forget your stuff!""
That is how the idea was born in Sep 2020 thanks to my baby girl! Elena and I hope to help millions of people that are doing the best they can but still forget...

Select your activity and a personal items list will load, for example if you chose GYM then items like shampoo, towel, etc. will be preset. You can also add items to any list, items that you carry with you when leaving home.
When you select the items, press GO and Remindit will track your device's movement through the GPS.

As soon as your device stays in one location for more than 5-7 minutes Remindit will assume you have forgotten some of your items and as soon as your device starts moving again and goes further than 15-20m distance then an alarm is triggered asking you to double check the items you have on you.
Responsive: Designed to work on Android and IOS Devices and uses minimum device resources!
• User Friendly: Children and older Low-Tech seniors are who we were thinking about when developing our App.
• Stand Alone App : The App runs locally on each device and doesn’t need Wi-Fi or Cellular network! We only use your GPS
• Total Privacy:  Remindit App doesn’t need any personal data! No email or login required!

Well there was no team. Only me, unemployed in Lockdown with a bunch of great ideas and all the time in the world. So many really good ideas that I could not NOT make them a reality! So I decided I needed help and started searching for people that would be an asset to the App. While playing Fortnite (?!?) I met a young software developer who introduced me to a few more developers... after some talks, Paul was the most keen and willing to learn out of the group and immediately stood out from the rest. So I made him an offer to partner with me and here we are... The two of us have managed to bring this app to life and we are sure we will always be able to enhance and improve it.

By talking to various friends and family around us we were able to design the app as user-friendly as possible in order to be easy for kids and seniors. Our goal is to help people to not lose their personal items when they leave their home, but also additional features will be available when launched but shhh...  that's a secret!
What we offer to our Indiegogo Supporters!

Remindit App is scheduled to launch on 30th of April 2021 and backers will have first hands on to the App's BETA AD Free Version which will also have extra features that we will not disclose until the launch date!
We appreciate everyone's love and support, even if some people can't afford to back us, they can always spread the word and inform people who might desperately need an app like ours!
PS: If you chose to purchase the perk, I will send you an email with the extra secret features that will be available when we launch!

You want adventure?

Looking for a way to blow money in the stupidest way possible?

Want someone to connect the dots and show you how your bank account will be lighter?

Boy, have YOU come to the right campaign!!!

If you've been wowed, awed, enraptured by the thought of having your very own social robot...
column4:
>Like these guys here!

..then you need to contribute to this campaign! Take a look at our promotional video, and learn all about Aido, the Little Crowdfunded Robot That Couldn't.

Remember when you contribute here as a backer, you'll get a fabulous NoPrize in return, of absolutely NO value whatsoever--because it doesn't exist!

Just like backing a social robot that doesn't ship after three (at least) promises made to backers, we'll be happy to take your money and burn it in the street. You get nothing, but WE get to buy all the shawarma we can eat!

So strap on your Viking helmets, get out your credit cards, and stay with us as we continue to bash a poor little robot that you'll meet in our video.

Be sure to watch for our Updates, coming to you from our crack team of researchers!

Link to our original Aidon't Exist Indiegogo campaign:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/aido-the-nex...

Link to original Aido Indiegogo campaign:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/aido-next-ge...

Link to InGen Dynamics' StartEngine equity crowdfunding campaign (to see the comments, click on ""Engage"" and scroll down until you see them (or rather, you'll see Arshad Hisham's self-spamming copy-paste disinformation garbage that tries to bury any negative, skeptical, or critical comments):

https://www.startengine.com/startup/aido

UPDATE March 31, 2017:
The StartEngine campaign for InGen/Aido has been removed from the site without notice or warning. See our Updates section here for details!

Any color, Any shape, desk completely custom colour to the shape.
Will It Work With? (my PC, my Tablet, my Smartphone)
eVO is a complete product consisting of a desk and multimedia part HW & SW.
VirtualOffice is the service associated with it and can be used by any user at any place, just you've need an internet connection.
Currently VirtualOffice is available via web with PC, but it will soon be released apps for smartphones and tablets (all models: iOS, Android, Windows)
How Do I Use It With My Contacts?
eVO is your product, you can add an infinite number of contacts,
these will be free to access your virtual office as guests,
through  VirtualOffice service and for your contacts it's TOTALLY FREE
How Do I Manage Communications With My Contacts?
You will have many useful app
Can I Share Pictures And Documents With My Contacts?
YES! VirtualOffice allows you to make presentation of PDF documents,
image slideshows and more with anyone you want.
It also includes an infinite number of apps such as boards (white & black)
that allow you to draw as you would on a board in real time by all your guests simultaneously.
How It Works On Pc Of My Guest?
Your contact can interact with any PC
any web browser (Safari, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, IE, Yandex)
Have I Need Keyboard And Mouse?
No, whole system is multitouch-screen means that is used with the touch of your fingers directly on the screen, all your fingers together.
You can optionally use a graphics tablet.
What Are The Minimum Specifications Of Operations?
Simple! Internet connection (eg. 6Mbps download and 512Kbps upload are enough for HQ video communications)
Flash enable the use of the webcam, microphone and peer2peer.
In Which Country Does It Works?
Around the world, enough to have an internet connection, wired or wireless.
I Am A Distributor, Can I Contact You?
Simply send us an email to  info@elvio.org
I Don't Have Money To Invest, Are There Other Ways To Help?
Of course! we work in many years crowdsourcing, even before the invention of term
Every professional is welcome, currently marketing, sales and manufacturing specialists, but also technicians are welcome
Write your questions and we will publish them online with answers.
THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO WILL SUPPORTS THIS PROJECT

Computer gaming  should not be limited to expensive hardware. GalaxyTweaker ensures better system performance, faster loading speed and smoother, high-quality device usage.

GalaxyTweaker revolutionizes your gaming experience. Simplistic, powerful, and customizable by you - all for the price of a cup of coffee. GalaxyTweaker performs beyond any conceivable barrier of standard computer performance, aiding your productivity and superiority over the battlefield, or even your everyday tasks.

GalaxyTweaker strives to be the #1 Optimization Tool &
column2: Game Manager on the marketplace. Not only is our program filled with dozens of optimization features, it's customizable, and as affordable as a caramel latte. Our team has developed a program that allows our users to perform optimally online or offline in any scenario, without the need of expensive hardware.
column3:
>

Our vision is to go beyond the barriers of productivity and performance, as we strive to create a unique experience that is seen within our brand. For the bold, the competitive and the adventurous, we  act to sculpt a universe building on those characteristics, by developing software and products that empower our users and encourage the very best out of their ability to achieve anything they truly desire.
column4:
>

By partnering with PopCorn's Official PC Community, we have opened an gateway for software and hardware compatibility and help to go hand-to-hand. Their official Discord server is filled with dedicated tech-savvy individuals who teach, develop and aid individuals with their computer needs. Rather it be advice to build a budget-friendly gaming rig, or a forum for AI and software development discussion, there are many voice and text channels for any questions to be addressed and for interaction to be met. The GalaxyTweaker Team supports their endeavors to further educate minds and developing a home for many gamers and tech connoisseurs.

To join PopCorn's Official PC Community Discord, click this link.
column5:
>

✔️ Equipped up to 25+ optimization features to improve your gaming experience online or offline.

✔️ Unique UC-encrypted user accounts that can be transferred across multiple devices under one household

✔️ RGB Customizable Interface compatible with gradient display presets

✔️ Multilingual Program Support (English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Portuguese, French, Dutch, German &
column6:
Arabic)

✔️ Automated feature calculation and application, with saved presets for ease-of-use.
column9:
showinfo=0"">

Through of a extensive analysis of existing optimization software on the marketplace, Our main inspiration is to reform the flaws of existing optimization programs, while exceeding the demand of user preference and simplicity to blend the ultimate program. A comparison of other programs can be seen below:
column10:
>

Introducing a multitude of different categories of improvement among a user's device, internally and externally, GalaxyTweaker offers a ""Registry"", ""Network"", ""Mouse/Hardware Accessory"" &
column11: ""General Performance"" tab to create an equilibrium of optimization features to be selected and applied with the click of a few buttons. Feature versatility involves  interaction sliders/bars, calculators, and buttons to adjust certain levels of game-play, with the ability to ""enable-all"" and ""disable-all"" features by clicking on a roaring lion.
column15: >Learn what our beta testers have to say about GalaxyTweaker.
column16:
>

 Eye spy on the new customization features added to both Premium and Highroller packages. Introducing RGB customization menus, color appearance and clarity falls between the user’s preference, making the possibilities endless. 

Although experimental, these features will enable users to completely change the outline, and menu display of the program followed with preset options. As the program receives feedback and updates, the GalaxyTweaker team plans to implement other extensions such as “Gradient Display” and community preset models for users to publish and apply.
column20:
showinfo=0"">

Multi-color synchronization will be available to our users along with animated effects to have a beautiful cosmetic presentation, as well with other extensions and presets for total program control and preference for our users.
column21:
>

GalaxyTweaker offers a more simple and powerful approach to online and offline gaming by offering dozens of features that optimize different algorithms among your own PC to modify the responsiveness and strength of your device. 

This may be responsible in decreasing ping, optimizing latency, TCP congestion clearance and disk storage space. The goal is to allocate more resources towards what matters at a given time, to promote a more enhanced gaming experience.
column22:
>

 Rather if you're an artist, developer, video editor, online shopper, or someone who typically uses a computer - performance matters. Browsing the internet swiftly, securely and with ease, GalaxyTweaker brings the best out of your computer, for any situation, anytime and anywhere.
column25:
showinfo=0"">

It is imperative that the best is brought out of your computer rig, with no risk at all, to promote much more balanced and sustainable device performance to meet and/or exceed today's market standards.
column26:
>

 Our team of developers and gamers are dedicated to innovating and pushing the optimization software industry forward by developing a all-in-one program optimization engine and combining it with interactive cosmetic display options and a game/profile manager.

 Our team strives to evolve community transparency and control over our software by allowing community optimization presets, cosmetic extensions and add-on updates to be implemented in the near future. This would allow our users to choose specific RGB and gradient display patterns and themes, along with sharing optimization preset models for specific games and tasks all within the program.
column27:
>

GalaxyTweaker Gold Theme is considered to be the pinnacle of all program cosmetics that we have to offer. Awarded to up to one hundred individuals that purchase the ""GalaxyTweaker - Royal Package"" on Kickstarter, you are considered to be a top donator for this project. It is our honor to award you with 12-month access of GalaxyTweaker Highroller and a exclusive Gold theme for your program package. GalaxyTweaker Gold Theme will be a limited item only awarded  through our Kickstarter campaign, and will potentially never be awarded out again after the campaign ends. 

As our community grows, we plan to implement theme and skin extensions, in which our users can purchase themes on our theme store in the near future. We also plan to award these themes through a referral system, through giveaways, and through our community Discord. To join our Discord, click this link.
column28: >
column29:
>

 Our team intends to make GalaxyTweaker as customizable and affordable as possible, so we have made certain design choices to include a multitude of features under different categories to ensure organization and simplicity, while also sectioning our customization menu under a mechanical gear tab, to introduce a separate  preference window that may include: ""Profile"", ""RGB Color Wheel"", ""Background &
column30:
Overlay"", ""Game Manager"" , ""Mouse Rate Checker"", and ""Social"" tabs.  

GalaxyTweaker will come in two software variations: Premium (Standard), and Highroller (Pro), in which you may see the differences below or by clicking this link.
column32:
>Risk and Challenges

Though we have successfully hosted pre-alpha testing sessions and have recieved quality feedback, we are a very small startup. We do not have sufficient infrastructure to match the service level of a company like Razer or WTFast, so our exposure is low. We may reply slowly and take some time to handle support tasks
column33:
it is safe to say, however, that you will always get a reply and we will always help. Please expect to follow along with our weekly updates while we attempt to actualize the future of program optimization software.

 

Our team strives to implement and execute a major marketing and development plan following our public launch, allocating funds into reaching ambassadors and improving development standards guided by our users. A serious amount of work will be necessary to perfect our software to match major-league competitor standards.

 

 A voucher and instructions will be sent to your Indigogo backer email address once preparations are complete and funding arrives.

 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GalaxyTweaker/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GalaxyTweaker

Instagram: https://instagram.com/GalaxyTweaker

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GalaxyTweaker/

Discord:  https://discord.gg/MJpSrJt

Dogger.agency:

Hello everybody, I’m a 16 years old guy who just developed a website that allows you to buy or sell a dog from anywhere in the world. In the world we currently have 900.000.000 dogs. Through my website, you can easily find the right puppy for you: just select your country, and then you’ll find every website which allows you to buy/sell dogs. Before visiting any website though, you will find all the available breeds written in the description, so that, for instance, if you wanted to buy a french bulldog, you could choose the right websites to visit. If you want to sell a dog instead, it’s even more convenient, because you would find every website where you can freely post your announcement. You can even ask to directly be inserted in our websites list, so that you would get more attention from the public. As I said before, I’m just 16, but my aim is to do something good for the world, and I’m sure that through my unique website, a lot of dogs would find a new home in a much easier way. I’d like to be a CEO soon, and if I raised enough money I’d like to turn the website into an app where you could buy or sell any type of animal.

Thanks for your attention, 

Francesco - Dogger.agency founder.

• Hello! My name is Jessica and I currently work as a teacher and a bartender as a side gig to supplement my income.

• As a bartender, I found that it is sometimes very had to find work. This app is designed to find work for you in the area that you search for! Your payments will be secure in the app so you never have to hassle with the client!
• I am currently in the last phase of completing the app. This app has been in the works for about 2 years, as I try to save up to complete it which hasn't been very effective.
• To complete the last phase of the app, I would need 30,000 dollars to pay the company creating the app.
• Whats really cool about the app is, you can create you profile, where you display your work, your availability, and your price so its there for customers to view easily!
• If I do not reach my goal, the funds will serve as partial payment to the app company, which still puts me closer to my goal! Every dollar helps!
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

• During these unprecedented times, many people have lost their jobs. Some of these people still possess skills that others would deem very useful. This app gives everyone a chance to make money with their own skill, making you your very own boss!
• You can even supplement your income with a useful side-hustle that might be of interest to others.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Even if you are unable to contribute at this time, please share this campaign with everyone you know! That support is a major help!
• Remember to you Indiegogo to share tools!
Hello! My name is Jessica and I currently work as a teacher and a bartender as a side gig to supplement my income.

As a bartender, I found that it is sometimes very had to find work. This app is designed to find work for you in the area that you search for! Your payments will be secure in the app so you never have to hassle with the client!
I am currently in the last phase of completing the app. This app has been in the works for about 2 years, as I try to save up to complete it which hasn't been very effective.
What We Need & What You Get:
To complete the last phase of the app, I would need 30,000 dollars to pay the company creating the app.
Whats really cool about the app is, you can create you profile, where you display your work, your availability, and your price so its there for customers to view easily!
If I do not reach my goal, the funds will serve as partial payment to the app company, which still puts me closer to my goal! Every dollar helps!
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

Even if you are unable to contribute at this time, please share this campaign with everyone you know! That support is a major help!
Remember to you Indiegogo to share tools!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Overview 

Mease: A digital will of your memories 

A private space where you can record moments, memories and thoughts
column2:
keep them private or share them with your loved ones. 

This particular project has had such a profoundly positive impact on our lives that we think everyone could benefit immensely from doing it too.

What problems are we solving?

On social media, you create for the world, but what are you creating for yourself and your future generations ? How are you preserving your legacy?

People are now more distant than ever. Maintaining a bond with close ones is becoming increasingly difficult due to extremely busy lives or inability to communicate their feelings. In this age, moments spent with loved ones are assets.

 How we came up with this idea

""A few years ago, I lost my father. It left us miserable and empty because we didn’t get to communicate everything with him. He was a very introverted person and didn’t share a lot, not even with his family. Even though he didn’t communicate with us a lot, we missed him terribly and on some days we were trying to look for notes or his diary to find out more about his life that he didn’t tell us. We wish that we knew more about his life, our childhood memories, perspectives, feelings
column3:
something that would have given us closure. 

Sometimes expressing emotions doesn’t always mean speaking, it means expressing in any way you’re comfortable with. I realised that people may go but memories last forever.

That is how we decided to come up with a platform for people to vent, rant, talk, write about their feelings, memories and record beautiful moments of their life to preserve and share their legacy with loved ones.""

- Rushabh Shah, Co-founder

While researching we found that journaling is one of the keystone habits that can transform your life. But we wanted to give journaling a twist. Mease is a one-of-a-kind app, where you can express thoughts, feelings, record your life journey, preserve your legacy, keep memories alive and share with loved ones. Understand yourself and your life better and preserve all those valuable memories and stories for yourself and others and it also aides you in writing.

We believe that moments spent with loved ones are assets and should be remembered and cherished forever, so we have added the nominee feature. We aim to create a digital legacy of memories that can be accessed by generations” Aaryan Shah, co-founder.

 

Introducing Mease

Mease is a digital will of your memories. From recollecting little things about your day to ruminating about special moments. You can easily rely on Mease to store key moments of your life. Moreover, you can share these with your friends and family or keep them personal to you.

Among other features, below are some of our main features:

Schedule posts for future

Schedule a post for your future self to remind that you made it! (through difficult times) or a message for your son’s 18th birthday or any occasion by setting a date and time. You can also write a confession that you might want to share with someone at a later date and tag them.

Gift your memories in a Memory Scrapbook

At Mease, we understand the need of having a personal connection with your friends and family beyond the virtual world, therefore we worked on a new feature where you can export certain entries, choose from six themes and we will transform it into a physical scrapbook which will be delivered to your loved one.

Appoint a Nominee

Our distinctive feature is to appoint a nominee, who will receive your memories, after 6 months of your inactivity on Mease, on an email request. They can only see posts they are nominated in. You can add upto 2 nominees. Our aim is to help remember loved ones, cherish their memories and bring families and relationships closer. 

 

Why Mease?

The day he proposed, that first house, the birth of a child, a graduation, or a family reunion, it can be hard to remember the nuanced details of your life. Forgetfulness can be vexing after all. Writing down your memories will help you recall past experiences in greater and accurate detail, reference aspects of your daily lives, reflect by looking back at a situation to understand it better to gain insights and lastly, relive special days of your life.

Unlike a conventional will, where your assets get passed on to your nominated kins. Mease stores and shares your memories and feelings and your life’s legacy to your loved ones. It’s a place to record your life journey and to preserve and share your legacy. From recollecting little things about your day to ruminating about special moments. You can easily rely on Mease to store key moments of your life.

column1: • Capture beautiful memories visually with text, photos, videos, voice notes and documents.
• Schedule for your future self or someone else.
• Appoint a nominee to receive your memories.

Testimonials 

Mease according to me means ""Me at Ease"". Mease will simplify my well being on the social media circuit as it has various mind boggling new features standing above the rest

-   @imVickyKumar Twitter

The interface looks eye pleasing. The options given to add photos, videos, voice notes add a personal touch to it. Tagging option is a cherry on the cake. From now on, I am going to write my heart out and not to forget my post lockdown plans too.

-@iiamrohit Twitter 

Other ways you can help

Can’t donate? No problem. Even if you are short of a reason to pitch money, we will really appreciate the following,

•       Download our mobile app ‘Mease’ from Apple/Google stores and try the practices

•       Spread the work in your circle about the mobile app and have them signup.

•       Use the Indiegogo share tools to maximize the visibility.

•       Follow us and join the community on our Instagram, Facebook and Twitter pages 

Thank you so much in advance!
Team Mease

Writing down your memories will help you recall past experiences in greater and accurate detail, reference aspects of your daily lives, reflect by looking back at a situation to understand it better to gain insights and lastly, relive special days of your life.Unlike a conventional will, where your assets get passed on to your nominated kins. Mease stores and shares your memories and feelings and your life’s legacy to your loved ones. It’s a place to record your life journey and to preserve and share your legacy. From recollecting little things about your day to ruminating about special moments. You can easily rely on Mease to store key moments of your life.

column1: Capture beautiful memories visually with text, photos, videos, voice notes and documents.
Schedule for your future self or someone else.
Appoint a nominee to receive your memories.

Testimonials Mease according to me means ""Me at Ease"". Mease will simplify my well being on the social media circuit as it has various mind boggling new features standing above the rest-   @imVickyKumar TwitterThe interface looks eye pleasing. The options given to add photos, videos, voice notes add a personal touch to it. Tagging option is a cherry on the cake. From now on, I am going to write my heart out and not to forget my post lockdown plans too.-@iiamrohit Twitter Other ways you can helpCan’t donate? No problem. Even if you are short of a reason to pitch money, we will really appreciate the following,•       Download our mobile app ‘Mease’ from Apple/Google stores and try the practices•       Spread the work in your circle about the mobile app and have them signup.•       Use the Indiegogo share tools to maximize the visibility.•       Follow us and join the community on our Instagram, Facebook and Twitter pages Thank you so much in advance!Team Mease",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

We are two friends from Iceland who shared the dream of publishing our own personal planner with special features that are highly important in our lives. Our dream came true when we published our first planner in Iceland for the year 2016. Our planner got sold out in only a few weeks and we received very positive feedback from our customers. In 2017 our planner was the most sold in Iceland in years. Since we always dream big - our current goal is to be able to publish an English version of the MUNUM planner. MUNUM means remember in Icelandic and we really like the brand and the meaning of it and therefore decided to keep the original name.

The MUNUM planner is designed with the aim of facilitating goal setting, time management and positive thinking. Studies show that precise goal setting leads to more achievement and overall success. You are about ten times more likely to succeed only by setting goals for yourself and by writing them down you can increase the likelihood of success up to 40%. By setting specific goals, with a precise time frame and braking them down into smaller steps you can increase your likelihood for success even further. For this reason, this planner is designed in a way that facilitates this process. In the beginning of the planner there is a good summary of goal setting and what aspects you need to keep in mind when setting your goals.  You are encouraged to set a few bigger goals for the year of 2017. In the beginning of each month you are encouraged to write down your monthly goals and in the beginning of each week you have a motivational quote and a space to write down goals/tasks for the week. In each week there is a small section for your ""10 minutes tasks"". These are simple tasks that take short time to finish but somehow you always postpone them. This can be things such as making an appointment with the dentist,  unsubscribe your gym membership, pay some bills, book a summerhouse for your upcoming vacation and etc.

We also put great emphasis on positive thinking in our planner. It is very important to take a moment each day and remind yourself of all the positive things around you and be thankful of what you have. In order to promote this, we have a special section in each week where you are encouraged to write down things that you are thankful for that week. These do not have to be big things because more often the beauty lies in the small moments around us. Positive and thankful thinking provides us with more happiness.

We really hope you will enjoy writing in this planner and that the year 2018 will bring you motivation, increased power, success and overall happiness.

In today's busy world lot of people do not maintain their own financial hygiene. We believe that taking a good care about personal finance is as important as regularly brushing your teeth or planning a healthy diet.

Our Financial-IQ (F-IQ) service is designed to be your best tool for managing your household finance situation. It provides you with the possibility to organize your financial data in a simple, yet very informative way. You can manage your past, present and, most important, future information. You can make different scenarios, analyse income/cost structure, get automatic reports, build charts, track down expenses, and many more. The main idea is for you to become capable of building a rock solid financial plan and stick to it in order to achieve desired financial goals.

The F-IQ service is designed and developed by Patronus consulting, a startup company from Zagreb, Croatia. Our main motivation for running this project is to help our users to learn how important it is to understand personal finances and to be in line with the real financial situation at any given time. Therefore, our main goal is to provide our users with extremely easy to use service for managing personal finances.

We completed our first project milestone and F-IQ service is fully functional (check it out at www.fiq4me.com). First development cycle has been funded internally which was sufficient for implementing basic functionality. Currently, it's completely free for use with no limitations at all.

Our plan is to make the service commercial in 6-12 months. In order to reach this goal and continue with our development, we need to raise some money. Therefore we decided to ask the community to contribute to the project. The desired amount of funds that we need to raise in order to reach our next milestone is 30.000 USD.
All contributors, regardless of the amount contributed, will receive one year free subscription once we decide to go commercial. The only requirement is to register for the service at www.fiq4me.com.
Our plan for next milestone includes following functionalities:
• Multi-language support - translations to German, French, Spanish and Croatian language with real time language switch (user option)
• Main Web site redesign - modern, professional design and updated content with ""Blog"", ""How it works"", ""Tips"" and ""Support"" sections
• Scenario module implementation - ""What-if"" analysis with multi-dashboard option
• Budget module implementation - tracking household budget and financial goals
• Reporting module implementation - automatic reporting for main financial indicators, reporting framework for customized reports
• Dashboard improvements - new charts, zoom in/out functionality, indicators and alerts.
• Group module improvements - templates, categories, improve editing features
• Data module improvements - smart grouping, intelligent editing, support for smartphone/tablet devices

There are several similar products currently on the market. Our main challenge is to differentiate from those services and to make our solution unique. We carefully analysed other products and recognized our advantages:
Simplicity: Focus on main income/expense groups, keeping the usage very simple, intuitive, user friendly and straightforward.
Prediction: Learning from the past, but focusing on the future, making it easy to recognize potential financial problems way in advance.
Simulation: Creating different scenarios in order to check possible outcomes and create sustainable budget.
Planing: Improving the personal discipline will result in maintaining healthy financial life.
If you are not able to contribute in raising the funds, you can still help us in achieving our goals:

• Create an account on www.fiq4me.com, try out the service and let us know if you find any bugs, lack of functionalities or just drop us an e-mail and state your impressions. This will help us in further development.
• Help us in translating the service in other languages.
• Share the info about the project with your friends on social networks. Feel free to share the link on our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/fiq4me/

Here's who we are, what we are doing and what we are up to:

• My name is Emuobosa and I'm working with Adewuyi on this project. We are software developers. I'm focused on managing solutions architecture for integrations and communication services while Adewuyi is focused on developing software and services for security and scaling of company software. We do this through Cronalia (www.cronalia.com)

• We are passionate about building affordable storefronts and landing pages hence we find it important to build a community of software developers who would help small businesses work on their concepts at a cheaper cost before they go about seeking funding - most importantly, we don't want them spending too much on turning concepts to prototype. To achieve this, we've developed the App Factory 360 System at www.appfactory360.com.

• For contributing to this project, we are ready to give you access to the community we are building and always have you featured on a roll basis as our sponsors. Well, if you're giving us at least $10,000, we can discuss equity.
<li>We would need to lease training halls with $5,000 (about NGN2 million) in stages for 3 months at Co-working Hubs in Abuja, Lagos and Port Harcourt, Nigeria
column2: another $5,000 (still around NGN2 million) for getting an office space with an Incubator in Abuja, Nigeria and the rest as cash for on-site campaigns and travels.

column1: • You get access to leverage on partnerships that help us grow. If you give us good integral partners e.g. Incubator Hubs, Co-working spaces, etc., you are sure to get a commission across board.

• If we don't reach our goals, we would settle in Ventures Platform, Abuja, Nigeria and make use of the free space benefits to train a few people as much as we can. At the least, what we get can be used for operational expenses.

• The Mobile App Development System would reduce the time it takes to bring ideas to life. Collecting feedback and connecting with end users has proven to keep customers better than transaction notifications.
• We have developed a Bulk SMS Mobile Service at www.mobi2sms.com and maintained it for 6 years. So far, we have a client branding the solution at www.fortemobilesms.com

• We are real and we have been solving problems. However, we want to move a step further from simply automating messaging to build customer retention initiatives to help startups getting ready for the future.
We would face risks and challenges but we are sure to win and here's why:
• We have struggled to keep and manage Mobi2SMS, even when other businesses were falling. We survived by providing a lot of other intuitive value added services for clients.

• We have a rock solid plan. We intend to minimize operational costs as much as possible. We would just be introducing our products to incubators at first - hence using our first savings for travels and brief meetings aimed at closing deals with channel partners.
You might not have the funds but you can help. Here's what we are asking for in two simple ways:
<li>Help us get places to go and people to train
column2: even for free. We know that if people are well trained, they would use our software. That's key!

column1: • Don't forget to give it a shot in this trial period. However, we can't wait to launch out in July. We just can't wait!

We hope that you look forward to the App Factory 360 Launch.

Kind Regards,
App Factory 360 Team

What is the Fidget Ki?

The Fidget Ki is a discreet fidgeting solution, that merges the familiarity and precision of keystrokes to a dedicated fidgeting platform. Roughly the size of a pack of gum, the gadget can easily be taken with you wherever you go. The standard platform’s integrated mechanical keyboard switches offer an intuitive and haptic fidgeting experience.

 

Why Ki?:

Ki (気), is a Japanese term with many meaning. Derived from the Chinese word Chi, the Japanese adaptation utilizes the kanji symbols for rice and steam, “combining a simple “inanimate” thing with an animation that brings it alive, as some sort of energy is released” (David Watts Barton).

This description of the fundamental meaning of ki exemplifies the intentions behind the functionality of the Fidget Ki, to enable users to release their nervous energy through a dedicated fidget mechanism.

 

Functionality:

Mechanical keyboard keys are designed to be pressed with longevity in mind. With these features and the ubiquity of notebooks and personal computers, using the Fidget Ki should prove to be a familiar and intuitive experience.
column2:
>

Actually, closer to 20 million. The Fidget Ki sources mechanical keys from quality manufacturers boasting average keystroke longevity in excess of the 20 million mark.

 

Options:

The Fidget Ki is currently offered in 3 different skews:

column1: 2x Blue Key Switches: Blue mechanical key switches make an audible clicking noise as the key is depressed and actuated, reminiscent to the sound that “old school” keyboards made. Ideal for those who want to an audible and haptic fidgeting experience.
2x Brown Key Switches: Brown mechanical key switches are designed not to click when depressed and actuated, resulting reduced noise and a more discreet fidgeting experience in public locations.
1x Blue and 1x Brown Key Switches (Combination): The best of both worlds.
Ways to Fidget with the Fidget Ki:
column3: >The Typist Method
column4: >The Console Gamer Method
column5: >The Typist Method
column7: >The PC Gamer Method
column9: >The Remote-Control Method
column11: >The Spider Method
column12:
> 

These are just a few examples to get you started. Choose or develop a fidgeting method that works best for you.

 

Timeline:

column1:
If any unforeseen production or development challenges arise that will push back our timeline, we will be certain to communicate with all our backers, concerning such delays.

 

Fund Usage Strategy:
• First round of injection mold production for ship-worthy Fidget Ki.

column2:
Challenges:

With a functioning set of prototypes and reliable manufacturing, we are confident that there is minimal risk to the success of this campaign's objectives. Unforeseen causes for production delays is the most probable risk. If any unforeseen production or development challenges arise that will push back our timeline, we will be certain to communicate with all our backers, concerning such delays.

 

FAQ:

If you have any questions or suggestions, please leave us a message.

 

About Ponder Mint:

Ponder Mint is a developing start-up focused on research and development ventures. We execute projects through inventive, innovative, and iterative means, taking on and testing ideas.

From board games to gadgets, we endeavor to explore viable and interesting concepts and make them a reality.

Embark with us as we ponder actionable solutions and novel concepts.

More About Ponder Mint:

Visit our website at www.pondermint.com

Please share and follow us on Facebook.

 

Disclaimer:

The Fidget Ki is not intended for unsupervised use by young children. The Fidget Ki contains small parts which could potentially pose a choking hazard if swallowed. The Fidget Ki is not designed to be disassembled.

WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD—Small parts

Not for children under 3 yrs.

column2: makeup artist for your upcoming wedding in a few months. You've trawled countless pages on Google and 'stalked' hundreds of Instagram beauty pros for weeks, messaging backwards and forwards trying to get prices and availability before finally booking someone.

column1: You’re so excited when your trial date arrives, but once your hair and makeup is done, you realise that the finished look is nothing like the photos on the artist's Instagram feed. Now you've wasted money on a trial and have to start your search all over again.
This is the harsh reality of booking hair stylists and makeup artists online.

Our very own co-founder, Zara (a professional makeup artist with over 16 years experience) has heard this story from her clients all too many times and she’s not alone. So many people have been disappointed with the outcome of their hair and/or makeup, leaving them frustrated and feeling like they have wasted precious time and money. No more…

Due to COVID-19, a multitude of brides have had to postpone their weddings, losing their original hair and makeup artist, and are now having to go through the dreaded search of finding a new artist they trust and love.

That’s one of the reasons why we’ve designed Glowify, the solution that every beauty user has been looking for. We're creating a platform to connect you with the absolute best, pre-vetted hair stylists and makeup artists in your area. You'll be able to:
• View artists portfolios, reviews and availability upfront.
• Chat to artists from within the app.
• Book trials and make payment securely through the app.
• Manage your calendar and book artists for a variety of occasions from weddings to parties.
You'll never have to second guess your next beauty booking.
By showcasing the absolute best selection of hair stylists and makeup artists we guarantee a seamless, first class beauty experience every time.

1 in 2 people say they have had a bad experience with a hair or makeup artist. Glowify aims to solve this by ensuring that all hair stylists and makeup artists on our platform are individually vetted before being granted access.
Simply put, if they don't meet our high exacting standards, they're not good enough for you.
We know how important it is to not overspend, so when you are searching for an artist you'll be able to filter by price to stay within your budget.

We believe in showcasing all professional artists, regardless of how much they charge. Experience and quality of work is what matters the most, and naturally, that can come at many different price points.
If the artist shows talent and has a proven track record of happy customers, they'll make the cut for Glowify.

With our intelligent recommendation engine and location based search, it's never been easier to find your perfect hair stylist or makeup artist near you. Search by venue, style or artist speciality and let Glowify do the rest.
Ideal for anyone who is looking to get their hair/makeup done for any occasion at any location and even businesses (e.g. Modelling agencies, TV &
column2: Media, Photographers) who are looking for hair and makeup artists on set.

column1: Of course, we're also on the lookout for amazing hair stylists and makeup artists to be featured on Glowify - If that sounds like you, then we'd love to hear from you.

Great question. Firstly, all hair stylists and makeup artists on Glowify have been individually hand-picked to ensure a first class service, every time. No other beauty service app offers this guaranteed level of quality.

In-built messaging allows users to ask questions and get to know artists before committing to booking their services. Glowify also has trial booking functionality to make organising various trials with different artists a breeze.

Right now, Glowify is in the development phase for both Android and iOS, and whilst most of the details and features are finalized, we still need your help to continue building the world’s most diverse beauty booking service featuring the best hair &
column2: makeup artists, specialising in all styles, skin tones and occasions.

column1: We plan to have Glowify full of the best beauty talent available on day 1 of release for you to book immediately. You'll never have a bad experience with a hair stylist or makeup artist again.
Here’s how we will use the funding:
• Mobile Development Includes: Paying our developers for their contributions and expanding the list of features post launch.
• Marketing Includes: Paying for content promotion through social media and in-person events.
• Operational Expenses Includes: Maintaining website content, hosting, and app store distribution fees.
If you can't donate to our campaign, here are some other options for you support Glowify:
• Follow us on Instagram at @glowifyapp
• Sign up for our newsletter at www.glowify.app
• Tell your friends about us to build up the excitement!
We’d like to thank all of you for the love, support, and donations towards this project, and we hope to provide you all with the best experience upon Glowify's release!

This is the harsh reality of booking hair stylists and makeup artists online.

Our very own co-founder, Zara (a professional makeup artist with over 16 years experience) has heard this story from her clients all too many times and she’s not alone. So many people have been disappointed with the outcome of their hair and/or makeup, leaving them frustrated and feeling like they have wasted precious time and money. No more…

Due to COVID-19, a multitude of brides have had to postpone their weddings, losing their original hair and makeup artist, and are now having to go through the dreaded search of finding a new artist they trust and love.

That’s one of the reasons why we’ve designed Glowify, the solution that every beauty user has been looking for. We're creating a platform to connect you with the absolute best, pre-vetted hair stylists and makeup artists in your area. You'll be able to:
View artists portfolios, reviews and availability upfront.
Chat to artists from within the app.
Book trials and make payment securely through the app.
Manage your calendar and book artists for a variety of occasions from weddings to parties.
You'll never have to second guess your next beauty booking.
By showcasing the absolute best selection of hair stylists and makeup artists we guarantee a seamless, first class beauty experience every time.

1 in 2 people say they have had a bad experience with a hair or makeup artist. Glowify aims to solve this by ensuring that all hair stylists and makeup artists on our platform are individually vetted before being granted access.
Simply put, if they don't meet our high exacting standards, they're not good enough for you.
We know how important it is to not overspend, so when you are searching for an artist you'll be able to filter by price to stay within your budget.

We believe in showcasing all professional artists, regardless of how much they charge. Experience and quality of work is what matters the most, and naturally, that can come at many different price points.
If the artist shows talent and has a proven track record of happy customers, they'll make the cut for Glowify.

With our intelligent recommendation engine and location based search, it's never been easier to find your perfect hair stylist or makeup artist near you. Search by venue, style or artist speciality and let Glowify do the rest.

Ideal for anyone who is looking to get their hair/makeup done for any occasion at any location and even businesses (e.g. Modelling agencies, TV & Media, Photographers) who are looking for hair and makeup artists on set.
Of course, we're also on the lookout for amazing hair stylists and makeup artists to be featured on Glowify - If that sounds like you, then we'd love to hear from you.

Great question. Firstly, all hair stylists and makeup artists on Glowify have been individually hand-picked to ensure a first class service, every time. No other beauty service app offers this guaranteed level of quality.

In-built messaging allows users to ask questions and get to know artists before committing to booking their services. Glowify also has trial booking functionality to make organising various trials with different artists a breeze.

Right now, Glowify is in the development phase for both Android and iOS, and whilst most of the details and features are finalized, we still need your help to continue building the world’s most diverse beauty booking service featuring the best hair & makeup artists, specialising in all styles, skin tones and occasions.
We plan to have Glowify full of the best beauty talent available on day 1 of release for you to book immediately. You'll never have a bad experience with a hair stylist or makeup artist again.
Here’s how we will use the funding:
Mobile Development Includes: Paying our developers for their contributions and expanding the list of features post launch.
Marketing Includes: Paying for content promotion through social media and in-person events.
Operational Expenses Includes: Maintaining website content, hosting, and app store distribution fees.
Legal Includes: Banking and Indiegogo fees.
If you can't donate to our campaign, here are some other options for you support Glowify:
Sign up for our newsletter at www.glowify.app
Tell your friends about us to build up the excitement!
We’d like to thank all of you for the love, support, and donations towards this project, and we hope to provide you all with the best experience upon Glowify's release!",20.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Almost all businesses are going online. Chances are you are a business owner, or you know someone who is.

Every small business deserves the best tools to perform smooth day-to-day operations and stay connected with customers 24hrs a day and 365 days a year. Smart Fingers 365 will give you that much-needed edge. Here is what you can gain from Smart Fingers 365:

Smart Fingers 365 Invoice Management System is an online internal and external business system that helps manage invoice documents between businesses and customers. User can receive their payment electronically using the invoice.

column2: ><strong>Create, Manage, Track Contracts and Milestones on a Fixed &amp

column1: Smart Fingers 365 Contract Management System is designed to manage contracts between businesses, vendors, partners, customers, and contractors. Manage all contracts and milestones, set your contract on hourly or fixed payment, and track them accordingly.

Smart Fingers 365 Scheduling System do more than just manage schedules, it allows users to use their Online Presence share their work hours on their calendars, manage their team members, manage their services/products, and their Online Presence (Personalized website)

column2: >Secure document management, eSignature, Shareable with clients
sign is designed to help manage all types of documents securely, create documents, and use e-signature to sign documents. Smart Fingers 365  offers sharing documents securely.

column1: Smart Fingers 365 Collaboration System is designed to facilitate efficient sharing of data, documents, files, information, and knowledge between teams, and clients. Create a project, assign team members, give them tasks, add your customer to the project also.
Smart Fingers 365 Messaging System is designed as a secure electronic communicating system, where only the communicating users can read the messages. It prevents potential eavesdroppers.
Smart Fingers 365 Smart meeting is designed to allow users to schedule video conferencing, webinars with their clients and team members via a secure video communications technology system.

Smart Fingers 365 is designed to help the business in sales to track goods throughout the entire supply chain, from purchasing to production to end sales. It governs how you approach inventory management for your business.
Smart Fingers 365 Clients/Customers Management System is designed as a database to manage your customers.
Smart Fingers 365 enables you to manage your online payments seamlessly with PayPal, Stripe, and Square integrations

column1: Because we want your business to have great support we designed our application to contain step-by-step guides, videos, system information, and a ticket system to make our support for you easy and quick.
Has always been a big deal for small businesses. As the most significant software market globally with no signs of slowing down, it’s not hard to see why.
Every small business owner that has adopted some form of CRM software has experienced:
• Keep track of appointments with your customized calendar, services/products, team members, and online presence
• Send invoices to clients and view them in real-time
• Manage your online payments seamlessly with PayPal, Stripe, and Square integrations

column2: track contracts and milestones on a fixed &amp

column1: • Secure document management, eSignature, shareable with internal clients and external clients
We can give small businesses a chance to grow and excel in this harsh business environment. You need a level playing field to compete with others in your industry. We can make this happen.
We are aware that this project has its risks and challenges. However, we have studied this extensively and believe that we are uniquely positioned to scale it all.

Our major challenge is the presence of competitors that offer similar services. The difference is that Smart Fingers 365 is a project of Net Cata which is founded to help small businesses so, Smart Fingers 365  will be way more affordable, as you won't need to spend a lot of money on a premium subscription like most these popular applications.
Also, we appeal more to the needs of small business owners who need an all-in-one space to deal with everything necessary to ensure the smooth flow of business operations.

Small business owners no longer have to install several applications to handle a variety of tasks. Smart Fingers 365 is that all-in-one smart application design to make it easy for small businesses to scale quickly and manage their tasks.

Want to start the year with a little bit of peace, space and calm? Are you ready to focus, slow down and de-stress? Meet the new DO EPIC HAPPY 2018 Planner. Your wellbeing companion for the year!

Modern life is hectic and relentless: trains delayed, endless emails filling the inbox, getting kids to bed... There has never been a more important time to rediscover your pause button. Whether you're a full-on planner addict or someone who's just got big plans, take one day at a time with this planner. Structured in a way to help you focus on positive experiences. The DO EPIC HAPPY 2018 Planner offers inspiration, a moment of reflection, focus on your most important tasks and affirmations.

Mindfulness has been linked with improvement in productivity and focus, increased self-awareness and helps change unhealthy habits. This is a mindfulness planner to keep you Happy &
column3:
Mindful. You can practice gratitude and meditation with this Planner. Filled with interesting information on mindfulness, such as benefits and techniques, meditation exercises and reflection pages, the planner helps you live in the moment and provides ways to improve mental and physical well-being.

This premium planner contains the simple tools, tricks and habits that will change the rest of your life. It is a practical and pleasurable, with part of the book in beautiful patterns and Mandala patterns to colour in and de-stress.

 

The DO EPIC HAPPY 2018 Planner combines both the practicality of a goal planner and the benefits of mindfulness. Learn how and why the Planner and Mindfulness can help master a smarter you.

 

 

PLANNER ⋆ BENEFITS 

1. Helps manage time 
2. Keeps track of daily tasks and appointments 
3. Stores important events to remember 
4. Clears the mind 
5. Increases productivity 
6. Organises various goals 
7. Records special memories and moments 

MINDFULNESS ⋆ BENEFITS 

1. Better anxiety management 
2. Reduces negative thoughts and rumination 
3. Stress reduction 
4. Boosts working memory and attention 
5. Less emotional reactivity 
6. Relationship satisfaction 
7. Improves well-being

The DO EPIC HAPPY 2018 Planner is for anyone. Here are examples to name a few...

#Planner Addicts 
#Bloggers 
#Academics 
#Students 
#Busy Parents 
#Visionaries 
#Business Owners 
#Professionals 
#Entrepreneurs 
#Go-Getters

 

WHAT DO YOU GET

⇒ Original Design. Beautifully British Designed.
⇒ Quality. Printed in the UK and produced using high-quality materials. This is a premium planner, designed with you in mind. 
⇒ Book size. A5 format (5.83"" x 8.27""/ 14.8×21cm). It's the perfect size for a handbag/ manbag/ baby bag, desk or counter top. 
⇒ Feature. Two Satin bookmark ribbons 
⇒ Paper. 90gsm / 24 lb. White, uncoated, wood free paper.
⇒ Content. Over 250 pages*. Feel lifted and inspired by a ""colour me in"" page and quote/ aspiration for every month. (*This may increase, will notify if this changes.) 
⇒ Cover. Durable flexible cover. 
⇒ Lay-flat design. Yes, every page stays perfectly flat. Which means you can focus on your work, rather than wrestling with the pages.
⇒ Two Satin bookmark ribbons. Never lose your page with two wayfinding ribbons that will always point the way.
⇒ Organise your thinking. We’ve added a few extras blank pages to help keep your thoughts in check. 
⇒ Elastic closure. Keeps the contents together and even use it as a pen holder.
column4:
>An example of the start pages.

*Example pages shown here are based on a prototype designed book. The actual notebook will have rounded corners.
column5:
>An example of the monthly sections (January).

WHAT'S INSIDE ME? 

The DO EPIC HAPPY 2018 Planner has the following layouts:

✔ Date Range - January 2018 to December 2018 (Yearly Diary) 
✔ 12 months of happy! 
✔ Monthly pages to de-stress, unwind and colour! 
✔ Draw yourself happy 
✔ Colour wheel 
✔ Public Holidays 2018 
✔ Very important dates 
✔ Calendar year view - January 2018 - December 2018 
✔ Full month view - (Sunday - Saturday) 
✔ Daily pages 
✔ Daily schedule spots from 5am - 10pm 
✔ Daily To-Dos 
✔ Daily reflection and positive thinking 
✔ Daily gratitude 
✔ Daily notes 
✔ Turn your dreams into plans 
✔ Dream Board - achievements so far 
✔ Travel and adventure 
✔ My Bucket List 
✔ My New Year's resolutions list 
✔ Sum up your year 
✔ Top goals 
✔ Road Map exercise - exercises that help you define, create actions for your goals in months, years and throughout your life. 
✔ Habit Tracker - Change your habit(s) in 30 Days
✔ Monthly Plan - Monthly goals 
✔ Monthly goal achieving strategies 
✔ Monthly problem-solving strategies 
✔ Monthly inspiration quotes and affirmations throughout 
✔ Weekly + Daily plan 
✔ Daily mindfulness 
✔ Monthly Reflection 
✔ Pause And Escape - Adult colouring and mindfulness 
✔ Year reflection 
✔ Note pages


Get the most out of your planner.

“As a businessman, I look to all aids which can help me approach my day with a balanced mind looking for successful outcomes. I have used many of these types of planners in the past, but this year I am using this brand's planner. It's turning out to be one of the best years ever. I will be using the Do Epic Planner next year as I would like to repeat the business and personal success of today.” - Simon, Managing Director 

“Love the daily suggestions. Keeps you mindful. :-)” - Alison Barratt, Product Development Manager.

“Being a ""to-do-list"" person, I love the Epic Planner! It helps me organise my daily tasks and also assists with achieving the goals I set for myself. What makes it even more appealing are the unique activities you can do in between all the planning. Would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fun and easy way to organize their daily tasks!” - Beema Jamal, Solicitor.

“This planner is gorgeous! It is helping me to organise my year so that I can make 2017 the best yet! I love all the inspirational quotes and it's got such a beautiful design which really appeals to the creative in me! It's helping me to integrate more of what makes me happy into my daily routine which I'd say is crucial to running a business and my well being! ” - Faye Mosshammer, Professional Makeup Artist + Teacher

“This planner is great. It's really unique in its design and how it helps you integrate all aspects of your daily life as well as your business. Am finding it a really positive tool in my life and business.” - Julie Blenkharn, Counselor.

“While I use digital tools to organise my schedule, I find this mindfulness planner extremely useful in making me take a moment out from the busyness of life. It helps me to pen down my reflections, refocus and be clearer on what I need to do next.” - Serene Toh, Business Manager.

ADD-ONS - TBC.
To purchase an add-on click on the ""BACK IT"" button at the top of the page. In the Contribute menu enter the amount for the add-on(s) that you wish to purchase then select ""No perk, I Just want to contribute."" Your Add-On selection will be confirmed in the BackerKit post-campaign survey sent before fulfilment begins.

 

STRETCH GOAL!
Unlock Limited Edition Colours! 

We would love to offer you a further three more colours. Unlock colours Mint, Blush Pink and Coal Grey. Details to follow after reaching pledged goal.

Why Indiegogo?

Crowdfunding is all about people pulling together to help bring into the world something that’s epic. The Do Epic project is about pulling together to bring out the best in people. So it was a natural choice for us to bring the Do Epic Happy 2018 Planner to Indiegogo and get you to join our incredible journey.

Reaching our campaign goals will enable us to keep developing powerful, practical planners and tools to help busy people achieve, tackle their goals and be happier. Our mission is to continually translate the success, strategies and habits of high performance into meaningful, yet simple tools that will guide you to become a better you. We are already in the advanced planning stages of designing the exciting new planner and your backing can make it happen!

Thank you for your support!

We can't say it enough. Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to get the Do Epic Happy 2018 Planner in your hands.

Share and follow us.

www.facebook.com/doepiccom

www.twitter.com/doepiccom

www.instagram.com/doepiccom

ABOUT THE BRAND.

PAPER LIBERTY LTD is a multi-channel lifestyle brand, specialising in print and printable personalised designs, stylish gifts, stationery and organising tools. PAPER LIBERTY LTD strives to create inspirational and stylish designs that can be treasured as a keepsake forever.

 

Risks and challenges

From our industry experience in graphic design, typography and print, we consider the risks of the project relatively low. We have thoroughly researched and worked with a very good professional vendor. The only risks will be manufacturing and shipping times, there are always events outside of our control (i.e. weather) that could delay in shipping. Our goal is to deliver the planners as soon as possible and kindly ask in advance is for patience and that backers respond to the information survey as quickly as possible.

⇒ PLEASE NOTE: Please be aware that colours can vary from monitor to monitor and also from monitor to print. The inner page designs may vary slightly, and any updates will be notified immediately.

We have taken the utmost care in compiling this book, however, we cannot accept responsibility for any errors or changes herein.

⇒ PLEASE NOTE FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS - Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine these additional costs prior to purchasing. 
Ultimately, our aim is to make sure you are happy and receive your product on time. Any questions do not hesitate to message us.
